column1: p
(:Text {content:  Captain, Doctor, I am honored by your presence, but may I suggest you attend the second concert.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Why, Data?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Ensign Ortiz will perform the violin part. My rendition will be less enjoyable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Oh?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  While I am quite proficient Technically, according to my fellow performers, I lack soul.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Data, telling us why you're going to fail before you make the attempt is never wise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  But is not honesty always the preferred choice?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Excessive honesty can be disastrous... particularly in a commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Indeed?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Knowing your limitations is one thing. Advertising them to a crew can damage your ability to lead.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Because you lose their respect?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  No, because you may begin to believe in those limitations yourself.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Captain, we're receiving a message from the Sheliak Corporate.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2A})
(:Text {content:  Origin point of the message confirmed. It is from the Shelia star system.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  The Sheliak have not attempted to communicate with the Federation for a hundred and eleven years.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  On screen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})

(:Text {content:  Federation creatures, there are humans on the fifth planet of Tau Cygna. This planet was ceded to the corporate in section one hundred and thirty-three, paragraph seventy-seven of the Treaty of Armens. We will begin settlement of this world in four days. Remove the humans.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  What the devil --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Federation creatures, there are humans on the fifth planet --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Cancel message.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Tau Cygna Five is in the de Laure belt -- heavy concentrations of hyperonic radiation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Humans can't survive in such an environment. Exposure to hyperonic radiation is fatal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Then the Sheliak are asking us to chase ghosts.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  No, Number One. The Sheliak haven't broken a century of silence to send us after phantoms. An investigation is in order. Set course for Tau Cygna Five.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Human life form readings from the planet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  So, the Sheliak weren't hallucinating.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Numbers?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Impossible to get an accurate reading, Captain. The high radiation levels are disrupting our sensors.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Hyperonic radiation also interferes with ship's transporters; they are now inoperable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  So are the ship's phasers.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  How can humans survive down there?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})

(:Text {content:  They must have found a way to adapt. Milan's work in radiation sensitivity suggests it's possible. Perhaps with extensive virotherapy... Until they found the answer, their mortality rate must have been staggering.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Well, whoever they are and however they've survived, we've got to get them off the planet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  By treaty, this world does belong to the Sheliak...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  to demand the removal of these \"trespassers.\"})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  And if we don't remove them, the Sheliak will.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  How forcefully?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  To the Sheliak, humans are a lower life form. They'd have no compunctions about exterminating the intruders.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Mister Data. As you are unaffected by hyperonic radiation, you will go to the planet via shuttlecraft and commence evacuation procedures.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Any speculation as to what he'll find, Number One?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  A lost survey ship would be my guess. A dozen or so survivors at most.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  A shuttlecraft!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7A})
(:Text {content:  Where's it from?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7A})
(:Text {content:  Look at the markings. I think it's from the Federation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7A})
(:Text {content:  Hello.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7A})
(:Text {content:  We saw your ship... You're the first visitor we've had in...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7A})
(:Text {content:  The first visitor we've ever had.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7A})
(:Text {content:  You're -- not human.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7A})
(:Text {content:  That is correct. I am an android. I am Lieutenant Commander Data of the Federation Starship Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7A})
(:Text {content:  Our great-grandparents were citizens of the Federation. But you don't want to waste time talking to us...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7A})
(:Text {content:  You'll want to speak with Gosheven. We'll take you to him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7A})
(:Text {content:  Excellent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7A})
(:Text {content:  I'm sure the Federation will be very proud of us. Wait until you see all we've accomplished.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7A})
(:Text {content:  And who, precisely, is \"we?\"})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7A})
(:Text {content:  You don't know? No, I guess you wouldn't, would you? We are the descendants of the original settlers -- from the colony ship Artemis.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7A})

(:Text {content:  Got it. The Artemis, launched one hundred forty-two years ago, destination Septimis Minor. When they failed to check in, Starfleet began an extensive search.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  What carried the Artemis so far off course?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  My local informant does not know. In the early days survival on Tau Cygna Five was more important than history.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Understood. How many are there?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Approximately fifteen thousand.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  We've only got three days. Without working transporters, we couldn't have them out in time.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Shuttles?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Loading all the Enterprise shuttlecraft to capacity -- evacuation would take four weeks, four days.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Then we need more time. Mister Data, prepare the colonists for an evacuation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Mister Worf, get me the Sheliak.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Their home world is quite distant, Captain. This will take some time.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Gosheven, look what's come --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Commander Data of the Starship Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  He's an android.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  So he is. Well, you're here -- what do you want?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  My mission is to prepare this colony for evacuation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Why?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Because this planet belongs to the Sheliak.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  And just who is this Sheliak?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  The term is plural. The Sheliak are an intelligent, non-humanoid life form, classification R-3 --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})

(:Text {content:  This colony's been here for a hundred and forty years -- and no one's ever seen a Sheliak. I'd say that makes Tau Cygna Five our planet. (ALTERNATE: ninety years)})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  But the original destination of the Artemis was Septimis Minor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  The guidance systems on the Artemis failed -- and sent them off course. Far off course. Our ancestors were lucky to find any place to land.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  And when they did, the radiation started killing them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Hyperonic radiation took the lives of a third of the colonists before they learned they could adapt to it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  But the colony survived -- and prospered.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Look around. We've brought water to the desert, built a community.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Your accomplishments are indeed remarkable. However, the Sheliak and the Federation have a treaty that clearly makes this planet Sheliak domain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Then change the treaty.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})

(:Text {content:  That may not be possible. The Sheliak wish to colonize this planet, and they are unwilling to share it with humans. If you are still here when the Sheliak colony ship arrives, they will eradicate you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  They would kill us all?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  They have little regard for human life. Thus, our most sensible course is to prepare a contingency plan for the evacuation of your people.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  We're not evacuating.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps I have not made myself clear.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})

(:Text {content:  Yes, you have. Now let me be equally clear. There's going to be no evacuation. You've delivered your message -- so go back to your ship. I have work to do.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Nice catch. Wonderful reflexes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11A})
(:Text {content:  Sorry to test you like that -- but I was curious.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11B})
(:Text {content:  Found a new toy, have we, Ardy?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11B})
(:Text {content:  Toy? This is the most incredible android I've ever seen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11B})
(:Text {content:  Have you seen many?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11B})
(:Text {content:  Actually, no. You're the first.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11B})
(:Text {content:  Only you would get this excited over a walking calculator.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11B})
(:Text {content:  He's more interesting than anything else walking around here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11B})
(:Text {content:  Depends on what you find interesting.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11B})
(:Text {content:  Cybernetic intelligence fascinates me. Are your neural pathways duotronic?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11B})
(:Text {content:  No -- they are positronic.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11B})
(:Text {content:  I didn't know that was possible! What's your memory capacity? How many operations per second? I have a million questions...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11B})

(:Text {content:  I am afraid I have no time to answer one million questions. I have a mission to accomplish. I need to know more about your people, and Gosheven seems unwilling to talk to me further.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11B})
(:Text {content:  I'm Ard'rian McKenzie. Perhaps I can help you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11B})
(:Text {content:  Gentlemen, we're giving you an assignment, and the one thing we don't want to hear is that it is impossible.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  I need the transporters to function despite the hyperonic radiation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Impossi -- Yes, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Even if we can get the Sheliak to talk to us, they're not likely to be accommodating.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Captain, when the treaty was negotiated the Federation sent three hundred and seventy-two legal experts. What have we got?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Thee... and me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  No response.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Try again. Boost signal strength.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Sheliak Corporate. This is the Starship Enterprise. Respond please.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Conversation is neither required nor desired.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Conversation is necessary if we are to find a solution to our mutual problem.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Our involvement in Federation illegality is not indicated.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Both parties are involved, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Remove the humans from the Tau Cygna system. Three Earth days remain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Their culture is extremely formal, almost ritualistic. An apology might smooth matters.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  I apologize for our inadvertent violation of the treaty.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Acknowledged and accepted. Now remove the human creatures.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Let us negotiate in good faith...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Negotiate to what purpose? The treaty is signed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  There is a thriving colony on the planet. Rather than uproot these people may I offer a compromise?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Denied.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Why?!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  The law is paramount. We are entitled.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  This is not a law. It is a treaty. It is designed to smooth relations between peoples. Not to act as a strait...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Off Picard's annoyed expression.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  The possibility exists, and Gosheven appears unwilling to prepare for it. Why?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Maybe because you're an android. I don't think Gosheven likes the idea of machines ordering him around.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})

(:Text {content:  I am not ordering him to do anything; I am merely trying to persuade him that his people should prepare to evacuate. Do you believe my suggested course of action should be followed?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Of course.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  In spite of the fact that I am an android?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Because of that fact. I don't have any silly prejudices against computers -- I like them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Not that any computer we have is half as sophisticated as you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  No, I would say not.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Data follows her logic:})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  You conclude from this that I am impartial... hence you accept my recommendations.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Yet Gosheven does not. Perhaps he might reconsider his position if someone other than myself were to present the arguments.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})

(:Text {content:  Well, I'm willing to talk to him, but I don't think he'll take me seriously. He finds me attractive -- but I'm not interested in him at all. So he belittles me to protect his ego --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Data, here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  The Sheliak won't bargain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Understood.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  I'm contacting Starfleet to arrange for transport. Get those people prepared for evacuation. We may have to move very quickly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Yes, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  We must speak with Gosheven immediately.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Gentlemen, how are you coming? What the hell is that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19A})
(:Text {content:  Our first attempt.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19A})
(:Text {content:  We recalibrated the transporter setting for the tightest possible beam.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19A})
(:Text {content:  But we've got plenty of things left to try.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19A})
(:Text {content:  There's some really interesting residue . . . reminds me of -- There's that damn pulsar in the neighborhood.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19A})
(:Text {content:  Teremi-thorons.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19A})
(:Text {content:  This just got a lot harder.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19A})
(:Text {content:  They're one of the most elusive sub-atomic particles known, and they really shred a transporter signal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19A})
(:Text {content:  Thank you, Ensign, I passed physics. Keep at it. We need those transporters.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19A})
(:Text {content:  We're going to have a lot of fun cracking this one.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19A})
(:Text {content:  See that? Do you have any idea what it is? What it means?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  It is water, a substance composed of two atoms of hydrogen --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})

(:Text {content:  It's not water. It's blood and sweat -- the result of a hundred and forty years of combined effort. (ALTERNATE: ninety years) This isn't a town. It's a monument to every man, woman, and child who has lived and died on Tau Cygna Five.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Gosheven, you're talking nonsense.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})

(:Text {content:  Am I? My grandfather's buried on that mountain. He died in a rock slide surveying the route for this aqueduct. This colony exists because of his sacrifice, and the sacrifices of thousands of others. No, we're not leaving.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  The Sheliak will not accept humans on their planet. And they will not hesitate to use force to remove you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  And we will not hesitate to fight back.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  You cannot win.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  You just don't understand, do you? We will not be bullied off our land... not by you, and not by the Sheliak.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Stubborn and irrational. Now what do we do?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Are his sentiments typical among the colonists?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  I hope not. Are you thinking of bypassing Gosheven and taking your case directly to the people?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  I see no other course of action. If I can convince enough people of the necessity of leaving --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Don't you mean \"if we can convince?\"})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  You are offering assistance?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Yes, sir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22B})
(:Text {content:  Three weeks. Starfleet is profuse in their apologies, but it will still be three weeks.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22B})
(:Text {content:  Until?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22B})
(:Text {content:  Until the arrival of a colony transport ship equipped with dedicated personnel shuttles.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22B})
(:Text {content:  We can't wait three weeks.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22B})
(:Text {content:  The Sheliak must agree to extend our deadline.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22B})
(:Text {content:  If they plan to settle Tau Cygna Five two days from now...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22B})
(:Text {content:  We're going to intercept that ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22B})
(:Text {content:  The Sheliak may interpret that as a hostile act.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22B})
(:Text {content:  We have to take the risk.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22B})
(:Text {content:  The Enterprise is going to try to intercept the Sheliak colony ship. Your job ... well, you know your job.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})

(:Text {content:  Commander, in human parlance, I do not believe I can \"get the job done.\" My training has prepared me for starship command duties. As a cultural contact I am proving to be less than exemplary.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  What's the situation?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Their leader has rejected my counsel. He denies the logic of my arguments and talks of structures they have built.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Then try something else.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})

(:Text {content:  I have. In the last three hours and eight minutes, I have spoken to fifty-six colonists. Ten refused to believe a threat exists. Twenty-two favored staying and fighting the Sheliak.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  I don't have time for this.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Sixteen preferred negotiation or some form of passive resistance. Only eight were willing to consider evacuation. And of those eight --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})

(:Text {content:  Data, I can't help you -- I don't know these people; I haven't talked to them. You have. Use that fancy positronic brain of yours -- and carry out your mission.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  If I do not succeed, how violent is the Sheliak reaction likely to be?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  The treaty is the only thing which kept them from eradicating the colony the moment they discovered it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Ah.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  \"Ah\" is right. The lives of fifteen thousand people are riding on you. You'd better get innovative. Riker out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Data -- we're having an effect. So many people are asking questions about the Sheliak that Gosheven's called a public meeting.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Is there any indication that Gosheven has changed his position?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  No. But a meeting will give you the chance to present your recommendations.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  First, will Gosheven allow me to speak? Second, even if he does, what good will it do? So far, my attempts at persuasion have been ineffective.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Why did you do that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  You appeared to need it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Among humans, a kiss normally serves to seal a friendship or to indicate support, attraction, affection.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  In this context, I would assume your intention was to express support.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  That was my primary motivation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  You don't really understand human behavior, do you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  That is something of an understatement.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Sometimes I don't either. androids are a lot more rational.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Thus far, that quality has not helped me accomplish my mission.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  A rational argument isn't always enough. Maybe to be more persuasive, you need to use a little reverse psychology.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Elicit a desired behavior by advocating its opposite? That implies deception, does it not?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  A little. But if it helps us get our point across...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps this is a situation in which excessive honesty is detrimental.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  How are we progressing, Mister La Forge?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  About like you'd expect.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Splendid.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  He wants the impossible.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  That's the short definition for \"captain.\"})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  You've all heard about the android Starfleet sent here, and you've been discussing why he's come.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  I called this meeting to replace misinformation with cold, hard fact.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Leave. Immediately.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  I wish to speak.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  No.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  You deny me the opportunity to address the assemblage?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  This meeting is not for outsiders.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Do you consider your position so weak that it cannot withstand debate?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Let him talk.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})

(:Text {content:  You know of the Sheliak threat. Starfleet wishes to evacuate you for your own protection. Gosheven has decided otherwise. That is his right. And I will not waste time trying to reverse that decision.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})

(:Text {content:  I admire your conviction in the face of certain defeat. Your effort will be valiant, though doomed. Still, when you die, you will die for land and honor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Your children will understand that they are dying for a worthy cause.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Long after the battle is over, their courage will be remembered and extolled.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Remembered by who?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Ah, that is true. There will be no one left alive to remember.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  A valiant try, android, but what a low opinion you must have of us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  I was simply attempting to describe your inevitable destruction in a manner that would have an emotional effect.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  And he did it pretty damned well.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})

(:Text {content:  Are you ready to follow this machine, Haritath? Give up everything? Without a fight? He says we're going to lose, I think that's his own cowardice talking!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  And what if he's right, and you're wrong? Shouldn't we consider that possibility?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  We may be sacrificing ourselves for nothing --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Last winter we buried your little girl -- laid her to rest next to your mother, and you dare speak of sacrifice?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  And you, Kentor, we built you a new house after the fire wiped you out. Can you simply walk away from that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Better to walk away than to be annihilated.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})

(:Text {content:  This colony exists because generations gave their lives for it. Many people died before we found a way to adapt to the radiation. Many more died bringing water to the desert. My father --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Well, who's going to be left to bury you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})

(:Text {content:  Have you considered what this evacuation means? Everything we have, we abandon. Everything we've built turns into dust. Everything we've accomplished means nothing. Well, I say NO! You elected me to be your leader -- follow me now! I don't think our chances are as hopeless as he says. And I'm willing to stake our lives on it. Any objections?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Good, because here... we... stand.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Then here you die.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Maybe if we bypassed the autosequence and decompiled the pattern buffer... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  It's no crazier than anything else we've tried.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Ensign Crusher.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Yes, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  If you ever touch my transporter again... I'll kill you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Sorry, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Mister Data -- I want to tell you that... well, Gosheven doesn't speak for all of us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  I see no point in dying needlessly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  And you, Kentor?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  I'm not sure. Gosheven has done well for us. But I'd like to hear more of what you have to say.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  There are many others that feel the same way but are uneasy about confronting Gosheven.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  Get them together. We'll meet at my house.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  In our dealings with other non-humanoid races there has been some point of reference; not so with the Sheliak.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  We must have something in common. We communicate.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Barely. The Sheliak have learned several Federation languages, but theirs continues to elude us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Telepaths?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Attempted and failed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  This is ludicrous!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  No, sir, the fact that any alien race communicates with another is quite remarkable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  We are stranded on a planet. No language in common, but I want to teach you mine.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  S'smarith. What did I just say?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Cup? Glass?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Are you sure? I might have meant liquid, clear, brown, hot. And we conceptualize the universe in relatively the same way.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Point taken.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})

(:Text {content:  During your talks you must be extremely accurate. The treaty is 500,000 words. The length was to accommodate the Sheliak. They consider our language irrational, and demanded this level of complexity to avoid any future misunderstandings.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Captain, we have the vessel carrying the Sheliak colonists on visual.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  On my way. So it begins.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Open hailing frequencies. This is Captain Jean-Luc Picard of the Starship Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Your purpose, Enterprise?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  We desire face-to-face negotiation to settle the crisis on Tau Cygna Five.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  We are entitled to consultation under paragraph five hundred and sixty-three subparagraph nine.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Granted.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Was that an invitation?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  I'm going to take it as such. Number One, you have the bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Helm, maintain relative position. Mister Worf, have Transporter Room Two stand by.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  resettles us, we'll be left alone?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  If you so desire.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  We do. We like doing things on our own.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  The Federation will offer as little or as much help as you dictate.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Kentor -- are you with us?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Yes. The question is, how do we convince Gosheven?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Why do we need to?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Because he's respected. Most people will do as he says.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  The people respect you, too. If you take a stand, they'll fall in line.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  I don't know. Gosheven's got a lot of supporters...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Don't forget that, Kentor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  I'm disappointed. I thought we had settled this.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40B})
(:Text {content:  Apparently, that is not correct.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40B})
(:Text {content:  Still stirring up trouble?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40B})
(:Text {content:  Since when is talk trouble?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40B})
(:Text {content:  It's over. Don't you get it? You had your say, and you lost.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40B})
(:Text {content:  I appear to be reversing that defeat.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40B})
(:Text {content:  No, you're not -- you're just stubborn. Well, let me tell you something...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40B})
(:Text {content:  Gosheven touches Data with an electronic prod -- BLUE SPARKS dance over Data. Data's whole body stiffens})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40B})
(:Text {content:  You killed him?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40B})
(:Text {content:  I've killed no one. I've merely shut down a machine.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40B})
(:Text {content:  That's it, everyone. Time to go home.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40B})
(:Text {content:  You'll see I'm right.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40D})
(:Text {content:  Advance and speak.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Director, we will comply with your request to remove the colony on Tau Cygna Five, but we need time.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  The given time has elapsed. We carry the membership and we will proceed with their debarkation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  The temporary presence of these humans should not interfere with your plans.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Unacceptable. You must remove the creatures.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  I'm trying! But the needed ship won't be available for three weeks.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Then you are in violation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  I have admitted that! I'm only asking for a little tolerance.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})

(:Text {content:  Section five hundred and one, paragraph seven hundred and sixteen, subparagraph five -- unwanted lifeforms inhabiting H class worlds may be removed at the discretion of the Sheliak corporate.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  We will remove them. But you must grant us the time we require.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  You need time, Picard of the Enterprise, we will save you time. We will eradicate the human infestation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  They are not vermin! They are citizens of the Federation and I will not permit this travesty!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Intelligent converse is impossible. You do not discuss, you gibber.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Between intelligent species of good will --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  I take it the Sheliak just hung up on us. Again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  I was afraid your neural pathways were scrambled beyond repair.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42A})
(:Text {content:  I am equipped with diagnostic circuits and can correct many malfunctions.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42A})
(:Text {content:  I'm not surprised at Gosheven's behavior. But Kentor and the others... they said they were on our side. I guess words don't mean very much.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42A})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps that has been part of our difficulty. Words are all we have been using. Humans seem to take much stronger notice of actions.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42A})
(:Text {content:  I require a phaser.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42A})
(:Text {content:  What's a phaser?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42A})
(:Text {content:  A type of weapon. Unfortunately it will not function in the presence of hyperonic radiation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42A})
(:Text {content:  I will have to be innovative.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42A})

(:Text {content:  Hyperonic radiation randomizes phaser beams. But I believe I can improvise a servocircuit which will compensate by continuously recollimating the output.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42B})
(:Text {content:  You're using your own neural subprocessors to build a smarter phaser.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42B})
(:Text {content:  Essentially correct.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42B})
(:Text {content:  Get word to Gosheven. Tell him I am coming to the pumping station. Tell him I am going to destroy the aqueduct.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42B})
(:Text {content:  He'll try to stop you --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42B})
(:Text {content:  I sincerely hope so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42B})
(:Text {content:  Go to Yellow Alert. Shields up.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Mister Riker, put us nose to nose with the Sheliak ship. If she makes a move, match it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Open a hailing frequency.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  They're not responding, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  They don't have to answer. They just have to listen! Sheliak vessel, you will have to go through me to get at the colony on Tau Cygna Five!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  No response.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})

(:Text {content:  Close channel -- and get me that treaty! They've been beating us over the head with it for three days. Let's see if we can't find something in it that can be turned to our advantage.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  We're going to try to beat them at their own game?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  The treaty is how long?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Five hundred thousand words.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  We are going to regret Data's absence.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  That was the \"stun\" setting.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48B})
(:Text {content:  This is not.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48B})

(:Text {content:  I could reduce this pumping station to a pile of debris... but I trust my point is clear. I am one android with a single weapon. There are hundreds of Sheliak on the way... and their weapons are far more powerful.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48B})
(:Text {content:  And the Sheliak may not even offer you a target. They can obliterate this colony from orbit. You will die never having seen the faces of your killers.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48B})
(:Text {content:  The choice is yours.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48B})
(:Text {content:  There are other places -- other challenges. It's time to move on.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48B})
(:Text {content:  I really was willing to stay and die for this.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48C})
(:Text {content:  I know that, but it is just a thing, and things can be replaced. Lives cannot. Live, rebuild and be remembered.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48C})
(:Text {content:  This is hopeless. Fighting would be preferable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  That's it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  I don't follow you, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Worf, get me the Sheliak.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Picard, Riker and Troi return to the command station. The strange Sheliak scene replaces a view of the ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Pursuant to paragraph one thousand two hundred and ninety I formally request third party arbitration of our dispute.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Agreed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  And further, pursuant to subsection D, three, I name the Grizzelas to arbitrate.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Grizzelas?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})

(:Text {content:  Unfortunately they are currently in their hibernation cycle, but they'll awaken in six months, and then we'll get this matter settled. Now, do you want to wait... or give me my three weeks?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Absurd. We carry the membership! We can brook no delay!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Then I declare the treaty in abeyance!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Wait! Negotiation is --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  You enjoyed that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  You're damn right.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Captain, they are hailing us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Sir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  On screen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  You may have your three weeks, Picard of the Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})

(:Text {content:  The screen returns to a view of the Sheliak ship pulling away. Instant release of tension. Suddenly the turbolift doors open, and Geordi ENTERS. He is looking frazzled. People's expressions reflect the thought that \"dear God, he did it.\"})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Captain, we can do it! We can modify the transporters.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Excellent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  It'll take fifteen years, and a research team of a hundred --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Mister La Forge, I believe we will postpone.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Yes, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Commander Data to Enterprise. I am preparing to leave Tau Cygna Five and await rendezvous instructions.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Acknowledged. Stand by.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Hi.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Hello, Ard'rian.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  The evacuation plan is going well. When the transport ship arrives, we'll be ready. You succeeded.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  I would not have succeeded without your support and insight, and I appreciate your assistance.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Good. Then you won't forget me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  I am incapable of forgetting. I will remember every detail of my visit with perfect clarity.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  But nothing more?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  I do not understand.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  I guess what I really want to know is -- do you have any feelings for me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  I have no feelings of any kind.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  No. Of course you don't.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  What was that for?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  You appeared to require it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  You observed I was unhappy and did what you concluded would make me feel better. A purely rational deduction.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Have I disappointed you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  No, I'm disappointed in myself I can't have. Data, in so many ways you're superior to humans. But you are still a machine... without emotion.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Yes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})

(:Text {content:  It's so easy to believe otherwise. It's so easy to read things into your behavior... and perceive feelings where none exist. Well, I am human and I do have feelings... silly though they may be at times. I like you, Data. You're my favorite android.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  But I am the only android you have ever met.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Rational to the last.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Come.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Welcome home, Mister Data. Well done.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Thank you, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  The good doctor was kind enough to provide me with a recording of your concert. Your performance shows a good deal of feeling.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  As I have lately had to remind others, I have no feelings.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  That's hard to believe; your playing is quite beautiful.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Strictly speaking, it is not \"my\" playing. It is a precise imitation of the techniques of Jascha Heifetz and Trenka Bron-Ken.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  And is there nothing of Data in what I'm hearing?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  You chose the violinists. Heifetz and Bron-Ken had radically different styles, but you combined them -- successfully.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  I suppose I have learned to be innovative... when necessary, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Mister Data... I look forward to your next concert.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Commander Riker to Ensign Crusher.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Go ahead....})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Forget to set your alarm, Wesley?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Uh, yessir. I'm... very sorry. I'll be right there.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  I didn't think you'd want to miss this.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Stardate 43102.8. We have entered a spectacular double star system in the Kavis Alpha sector on a most critical mission of astro-physical research.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})

(:Text {content:  Our eminent guest, Doctor Paul Stubbs, will attempt to study the decay of globules of neutronium expelled at relativistic speeds by a massive stellar explosion which will occur here in a matter of hours.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})

(:Text {content:  It is virtually a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity as dictated by the forces of nature. But frankly, Doctor Stubbs seems much calmer about it all than those of us who are simply charged with the responsibility of delivery and observation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Ensign, our position....})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Approaching ten million kilometers from the neutron star...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Slow to one third impulse power...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Spectacular, isn't it, my young friend?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Yessir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})

(:Text {content:  Over and over again, the intense gravitational pull of the little neutron star sucks up the star material from the red giant, and it builds up on the surface until it explodes... every one hundred and ninety six years. Like clockwork. And it is but eighteen hours away.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Eighteen hours, seven minutes, and ... ten seconds, Doctor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  The interstellar counterpart to Earth's \"Old Faithful\". The only predictable burst of energy in the universe that can accomplish our goal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Doctor Stubbs, if you want to make a final inspection of the unit...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Captain, I've been inspecting the egg for twenty years... you may lay it when ready.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Begin launch sequence.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Shuttle Bay Two, stand-by to launch the uh, \"egg\"...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Standing by, Commander...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Do you know how long the experiment will last, Wesley... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  One billionth of a second.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Now, how would you know that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  When I heard we were going to be part of your experiment, I read all your published works.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Begin pre-launch sequence.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Five minutes to launch site.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Stabilize.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  The ship is not responding.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Checking for failure of inertia dampeners... Instruments say they're working...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Captain, we're heading straight into the path of that stellar matter....})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Shields up.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Negative. The shields won't respond.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Impact thirty seconds.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Go to manual override to raise shields.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Shields are rising.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Reset dampeners.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Dampeners not responding. Unable to reset.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Reverse impulse engines.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Initiating reverse sequence.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Impact twenty seconds.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  The momentum is still taking us into the path of the stellar matter.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Close the shuttle bay door... Prepare for impact.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Door is frozen, Commander...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Commander Data, check all systems... Medical personnel to the bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  All systems functioning normally again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Computer, explanation for control malfunction.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  No control malfunction has been recorded.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Hey, Wesley, you need some work on your right turns...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  They're running a check to find out what happened. Everything's okay now...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  We're going into the Holodeck to ski in Switzerland, Wes... want to come?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Oh... I can't... I have to check on Doctor Stubbs. He's in Sickbay...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})

(:Text {content:  Wesley, I have this awkward situation... Two gorgeous ladies, only one of me and a terrific program where we get snowed in at the ski lodge... just the fire and each other to keep us warm... I can hold the storm for you... meet us at the lodge later on.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  I can't, Eric. There's just too much to do...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Yeah, okay... next time.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  The captain asked me to tell you that our systems are back to normal and we can make another launch attempt as soon as you're ready.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Quite a dynamic family team, you Crushers....})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  It's nice to be back together. I was at Starfleet Medical for a year... I missed about two inches of him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})

(:Text {content:  I'm not sure I'd want my mother to be flying through space with me... no, I take that back. I am sure. I wouldn't want her. I love her dearly you understand.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Does that hurt?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  My mother's a formidable woman too. A woman of letters. A great critic.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  I know.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})

(:Text {content:  Good Lord, son. You didn't read that unauthorized biography too... I totally deny the story about the consulate's wife on Beldoron. We were only good friends. Is that all the boy does, Doctor, fly the ship and read? Doesn't he have any fun?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Sure he does...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})

(:Text {content:  My studies keep me pretty busy. I'm trying to get into the Academy... I earn credits for my work on the Enterprise... but it's not the same as being there...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Ready to sit up?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  I am whole again, thank you, Doctor. Come along, Wesley, let's make sure Humpty Dumpty is still in one piece.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Computer, fix the food slot...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  The food slot is functioning properly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Well, check it again...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Deactivate food slot.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  We're analyzing the engineering systems data, Captain... so far nothing unusual in the computer log for that time period...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Run a level one diagnostic series. We need a computer that's one hundred percent to run Doctor Stubbs' experiment.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  It seems to be working again. For the moment anyway...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  What can I do for you, Doctor?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Jean-Luc, how would you feel if you were a seventeen year old and the only starship officer whose mother was on board... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  If you're concerned about Wesley, I see no evidence that there's a problem.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  I know. In a funny kind of way... that's exactly my point. We talk. We smile. It's almost too polite.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Beverly, this is simply a matter of time. I know how difficult it was to be away.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Tell me about him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  He's... become a fine officer. He works as hard as any member of the crew... Riker says his studies...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  No, tell me about him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  He seems well adjusted...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Does he have many friends... has he been in love... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Jean-Luc, he's come so far, so fast. And since I've been back I don't feel...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  His dependence? He is seventeen, Beverly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  What were you doing when you were seventeen?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Getting into a lot more trouble than Wesley is, I can assure you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  So was I.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Isn't that what seventeen is supposed to be?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  No cracks in the armor... we'll be just fine...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  How can you be so calm about everything? If I was about to make this kind of breakthrough...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})

(:Text {content:  I've never doubted for a moment that this day would come, Wesley. And I suspect some day it will come for you as well. I see a lot of me in you. In my youth, they called me a vunderkind... do you understand vunderkind... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  It's German, isn't it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  It means wonder child. It is reserved for those of us who achieve early in life. Now the burden is yours.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  The burden?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  To fulfill your potential. You will never come up against a greater adversary than your own potential, my young friend.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Red Alert. You should return to your quarters immediately.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Still no visual contact? Impossible... Mister Worf, same magnification. Fifty degrees starboard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Worf, you're absolutely sure...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  The sensors clearly indicate the approach of a Borg vessel.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Shields up.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Shields are not responding.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Manual overide is jammed. It's not gonna work this time... we don't have shields, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Captain, they've fired energy weapons at us...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Evasive action.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Bring about to two-eight-five mark three.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Predict current vector of the Borg ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Vector... is gone. And so is the Borg vessel.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  You're telling me this was another computer glitch?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  It is conceivable that we were viewing a synthetically generated image... although there is no precedent for it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Our computer was daydreaming... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Computer, identify malfunction immediately.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Pawn to King Three... Knight to Rook Four... Queen to Bishop Three...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Controls are not responding.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Impulse engines are down.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Try warp engines.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Sorry, Commander... I better get back to engineering...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})

(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Worf, you will accompany Commander La Forge. I want a full report on the prospects for getting our shields back. Commanders Data and Riker will join me in the conference room to consider the future of this mission... if there is one.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  The fact of the matter is we're dealing with a potential breakdown of our main computer...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  That's hard to accept.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})

(:Text {content:  The system automatically provides for self-correction, Captain. There has not been a system-wide technological failure on a starship in seventy-nine years.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Excuse me, Captain, Doctor Stubbs has been waiting to see you. I think it might be wise if...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Captain, I'm sure you have everything under control, I'd just like to know what's going on.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Of course, Doctor. Sit down. Counselor...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Commander La Forge is attempting repairs as we speak...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  \"Attempting\" ... that doesn't sound particularly reassuring.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Doctor, if it is at all possible, we will continue this mission as planned.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})

(:Text {content:  Captain, if we miss our chance now we don't get another for two centuries. There will be many questions asked by Starfleet if the Enterprise fails in its duty...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Nevertheless, my first and foremost concern will be to insure the safety of this ship and its crew...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Insure the safety, Captain or are you really talking about playing it safe?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  My dear Doctor, in our current position, when that star explodes, you'll get to watch your experiment from the inside out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  I would rather die than leave.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  I don't believe you speak for the majority, Doctor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Doctor Stubbs, I know how much this means to you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  My dear Counselor, no insult intended but please turn off your beam into my soul. I will share the feelings I wish to share...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Worf to Captain Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Captain, all weapons systems are down.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Estimated time for repairs?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Commander, I don't even know what to repair yet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Continue to advise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Well, if we do not take our leave in time, so be it... it's one sure way into the history books, eh?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  His nonchalance is studied and practiced...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Even my sensory perception picked that up today...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})

(:Text {content:  In fact, he's put his entire self-worth on the line with this experiment. He is telling the truth when he says he'd rather die than leave. And one more thing... he doesn't like women very much.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Odd. The research material on Doctor Stubbs includes not a few references from gossip columns. It suggests females find him quite attractive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Not this one.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  What happened to you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  We had a little accident on the Holodeck....})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  On the Holodeck... but it's programmed to prevent injuries...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  I was making a great run down a deserted slope when the ground just seemed to fall away....})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Engineering, this is Doctor Crusher. The Holodecks are to be closed by my order until further notice.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  We've been having control problems today. There's a small fracture here... this'll just take a minute...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  You look like you could use something warm inside you... hot chocolate, maybe?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Wes almost came along. It's probably a good thing he didn't.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  I didn't know he was going skiing with you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  It was one of those last minute things... we tried to grab him on the way...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  We don't see much of him now that he's been assigned to the bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Omigod....})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  What happened...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  He's not breathing...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  If he had been alone, he would have died.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})

(:Text {content:  Advise everyone to remain in their quarters when not on duty. Protocol \"B\" access to all power components. Nobody else uses them unless it's cleared by Commander Riker.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Sir, is it possible this is not a computer breakdown? What if it is some form of attack?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Our sensors showed no sign of life in this stellar system.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  They also showed a Borg vessel that did not exist. Counselor Troi?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  I perceive no life force, Captain... no feelings of ill will. But I am not attuned to every form of life.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Data, stay on the sensors... see if we can't pick up something out there.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  It does almost seem as if something... or someone is trying to render the Enterprise helpless.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  They're not just trying, Number One. If it's true, they're doing a damn good job of it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  You got it. Nice going, Geordi...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Call up the cross-section of computer core processor four-five-one, elements zero-two-hundred through zero-three-hundred.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  In order to get some power, I had to by-pass the computer core and essentially hotwire the connection.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Look at that lesion. No wonder we're coming apart at the seams.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  It's some kind of continuing disintegration. But from what... I can't tell ya. And I haven't the slightest idea how to stop it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  But it's just a mechanical problem, right?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  Increase magnification, factor fifty.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  I don't know, Wesley. Looking at it... if it weren't... impossible... I'd say someone had climbed in there and started taking it apart.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  Guinan... I didn't think anyone would be here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  I've never been very good at being confined to quarters. Any of my husbands would testify to that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  What are these things?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  I'm just setting... traps.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  I run a clean place here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  I know. It's not that. I just...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Guinan, I'm scared. Everything that's been going wrong may be my fault.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Pull up a stool, Wesley.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})

(:Text {content:  I've been working on my final project for Advanced Genetics. It's on nanotechnology. And I've been studying the nanites we have in the Sickbay genetic supplies. They're just like tiny little robots with gigabytes of mechanical computer memory, tiny enough to enter living cells and conduct repairs. They're supposed to be strictly confined to the lab.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Are you trying to say some nanites are on the loose?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})

(:Text {content:  Two of them. That's all. See, I just wanted to see how they would interact and function in tandem. In my project, I had proposed a theory that they could actually combine their skills to improve their usefulness. And it was working.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  You made a better nanite.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})

(:Text {content:  I was pulling an all-nighter to get my final data... and I fell asleep. When I woke up, I realized the container was still open... It was just a science project.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  A doctor once said the very same thing to me... what was his name... Frankenstein, I think.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  They're really harmless. They only have the most basic skills. It's almost impossible that they could be responsible...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Almost.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Doctor Crusher to Wesley Crusher.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Go ahead.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  I stopped by your quarters, Wes. I assumed you'd be there, since you're off duty.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  I was just... I had some things to do...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Orders are orders, Mister Crusher.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  You won't tell anybody...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  I know. I will. If it's true.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Wesley... Think you'll get a good grade?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  I always get an A.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  So did Doctor Frankenstein.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Captain's log, supplemental. Our computer core has clearly been tampered with and yet there is no sign of a breach of security on board.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})

(:Text {content:  We have even considered sabotage, but Counselor Troi has not detected any such sentiments. We have engines back and will attempt to complete our mission... but without a reliable computer, Doctor Stubbs' experiment is in serious jeopardy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Manual restart sequence?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Manual restart successful... impulse engine functions appear normal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Proceed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Shuttle Bay Two, open hangar doors.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Doors did not respond. Repeating sequence.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  What in heaven's name... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  It is \"Stars and Stripes Forever\" by John Phillip Sousa, a popular American composer of band music in the early twentieth century...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Yes... yes... I know...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Computer, shut off the music....})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  The music is on all communications channels, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Power... weapons... communications. We're being stripped one system at a time...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Shut off the power to the bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  I feel no hostile emotions present. No friendly feelings either. Nothing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Only an enemy without honor refuses to show himself in battle.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  We may be fighting a different kind of enemy than we've ever known... an enemy that fights a war of nerves. Resume power to the bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Commander La Forge, can you get us out of this star system safely...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  No...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Not now, Doctor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  I'll try, Captain. I don't want to overload the engines...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Do it gently. But do it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  We'll circuit in auxiliary power to the bridge... and find some way to silence Sousa if he tries an encore.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})

(:Text {content:  The priority is to find out who or what is doing this and why. Those of us not involved in that detail should get a few minutes rest. Commander Data, the bridge, or what's left of it, is yours.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  The egg that Stubbs laid.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  Nobody will say that...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  Nobody will say... anything, Wesley. We will not even be mentioned.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  I could live with failure. even to try. To miss your one chance at bat. Do you know baseball?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  My dad taught it to me when I was little.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})

(:Text {content:  Once, centuries ago, it was the beloved national pastime of the Americas, Wesley. Abandoned by a society that prized fast food and faster games. Lost to impatience. But I have seen the great players make the great plays.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  Do you recreate them on a Holodeck?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})

(:Text {content:  No, in here... With the knowledge of statistics... runs, hits and errors... times at bat... box scores. Men like us do not need Holodecks, Wesley. I have played seasons in my mind. It was my reward to myself. For patience. Knowing my turn would come. Call your shot. Point to a star. One great blast and the crowd rises. A brand new era in astro-physics. Postponed one hundred and ninety-six years on account of rain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  We have to talk.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  You really look like you could use some rest...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  I know. It's okay. Really.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  No, it's not. Really.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  I'm just checking some traps that I set... to see if I can find out what's happening to the ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  On someone's orders... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  We're running out of time for Doctor Stubbs...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Wesley, you can't put everything on your own shoulders. Even when you're off duty, you're on duty...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Mom, you don't understand...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  You're a seventeen year old boy...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  I'm an acting officer... I have responsibilities....})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  I'm beginning to think... maybe we're all expecting too much of you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  I've done everything anyone has asked of me and more. You don't know... you haven't even been here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  I'm here now, Wesley.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  C'mon, I'll help you finish this up... what are you looking for?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Wesley... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Mom, I think I've made a horrible mistake.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Nanites. Tiny machines built from the atom up.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  Designed to have exposure only to the inside of nucleii during celluar surgeries. Until then, they are kept tightly confined in a non-functional state.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  These are not ordinary nanites.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  No, these have... evolved.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Evolved... how does a machine evolve...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  It's true. I'm reponsible. I allowed two of the nanites to interact for my school project to increase their capabilities. And... they escaped.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  School... project...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Just how far have these things... evolved?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  This is a sample of linear memory crystal from our computer core.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  It's like candy to them...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  They're now capable of mechanically replicating themselves. And who knows what else....})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  It is conceivable that with each new generation they enhance their own design. The rate of evolution would be...extraordinary.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  How many generations are we dealing with here?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Engineering, display computer core processor four-five-one, element zero-two-nine-nine.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Increase magnification, factor one thousand.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  A few. Can it be possible that they know what they're doing...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Why would they attack us?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Why does a mosquito bite your ear and who cares? The answer is simple. Call an exterminator.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Doctor Stubbs, these nanites are apparently operating with a new collective intelligence... working together, teaching each other skills...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Doctor, are you suggesting they are becoming a... civilization?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})

(:Text {content:  Oh really. I'm sorry but this is nonsense. You can't have a civilization of computer chips. They're made in a plant in Dakar Senegal. I've watched the construction.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Then how do you explain what you've seen here?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})

(:Text {content:  It's no more mysterious than watching a strain of the Leutscher virus reproduce itself. And that at least is a bona fide lifeform. How many disease germs and viruses have you destroyed in your time, Doctor Crusher?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  I cannot exterminate... something that \"may or may not\" be intelligent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  My good Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  There is still time. Ensign Crusher, work with Data to find some way to remove them safely. If things get worse, we'll take stronger measures.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Gentlemen. I need a computer functioning perfectly in less than eight hours... and we still have core reconstruction to consider...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  We're testing a low level gamma field that might reduce their processing speed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Have you considered a high level charge?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  High level gamma radiation would kill them, Doctor Stubbs.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  I know.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Doctor Stubbs...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  I can't get the story of David and Goliath out of my head. How long do we wait, Number One?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  We can continue to bypass parts of the computer that are affected... but if these nanites are spreading all over the ship...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Do you smell a change in...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Picard to La Forge... enviromental system malfunction on the bridge... acknowledge...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  Nitrogen oxide... toxic levels...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  I've switched to manual control of the air handling system...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
