(:Text {content:  He entered a computer access room and sterilized one of the processors with gamma radiation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  The nanites in the upper core are all dead, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  You have no choice now... it is a matter of survival.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  If you were a member of my crew, sir, I would...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})

(:Text {content:  But I am not a member of your crew, sir... I am a representative of the highest command of the Federation... which has directed you to perform my experiment...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  If one man, woman or child on my ship dies because of your experiment... I will have your head before the highest command of the Federation...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Good Lord, you are talking about machines with a screw loose. Simply turn them off. And be done with them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})

(:Text {content:  Doctor Stubbs, your own actions have provided evidence to the contrary. After you destroyed the nanites in the core, they immediately responded by interfering with our life-support systems. It is hard to accept these as random actions by machines with \"loose screws\". In effect, you may have proven that the nanites do have a collective intelligence.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Captain, I'm feeling a vague presence. It wasn't there before. It is not hostility... More like a primitive sense of self-preservation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  If they have evolved this far... into emotional growth... how can we destroy them now?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  The ship is at risk. Extermination may be the only alternative left.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  A good point...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Worf, Doctor Stubbs is to be restricted to his quarters until further notice.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Data, can you find me a way to communicate with these things?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})

(:Text {content:  With intelligence, they have the capacity for language. But it will depend on how far their evolution has brought them. We could modify the circuits in the universal translator to make it capable of communications with them...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Proceed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  May I come in?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  You just can't resist, can you, Counselor?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  I only want to help.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})

(:Text {content:  Yes, yes... to break the shell... to get in touch with my true feelings. What is this preoccupation women have with de-mystifying me? It must be the challenge. Climb me. Because I'm there.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  I am only worried about your state of mind, Doctor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  All right, Counselor... what is it that has you so worried?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Your single-mindedness, your need to have this experiment work...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})

(:Text {content:  But it will. Picard has no choice now. He must defend the Enterprise. Counselor, when this is over, I will show you New Manhattan on Beth Delta-One as you've never seen it and we will laugh over glasses of champagne.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Your self portrait is so practiced, so polished....})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Yes, isn't it, though?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  It is stretched so tight that the tension fills this room. And if you finally... fail... I fear it will snap.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})

(:Text {content:  A good try, Counselor. But sometimes when you reach beneath a man's self portrait, as you so eloquently put it, deep down, inside... what you find... is nothing at all.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Lockman on first, Dark on second... Thompson at the plate... Branca on the mound...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  He's coming around...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 78})
(:Text {content:  I have to believe this was not an arbitrary attack...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 78})
(:Text {content:  Has Data made any progress in contacting them?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 78})
(:Text {content:  You must protect me. Kill them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 78})
(:Text {content:  Commander Riker, on my signal, we will gamma-irradiate all computer systems throughout the Enterprise to end this conflict.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  Worf, prepare to activate gamma pulse generators.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  Electromagnetic scanners ready, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  I have established contact.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  Are you okay?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  I will be. As soon as we finish off these pests.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  Wesley, do not be too harsh in your judgment of me... until you've walked a lifetime in my shoes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})

(:Text {content:  We are no different, you and I. For you right now, it's getting into the Academy. For me, it's the egg. Others will never understand how important our work is to us. It's everything we live for.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  Doctor Stubbs, I want to go the Academy. But if I don't, I have other things to live for.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  Of course you do.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  They are virtually learning the concept of communication as we continue, Captain... each new generation is making modifications.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 86})
(:Text {content:  Can we actually talk to them yet?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 86})
(:Text {content:  I think it is worth an attempt...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 86})
(:Text {content:  Ask them for a cease-fire... put it in whatever words you think they'll understand.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 86})
(:Text {content:  Captain, their answer is... no.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 86})
(:Text {content:  Tell them it is critical to their survival as well as our own.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 86})
(:Text {content:  Their answer is no.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 86})
(:Text {content:  I sense that after the incident in the computer core, there is very little trust...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 86})
(:Text {content:  Bring Doctor Stubbs to the bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 86})
(:Text {content:  The universal translator has its limits. I prefer to negotiate eye to eye with my enemy...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 86})
(:Text {content:  I don't think there's much chance of that here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 86})
(:Text {content:  But they have already tried to kill me once...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  \"One sure way into the history books\", Doctor...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  Tell them the human who destroyed their comrades is here and wishes to address them...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88})
(:Text {content:  Captain, if I might...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88})
(:Text {content:  And you, sir will explain your error and apologize and pray that we can negotiate a peace we can all live with... is that clear?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88})
(:Text {content:  Captain, if a face to face negotiation would be helpful, I would like to volunteer myself as a conduit.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88})
(:Text {content:  Yourself, Data?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88})

(:Text {content:  I can easily furnish the nanites with a schematic design of my neurological structure. Entering my neural network would require only their most basic skills.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88})
(:Text {content:  That's what they were designed for.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88})
(:Text {content:  They could easily penetrate the molecular fabric of my hand-covering into the nerve circuitry and interface with my verbal programs.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88})
(:Text {content:  If they have control of a Starfleet commander, they become an even greater threat.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88})
(:Text {content:  How do we know we'll ever get them out of you, Data...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88})
(:Text {content:  There are considerable risks. But it would also represent a gesture of trust on our part. It could be an important step toward peace.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88})
(:Text {content:  All right. Propose it to the nanites.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88})
(:Text {content:  The answer is yes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88})
(:Text {content:  They are ready, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 90})
(:Text {content:  Proceed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 90})
(:Text {content:  You are very strange looking creatures.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 92})
(:Text {content:  In our travels, we have encountered many other creatures... even stranger-looking than we are... and all of us try to co-exist peacefully.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 92})
(:Text {content:  The urge among us to destroy all of your kind is intense. Why did you attack us?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 92})
(:Text {content:  We misinterpreted your actions as an attack against us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 92})
(:Text {content:  We were only seeking raw materials for our replication process.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 92})
(:Text {content:  Yes, but you endangered the vessel in which we all travel.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 92})
(:Text {content:  You almost killed a crewmember.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 92})
(:Text {content:  We meant no harm. We were only exploring.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 92})
(:Text {content:  We understand. We are also explorers and we mean no harm to any life-form.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 92})
(:Text {content:  I am the one responsible for the deaths in the computer core.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 92})
(:Text {content:  We know who you are.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 92})

(:Text {content:  I... deeply regret the incident. I am a scientist on an important mission. Your... your colleagues' exploration of the core memory put our mission at risk. I only meant to protect a lifetime of work from being destroyed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 92})
(:Text {content:  A beat. To Picard --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 92})
(:Text {content:  What is \"mercy\"?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 92})
(:Text {content:  He asks you to forgive him. This conflict was started by mistakes... on both sides. Let us end it here and now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 92})
(:Text {content:  We agree.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 92})
(:Text {content:  I pledge to you that we will provide any assistance you need for your continued survival.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 92})
(:Text {content:  Thank you, but we have evolved beyond any need for your assistance. This vessel has become too confining. We require relocation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 92})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Stardate 43104.7. Doctor Stubbs has generously used his influence to arrange the designation of planet Kavis-Alpha-Four as the new home of the Nanite Civilization. Plans to negotiate a treaty are underway. Commander Data's neural network has been vacated... He has been returned to us, unharmed, and with the help of the nanites, our computer core has been reconstructed in time for the experiment...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 93})
(:Text {content:  Ten seconds to stellar blast.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  We're at forty million kilometers from the neutron star.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  Hold your position.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  Doctor?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 96})
(:Text {content:  Do you have any children, Guinan?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  A lot.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  Ever have any trouble relating to them?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  Just one.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  One?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  He wouldn't listen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  Well, they all go through that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  Not in a species of listeners.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  Did he grow out of it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  Well, it's taken a few hundred years or so but I've brought him around.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  How?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  A mother shapes her child in ways she doesn't even realize. Sometimes just by listening.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  Cute couple.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 98})

(:Text {content:  Now, see, that's healthy for a boy his age. I mean that as a doctor not just a mother. It's good to see him having fun... with an attractive young woman... who obviously looks at him with extraordinary affection...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 98})
(:Text {content:  What do you know about this girl?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 98})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Stardate 43042.3. We are cautiously entering the Delta Rana star system three days after receiving a distress call from the Federation colony on its ninth planet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})

(:Text {content:  The garbled transmission reported the colony under attack from an unidentified spacecraft. Our mission is one of rescue and -- if necessary -- confrontation with a hostile force.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Shields up, maximum strength.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Shields up. Sensors do not indicate the presence of any armed space vehicles operating in the Rana system.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  They could be cloaked or otherwise shielded. Mister Crusher, bring us in well clear of the planet's three moons.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Commander, I am not receiving Rana Four's call sign.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Open a frequency to Colony Operations.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  There is no response. Rana Four is emissions quiet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Captain, there are eleven thousand inhabitants in the colony. At this range I should be feeling something.... I'm not.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Mister Data, put the planet on the Main Viewer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Magnify.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  My God...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Helm, put us in a high equatorial orbit. Scan for survivors.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Survivors? Down there?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Sensors are scanning ninety degrees of longitude as we orbit. I am detecting no artificial structures, no vegetation, no bodies of water...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Lifeform readings are negative.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Could the colonists have escaped?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  That is unlikely. Rana Four possessed no interstellar spacecraft.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Who could cause devastation on such a scale?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Hold it -- hold it! I'm getting something at thirty-seven degrees north, sixty-two degrees east -- a structure!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Life?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Two lifeforms. Possibly human.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Put the area on the Main Viewer and magnify.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  The structure is located at the center of the vegetation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  An entire planet obliterated... except for a few acres of trees and grass... and one building?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  It's some kind of illusion...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Negative. It is as you see it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Number One, I think you had better see who's home...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  If they're the only survivors of a global holocaust, they can't be in very good shape.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Counselor... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  What I sense of them is human...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  And something else... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  It's difficult to explain... I feel these two people are somehow... different. I'm sorry. I cannot be any clearer than that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  We're ready.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Good luck, Number One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Energize...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  What can you tell me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  The house is a typical settlement structure with adaptations. Its thermal properties all seem to conform to known materials.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  If there are indicators as to why this particular area has remained intact, I cannot detect them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Worf, the interior of the house.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})

(:Text {content:  One individual is located at the south end of the house, the other toward the north. There is a weapon -- a low-yield phaser, nonfunctional -- in proximity to the front-room individual.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  I guess a frontal assault is unwarranted. Stay here. I'm going to try an old-fashioned knock on the door.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Commander, there's a --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Who's there? Who are you people?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Commander William Riker, USS Enterprise, and crewmembers. May I get down and approach you, sir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  You leave him right where he is.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Commander, shall I incapacitate him?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  No. We're a rescue party. We picked up your colony's distress call and came as fast as we could.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Kevin, what are you doing? Can't you see they're here to help us? Can't you see they're human?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Stay in the house, Rishon. It could be some kind of trick.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  We'd just about given up hope. We thought maybe the whole Federation had been attacked.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Do you know of any other survivors?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  It's been days since we've seen or heard anybody else... Please, no -- don't tell me we're the only ones...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  They came in a spaceship so big you could see it up in orbit. They took our world apart piece by piece.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Who?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  We don't know. We never saw their faces.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  You don't know where they came from -- where they are now?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  I guess they've gone away.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  I'm sorry. I'm only performing a physical. Could I have your names please -- for the record.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  I'm Rishon Uxbridge... and this is my husband Kevin.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})

(:Text {content:  Botanists. Originally from the aquatic city New Martim Vaz in the Atlantic Ocean on Earth. Residents of the Rana Four colony for five years. You, ma'am, are eighty-two years of age and a composer of Tao-classical music. You, sir, are eighty-five years of age and a specialist in symbiotic plantlife. You have been married fifty-three years.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  I memorized the colony register on the way to Rana in the event such information was needed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Is something wrong?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Your house -- with your permission I'd like to look inside.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Why? What could interest you in there?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})

(:Text {content:  Mister Uxbridge, as far as we've been able to determine, you and your wife -- and this house -- are all that survived the attack. It was either a bizarre coincidence or by design. I don't favor the coincidence theory.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Are you saying we were left alive intentionally?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Yes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  I don't understand. You don't think Rishon and I did something to merit our survival, do you? I mean, betrayed the others... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})

(:Text {content:  I'm not accusing you of anything, Mister Uxbridge. The attacking force spared you for some reason. We're only trying to find out why. May I look inside... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  I said you could.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  I'll make a cup of tea for everyone. We have wonderful tea on Rana. It grows wild nearly everywhere...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Sir, may I say that your attempt to hold our away team at bay with a nonfunctioning weapon was an act of unmitigated gall.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Didn't fool you, huh?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  I admire gall.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Excuse me. Out front -- that was about the best job of concealing a snare that I've ever seen. Could you tell me what it was for?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Got a local critter that's developed a taste for what's in the garden. Guess I should've dismantled it. Guess I don't have to worry about him anymore.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Go ahead. Pick it up. It's a music box. It's been in my family for generations.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  I've been in every room. There's nothing unusual about this house except that it's here. What about them?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  They're in reasonably good health. Both show signs of mental stress. Understandable considering what they've been through.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  But somehow they're different.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Let's get back to the ship. We'll take them with us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Excuse, Mrs. Uxbridge. We have to return to the ship now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Commander, I haven't finished fixing your tea --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  I'm sorry, but we're finished here. We can give you and Kevin time to pack. You can bring as much as you want.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  What do you mean pack?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  You're not thinking of taking us with you, are you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Surely you don't want to remain here. How will you take care of yourselves?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Kevin, I can't leave my home! Don't let them do this to us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  No one's going to make us leave.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  You'll be protected on the ship. You could still be in danger on Rana.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Commander, we appreciate your concern but we're not going anywhere. We'll manage. We always have.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  All right. I can't make you come with us. Are you familiar with one of these... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  We'll remain in this system for the next several days at least. If you should reconsider, please contact us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  We'll be fine, Commander. We have each other...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})

(:Text {content:  Are they collaborators? Did they in fact provide their colony's assailants with something that abetted the total destruction of Rana Four in order to protect their own lives?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  What could two botanists in their eighties possess that could possibly aid whoever attacked this planet?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  We have no idea what the enemy needed, Doctor. Love, fear, hope Maybe they're being held hostage in some fashion.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Nothing in the tricorder readings indicated emotional stress.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Counselor... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  All eyes turn to Troi. But she hasn't heard Picard. She is lost in her own thoughts. Picard has to repeat})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  I'm sorry... I can't sense them well enough...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Picard gives her a quizzical look. Suddenly from Geordi})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  No. The assailants would have picked someone younger for that, someone who would have given them a proper show for their money.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Number One, you say the couple is incapable of sustaining themselves?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})

(:Text {content:  There's a fusion reactor in the house, probably good for another five years of power. But their watertable is tainted and they have no way of feeding themselves other than a small garden.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  They won't come to the ship?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  They were adamant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  We'll do all that we can to help them... but in the meantime I want them kept under surveillance.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Counselor, is something wrong?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  I'm sorry... I don't feel well. I would like to go to my quarters...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  By all means.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Is there anything I can do?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Captain, a search of the Ranian system has determined that the hostile force that attacked this planet is no longer present.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})

(:Text {content:  I remember a Starfleet admiral saying the same thing about some renegade Andorians in the Triangulum system once. The truth was they'd dismantled their ship and hidden it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Those Andorians did not have to contend with someone of my thoroughness. I will stake my reputation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Don't listen... think of something else...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Stop... please stop!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Yes --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  I was concerned. I came to see if I could be of any help.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  I'm fine. There's nothing wrong. I'm tired, that's all.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  I don't have your gift for reading emotions, Counselor, but I can tell when someone is in pain and hiding it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  It's silly... I... I hear music. Music that won't stop. In my mind.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps it's a symptom of fatigue. We've all been inflicted one time or another with the song that wouldn't quit.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})

(:Text {content:  No... it's deeper than that. The song never stops for an instant. It plays in perfect clarity from beginning to end over and over again. I don't even know what song it is -- I've never heard it before!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  When did this start?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  A few hours ago. While the away team was on the surface. I was trying to... I was thinking of Rishon and Kevin...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Rishon and Kevin... And?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  I can't explain. They're elusive. They're... I'm sorry...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Get some rest. Take the necessary sleep inducements if you have to.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Data, give us a visual. Magnfication factor fifty.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Where did that come from?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Apparently it was riding a Lagrange point behind Rana Four's furthest moon.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Our vehicle classification index can put no identity to it. Its design is completely foreign.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  But it's our boy -- roughly five times our mass and carrying enough armament to pulverize a planet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Worf... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  I... cannot explain this, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  It's moving toward the planet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Open a hailing frequency, Data. Ask them to identify themselves and to match orbit with us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  They have received the message, Captain, but are chosing to ignore it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Worf, maximum shields, ready all weapon systems.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  It's assuming an attack posture. Don't be surprised if --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  The vessel is firing jacketed streams of positrons and antiprotons, equivalent firepower of forty megawatts. Shields are holding.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Again forty megawatts. No damage.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  If that's as good as they can do, this'll be over in five minutes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Worf, fire phasers... Just a warning shot. Data, repeat the order to stand to.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  The vessel has assumed a course out of the Rana system and is rapidly increasing velocity.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Helm, initiate pursuit.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  The vessel has reached warp two and continues on a steady acceleration curve. We aren't getting any closer, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Give us a superior curve, Mister Crusher.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})

(:Text {content:  Warp three... warp four... The warship is simultaneously matching our curve point per point. Warp four point five... warp five... warp five point five...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Riker to La Forge. Give us everything you can to close the gap, Geordi.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Yes, sir. I'll get you to Nine point three seven in fifteen seconds.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Warp eight point five... warp eight point seven five... warp nine... the warship continues to match our acceleration curve perfectly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  I get the impression we're being toyed with, Number One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  This ship will not chase a pony on a merry-go-round. Number One, take us back to Rana Four.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Back?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  We have unfinished business there. I need to have a talk with those two people.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Reduce speed. Bring us around on a return course. This one's getting away...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})

(:Text {content:  Good afternoon. I apologize if I startled you. I'm Jean-Luc Picard, captain of the Enterprise. I've brought you something you badly need if you're going to stay on Rana -- a matter replicator. It has limited capabilities, but...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Thank you. But we have no use for such a thing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  It will provide you with food and clothing -- clean water. Lieutenant Worf can instruct you in its operation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  We don't need it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Kevin, you know we do. Thank you, Captain. Kevin and I were about to have our afternoon tea. You and Mister Worf must stay and have some with us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  We'd like that very much.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Rishon, they only want to spy on us like this morning.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Kevin, I've never turned away a visitor to this house and I'm not starting today. Please come in, both of you. And excuse the mess...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Stop -- make it stop! Please, I'll do anything -- make it stop!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Deanna, please. I'm here to help.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  It's getting louder! So loud... I can't stand it -- make it stop!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Move her to the bed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  This will relax you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  I hear it! It's still there! It's so loud --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Move her to Sickbay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  No! I want to stay in my quarters.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  I can get you to sleep there.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  I don't want to sleep! The music will only follow me!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  I can induce delta sleep... Tune out even your deepest dreams.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  But it's not a dream! You've got to understand that! It's not a dream -- it's real!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})

(:Text {content:  Kevin and I first saw each other on a ship at sea. He was a starving student in a threadbare suit and mismatched shoes. I was traveling with my parents who didn't like the way he was hanging around. I asked him to marry me two hours after we met and he knew I was serious. I don't think he's ever recovered from that day.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Mister Worf, what do you think?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Good tea. Nice house.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Why did you leave Earth and move to a brand new world when you did?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  You mean at our age? We thought it would make us fall in love all over again. It worked.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  It must've been terrible... when the colony was fighting for its life.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Yes, it was. Fire lit the sky... the ground never stopped shaking... there was thunder, unbelievable thunder...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  But you survived...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  We don't know why we did and the others didn't. I've tried to put some purpose to it, but I can't.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  I was wondering, Captain, when you and your ship would be leaving...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})

(:Text {content:  I don't have an answer for that. A few hours ago we had an encounter with a warship... Possibly the one which attacked you. We forced it to leave the system but were unable to affect it otherwise. It could return.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Kevin -- you said it'd gone away.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  I guess I was wrong. Don't worry. It didn't hurt us before, it won't hurt us now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Do you know that for a fact, Kevin?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  No. But I don't enjoy seeing my wife frightened. As we've told you time and time again, Captain, we don't know why we were spared.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})

(:Text {content:  But there had to have been a reason. In some way you and Rishon were \"different\" from the other colonists. Your geographical location, your philosophical beliefs, the color of your eyes -- somehow you stood apart from them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  There was a difference... I am a man of special conscience. While the others were doing what they could, I chose not to fight.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  That is your protected right.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  But I assure you the attacking ship had no way of realizing this. I expected to die like all the others.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  There's no reason for you and your ship to remain, Captain. We can manage without you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Kevin grieved for the others but he did nothing. He's a very gentle man. Please understand that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  What about you, Rishon? Did you feel the same way?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  I wanted to fight... but I stayed with my husband. Thank you again for the replicator, Captain. I had better clean up now...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Before we go I ask you one more time to come to the ship. For your own safety.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  I'm frightened, Captain. But I can't leave Rana. Even if it means my life.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})

(:Text {content:  I don't understand it. I've inhibited almost all the activity of the neocortex and she continues to behave as if she's hearing the music... We're going to have to shield her from all outside stimuli by inducing coma...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})

(:Text {content:  I have positive identification, Commander. It is the vessel that attacked us earlier. It is reentering the system at high velocity and is approaching Rana Four.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Give us a tight visual, Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Is it my imagination or does it look a lot meaner this time? Shields up. Weapons ready.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  Our friend is back.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  I am not surprised. Lieutenant Worf, open a hailing frequency. Warn the vessel to stay clear of the planet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir. But they are already within firing range.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  Shields down! Captain, they hit us with four hundred gigawatts of particle energy!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Damage?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Superficial -- but I am having trouble reassembling the shields!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Shields down! There is thermal damage to the hull!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  The warship is in possession of enormous energy reserves. It is capable of striking us with far more powerful bursts.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  They're maneuvering to come between the Enterprise and Rana Four.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Number One, we have been exemplary in our patience.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Worf, fire phasers on full with a simultaneous spread of torpedoes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  The vessel appears undamaged. Its defenses are apparently able to absorb incoming matter and energy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Commence rapid fire with all weapons on full!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Shields are down! There is internal damage -- weapon systems control has been lost!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Riker to Sickbay. Medical assistance to the bridge!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Mister Crusher, move the Enterprise out of range of the attacking vessel!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  The vessel has terminated its pursuit. It is assuming an orbit around Rana Four.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Rishon and Kevin...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  We can't help them... But it's my guess they're in no danger.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Number of casualties?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Sixty-six.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Fatalities?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  None. We've been able to treat everyone.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Can you help her?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  I've done everything I can. I don't understand the nature of this music she says she's hearing, or where it's coming from.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  Could it be telepathic?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  Yes. But I'm no expert at determining that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  They're blocking her sensitivity Who?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  Rishon and Kevin.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  What?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  They wanted us to leave Rana... and that's exactly what we're doing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  Picard to bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  Number One, I want you to maintain the present course for another hour, then turn the Enterprise around and take it back to Rana Four.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  Sir? We still won't have our shields restored by then.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  We're going back, Commander -- and this time nothing is going to lure us away.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  Sensors indicate no spacecraft in the vicinity of Rana Four. Forget your previous error, Lieutenant. There was no way you could have prevented it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Captain, the Uxbridge house is coming into transporter range.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Worf. If you will accompany me to the Transporter Room...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  I think you should reconsider this, Captain. The warship has come after us twice, it could come back.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})

(:Text {content:  I disagree, Commander. I don't think it knows we're here. I think it believes it's run us off for good. That, however, will change once I'm back on board.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Sir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  It's protecting Rishon and Kevin. It responds to their wishes -- directly or indirectly, I'm not sure. That's what I'm going to put to the test.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Celebrating?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  What are you doing here? What do you want?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})

(:Text {content:  This is the second time you've shown surprise at my appearance, Kevin. The first time was understandable, but why now? -- unless you expected never to see me again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Why do you keep interfering with our lives, Captain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  It isn't my intention to interfere, Kevin... only to help you and Rishon.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Then please leave us alone.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  I promise you that once I leave this house I will never set foot in it again. The Enterprise, however, will remain in orbit over this planet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Why?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  To protect you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  That isn't necessary, Captain. I thought you understood.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  But it is necessary, Kevin. Your lives are in great danger. The warship has returned.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Kevin --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  He's lying, Rishon.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})

(:Text {content:  We fought a pitched battle with it and lost. Many of my crew have been injured -- including a woman who's mind is slowly being destroyed by a telepathic aberration.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  No! Oh please no!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  This is a form of intimidation. I have my rights --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  You, Kevin? What about Rishon? Is she in favor of being left at the mercy of a homicidal spaceship?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  I think you'd better go, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Come to the Enterprise, Rishon. Let me take you where you'll be safe.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  No. I can't leave Kevin...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  And I'm staying. She's safe here with me in this house.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})

(:Text {content:  Then explain to me why you're safe, Kevin. Why is this house a sanctuary from a destructive force that otherwise has no conscience? Does it have to do with you -- with your refusal to fight?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Tell me this, Kevin. If Rishon were in danger, would you kill to save her life?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  No! Not for her, not for anyone! I will not kill!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Stop hurting him! Leave our house!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  It is my sworn duty to protect you. The Enterprise will remain in orbit around Rana Four as long as the two of you are alive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Number One -- an update, please.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Little change, Captain. The shields are still inoperable. We have partial control of our weapons. I've doubled the repair crews.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Commander. The warship is approaching from high orbit. It is very close -- three hundred thousand kilometers distance.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  How is that possible? Is something wrong with the sensors?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  That's of no concern, Number One. It's here. And precisely on schedule.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  The vessel has altered its course to a direct intercept with the Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Worf, arm phasers and photon torpedos, prepare to fire.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Belay those orders, Mister Worf.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  The vessel is now within twenty thousand kilometers of the Enterprise and closing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Let it come, Commander. Activate the Main Viewer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Evasive action, sir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  The Enterprise will stand its ground, Lieutenant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Weapons, sir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  When I give the order. Not before.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  The vessel is entering a low orbit around Rana Four. Captain, it appears it is preparing to fire at the planet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Understood.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  My calculations indicate that its target may be the house of Rishon and Kevin Uxbridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  There will be no interference from us, Mister Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  The house has been obliterated!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Scan for survivors, Lieutenant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  There are no survivors.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Ready a photon torpedo. Fire at the vessel when ready.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Commander Riker. What reason does the Enterprise have to remain at Rana?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  The unknown vessel has been destroyed. The Uxbridges have been destroyed. There is no reason for the Enterprise to remain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Good. Helm, move us to a higher orbit so that we may keep the surface of the planet under surveillance.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir. But, Captain, what do we watch for?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Anything. If I'm needed I will be in my Ready Room. That is all for now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Come.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  Captain, may I speak with you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  The pleasure is mine, Number One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  We've been observing the planet very carefully for three hours. We've seen nothing. I have the feeling you're waiting for something to happen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})

(:Text {content:  I have acted on an assumption, Commander. I am not sure what the result will be -- or even that my assumption is correct. We found two people alive in a house on a devastated planet. But there was only one survivor of the war on Rana Four})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  Why is it we maintain watch on a planet that is now totally dead?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Bridge to Captain Picard. You had better come see this.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Captain, Commander, it's back -- the house! And the trees and the grass! It happened right in front of us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  Worf, do you see survivors?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  I detect two life-forms inside the house. It appears Kevin and Rishon were not destroyed. But how... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  Helm, bring us into transporter range. I want them beamed aboard Captain, will they not protest?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  Let them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  My apologies if I interrupted a waltz...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Why have you brought us here against our will?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  To end the suffering of one of my crewmembers.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  I don't understand --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Kevin does. He's the cause.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})

(:Text {content:  At first I couldn't figure out why your house had survived the holocaust while all the others hadn't. And then it occurred to me that it had been destroyed. The dwelling where you served me tea and danced your waltzes was a reproduction, something real to the touch but capable of being created and destroyed and recreated at whim.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Now you're joking with us, Captain. Can't you see it's hurting my husband?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Rishon looks at Kevin, quizzically. He avoids her; looks deeply at Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  I am deeply sorry about the woman. I will help her. But I must know what you intend to do with me afterwards...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Take you to the nearest starbase where you will be held accountable for the attack on this ship... and perhaps the deaths of eleven thousand people.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  No! He hasn't killed anyone!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  The destruction of the planet happened just as I told you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  But you haven't told us the whole story, Kevin -- how it ended... the part about Rishon.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  What is he saying... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})

(:Text {content:  I can touch you, Rishon. Hear your voice. Smell your perfume. In every respect you are a real person with your own mind and your own beliefs... but you do not exist. You died with the others, defending the colony. He has recreated you just as he has recreated the house.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  You're the only living thing that really exists on Rana Four, Kevin. And though you look human, you're not.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  He's in the turbolift!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Let him go.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Captain -- he is dangerous!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})

(:Text {content:  So dangerous, Lieutenant, he could have destroyed us at any instant he wished. Track him. Alert the crew to keep out of his way. I want him to know we mean him no harm...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Will he try to get back to the planet?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Not if he's the creature of conscience I think he is. He has someone to help first...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  I have taken the music from her mind. She's alright now. She's sleeping.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75})

(:Text {content:  She was beginning to sense who I really was. I've been living as a human for over fifty years but I couldn't hide from her. She has suffered because of my pride and selfishness. It will not happen again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75})
(:Text {content:  What happened on Rana Four, Kevin? The truth this time -- all of it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})

(:Text {content:  Very well. For what it's worth. I am a Douwd... an immortal being of disguises and false surroundings. I have lived in this galaxy for many thousands of years although until today no one has known my true identity. Once while traveling in human form I chanced to fall in love with an Earth woman. I put aside my powers and became her husband. Our life was happy and rich. Eventually we came to this planet to live our final years. Now she is dead. She never knew what I really was...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Your colony was attacked by a warship...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})

(:Text {content:  Belonging to the Husnock, a species of hideous intelligence that knew only aggression and destruction. I could have destroyed them with a mere thought, but this I did not do.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  You had the power to stop them and you didn't?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  I refused to for the same reason I refused to stop the Enterprise. I will not kill!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  So you let the colonists fight a hopeless battle.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  I tried to fool the Husnock as I tried to fool you, but it only made them angrier and more cruel.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  And then what you feared most happened. Rishon went to fight with the others -- and she died with them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  How I wish I could have died with her...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  But you couldn't. You did the unthinkable instead. You took revenge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Yes! I saw her broken body. I went insane! My hatred exploded and in an instant of grief I destroyed the Husnock!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Why did you try to hide this from us? Was it out of guilt for not helping Rishon and the others when they were alive?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})

(:Text {content:  No. You don't understand the scope of my crime. I didn't kill just one Husnock, or a hundred, or a thousand -- I killed them all. All! The mothers, the babies, all the Husnock everywhere! Are eleven thousand people worth fifty billion? Is the love of a woman worth the destruction of an entire species... ? This is the sin I tried so hard to keep you from learning. This is why I wanted to chase you from Rana.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  We are not qualified to be your judges. We have no law to fit your crime. You're free to return to the planet... and to make Rishon live again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Helm... break orbit. Full impulse.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 78})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Stardate 43043.5. We are departing the Rana system for Starbase one three three. We leave behind a being of extraordinary power... and conscience. I am not certain if he should be praised or condemned. Only that he should be left alone...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 78})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Stardate 43125.2. We are en route to Mintaka Three, where a three-man Federation anthropological field team has been studying the inhabitants.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  Our mission is to resupply the outpost and repair their malfunctioning reactor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Report, Mister La Forge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})

(:Text {content:  We've finished replicating the parts they need. What I don't understand is why a three-man station needs a reactor that can produce four-point-two gigawatts.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  That's enough to power a small phaser bank, a subspace relay station, or...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  The anthropologists are studying an extended family of Mintakans at close range... from a camouflaged observation post.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  According to Doctor Barron's preliminary reports, the Mintakans are proto-Vulcan humanoids at the Bronze Age level. Quite peaceful and highly rational.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Not surprising, considering how closely their evolution has paralleled Vulcan.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Captain, incoming transmission from Mintaka Three.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  On screen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Barron to Enterprise. Our temporary repairs have failed. The reactor is now inoperative.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Do you have battery backup?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Three hours' worth at best.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Captain, if we increase to warp seven we can be there in twenty-three minutes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Make it so. We're on our way --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  We've lost contact, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Increase to warp nine.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Why did we have to come so early?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  When the sun reaches its zenith, I have to be ready to take the measurements.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  You'll be ready. You've read the sundial hundreds of times.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Yes, father -- but never as the appointed recordkeeper.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  You're taking your duties quite seriously. Your mother would have been proud of you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  What is that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  I don't know...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Keep work... Palmer... Warren...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  The hologram generator is now functional.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10A})
(:Text {content:  Or would be, if we had power...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10A})
(:Text {content:  Almost there...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10A})
(:Text {content:  Enterprise -- beam Martinez and his patient directly to Sickbay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10B})
(:Text {content:  Doctor --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10B})
(:Text {content:  Crusher to Enterprise. Medical emergency. Two to beam directly to Sickbay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  That should do it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Before you start quoting the Prime Directive -- he'd already seen us; the damage was done. It was bring him aboard or let him die.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Then why didn't you let him die?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Because we were responsible for his injuries!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  I don't know if I concur with that reasoning, Doctor. But now that he's here, you must remove all memory of his encounter with the away team.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  By erasing short-term recall?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  It's been accomplished before.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Yes, I'm familiar with Doctor Pulaski's technique. Though I can't guarantee it will be effective on Mintakan brain chemistry --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  No! We must evacuate --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Doctor Barron! You're on the Enterprise. You're safe now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  The others?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Doctor Warren is here. We're doing all we can.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  And Palmer? Where is Palmer?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Still on Mintaka Three.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Picard -- you have to find him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  We will.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  He may be hurt --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Rest assured -- we will not leave until we locate Palmer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Thank you, Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Picard to bridge. Report.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Scans of the planet detect no humans, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Very well. Take us into a close orbit.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Sir, a close orbit will increase sensor efficiency by only four percent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  I want that four percent, Lieutenant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Picard out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Picard?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Damn --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Doctor, your next task is clear.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Oji?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Father?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  After a beat, Oji ENTERS, rushes to her father's side})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  I think I was... but I was brought back to life. I awoke in an incredible place -- and my wounds were gone. I had been healed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  How is that possible?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})

(:Text {content:  Long ago, our people believed in beings with great powers. These beings made the rains come, told the sun when to rise, and caused all life to be born, to grow, to die.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  But those are just tales -- old superstitions.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps the beliefs of our ancestors are true. Nothing else can explain what's happened. Everything's changed now, Oji. We must tell the others...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Palmer is missing, and scans of the planet pick up Mintakan life forms only -- no humans. However...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})

(:Text {content:  The area around the duck blind exhibits Karst topography -- sinkholes, underground rivers, and caverns. And the rock strata contain a high concentration of thallium compounds, which may be obstructing our sensor beams.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  So if Palmer, in his delirium, fled into a cave, we might be unable to detect his life signs.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Correct.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Captain, if he is still alive, he probably needs medical attention. We must send an away team to locate him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  But our presence mustn't interfere with the cultural development of the Mintakans.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Agreed. Further contamination must be prevented.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Sir, I have a suggestion.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  First officer's log, Stardate are beaming down to Mintaka Three to locate Doctor Palmer and determine the extent of the cultural contamination.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})

(:Text {content:  Doctor Crusher has temporarily altered our features and skin color. She's also implanted subcutaneous communicators so that any transmissions we receive will be inaudible to the Mintakans.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Riker to Enterprise -- do you read?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Perfectly, Commander. I will be monitoring you continuously.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Mintakan emotions are quite interesting. Like the Vulcans, they have highly ordered minds... A very sensible people.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  For example, Mintakan women precede their mates. It's a signal to other women.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  \"This man's taken; get your own?\"})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Not precisely... More like, \"if you want his services, I'm the one to negotiate with.\"})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  What kinds of \"services?\"})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  All kinds.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Ah. They are a sensible race.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  I understand your skepticism. Had it not happened to me, I would find it difficult to accept as well.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  But it did happen, just as we've told you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Fento -- you know the legends better than anyone. Don't they speak of beings like the ones I've seen --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  There are the stories of the Overseer... who could appear and disappear at will...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  And couldn't this Overseer heal the dead?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  He had supreme power -- or so our ancestors believed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  I believe I've seen the Overseer...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Uh-oh...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  He is called the Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  His memory is intact.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  The procedure didn't work.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})

(:Text {content:  Liko -- all this talk of a supernatural being... No one's believed that for countless generations. Just as we no longer believe the stars control our fates, or that the spirits of the dead haunt the living.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  I'm not saying all the old beliefs are true. But I did see the Picard, and I was restored to life.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  We are visitors; we've come to trade our cloth. May we speak?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Please do -- we welcome outsiders. I am Nuria.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  I am Troi; this is Riker. You've had a very interesting dream.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Dream? It was real!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  My father and I both witnessed these beings.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  If you are father and daughter, you may have shared the same dream.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  That is not reasonable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Is it any less reasonable than being magically propelled to a strange place by \"the Picard?\"})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Nuria!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  It has to be -- Palmer -- the one the Picard wished to find.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Remarkable. You were speaking the truth.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  The Picard will be pleased.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Riker to Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  Go ahead, Number One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  We have a problem.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  The contamination?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  It's worse than we suspected. The Mintakans are beginning to believe in a god -- and the one they've chosen... is you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Picard -- you must beam Palmer aboard immediately. Without medical attention --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  It's not that simple. He's surrounded by Mintakans. If he dematerializes before their eyes...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  cultural contamination which already exists. A small price for saving Palmer's life.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Number One -- is there any chance of your freeing Palmer and transporting up unseen?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  We can try...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Try hard. Picard out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Picard, I must protest. You're endangering Palmer with this delay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  I'm aware of that. But each of us -- including Doctor Palmer -- took an oath to uphold the Prime Directive... if necessary, with our lives.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  We followed a hornbuck into a cave. The stranger was there -- asleep.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  This Palmer is one of the Overseer's servants?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Yes -- the Picard has many servants. Isn't that true?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  According to the legends. But if Palmer is a servant of the Overseer, what was he doing in the cave?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps he ran away.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Or he failed the Picard somehow and was hiding from him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  We should bind him in case he wakes and tries to escape.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  It's senseless to hold this stranger captive. This Overseer talk is nothing more than an old superstition.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I disagree. All the evidence suggests the Overseer does exist.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  And I heard the Picard say he wanted to find Palmer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Then by keeping Palmer safe, we will please the Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  And he'll grant us favors in return.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Favors?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  The Overseer was said to be all-powerful. He could provide gentle winters, plentiful hunting, fertile crops... anything.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  He could even bring back those who have died.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  We will keep Palmer for the Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I've seen another one -- like Palmer!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Another servant of the Picard?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  He's headed toward the caves!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Fento -- stay and bind Palmer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Excuse me... that knot won't hold. If I may assist...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  Please do.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  The trick is to make a knot that tightens under pressure. Here, I'll show you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  Father -- the sun's reaching its zenith. If I don't go to measure...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Go.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Forgive me, friend... but the stranger must be set free.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  Riker to Enterprise. Lock on and prepare to beam us directly to Sickbay, but wait for my signal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Acknowledged, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Riker?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Riker! Stop!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Oji?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  It's Riker -- he's taking Palmer!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Yari -- don't let her escape.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  I'm clear. Energize!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Data. Has Counselor Troi beamed up?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Negative, Commander. Sensors show she's in the midst of a group of Mintakans.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Damn.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Hali -- find Riker and Palmer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  Why? Why did you and Riker take Palmer from us?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  We did not \"take\" Palmer...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  I don't believe these fables about the Overseer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Don't you realize what you've done?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  You've angered the Picard -- and we may all suffer for it! Weren't there stories of the Overseer destroying those who offended him?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Stories. Nothing more.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Liko, we'll get Palmer back. Riker was carrying him -- they can't have gone far.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Still, the Picard may blame us for Palmer's escape. Perhaps we should punish her -- to let the Overseer know that she and Riker acted alone.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  We'll keep Troi captive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  That's not enough.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  You would have us harm her?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  If it will hold off the Picard's anger -- yes. I've seen how powerful he is...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  I am unwilling to hurt Troi needlessly. We will wait for Hali and the others to return.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  And if they don't find Palmer?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  Then we may have to do as Liko suggests.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  You believe the Mintakans are capable of harming Troi?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  They are not normally a violent people... but these are extraordinary circumstances. They're trying to comprehend what they believe to be a god.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Recommendations?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  The Mintakans wish to please the Overseer, but they can only guess what he wants. They need a sign.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Are you suggesting...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  You must go down to Mintaka Three.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Masquerading as a god?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Out of the question. The Prime Directive --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Has already been violated. The damage is done; all we can do now is minimize it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  By sanctioning their false beliefs?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  By giving them guidelines... letting them know what the Overseer expects of them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  I cannot -- I will not impose a set of commandments on these people. To do so violates the essence of the Prime Directive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Like it or not, we've rekindled the Mintakans' belief in the Overseer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  And you're saying that belief will eventually develop into a religion.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  It's inevitable. And without guidance, that religion could degenerate into inquisitions... holy wars... chaos.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})

(:Text {content:  Your own reports describe how rational these people are. Millennia ago, they abandoned all belief in the supernatural. And now you're asking me to sabotage that achievement... send them back into the Dark Ages of fear and superstition. No. We must undo the damage we've caused. Number One -- tell me about the group's leader.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Nuria is exceptionally fair-minded and sensible... the Mintakans trust her judgment. If we could convince her we're not gods...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  And how do you propose to convince her?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  She sees the Picard as a magical figure. I'm going to show her how the magic works. Bring her aboard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})

(:Text {content:  Counselor, sensors indicate five Mintakans in your immediate vicinity. Four are motionless; the fifth is eight meters away, proceeding south. Is Nuria one of these five?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Mmm-hmm.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Was that intended to be an affirmative?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Data, it was.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Is Nuria the closest of the five?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  Mmm-mmm.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  Negative.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  Is Nuria the one in motion?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  Mmm-hmm.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  Lock sensors on Nuria.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  Locked on, Commander. We can beam Nuria aboard at will.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  Data, when sensors indicate she's alone, beam her to Transporter Room One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  Ensign Hoy, I'll handle this.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75})
(:Text {content:  Nuria -- don't be afraid.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  No one's going to harm you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  Who... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  My name is Jean-Luc Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  Please -- get up.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  Get up! You don't kneel to me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  You do not wish it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  I do not deserve it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  Look at me. Feel the warmth of my hand, the rhythm of my pulse. I am not a supreme being -- I am flesh and blood, like you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  Not like me...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
