(:Text {content:  Like you! Different in appearance, yes. But we are both living beings -- we are born, we grow, we live, we die. In all the ways that matter, we are alike.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  But -- you are the Picard!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  Let me show you my people. Let me show you something.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  What a wondrous place this is. Even the doors obey your commands.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  It is wondrous -- but not miraculous. The doors merely work differently from the ones you know.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  That is my home?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Seen from far, far above.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Yet we don't fall. I never imagined I would see the clouds... from the other side. Your powers are truly boundless.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Nuria -- your people live in huts. Was it always so?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  No. We have found remnants of tools in caves. Our ancestors must have lived there.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Why do you now live in huts?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Huts are better. Caves are dark and wet --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  If huts are better, why did your people ever live in caves?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  The most reasonable explanation is that at one time we didn't know how to make huts.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Just as there was a time when you didn't know how to make cloth -- or bows.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  That is reasonable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Someone invented huts. Someone invented the bow. And they taught others, who taught their children, who taught their children's children...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Now suppose one of your cave-dwelling ancestors could see you as you are today. What would she think?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  I don't know.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Put yourself in her place. You have a power she lacks. You can kill a hornbuck from a great distance.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Only because I have a bow.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  She has never seen a bow -- it doesn't yet exist in her world. To you, it's a simple tool. To her, it's magic.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  I suppose she might think so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  And how would she react to you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  I think... she would fear me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Just as you fear me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  I do not fear you any longer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Good. My people once lived in caves, too. We learned to build huts... and, later, to build ships such as this one.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps some day my people will travel above the sky...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Of that, I have absolutely no doubt.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  It's not the season for lightning. It must be a warning...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  We've had storms at this time of year before.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  Not like this one...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  It must mean something! The Picard is angry with us. He blames us for Palmer's escape.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  Liko -- we don't know that the Overseer is responsible for this storm...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  Will he also send floods? My wife died in last year's floods -- will we all die now?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  We must find Nuria.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  Picard... you have shown me wonders I could never have imagined... and I am grateful beyond words... but might I request something for my people?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 85})
(:Text {content:  You are indeed a leader.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 85})
(:Text {content:  You have shown me such generosity; I wish my people could share in it. Six Mintakans died in a flood last winter. Four of them were children.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 85})
(:Text {content:  Would you bring them back to life?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 85})
(:Text {content:  That is beyond my power.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 85})

(:Text {content:  Why? You restored Liko's life. Did the six who died offend you in some way? Or have I offended you? Should I have ordered the death of Troi? Please -- if there is anything I can do to change your mind...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 85})
(:Text {content:  I've failed to get through to you, haven't I? Despite all my efforts...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 86})
(:Text {content:  Nuria can't be found. No one knows where she's gone.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  Hali! Any sign of Palmer or Riker?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  They've escaped us. We searched everywhere.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  What do we do now?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  As the Picard wishes. Punish those responsible.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  Nuria would not allow --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  Nuria isn't here -- and we can't wait.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  Crusher to Picard. I think we're going to lose Warren.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91})
(:Text {content:  On my way.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91})
(:Text {content:  I'm here, Mary.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 92})
(:Text {content:  Prepare two cc's of norep.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 92})
(:Text {content:  I'm sorry.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 92})
(:Text {content:  Picard?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 93})
(:Text {content:  You could not save her.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 93})
(:Text {content:  No.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 93})
(:Text {content:  You do have limits. You are not masters of life and death.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 93})

(:Text {content:  No, we are not. We can cure many diseases and repair many injuries. We can extend life... but despite all our knowledge -- all our advances are... just as powerless to prevent the inevitable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 93})
(:Text {content:  You are a remarkable people. But you are not superior beings. My people must be made to understand that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 93})
(:Text {content:  Liko -- you don't want to kill me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  I have no choice. I must do as the Picard wishes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  Are you sure you know what he wants?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  That's one problem with believing in a supernatural being... trying to determine what he wants.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  We must do something.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  But what if we do the wrong thing?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  Picard. We need your guidance. Is it your wish that this woman should die? Answer us! Speak!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 95})
(:Text {content:  Liko!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 95})
(:Text {content:  The Picard! The Overseer has come!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  No, Liko -- I am not the Overseer. I am a man... a traveller from a faraway land. Nothing more.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  But you restored my life! I am your servant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  You are no one's servant. I deserve neither your obedience nor your worship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  Why are you trying to deceive me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})

(:Text {content:  Picard speaks the truth. I've visited his people... I've seen how they live... how they die. When death takes their loved ones, they are as helpless as we are.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  Then how was I brought back to life?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  You were not dead. Picard's people have knowledge we lack -- they can heal wounds that we cannot.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  You can bring people back from the dead. Show them, Picard. You can bring my wife back to me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  I can't.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  Why? Why won't you do this for me? Have I failed you somehow? Are you angry with me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  I am not angry.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  Then I beg you -- bring her back to life!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  I will give you my life in exchange! Please -- take back what you've given me -- and give it to her! Let her live!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  It is beyond my power.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  Nothing is beyond your power! You are the Overseer -- I'll prove it!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  Liko!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  Go ahead, Liko. If I am all-powerful, you can't hurt me. If, however, I am telling the truth and I am mortal... you will kill me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 98})
(:Text {content:  But if the only proof you will believe is my life -- then shoot.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 98})
(:Text {content:  Don't do it, Liko!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 98})
(:Text {content:  Father -- no!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 99})
(:Text {content:  Captain's log, supplemental. Before we dismantle the observation post and depart, I must make one last visit to Mintaka Three.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 102})
(:Text {content:  Now, Mister La Forge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 103})
(:Text {content:  What is it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 103})
(:Text {content:  A place where we could watch your people.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 103})
(:Text {content:  Why?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 103})
(:Text {content:  To study you. To understand your ways.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 103})
(:Text {content:  Why should a people so advanced want to learn about us?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 103})
(:Text {content:  Because we were once as you are. To study you is to understand ourselves.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 103})
(:Text {content:  But why did you have to hide from us?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 103})
(:Text {content:  Because their presence would affect us... as it affected me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 103})
(:Text {content:  It is our highest law that we shall not interfere with other cultures.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 103})
(:Text {content:  Then revealing yourselves was an accident.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 103})
(:Text {content:  Yes. And now we must leave.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 103})
(:Text {content:  Why? There's so much you could teach us...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 103})
(:Text {content:  But that would also be interfering. You must progress on your own.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 103})
(:Text {content:  As we will. You've shown us that nothing is beyond our reach.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 103})
(:Text {content:  Not even the stars.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 103})
(:Text {content:  I wish you good journeys, Picard. Remember my people.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 103})
(:Text {content:  Always.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 103})
(:Text {content:  Away Team reporting in, Commander. Lieutenant Worf standing by.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  This is Riker, report Lieutenant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  The archeologists have identified the markings in these caverns. This planet was apparently once home to a race known as the Koinonians.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  What do we know about them, Data?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})

(:Text {content:  The Koinonians were an intelligent culture which became embroiled in a war that lasted several generations. Our best evidence indicates they destroyed themselves.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  We have completed our survey of the third tunnel and will proceed into the ceremonial chamber.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Affirmative. Enterprise out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Destroyed themselves, Data?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  According to historical records. This will be the first opportunity for a Federation team...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Captain! Beam them up quickly! They---})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Emergency beam-up! Enterprise, emergency! Injuries. Away---})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Transporter Room!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  I've got them, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Beam them straight to Sickbay. Doctor Crusher, incoming wounded.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Away Team is aboard, Captain. One dead on arrival.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  FADE IN:})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Captain's Log: Stardate 43506.5 The Enterprise remains in standard orbit while we investigate the tragedy which has struck the Away Team.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})

(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Marla Aster, ship's archaeologist has been killed in what should have been a routine mission. Whatever the explanation, it will not bring back a valued and trusted officer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})

(:Text {content:  We had completed our investigation of the third tunnel. Our scans had indicated no weapons or traps of any kind. Lieutenant Aster was three meters behind me. An explosive device went off. There was no warning. Lieutenant Aster bore the full brunt of the detonation. I was in command. I bear full responsibility.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant. I have the utmost faith that you acted properly and in the best traditions of Starfleet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Let's take a look at that shoulder...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Aster is survived by a son, Jeremy. Twelve years old.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  What about his father?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  He is also deceased, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  His only living relatives are an aunt and uncle residing on Earth.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Where is the boy now?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  In class. I've alerted the teacher to expect us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  I must accompany you. I commanded the Away Team.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  I appreciate the offer but this is my responsibility.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Go to your quarters. Rest. You're relieved of duty for twenty-four hours.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  That's an order.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Picard to Bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6A})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6A})
(:Text {content:  Assign Commander La Forge to lead another Away Team to the digsite. I want to know why this happened...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6A})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  I will be with Counselor Troi and young Jeremy Aster.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  I understand. Riker out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  He had to do the same thing for me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Do you know Jeremy well?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  But I know what it'll be like for him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  It's part of life in Starfleet, Wesley.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  They're very careful to prepare us for... anything. Still...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  I know.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  How can you ever get used to it... to telling them... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  You hope you never do.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  I sense the weight of this duty on you, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10A})
(:Text {content:  I really wonder...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10A})
(:Text {content:  Halt.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10A})
(:Text {content:  I've always believed that carrying children on a starship... it's a questionable policy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10A})
(:Text {content:  Serving on a starship means accepting certain risks and dangers. But did Jeremy Aster make that choice?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10A})
(:Text {content:  Death and loss are an integral part of life everywhere. Leaving the boy on Earth would not have protected him from that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10A})

(:Text {content:  No, but Earth is not likely to be ordered to the Neutral Zone to repel a Romulan attack... It was my command which sent his mother to her death. She understood her mission and my duty. Will he?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10A})
(:Text {content:  In time. With help. Ensign Crusher does.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10A})
(:Text {content:  Yes, he does. And so will Jeremy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10A})
(:Text {content:  Resume.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10A})
(:Text {content:  Jeremy, the Captain needs to talk with you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  I'm Jeremy, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  My office is over there, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Jeremy, it is my sad duty to tell you that your mother has died.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13A})
(:Text {content:  How, sir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13A})
(:Text {content:  An explosive device at the mission site. She died instantly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13A})
(:Text {content:  I understand.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13A})
(:Text {content:  I know your mother loved you very much, Jeremy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13A})
(:Text {content:  I've been told... you've also lost your father.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13A})
(:Text {content:  Yessir. Five years ago. From a Rushton Infection. I'm alone now, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13A})
(:Text {content:  No one is alone on the starship Enterprise, Jeremy. No one.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13A})
(:Text {content:  I really ought to get back to class... if I get behind...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  I'm sure your mom wanted you to do well in school. Wasn't she a teacher on Earth?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  She taught exo-archeology.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Why did she sign on the Enterprise?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  She said she wanted to see the galaxy with her own eyes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Was she happy doing that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Yeah. Real happy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Did she ever tell you there was a chance this might happen someday?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Yes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  It might help if we talked about how you're feeling.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  You're a Betazoid. You know how I feel.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})

(:Text {content:  When my father died we were living on Betazed. My mother and all her people are telepathic. I kept wanting to talk about my father, and they kept pulling my thoughts out of my head before I could say the words. It made me very angry.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})

(:Text {content:  I needed to say them out loud. I was confused about why he went away. Was it me -- something I had done. I felt that if I could just say the words he would somehow know how much I loved him and missed him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  I thought you might feel the same way.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  She just had to do her job. I understand that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Did she talk to you about her mission before she left?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  She told me about the ruins. She always made it like a story book.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Why do you keep going over to the terminal?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  No reason.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  It's nothing. I broke it yesterday.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Was your mother angry when you broke it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Was she still angry when she left?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Jeremy, did that broken terminal cause the accident?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  No.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Did you cause the accident?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  No. I just never had a chance to tell her I fixed it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Jeremy, if your mother were here right now, would she forgive you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  I want you to have some time alone for a little while. I'll come back when you're ready to talk again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  How will you know?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  This time I will use my Betazoid sense, and I'll know.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Excuse me. Am I intruding?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17C})
(:Text {content:  No, sit down.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17C})
(:Text {content:  How well did you know Lieutenant Aster?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17C})
(:Text {content:  We spent some time together. Not very well.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17C})
(:Text {content:  How well did you know her?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17C})
(:Text {content:  Why do you ask?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17C})
(:Text {content:  Well... I mean you just asked me...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17C})

(:Text {content:  But why do you ask the question? I have been asked several times to define 'how well I knew Lieutenant Aster' since her death. And I heard you ask Wesley on the Bridge if he knew Jeremy well. Does the question of familiarity have some bearing on death?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17C})
(:Text {content:  Do you remember how we all felt when Tasha died?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17C})
(:Text {content:  I do not sense the same feelings of... absence... that I associate with Lieutenant Yar... although I cannot say precisely why...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17C})
(:Text {content:  That's just human nature, Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17C})
(:Text {content:  Human nature, sir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17C})
(:Text {content:  We feel a loss more intensely when it's a friend.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17C})
(:Text {content:  But should not the feelings be just as deep regardless of who has died?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17C})

(:Text {content:  Maybe they should, Data. Maybe if we felt the loss of any life as keenly as we felt the death of those close to us, our history would've been a lot less bloody.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17C})
(:Text {content:  La Forge to Riker...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17C})
(:Text {content:  You're back, Geordi...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17C})
(:Text {content:  Yessir, and we've brought back a souvenier...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17C})
(:Text {content:  Five more just like it... all identical to the one that killed Lieutenant Aster...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17D})
(:Text {content:  They employ a subspace proximity detonator. A normal tricorder would never detect it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17D})
(:Text {content:  How long would you say they've been there, Data?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17D})
(:Text {content:  It comes from the time of the Koinonian Wars, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17D})
(:Text {content:  Did you find them all, Geordi?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17D})
(:Text {content:  Yeah. But... Well, they were all sort of... left there to be found.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17D})
(:Text {content:  Left by whom? There are no indications of life on this planet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17D})
(:Text {content:  I don't know, Captain... but it was pretty obvious that they'd been recently pulled out of the ground and defused.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17D})
(:Text {content:  Worf!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Counselor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  I can understand that you don't want to talk about what happened.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  I have made my report to the Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  I'm more interested in how you feel about what happened. And right now I sense great anger.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  I cannot seek revenge against an enemy who turned to dust centuries ago.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Her death was senseless. The last victim of a forgotten war.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Go on.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  There is no more to be said.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  A person has died while under your command. It may happen again. If you cannot learn to release the anger and the guilt, to talk about it...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  A leader must stand alone. As Captain Picard does.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Captain Picard talks to me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Then may I seek your counsel about my plan to make the R'uustai with the boy...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  The Bonding.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  It is my right.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  It's a very generous offer, but he's not a Klingon child. He has different sensibilities.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  He is an orphan. I am an orphan. He will understand.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})

(:Text {content:  Right now, there isn't much he can understand, Worf. He's holding all his feelings inside... Children often feel they must be true to the memory of a lost parent. If you offer affection to them too soon they can feel guilty returning that affection. As if they're betraying the love they feel for the parent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  I only wish to honor his mother.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})

(:Text {content:  I know. And I understand this means a great deal to you. But you must be prepared, Worf... he is very angry too, but his anger is deep inside him... When he finally touches it, it will strike out in many directions... including yours. Talk with him. Be with him. But do not rush this. When he is ready, we will know.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Jeremy Aster, I am Lieutenant Worf. May I enter?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22A})
(:Text {content:  You were in command of the Away Team.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22A})
(:Text {content:  Yes. I was with Lieutenant Aster, your mother, when she died. Her death lies between us. It is my hope...that...someday... it can also bind us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22A})
(:Text {content:  You're a Klingon, aren't you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22A})
(:Text {content:  Yes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22A})
(:Text {content:  We studied Klingons in school.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22A})
(:Text {content:  What do they teach you about us?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22A})
(:Text {content:  You used to be our enemies.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22A})
(:Text {content:  Do they teach you that every Klingon hopes to die in the line of duty as your mother did?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22A})
(:Text {content:  In my tradition, we do not grieve the loss of the body... we celebrate the releasing of the spirit.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22A})
(:Text {content:  I understand death. They teach us all about it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22A})
(:Text {content:  Jeremy Aster, we may both understand it, but we must bring meaning to your mother's death. Perhaps we can do it together.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22A})
(:Text {content:  Come.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22D})
(:Text {content:  Counselor. How is the boy?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22D})
(:Text {content:  He is being very brave.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22D})
(:Text {content:  Good.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22D})
(:Text {content:  No. He'll have to get past brave. He is a very angry boy... He must learn to express that anger before he can really say good-bye to his mother.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22D})
(:Text {content:  How can we help?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22D})
(:Text {content:  I've asked Beverly if we might get Wesley to talk to Jeremy about his father's death...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22D})
(:Text {content:  The one unusual element is Worf.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22D})
(:Text {content:  Oh?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22D})
(:Text {content:  In many ways he is suffering as badly as the boy. He wishes to involve Jeremy in a Klingon ceremony called the R'uustai... the bonding...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22D})
(:Text {content:  I know it. Perhaps it would be a comfort to both your patients, Counselor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22D})
(:Text {content:  I don't think the boy would accept Worf right now. Later, perhaps. But it will have to be handled most delicately.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22D})
(:Text {content:  As you always do.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22D})
(:Text {content:  I break the unpleasant news and my responsibility ends. You have to stay with them through the entire grieving process.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22D})

(:Text {content:  We find many different ways to deal with our pain, but over the years, I've discovered it is in our joy that the uniqueness of each individual is revealed. If I can help a person back to a state of joy... well, my role has its rewards.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22D})
(:Text {content:  Captain, we're picking up an energy field on the planet's surface...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22D})
(:Text {content:  Location?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22E})
(:Text {content:  Two kilometers north of the Away Team's beamdown point.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22E})
(:Text {content:  Indeed. Full scan.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22E})
(:Text {content:  Inconclusive, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22E})
(:Text {content:  Sir, I sense a... presence on the planet. Very vague.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22E})
(:Text {content:  A life form?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22E})
(:Text {content:  I can't be sure... the emotions of the crew are particularly strong right now and it's difficult to filter them out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22E})
(:Text {content:  Data, scan analysis on Main Viewer...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22E})
(:Text {content:  Hi.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22F})
(:Text {content:  Troi stopped by a little while ago. She was wondering if you might be willing to talk to Jeremy Aster at some point.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22F})
(:Text {content:  Me? What for?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2F})
(:Text {content:  Because of your Dad.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2F})
(:Text {content:  What would I tell him?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2F})
(:Text {content:  It would help him to talk with someone who's gone through this.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2F})

(:Text {content:  We had each other, Wes... he doesn't have anyone to lean on now... and he might be more comfortable talking about it with someone who's not much older...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2F})
(:Text {content:  Okay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2F})
(:Text {content:  You ever think about him, Mom?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2F})
(:Text {content:  Your father? Sure, I do.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2F})
(:Text {content:  Sometimes I can't quite remember his face... it scares me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22F})
(:Text {content:  That happens to all of us, Wes... Sometimes I can't get his face out of my mind.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22F})

(:Text {content:  Today... it's like I can see it all as clearly as if it were yesterday... the way he looked when he hugged me good-bye... Captain Picard's eyes when he came to tell us...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22F})
(:Text {content:  Data, run comparison with known phenomena.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22G})
(:Text {content:  The pattern has no exact match in Federation records.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22G})
(:Text {content:  Is it alive?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22G})
(:Text {content:  A possibility.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22G})
(:Text {content:  Captain, I'm getting an unusual magnetic flux reading from the anti-matter containment pods.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22G})
(:Text {content:  My God.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22G})
(:Text {content:  Mom!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  All systems are functioning normally -- still, there's a fluctuation in the containment field. I can't account for it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Data, is it related in some way to the energy field on the planet?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  There is a beam of highly charged particles emanating from the planet...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Captain, there is a presence aboard the Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  An alien presence... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  No intruder noted by the ship's sensors, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  A presence...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Security, all decks... yellow alert... possible intruder...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  They said you were dead.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  There was a mistake. It's okay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  But there was an explosion... you were hurt.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  Jeremy, I'm not hurt. I'm fine. You mustn't think any more about it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  The important thing is, I'll never leave you again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  Oh, I see you fixed the terminal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  Just after you. you left.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  This woman is damned convincing. But Jeremy is still reluctant to accept her. Marla extends her hand.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  I think somebody needs a hug.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  We have to go now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  Where?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  To the planet. That's where we're going to live now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  We're not going to stay on the Enterprise any more?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  No. We're going to live in a home just like we used to on Earth.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  You'll see. I promise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Worf... did they tell you? It was a mistake.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  She didn't die. She's alive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  Jeremy, come here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Worf, it's all right. I'm here for the boy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  Worf starts to pull his phaser, and doesn't know what the hell to do with it... even he has to wonder a moment})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  Go ahead.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Aster is in her quarters.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Repeat, Worf... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Aster. She's here. In her quarters. With the boy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})

(:Text {content:  Do not provoke her or interfere in any way until I arrive. Picard out. Have security moving that way but tell them to keep their distance. You have the Bridge. Counselor...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  There's nothing to worry about. I'm going to take care of Jeremy and make him happy. It's time to go.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  Where are you taking the child?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  To the planet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  Come on, Jeremy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  Worf to Picard, they're leaving their quarters...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  Captain, I believe we're headed for Transporter Room Three.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  We're on our way.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36A})
(:Text {content:  Chief O'Brien, Jeremy and I are going down to the surface.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Who are you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  I'm Marla Aster...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  It's my mother, Captain... She's alive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  What do you want?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  To take my child down to the planet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  I cannot permit that. This child is my responsibility.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  I'm here to care for him. He needs me. Why do you resist?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Because I don't know who -- or what -- you are.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Can't you see who she is?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Jeremy, she appears to be your mother, but she is not.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  What do you mean?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  You're confusing the boy...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Wait...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  No...stop...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Mon...Mom...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Jeremy...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  NO...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  What did you do to her?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Jeremy, I don't know what that was, but it was not your mother.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  You saw her... She was here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Your mother is dead.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  I touched her. She was real.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Why would your real mother want you to go to the planet. There's nothing there but rocks and dust...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  It's my house. My house on Earth.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Exactly the way it was... remember, Jeremy?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  But how did you do it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Does it matter?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Yes. It matters.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  I am trying to understand your resistance. You spoke of rocks and dust on the planet? I decided to show what awaits us there.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Why would you create this fantasy?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  It's his home. And it makes you happy, doesn't it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  But it's not real.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Isn't it? Jeremy, isn't that really Patches?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  He knows me. It's him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Look -- your blanket...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  It's real. It's all real.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Jeremy, it's not. Could your real mother make all this appear?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  You must not stay here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Come with me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  I can't.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Is the boy in any danger?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  I don't think so. She seems to want to help Jeremy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  Help him?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  Troi, would it be wise to remove Jeremy from his quarters?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  He does not want to leave. I would not recommend taking him by force.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  She offers him everything. All we offer is the cold reality of his mother's death.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  A beat. Picard sighs. To Troi --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  Remain in the cabin with them, Counselor. We're going to try to put an end to this from here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  Understood.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  Mister Data, can we determine for certain the energy source from the planet is powering this creation?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44B})
(:Text {content:  The beam from the planet is clearly tapping into the ship's anti-matter, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44B})
(:Text {content:  I'd say it's running the manifestation off our own energy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44B})
(:Text {content:  So there are limits to her power...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44B})
(:Text {content:  That's why she needs the Transporter to get the boy off the ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44B})
(:Text {content:  So how do we cut the puppet's strings?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44B})
(:Text {content:  By increasing the shield harmonics to match our antimatter containment fields, it is almost certain that the beam would be severed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44B})
(:Text {content:  Proceed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44B})
(:Text {content:  Troi, stand by...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44B})
(:Text {content:  Jeremy, it's time for this to end... You know it's not real and it is over now...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  I'm not going to leave you, Jeremy. Ever again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Jeremy, I won't lie to you or trick you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Jeremy we'll be happy together as soon as...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  No...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Anti-matter containment pods reading nominal...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  The shields have severed the beam.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Captain, the energy field...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Mister Crusher, take us out of...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Alien intruder. Transporter Room Three. Security alert. Alien...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53A})
(:Text {content:  Security to Transporter Room Three...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53C})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Worf, Commander La Forge with me... Number One you have the Bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53C})
(:Text {content:  Come, Jeremy, we will not let them separate us again. We are going home.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53E})
(:Text {content:  Captain, the image is back -- she's trying to take Jeremy off the ship again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Acknowledged.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Engineering, this is La Forge. Shut down power to all Transporters. I'm on my way...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Worf, to Transporter Room Three.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Bridge, seal off deck eight, corridors A and B.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Engaging force fields, Captain. Transporters are down.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  Energy force has left Transporter Room Three... security alert, all decks...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  La Forge, the intruder may try to reinstate Transporter power.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69A})
(:Text {content:  Understood, Commander...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69A})
(:Text {content:  Bridge, release security forcefield eight - B.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  How are you, Jeremy? Are you frightened?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  A little, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Of course. These are frightening things that are happening. We won't let anyone harm you. Counselor, why don't you take the child to my quarters.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  No.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})

(:Text {content:  It's looking over everything, Commander... going to school... Let's hope it doesn't blow us to Kingdom Come while it's figuring out how to blow us to Kingdom Come.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Power's back in Transporter Room Three...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  By-passing to manual override... shutting it down...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73A})
(:Text {content:  Transporter is down again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73A})
(:Text {content:  Keep it down, Geordi... for as long as you can...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73A})
(:Text {content:  It is only a matter of time, Captain, before we can power the Transporters ourselves...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  We? For whom else do you speak?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})

(:Text {content:  The accident on the surface was caused by a remnant of an old and tragic era. Two species once shared this world... one of energy... and one of matter. The physical beings you call the Koinonians destroyed themselves in unending, bitter wars. The surviving lifeforms on this world will not tolerate any further suffering from that dishonorable past. So they have made this possible... they have made me possible.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  I appreciate your motives. But his mother is dead. He must learn to live with that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  I will be every bit his mother.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  But not his mother.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Picard to Lieutenant Worf.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Go ahead, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Please escort Ensign Crusher to the Aster quarters. Picard out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Your philosophy is curious, Captain. What is so noble about sorrow? I can provide him an existance where he will feel no pain, no anguish...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  It is at the heart of our very nature... to feel pain... and joy... that is what makes us what we are.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  He is alone now in your world. A child alone. How can you know he won't be happier with me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  For a brief moment in time... he surely would be. Any of us in his place would be.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  What would Jeremy do for friends in your world?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  He will have any friends he needs.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  And then will you provide for his education, his health, his growth? A career? A wife?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Yes, it is quite an undertaking you're proposing, isn't it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  It is our duty to make him happy again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Do you honestly believe he will be happy in this total fiction you wish to create?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  What will be his reason to live?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})

(:Text {content:  What you offer is a memory... to cherish... but not to live in. It is part of our life cycle to accept the death of those we love. He must deal with grief, not cover it or hide from it. We are mortal. Our time in this universe is finite. It is the lesson every human must learn.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Ensign Crusher reporting as ordered, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Come in, Wesley.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Worf comes in and stands at attention in the background.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Wesley lost his father on a Starfleet mission when he was even younger than you are.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Your mother told me you were finding it difficult to talk to Jeremy. Why?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  I don't know. I guess... I just didn't want to think about it any more, you know... all this has reminded me so much of that day...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  The day I told you your father had been killed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  As I recall, you handled the news very well.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  My parents taught me about the dangers of starfleet missions. I knew it could happen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  So you were prepared.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  No, I don't think I was. Not really. How could anyone be... prepared to hear that his dad is... never coming home again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  I just tried to be what everybody expected me to be. Brave. Mature.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Are you saying you didn't want anybody to see how you really felt, Wesley?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  So how did you really feel?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Like somebody kicked me right in the brain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Somebody?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Go ahead, Wesley. You've wanted to tell him for a long time...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  I was angry. At you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Why, Wesley? Why were you angry with me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Were you angry because I was the one who told you he was dead?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  No.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Then why?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Because you led the mission. You came back. My father didn't.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  How long were you angry with Captain Picard, Wesley?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  A long time. But not any more. Not even a little, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  And you Jeremy... must be very angry with Lieutenant Worf.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  He was in charge of your mother's mission. Just as Captain Picard was in command when Wesley's father was killed. Isn't that right, Jeremy})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  She was my responsibility.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Worf came back. Your mother didn't.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Why? Why weren't you the one who died? Why did it have to be her?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  He can't answer that, Jeremy. None of us can.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Worf also lost his parents, Jeremy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  They were killed in battle when I was six.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  When I was alone, humans helped me. Let me help you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  The Marla Aster I knew and honored is not in this room. Nor does she await you on the planet. Now she lives only here... And here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Join with me in the R'uustai, the Bonding. You will become part of my family now and for all time. We will be brothers.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  SoS jIH batlh SoH.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  What does that mean?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  It honors the memory of our mothers. We have bonded and our families are stronger.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  SoS jIH balth SoH.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  Another Coco-no-no?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3B})
(:Text {content:  No thanks, I think I've had enough already.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3B})
(:Text {content:  Yeah, me too.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3B})
(:Text {content:  Geordi...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  What?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  I'm sorry. I think I better go back now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  You're chilly... ? I can turn down the breeze...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  No, it's been a lovely program, and you're a terrific guy...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Yeah...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  I just don't feel that way about you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Knock it off.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Do you require full termination of the Holodeck program or just the audio portion?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  This was the final battle, wasn't it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Neither side intended Orelious Nine to be the decisive conflict.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Not much of it left, is there...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  The destruction is remarkable considering the primitive weapons of the period.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Uh oh...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  I beg your pardon, Wesley?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  \"Uh oh\"... it's an expression, Data. It just means, you know, uh oh, something's wrong...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  There is something wrong?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Commander La Forge had a big date with Christy tonight. He's been working on the perfect program for days. Looks like it ended kinda early.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Uh oh.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Commander Data to the bridge immediately.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Acknowledged.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  We're picking up a signal, coordinates two-one-one mark six-one.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  It is an ancient interplanetary code.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Survivors on Orelious Nine after all this time... not possible.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Not at all possible. Lay in a course to the source of the signal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Approaching the source, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Put it on the viewer, Mister Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  A Promellian battle cruiser.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  And with its Lang Cycle fusion engines intact.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Scanners indicate no life signs aboard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})

(:Text {content:  I should hope not. That ship belongs in a museum. Gentlemen, I'm afraid we're a little late. This call for help was very likely initiated over a thousand years ago.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Stardate 43799.1. We have arrived at Orelious Nine, to chart the battle in which the Menthars and Promellians fought to their mutual extinction. Among the ruins we have found a relic: a Promellian battle cruiser that has withstood the centuries.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Indulge me, Number One...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  I'd prefer Lieutenant Worf and I did a security sweep of the vessel first...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  No. Captain's prerogative, here. This one's mine. We've examined every conceivable risk...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  The risks aboard a vessel this old and fragile are inconceivable, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Ghosts, perhaps? Haven't you ever dreamed of climbing inside the bottle... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Sir... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  The ship in the bottle, Number One. Model air ships... I used to build them as a child. By God, I'll bet I even had a Promellian battle cruiser too.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Ready to beam the away team to the vessel...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Locked on to the Main Bridge, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  You're certain about the atmospheric conditions, Data... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  There is adequate oxygen for life support, Commander...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  It is exactly as they left it, Number One. In the bottle. Good Lord, didn't anyone else here build ships in bottles when they were boys?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  I did not play with toys.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  I was never a boy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Thank you, Mister O'Brien. Proceed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  I did. I really did. Ships in bottles. Great fun.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  What's that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Not sure. The secondary power bus may need adjusting.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Let me know.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})

(:Text {content:  Extraordinary. You would expect the layout of a bridge from this era to be clumsy, awkward... but see this -- it is a model of simplicity. They built the same craft for generations. And it worked.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Admirable. They died at their posts.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Don't you have anything stronger than this, Guinan?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Yes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Would it help?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  No.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Can you tell me something, Guinan? You're a woman, right?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Yes, I can tell you that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  What is it that... you want in a man?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Me personally?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  As a woman. What's the first thing you look at?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  His head.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Uh huh... his mind, of course.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  No, his head. I'm attracted to bald men.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Seriously?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Seriously.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Why?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Maybe because a bald man was very kind to me once... when I was hurting. Took care of me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  I'd like to do that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  I'm taking care of myself these days.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})

(:Text {content:  I mean take care of somebody. Guinan, I just don't get it... I can field strip a fusion reactor... I can realign a power transfer tunnel... why can't I make anything work with a woman like Christy? I don't know what to do, what to say...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  I never noticed... as a woman.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  You're different.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  No, you're different.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  But I'm not trying now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Exactly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  The source of the distress signal is twenty meters ahead...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Mister Worf, be sure we get tricorder images of their tactical display...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Look here, Worf... how well laid out it is. We went through how many different designs before we reached this kind of sophistication... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})

(:Text {content:  I believe it was four, sir. We did not have a fully integrated tactical command until the twenty-third century. In fact, several of the Promellian innovations served as inspiration for early Federation starship design...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  As well they should have.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Positron ducts. These channeled power from one end of the ship to the other.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  It is safe to enter.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Let's put an end to their last cry for help.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  I believe this is an information storage device... a crude analogue of our own iso-linear optical chip.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})

(:Text {content:  Crude by our standards today, Data. When this ship was built, humans on Earth had just perfected the mechanical clock... and were using steel crossbows in battle. Is there any way to see what's on this?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})

(:Text {content:  Questionable. I can supply power to the playback unit, Captain... but the components are quite old... I will attempt to amplify its image with a tricorder...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  What is it, Wes?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  The main power return is acting a little weird...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Define \"weird\".})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  I'm getting fluctuating waveguide readings...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Run a maintenance sweep.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Right.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})

(:Text {content:  I am Galek Sar, Captain of the Promellian cruiser, Cleponji. I wish anyone who finds this record to know my crew has behaved courageously. I want it recorded for all time that I, alone, am responsible for the fate that befell us. I have failed -- as a captain. And as the man responsible for all the souls aboard my ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Indeed, sir. Picard to Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Go ahead, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  I think we've seen just about all there is to see here. At Mister O'Brien's convenience... we are ready to return...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  You were absolutely right, Number One. There were ghosts aboard the old ship after all... one of them even spoke to us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  A friendly one, I hope.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  My own counterpart. The ship captain's final message... praising his crew.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  I hope you'll be as thoughtful when the time comes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Data, advise the Astral-Five annex of the Smithsonian... This should be catalogued and scheduled for retrieval...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  I'm sorry... it's just a rare pleasure to meet this side of your personality, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Mister Crusher, set our course for the original coordinates.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Yessir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Captain, we are experiencing a two percent drop in our energy reserves. Compensating.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  We were having a few problems while...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Readouts indicate we are being bombarded with a field of high intensity radiation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Shields up.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Captain, energy loss increasing to five percent. I am unable to correct.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Yellow Alert.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Maybe I should've gone with the Mardi Gras program... something a little livelier...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  You ever consider doing it without a program?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  You're a pilot... Try flying without instruments for a change... you might surprise yourself.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Mister La Forge, report to Engineering...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  On my way, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Save my seat, Guinan.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Always room at the bar for another broken heart.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Energy loss increasing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Mister Crusher, reverse course. Full impulse power.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Sir, there's no response.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Increase speed to warp one.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Engines are not responding, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Mister La Forge, I need warp power now!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})

(:Text {content:  Matter/anti-matter mixture ratio settings at optimum balance... Reaction sequence corresponding to specified norms... Magnetic plasma transfer to warp field generators per program specs. Commander, we should be going like a bat out of hell.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Power loss now at twelve percent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Red Alert.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Radiation intensity increasing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  We better slow these engines down before we burn out the reaction chamber.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Slow to idle, Geordi.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Is it possible... have we stumbled into the same snare that killed them? A thousand-year-old... booby trap?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  FADE IN:})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})

(:Text {content:  With the engines idling, the energy loss has been limited. But our reserves will be depleted in less than three hours. We won't be able to hold our shields in place.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  If we lose shields, the radiation will kill everyone on board, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Not everyone, Doctor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  I stand corrected.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Have you identified the source of the radiation, Mister Worf?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  No, sir. The radiation field is too strong -- it interferes with our sensors.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  And no apparent explanation for the loss of energy... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Anything in the history books, Data that might give us a clue... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})

(:Text {content:  There are many fascinating records of Menthar battle strategy... they were exceptionally innovative. In fact, they were the first to devise the Kavis Teke elusive maneuver as well as a Passive Lure stratagem that is comparable to Napoleon's...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Any mention of a situation like this?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  No.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Recommend I lead an away team to the cruiser.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  They didn't have much success with this problem, Commander...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  But at least they knew their enemy better than we do. Maybe they even knew how they got into trouble... they just didn't know how to get out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Agreed. Worf, what would be the impact of lowering shields long enough to get an away team out... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Negligible, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  It won't help our energy conservation any, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})

(:Text {content:  That's your job, Commander La Forge. Determine a way to keep the Enterprise up and running. Data, you will join Commander Riker on the away team. Find out what happened to that ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Radiation factor is within safe human limits, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Why isn't this ship being hit with radiation?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  That is curious, Commander. The radiation field must be directional in nature... aimed only at the Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})

(:Text {content:  Maybe our own engines triggered it somehow... Data, see if you can determine what kind of defenses the Promellians tried to employ... I don't want to waste time trying them again...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Understood.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  What'd really help us is a ship's log... any kind of record of their last battle.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  So why can't we move?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Computer, as we increased our power levels, was there any counter-reaction?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Affirmative. The opposing force grew in direct proportion to the power output of the Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  So it kept us from forming a subspace field for the warp drive?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  That is correct.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Computer, who is this L. Brahms?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Doctor Leah Brahms. Engineer. Graduate of the Daystrom Institute. Theoretical Propulsion Group, Galaxy class starships. Team seven, junior member.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Junior member, huh. Looks like she wrote the book on propulsion. Call up subspace design logs...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Select menu, visual records or L. Brahms' voice entries.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Voice entries.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Theoretical propulsion logs, Federation Starship Enterprise, Galaxy class. Heading: Subspace. Author: Leah Brahms.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Geordi La Forge. How ya doin, Doc...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Yeah, down to work. You're absolutely right.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  I recommend we evacuate and seal off all non-operational areas and group the families and crew on odd-numbered decks.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Proceed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  I'd also like to set up an assembly area for treating radiation in case we need it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  After the shields fall, how long for a fatal exposure?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Thirty minutes. After that, there's nothing that can be done.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Away team to bridge. Captain, we may have found something...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  We're in the Promellian communications area...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  There's a file of memory coils here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  They are identical to the coil we found earlier, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Their captain's log, perhaps?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  That's what we were thinking.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Data, are the coils in working condition?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  I believe so. We can enhance them through the image processor in the ship's computer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Good. Return at once.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  What about the dilithium crystal control?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  It should be possible to fine tune the frequency ranges...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Yes?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  And the propulsion group is investigating numerous theories to determine how.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Great. Thanks a lot. Computer, generate a cross section image of the dilithium crystal chamber.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  What about reorienting the crystal?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})

(:Text {content:  It is possible to reorient the crystal. The key lies in adjusting the lattice structure direction. This modification will be integrated into the next class starship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Sorry, can't wait. You and me, Leah. We have two hours to figure this out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})

(:Text {content:  You know what I need to do -- I need to get inside there. I need to turn that thing inside out... Computer, is there a cross section of the engines we can replicate on a Holodeck?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Select menu: design specifications or prototype schematic.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Prototype? Elaborate...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  A development stage prototype schematic at Utopia Planitia, drafting room five, of the Mars Station, Stardate 40174.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Perfect. Recreate it in Holodeck Three. Stay with me, Doc.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Ready computer?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Holodeck Three program is ready.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Damn. Right back where it all started. This is incredible...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Leah, did you design this?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})

(:Text {content:  The dilithium crystal chamber was designed at outpost designated Seran-T-one, Stardate 40052... Some of the Federation's best engineering minds participated in its development.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Sure, that's visiting dignitary talk, what's the inside story... off-the-record?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Access denied. Personal logs are restricted.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Another woman who won't get personal with me in the Holodeck.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Leah, I want to find a way to supplement the energy supply to the ship and to the engines. Could we alter the matter/anti-matter paths?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Theoretically, yes. The system should be able to accept more reactants at a faster rate of injection.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Well, this is your baby, show me which ones...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Computer, did I ask for a simulation?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})

(:Text {content:  Affirmative. You asked Doctor Brahms to show you which system could accept reactants at a faster rate. By accessing available imagery, an adequate facsimile was possible.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  I did do that, didn't I?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Okay... Leah... good to see you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Real good.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Continue your analysis.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Systems L-452 through L-575 will accept reactants, providing all other systems are calibrated to an equal factor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})

(:Text {content:  Then, if we use multiple injector streams, hitting more than one crystal facet, we could do it... we could hold our own. Leah, you're beautiful. La Forge to Picard....})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Go ahead.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  Captain, we've found a way to extend the matter/anti-matter energy supplies.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  Well done, Mister La Forge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  Geordi, can you give us enough energy to get us out of here?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  Sorry, Commander... we haven't addressed that one yet. First priority was to maintain shields.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Acknowledged.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  We'll get on it, right away, though...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Pass on my congratulations to your team, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Thanks, Captain. We're... all smiles down here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Picard out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  We have been able to verify that these coils are logs of the Promellian captain... but most of them have decayed and cannot be repaired...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  They're beyond any sort of playback... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  On most there are brief sections that may yield some information.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Do the best you can, Data. Let's just hope we have the brief section we need...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  He must have logged the cause of his ship's death. What captain wouldn't?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  They were all in an open locker. I don't think he was too concerned with security.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Adjustments to dilithium crystal chamber complete.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Impact analysis, computer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Warp energy has increased fourteen percent. Reactants per unit time remaining steady.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  All right.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Computer, do you have any... you know... personality... on file for Doctor Brahms?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Starfleet personality profile analysis, stardate 37650...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Did she ever debate at the intergalactic caucuses on Chaya-seven?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Doctor Brahms attended Chaya-seven caucuses on the following stardates...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Never mind the dates... Computer, if you add all data from these sources, could you synthesize a true representation of Doctor Brahms?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  There would be a nine-point-three percent margin of error in the interactive responses from the facsimile.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  I can live with that. Make it happen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Doctor Brahms?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Geordi, it's me, Leah. Don't start calling me \"Doctor Brahms\" or I'll call you \"Commander\" La Forge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Right.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Now, we've managed to maintain energy but we can't leave it in this realignment forever without burning out components so we need to move quickly...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  He's a little slow on the uptake, still a bit mesmerized with her... noticing, with a curl of a smile})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})

(:Text {content:  propulsion, and our weapons are useless. We can't move -- and we can't fight. The ship is being lashed with lethal radiation from the Aceton assimilators concealed in the rubble surrounding....})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Aceton assimilators -- ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  An Aceton assimilator is a primitive generator which can drain power from distant sources.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  Generator...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  It would not be difficult to modify them to convert energy into radiation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
