(:Text {content:  The Menthars hide them in the floating debris... and an unsuspecting enemy ship flies in... instant booby trap.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  And now we're supplying the devices with the energy to kill us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  No... no... no...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Will you listen to me...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  You can't boost the warp power that way...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  If you can just increase the speed of the parallel subspace field processor to gain a quicker response time...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I want to give us enough power to strengthen the shields and barrel out of here... not blow us up...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  This is my design we're talking about. I did all the calculations myself.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I don't care if you built it with your bare hands out of an old Ferengi cargo ship, it's going to go --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I'm not used to having people question my judgment.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  And I'm not used to dying. You worked in a lab on a static model. This is a working machine, it has tens of thousands of light years on it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  True.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Damn right. We'd never be certain the circuit paths are sealed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  You're good. Very good.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I know my ship. Inside and out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Then I guess you know me. Inside and out. Cause a lot of me is in here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I always wished the chief engineer could be present when a ship is being built.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  And that's what's wrong with designers -- we never get out in space.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  You're there now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Commander La Forge to the bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  On my way, Commander. Don't go anywhere. I mean, computer -- save program.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  How many of these devices do we think we're dealing with?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  To create the radiation field we are experiencing, it would take several hundred thousand, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  They've been out there a long time, Data... there must be some deterioration....})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  There is no way to calculate that precisely, Commander... but it is likely...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Is there any indication of a weakness in a specific part of the field...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Nothing substantial, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Of any kind.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  A point-one percent dip in the strength of the radiation field at two-one mark eight by four-two mark zero...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  I'll take that point-one percent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Recommend we fire a directional phaser pattern at those coordinates...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  We won't be able to maintain energy reserves... we might even lose some circuits in the new configuration...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  How critical would the losses be?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Not enough to shut down our engines... but if we don't make it... I don't know if we could hold shields.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  There is also the possibility the phasers will supply the assimilators with what they need most -- energy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Mister La Forge, alternative suggestions?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Maybe down the road, Captain... But we can't overload the dilithium crystals much longer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})

(:Text {content:  I imagine a discussion very much like this took place on our neighbor's ship a thousand years ago. May our decisions meet with more success than theirs. Mister La Forge, you will return to Engineering and continue your efforts without delay. Mister Worf, prepare the phasers.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Phasers locked on coordinates.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Fire.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Nothing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Radiation levels increasing, Captain. Eight percent. Ten percent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Energy reserves on board dropping rapidly...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Damn you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Wouldn't that increase the output of the parallel subspace processors to gain a quicker response time... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  The processors can handle the extra input.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  Yeah, but how do we reconfigure... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  Energy reserves reaching critical stage. Standard procedure requires termination of all simulations.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  Computer, override standard procedure...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  Override authority restricted.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  What? -- computer --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  The crystal lattice is breaking down...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  We'll have to pick up repairs when we can reach a starbase....})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  The optimist in the group.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  How long do we have shields based on current calculations... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Under two hours, Captain. And the radiation field has increased by seventeen percent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Impact on fatal exposure?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Down to twenty-six minutes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  If we resist, we die. If we don't resist, we die.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Mister La Forge, have we shut down all non-essential energy usage?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Captain. In fact, I need to get some back... I'm running a program on Holodeck Three...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  For what purpose?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})

(:Text {content:  I've gone back to the beginning... to the earliest construction entries of the Enterprise. I've created... a... propulsion design model to assist me. I believe we're... making progress...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Computer, reinstate Holodeck Three program.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Holodeck Three program is reinstated.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Your best suggestion in an hour, Mister La Forge. Picard out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Computer, resume Holodeck Three program.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59A})
(:Text {content:  Enter when ready.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59A})
(:Text {content:  There isn't much time left.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})

(:Text {content:  Somehow, we have to generate enough energy to get out of here... but we've got a booby-trap that eats energy for breakfast... how do we fool it, block it, shut it down, anything...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  Okay, we know for every movement the Enterprise makes, there's a counter-movement from the energy field... could we use that to our advantage somehow...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  Maybe. There must be a time differential between the force and counter-force response...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  If we could make quick, continuing adjustments in the linkups before the counterforce reacts, we might just be able to move this bucket...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  Yes...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  Leah, you like Italian food?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  Like it? Wait til I make you my fungilli.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  Okay, fusion reactor uplink to navigation processor...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  But then we have to adjust the drive coils... and the vector processor... it's impossible..})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Don't do that...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Sorry... I thought it might feel good.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  I don't want to feel that good right now. What time is it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Coming up on sixteen hundred hours.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  God, what am I supposed to tell the Captain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  It's possible and yet it's impossible... everything we've done says we can't adjust fast enough... but if we could, it might work...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  I could do it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Data couldn't even do it. It'll take a hundred... maybe even a thousand adjustments every second... how are you gonna do it? It's humanly impossible.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  I'm not human.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  You mean the computer could do it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Captain, this is... a holographic simulation of one of the propulsion experts who designed the Enterprise engines... Leah Brahms. Doctor Leah Brahms.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  We... I've been examining the force and counter-force response time... and trying to see if we could create linkage at maximum power...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  The bottom line, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  There's a chance we could manuever out of the trap... if we turn the ship over to the computer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  What kind of chance?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  I don't know yet. But we can program it and try it out on a few simulated runs.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Proceed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  This is the only way...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  I think so, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Come.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Any word from La Forge?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  He's come up with something that might give us a chance. If we agree to stay out of it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Sir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  He proposes to turn control of the ship over to the computer because it is capable of making quicker adjustments than any human being.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Computers have always impressed me by their ability to take orders; I'm not at all as certain about their ability to give them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})

(:Text {content:  Especially with a thousand lives at stake. What choice do I have? You missed something by not playing with model ships. They were the source of one boy's imaginary voyages, each holding a treasure of adventures. Manning the earliest space craft. Or flying a plane with only one propeller to keep you in the sky. Imagine that. Now, the machines are flying us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Fatal radiation exposure.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Computer, reduce thrust levels another four percent... adjust trajectory angle to compensate... begin simulation again...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  There you go. We got out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Repeat simulation, same levels.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Swell. Same variables. Only this time the computer didn't quite make it...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Deflector shield failure. Lethal radiation levels. Fatal exposure in twenty-six minutes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  FADE IN:})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Deflector shield failure. Lethal radiation levels. Fatal exposure in twenty-three minutes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  I can't do it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  It might work, Geordi.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  And it might not. I can't ask the captain to turn the ship over to a computer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  It's all we've got.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  Picard to La Forge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  Captain... two minutes... give me just two minutes....})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  There is another way, Captain... two minutes...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Two minutes. Picard out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Geordi, there's no other way...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  No..no... wait, listen... turn it upside down, literally... come at it from the opposite direction... God, it's so simple... it might even work...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Lethal levels of radiation...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Computer, shut up... at least in Holodeck Three...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Computer, new simulation...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})

(:Text {content:  Everything we've been trying to do is based on overpowering the trap... more energy, faster adjustments... but that's exactly what we can't do, because that's what we're supposed to do. That's the booby trap. The answer is in our own computer... the mind -- the best piece of engineering we'll ever need.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  Didn't your research suggest thousands of adjustments would be required per second?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  Not if we turn everything off.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})

(:Text {content:  One blast of everything we've got left for a microsecond to beat the inertia and then we shut it all down except minimal life support and two thrusters. No impulse engines. No computer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  One propeller, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  Deflector shield failure. Lethal radiation levels. Fatal exposure in twelve minutes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  Have you analyzed the risk factor?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})

(:Text {content:  The numbers say it's even money. No better than handing it over to the computer. No worse either. But I say forget the numbers. There's no way for a computer to compensate for the human factor... the intuition, the experience...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  Make it ready.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  I've run the simulations... If you want me to take Conn...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  No, Mister La Forge. You've done your job. Now I must do mine.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  I relieve you, Mister Crusher.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  Yes, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})

(:Text {content:  All hands, this is Commander Riker. We are about to engage impulse engines for a short burst. Inertial dampers are on manual. They may not fully compensate for acceleration. Brace yourselves.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Deflector shield failure. Lethal radiation levels. Fatal --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Computer, discontinue radiation warning till further notice.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Firing impulse engines.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Impulse engines are now down.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Shutting down all systems.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Velocity is one hundred thirty two meters per second.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  We will enter the debris field in eight seconds.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Starboard thruster firing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Coming to heading three-four-zero mark one-zero.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Captain, that large mass to port may contain an assimilator.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Port thruster firing...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  No reaction from the assimilator.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  We're past the first hurdle.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Sir! Object to port --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Starboard thruster.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})

(:Text {content:  Sir, the gravitational attraction of the various masses has reduced our velocity by eight percent. By my calculations, we no longer possess sufficient momentum to clear the debris field --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Thank you, Mister Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Port thruster...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  The asteroid's gravity is drawing us closer. Velocity increasing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  Velocity still increasing... now two hundred and nineteen meters per second.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  Starboard thruster.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  You have used the asteroid's gravitational pull as a slingshot. Excellent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 85})
(:Text {content:  We're out. We beat it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 85})
(:Text {content:  Mister Crusher, the conn is yours.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 85})
(:Text {content:  Yes, sir!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 85})
(:Text {content:  Initiate full restart. Bring all systems back on-line.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 85})
(:Text {content:  With pleasure, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 85})
(:Text {content:  Number One... make sure the booby trap won't bother anyone again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 85})
(:Text {content:  Mister Worf, ready photon torpedoes, all bays... set to detonate upon impact with the Promellian vessel.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 85})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 85})

(:Text {content:  I've always thought that technology could solve any problem. It enhances our quality of life... It lets us travel across the galaxy... It even gave me my vision. But sometimes you just need to trust yourself and turn it all off. Even the gypsy violins.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  Violins?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  Different program. Sorry.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  We made a good team.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  Maybe we could do it again some time.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  I'm with you every day, Geordi. Every time you look at this engine, you're looking at me. Every time you touch it, it's me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  Computer, exit Holodeck. Save program.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  Marking beam-out position. Return transport: fourteen minutes, forty seconds.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Your view any better, Geordi?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Not too bad, sir. A lot of charged-particle precipitation, but I can compensate.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Communicators are dysfunctional.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Tricorders?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Readings only valid within five meters.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  I'm not so sure of that... I'm reading Worf as an unintelligent life form.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Good thing we didn't bring Data... we would've been unscrambling his circuits for a week...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Picking up something on the positron scan, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6.})
(:Text {content:  Over here. Some electrically conductive objects.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Recognize the markings, Worf?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Yessir. Romulan.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  I wonder what the hell they were doing in a Federation sector.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  I'm picking up traces of ultritium residue with my VISOR, Commander. An explosive device must've been used to destroy the craft after it crashed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Spread out... twenty five meter radius... our window back closes in nine minutes...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Commander...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Commander Riker...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  COMMANDER RIKER... WORF... HEY UP THERE...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Four minutes to beam-up, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Where is he? Wait here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  La Forge to Riker... La Forge to Worf... HEY...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  GEORDI...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Worf, maintain your position.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Stardate 43349.2. An unidentified distress signal has led to the discovery of a crashed Romulan vessel on the surface of Galorndon Core, a Federation planet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16A})
(:Text {content:  We have recovered one survivor. Lieutenant Commander La Forge did not report back with the away team and is still missing on the surface.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Get him to Sickbay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Worf observes... ordering SECURITY GUARDS to follow})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  He's not going anywhere, Lieutenant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  I'm sorry, Commander... There's just no way to lock in on anything down there...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Keep trying, Mister O'Brien.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  The electrical storms are creating thousands of ghosts...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Then beam some of the ghosts up here... one of them may be La Forge. Request permission to lead another away team...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Denied. When we get another window in the storms.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  The crash site?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  The Romulan craft's a total loss. There's nothing there to salvage No sign of others...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18.})
(:Text {content:  We could barely see two meters in front of us down there...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})

(:Text {content:  It certainly is the last place one would expect a Romulan encroachment. On the other hand, Galorndon Core would provide ideal cover for an opening move of a new offensive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  I doubt they were there for the climate.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  We thought it would be like working on a Vulcan, but there are subtle differences... too many of them...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Can you treat him?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})

(:Text {content:  He has cell damage in vital areas... He's going to need a transfusion of compatible ribosomes in order to recover. I'm setting up a schedule to test every member of the crew.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Will he survive?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  I can't answer that yet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Let me put it another way -- will he survive long enough to tell us what he was doing here?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  It is an important consideration, Doctor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  I can't put his life in any additional jeopardy...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Nor would we ask you to.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  I can bring him around for a few minutes...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  There is one serious complication. His brainwaves indicate early neural-pathway degeneration.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  A head injury?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  There was no obvious cranial trauma. I'm guessing the exposure to the magnetic fields on the surface was slowly breaking down his synaptic connections.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Will it affect Geordi the same way?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  You are aboard the Federation Starship Enterprise. We are treating your injuries. How long were you on Galorndon Core? Do you understand me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  I will not answer questions.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  We must know if there are any other survivors on the surface.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  I am alone. I will not answer any questions.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Is there a mother ship we should advise of your condition?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  The only answer he offers is that he was alone...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  and then...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Something that can cut through the storm... to give us some way to signal him...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  A neutrino pulse...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  We could build a portable neutrino source and send it in a probe to the surface. It would be like a beacon.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  A neutrino pulse would send non-charged particles back up through the atmosphere... and would be detectable by Geordi's VISOR.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  He'll be able to show us that he's found it by modifying the pulse...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Make it so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Captain, I have a new transmission on a parallel frequency to the distress call...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  From the planet?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  No sir... from inside the Romulan Zone. We should be able to view the transmission.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  On screen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})

(:Text {content:  Tomalak to Pi. We have received your distress signal. Respond. If you can hear me, we are entering the Neutral Zone now... We will reach you in six hours.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Mister Worf, hail the Romulan vessel.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Frequency open, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Romulan vessel. This is Captain Jean-Luc Picard of the Federation Starship Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  The frequency is open, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Commander Tomalak, we have intercepted your transmission. You are not to enter Federation space.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Captain Picard, my apologies. If I had known you were in this sector, I certainly would have advised you before crossing the Neutral Zone.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Really...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  I'm sure you'll understand when I explain. Simply, one of our ships had a slight navigational error and apparently crashed on Galorndon Core.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  A \"slight\" navigational error. Nearly half a light year past the Neutral Zone.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  I assure you, Captain, no aggression was intended.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Commander, we have recovered one of your survivors.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  He is on board your ship?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  We are treating him for severe injuries.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  And his craft?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Destroyed... deliberately... after the crash.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Standard procedure for all Romulan crews.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  For all Romulan crews in enemy space... which would suggest they knew where they were, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  If I were lost and uncertain, I would not take any chances. Nor I suspect would you, Captain. May I speak to him?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  He is not conscious... and not well enough to leave Sickbay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Captain, with your permission...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})

(:Text {content:  I am Doctor Crusher, the medical officer. We are doing everything we can for him and it still may not be enough. Any medical guidance your ship's doctor can offer...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  My dear, there is no way to talk you through the intricacies of Romulan medicine. His life is in your hands.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  And it is clear that Tomalak is using this})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  I have an away team on the surface. We are waiting for a window in the storm to beam them back.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  And then you will return my officer?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Are there any other Romulans we should be looking to recover from Galorndon Core... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})

(:Text {content:  No. It was a one-man craft. Captain, we will be at the Federation border of the Neutral Zone in roughly five hours. We will expect you to rendezvous at that time.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Counselor?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  There is great hostility behind his smile, Captain. To complete his mission, he will stop at nothing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Including the Neutral Zone border?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Sir, I see no reason to return the Romulan to his ship. He should be held and interrogated.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  We do have a right to detain him, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Without clear evidence of intent, it would not be a simple matter.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  This was obviously not pilot's error, Captain... it requires a response from us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})

(:Text {content:  We must measure the response carefully, Number One. Or history may remember Galorndon Core alongside Pearl Harbor and Station Salem-One... as the stage for a bloody preamble to war.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  What the hell... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  About five degrees off... huh. The water maybe... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  I want him off all the drugs... they aren't doing anything... Doctor Crusher to Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Go ahead.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  My patient is not responding to treatment.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  You haven't found a compatible ribosome donor?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})

(:Text {content:  The lab is still processing the tests... early results indicate humans have far too many biorejection factors. I've also ruled out the Vulcans we've tested.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  We'll try a little old-fashioned country medicine... keep the fever down, try to let the body heal itself...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Keep me advised. Picard out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Captain, the neutrino beacon is operational. We've placed it aboard a class three probe.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Well done, Ensign. Launch the probe.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Probe has entered the atmosphere, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  The neutrino stream is coming in strongly. Sensors are tracking the probe despite the interference.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  This better not be another malfunction...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  A stationary neutrino source...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Wesley Crusher.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  You are my prisoner.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Right. Congratulations. Certainly, a strategic triumph for the Romulan Empire.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Stay there.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  My shoes are getting full of sand... I just hate that, don't you? You think we could just maybe move outta the...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  How many other Federation troops are with you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  We just stopped by to rescue you, big fella... which I'm still willing to do if you'll put that down...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Or we can just stand here and take in the view...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Your name and rank.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Commander Geordi La Forge. I don't believe I caught yours... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  A Romulan ship will arrive shortly... you will accompany me on board...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})

(:Text {content:  Uh, I really don't think that's gonna happen, Ensign... or is it Commodore... Yeah, see... we heard your message too... and well, the fleet's in, Commodore. Sky's full of Federation ships.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  You're lying.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I never lie when I've got sand in my shoes, Commodore.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Get up.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Seriously. There's only one way out of here. Put that down and I'll take you back to my ship as soon as there's a window in the storm...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  You gotta be kidding.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  Sit.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  Welcome to Galorndon Core, where no good deed goes unpunished...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Doctor...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant. Good. Come in. Please, sit down...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  We've finally found a compatible ribosome match for the Romulan. But only one. You.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  That is impossible. I am a Klingon.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})

(:Text {content:  Different species, yes. But Humans, Romulans, Vulcans, Klingons, Betazoids -- we're all genetically similar. We have comparable cell structures. And you have what this Romulan needs. There's absolutely no risk to you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  You did understand that was the purpose of all the testing...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  I have no objection to tests.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  You have an objection to being a donor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Yes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant, I understand your feelings about the Romulans. But this is not the time or place...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  If you had seen them kill your parents, you would understand, Doctor. It is always the time and place for those feelings.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  This Romulan did not kill your parents. And you are the only one who can save his life.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Then he will die.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  I don't need him to like the idea, Captain... just to do it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  There is no alternative?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  The alternative is the Romulan will die. Worf is quite correct on that point.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  We need him alive... It is easy to forget that our Lieutenant Worf is not human. His values are very different from yours and mine.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  Of course they are. But he is also an officer of Starfleet... and this is...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  It's very personal, Captain. Especially to the Romulan who's dying in my Sickbay. Maybe he has a family waiting for him to come home.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  Worf is a good man. I know with a word of encouragement from you he will do the right thing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  Order him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  Encourage him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  A captain's encouragement is difficult to refuse, Doctor. And difficult to offer to a man whose feelings run so deep.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  Even if it means the life of the Romulan?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  I must respect his personal views... even if I do not share them. He will have to live with the consequences of his decision.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  We will all have to.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  I wish you'd put that away.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  You're afraid of dying.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  You bet I am. Who isn't?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  I'm not.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Right.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  To die in the service of my people...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Ah, the Romulan path to glory.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  You can be sarcastic -- now. But in a few millennia, when humans are extinct and the Romulan Empire spans the galaxy...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  You really believe that stuff, don't you, Commodore?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Our culture is far older and wiser than yours. It's inevitable that we will prevail.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Well, if you're that sure of yourselves, why be so tight-lipped? You won't even tell me your name.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  I see no need to tell you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Why? Is it a military secret or something? I've told you mine. Okay, Commodore... whatever you say.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  You may address me as Centurion Bochra.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Ahh. Bochra. Good, solid Romulan name. And you're a centurion. Well, stay with it, you'll be a commodore someday.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  I'm not certain of the equivalent Federation rank... but I do know it's higher than lieutenant commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  What's the matter?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Nothing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Wrong. Your heart rate just shot way up.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  It translates a wide range of radiation into neural impulses. Allows me to see.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Without it, you are blind?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Yes...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  How did this happen?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  I was born that way.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Geordi's stunned.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  What kind of question is that? Of course they let me live.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  No wonder your race is weak. You waste time and resources on defective children...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Defective? Listen, Commodore -- I'm a chief engineer in Starfleet. You don't get there by being defective.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  But if you can't see...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  I can see things you can't even imagine.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Whoa...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57B})
(:Text {content:  I'm having some sort of polarity shift. The diagnostic insists everything's fine...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57B})
(:Text {content:  Your body temperature's gone up another full degree...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57B})
(:Text {content:  What are you saying?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57B})

(:Text {content:  It's this place... All that electromagnetic soup is playing hell with our nervous systems. Your metabolism's messed up... so's my interface with the VISOR.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57B})
(:Text {content:  We've got to get out of here while we still can.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57B})
(:Text {content:  Sit down.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57B})
(:Text {content:  Bochra...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57B})
(:Text {content:  What's that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Just a background fluctuation, Commander... he hasn't found it yet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Then he must be hurt... or dead. How long before another window, Data?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  There are none indicated, Commander. I have no way to predict.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Incoming Romulan transmission, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  They're early.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  The Romulan warbird should still be twenty-nine minutes away from the edge of the Neutral Zone.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Close enough, however, to see we're not there. On screen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Picard, I'm approaching the Federation border and the Enterprise is not to be found. Why?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  My away team has not been able to leave the surface because of the storms.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  And my officer?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  He is alive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  His life remains in jeopardy?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Yes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  And yet you will still not permit me to cross into your precious Federation space to retrieve him...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})

(:Text {content:  If the point hasn't been made clearly, Commander, let me make it again. Romulan warships do not enter Federation space unless they are prepared to do battle.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  But a mission of mercy...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  A mission to recover one of your officers who was caught on a Federation planet. For reasons still unknown...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  I have already explained that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  And I have rejected your explanation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Territories... you would measure territories against a man's life?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Commander, your singular concern for a life is impressive. Do not risk any more lives by leaving the Neutral Zone. Picard out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Bochra, you're in bad shape.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  My vision's getting worse. There's a beacon out there... it'll get us back to my ship... but not if I can't find it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  I can't surrender to the Federation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Then stay here and die.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  If the situation were reversed... would you not die to avoid capture?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  I don't know. I might... if I thought it was necessary. If the stakes were high enough. But they'd have to be pretty damn high.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Guess I'd make a pretty lousy Romulan, huh... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  I no more wish to die than you do.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  You mean Romulans aren't always ready to sacrifice themselves on command?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  No more than humans are frail, weak-willed children without any conception of loyalty or duty.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Bochra -- there are times when dying for one's ideals is necessary. Do you believe this is one of those times?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Bochra agonizes, makes up his mind, gets to his feet})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  What is it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Everything's gone blank. I'm blind.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Come.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62A})
(:Text {content:  You are busy. Forgive my intrusion.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  For what it's worth, I understand your bitterness.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  With respect, sir... you cannot. I am asked to give up the very lifeblood of my mother, of my father, to those who murdered them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Must you blame all Romulans for that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Yes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Forever, Worf? What if the Federation should make peace with the Romulans someday...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Impossible.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Not long ago, your people said the same thing about humans.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})

(:Text {content:  And so many on both sides died in that war. How could you and I be here now... like this... if we were unable to let go of the anger, the blame. When does it end, Worf? If the Romulan dies, does his family carry the bitterness forward another generation?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Then you believe I should.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  What I believe doesn't matter.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  My Starfleet training tells me one thing. Everything I am tells me another.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Worf, report to Sickbay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Acknowledged.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant, his life is coming to an end. I thought it important for you to see him again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  It is not too late to change your mind.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  Come close to me, Klingon. Let me die with my hands at your throat.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  I am the only one who can keep you alive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  You?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  There is a substance within my cells which you need to survive...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  You have come to hear me beg for my life.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  No.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  I would rather die than pollute my body with Klingon filth.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  I have lost almost all feeling in my legs.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  My synapses must be turning to jelly. The VISOR's fine, but I can't see a thing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  How do we locate the beacon?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  We don't.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Do all humans give up so easily?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Are all Romulans so pushy? Bochra, we're lost... unless you've got something that can smell neutrinos.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  We have the sensor device you were carrying.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  My tricorder? It isn't set up to detect neutrinos.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  But your eye device does. Connect them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})

(:Text {content:  That's crazy. They don't speak the same language. I'd never get an accurate sampling... But, then, I don't need an accurate sampling. I just need a pointer... a neutrino Geiger counter.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Still not possible.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  You cannot do it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Under normal circumstances, maybe. Here, no way.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Why?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Because I can't see. Adapting the neural output pods of the VISOR is tricky work. It can't be done by \"touch.\"})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Then I'll be your eyes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  The storm is beginning to subside, Captain... we should have a window in less than an hour...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  Still no indication he's found the beacon, sir...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  Assemble an away team...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  Yes, sir...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  Captain... the Romulan warship has crossed the Neutral Zone border. It is in Federation space and heading toward us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  Stand by, Number One. Red Alert.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  limiter matches the VISOR output range.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  Not so fast...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  Done.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Now close the case and place the neural output pods in contact with the tricorder scanner heads.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Ready.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Let her rip.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Bearing three-five-zero.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  We did it! The first Federation-Romulan co-venture.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  The storm may be breaking.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  With any luck an electromagnetic window will be opening up and we can get out of here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  At which point I'll be your prisoner.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Can you walk?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  I don't know...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Straight ahead...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  You wished to see me, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Lieutenant. I assume you know what this is about...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})

(:Text {content:  The Romulan ship will reach us within the hour, Lieutenant. If our patient dies... it may be just the excuse the Romulan commander needs to start an incident. The death of a Romulan officer at the hands of the Federation! Think of it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  I have, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  There is no question that this Romulan is more valuable to us alive than dead, Lieutenant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  I understand.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})

(:Text {content:  Sometimes the moral obligations of command are less than clear. I weigh the good of the many against the needs of the individual... and try to balance them as realistically as possible. God knows I don't always succeed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  I have not had cause to complain, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  You wouldn't complain even if you had cause, Lieutenant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  If you order me to agree to the transfusion, I will, of course, obey.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  I cannot order you. I will not order you, Lieutenant. But I ask you. I beg you to volunteer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  I cannot, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Sir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Dismissed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Picard to Doctor Crusher.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Go ahead.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Do not continue to enlist Lieutenant Worf's assistance.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  I won't have to, Captain. The Romulan has died.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  We've found it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75})
(:Text {content:  Now we have to change its signal pattern so the Enterprise knows we've found it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75})
(:Text {content:  Will that be difficult?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75})
(:Text {content:  Not with your help.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75})
(:Text {content:  Scanners show a window, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Estimated duration?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Nine minutes, forty seconds.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  No change in the neutrino beacon signal, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Romulan ship approaching. Bearing three-fifty-four mark two-eight-seven.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  On screen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Romulan is entering phaser range.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  We are being hailed, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 78})
(:Text {content:  On screen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 78})
(:Text {content:  You have one chance to escape destruction, Picard. Return my officer at once.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  You have entered Federation space despite my warning, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  You forced this situation. I will not leave without him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  He is dead.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  Then he is but the first to fall, Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  The Romulan ship is routing power to its forward disruptor array.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  All shields to maximum.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  Lock phasers on target.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  Phasers locked and ready.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  Captain -- the signal pattern from the neutrino beacon is modulating.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  Geordi!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  We can't transport him with our shields up.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  If we lower our shields, the Romulan will strike.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  The electromagnetic window on the planet is closing. Three minutes remain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  Transporter Room. Lock onto the coordinates of the neutrino beacon and stand by.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  Standing by, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})

(:Text {content:  Captain, the window is allowing intermittant sensor readings... There are still numerous ghost images, but I believe we are picking up two life forms near the beacon...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  Another Romulan?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  I cannot say. The electromagnetic interference prevents an accurate reading.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  But it is a likely hypothesis, Number One. If Mister La Forge located a second survivor... Hail the Romulan ship, Lieutenant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir. They're ignoring our hail, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  Repeat the hail -- all channels. He has no way of knowing how accurate our sensors are... put on your poker face, Number One... Open frequency.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  Commander Tomalak. It would appear our away team has rescued a second man from your one man ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  They are on the surface, ready to beam up. We are preparing to do so. After which we will return the survivor to you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  No acknowledgement, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})

(:Text {content:  Commander, both our ships are ready to fight. We have two supremely powerful, destructive arsenals at our command. Our next actions will have serious repercussions for both sides. We have good reason to mistrust one another, Commander, but we have better reasons to set our differences aside. The question, of course, is who will show vulnerability first. The answer is -- I will. I must lower my shields to transport these men off the planet surface.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})

(:Text {content:  Once the shields are down, you will have an opportunity to open fire. If you do, you will not only destroy the Enterprise and its crew -- but also the cease-fire that the Romulans and the Federation now enjoy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant, lower the shields. Leave hailing frequencies open.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  Yes, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  Mister O'Brien. Transport Mister La Forge and the Romulan directly to the bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir. Energizing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  Security team to bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  Belay that order, Lieutenant. Shields up. No one is going to harm you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  You have my word.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  Well, Commander?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  If he has been in any way mistreated...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  I have given them no information, Commander -- but I have not been mistreated. In fact, this human saved my life.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Commander, how is it possible you didn't know of this second Romulan on Galorndon Core?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  A simple misunderstanding, Captain Picard. I was obviously misinformed as to the size of the craft. I assure you, I intended no deception.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Of course not.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  You doubt my good faith?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Let's just say my faith would be strengthened with a gesture -- such as powering down your disruptors.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Disruptors powering down, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Thank you. Cancel Red Alert, Lieutenant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  We will return your officer and escort your ship back to the Neutral Zone, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  That is acceptable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Mister La Forge, it's good to have you back.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  I have Centurion Bochra to thank, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  Your vision is returning...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  Yeah, gradually. Your heart rate's slowing down.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  Mister La Forge, Mister Worf -- escort our guest to Transporter Room One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  Close call.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  Too close, Number One. Brinksmanship is a dangerous game...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  It was not in my power to save him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 86})
(:Text {content:  He was a loyal officer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Commander La Forge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  Centurion Bochra.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  You're not what I expected of a Federation officer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  That's okay; you're not what I expected of a Romulan, either. That's a compliment.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  That's the way to fight all the wars from now on. Two guys on a planet with no one else to talk to and nowhere to go. Things get settled in a hurry.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88A})
(:Text {content:  I'm gonna sleep for four days...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88A})

(:Text {content:  The truth is I'm a career man... you know, married to my job... Mitzi doesn't understand that... I like her a lot... but I just don't think I'm ready for two marriages if you know what I mean...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  But at the same time, you know I wouldn't want to lose her...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Maybe you should come in with her and talk about it together.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Oh, I couldn't ask her to do that...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Sure you could. Why don't I make another appointment for you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Counselor Troi... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Wesley...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Can I talk to you a minute... I have a real problem with my mother.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})

(:Text {content:  She's being completely unreasonable... see there's a party on Holodeck Four tonight... and all the other kids are staying overnight... well, most of them and...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Computer, dispatches...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  A research inquiry from the Manitoba Journal of Interplanetary Psychology and three communiques from your mother...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Transfer my mother's letters to my viewer... Define \"real\" in context, please.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Real... not one of your perfectly synthesized, ingeniously enhanced imitations... real chocolate ice cream, real whipped cream...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  This unit is programmed to provide sources of nutritional value. Your request does not fall within current guidelines.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Listen, computer...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Do you wish to override program?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Picard to Counselor Troi.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Now what? Yes, Captain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  The pleasure of your company is requested, Counselor. We're having an impromptu reception for the arriving delegates.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Captain, I'm not dressed for a reception...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Oh, just throw on any old thing. We're about to get our first look at the wormhole.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Of course, Captain. I'm on my way. Troi out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  God forbid, I should miss the first look at the wormhole.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  May I escort you in, Miss Troi...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Just tell me there's some chocolate here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Ah, Counselor Troi... allow me to do the introductions... Premier Bhavani of the Barzan...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Your discovery has certainly produced a great deal of excitement, Premier.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Hopefully, it will also produce a new era of prosperity for my people.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  We'll see to that...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  You know Mister Mendoza, the Federation negotiator...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  A pleasure to see you again, Counselor Troi.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  One of the Federation's worthy competitors in the bidding, Leyor of the Caldonians.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Madame.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  And I am Devinoni Ral.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Ship's Counselor Deanna Troi.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  My traveling companion, Rojay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  My good friend, Ral, is the best hired gun in the business.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Hired gun?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  My \"good friend\", Mendoza means that I am a negotiator who serves a variety of clients... on this occasion I represent the Chrysalians.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  I believe it's almost time, isn't it Captain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Indeed. It will be visible directly ahead...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Is it always on time, Bhavani?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})

(:Text {content:  Always. We see it every two hundred and thirty-three minutes... our scientists say it's due to radiation buildup in the acretion disk. The visible burst is very brief..})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  There it is, ladies and gentlemen. The Barzan Wormhole. The first and only stable wormhole known to exist. It's yours... for the right price.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Stardate 43385.7. We are in orbit around Barzan, a planet which is entertaining bids for control of what appears to be a most unique, stable wormhole. It could conceivably provide a permanent shortcut within our galaxy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})

(:Text {content:  And as you all know, the environment on my planet is completely inhospitable to most other life forms. So I'd like to express my appreciation to you, Captain Picard, and your fine crew for hosting these negotiations aboard the Enterprise. Remember, Mister Mendoza, it doesn't give the Federation an advantage.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})

(:Text {content:  The Barzan has been a society dependent on others for generations. We want that to end. The appearance of this stable wormhole in our space provides us with our first true natural resource. We have neither the experience nor technology to exploit it. You do.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Excuse me, a delegation of... Ferengi... wishes to be beamed aboard...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  You were not expecting the Ferengi, Premier... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  No, but I do not wish to create ill will, Captain. If they are interested in bidding, I have no objection.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Chief O'Brien, this is Picard. Beam the Ferengi directly to the observation lounge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Aye, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  On behalf of all Ferengi, I protest... why were we not invited to these negotiations...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  My apologies. We did not anticipate your interest. You are welcome to join us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  I am DaiMon Goss. These are my consuls... Kol and Doctor Arridor. We'll need chairs...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  DaiMon, I am Captain Jean-Luc Picard of the Enterprise... I'm serving as host for these proceedings...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Good, then see to it that we get chairs at once.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps you misunderstood...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Fine, fine, just have your Klingon servant...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  I am in charge of security.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Then who gets the chairs?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})

(:Text {content:  DaiMon, due to the intimate nature of these negotiations, all parties agreed that one representative would suffice. I will be happy to provide your consuls with accommodations... and you may have my chair...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Very well. Kol, the bag...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  We can handle all the pleasantries later. I'm sure I'll never remember your names anyway, eh? Enough of this foolishness. Let's get down to business.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  I'll match anyone's best offer... and add the gold on top of it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Computer... show me the file on delegate Devinoni Ral...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Devinoni Ral, human, age forty-one, born Brussels, European Alliance, relocated at age nineteen to Hurkos Three, a non-aligned planet...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Come in.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Should I call for an appointment... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  No... I... was just looking over some personnel files...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Too bad. I had hoped you might be thinking about... me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  I thought you'd be deep into negotiations by now...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  In recess. I never play the opening rounds, anyway. Inconsequential.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Besides there are more interesting things to negotiate on this ship. Like dinner tonight?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  What about your... traveling companion?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  My traveling companion... is traveling. I sent her home.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Why?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  You know why.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Weren't you getting along?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Don't do that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  What?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Don't do \"Counselor\" Troi.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Was I?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  When you leave this office, who are you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Oh. So that's how it is.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  You never do. You never leave the office.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  What are you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Ssshh...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Dinner at eight?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})

(:Text {content:  The data from the Barzan's probe into the wormhole is impressive, Captain. The wormhole delivered the probe beyond the Denkiri Arm, in the Gamma Quadrant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  It would take us nearly a century at warp nine to cross that distance...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  The same distance could be achieved in a matter of seconds through the wormhole.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  I was just imagining the Ferengi collecting tolls in front if we lose to them...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  I don't think the Ferengi are the greatest threat at the table... with all of DaiMon Goss' bluster, they don't have the resources the Barzans need.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  I'd say that fellow Devinoni's the one to watch out for...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  An accurate observation... what made you recognize that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  He's the most comfortable man in the group...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  You must play poker, Commander...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Poker, isn't that a game of some sort?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Commander Riker teaches poker.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Our skills are not dissimilar, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Mister Mendoza, if this lives up to its billing... it is a discovery of extraordinary value... but it is a big \"if\"...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Wormholes are here one moment, gone the next... a stable wormhole is unheard of.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Are you saying this may not be what it seems?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})

(:Text {content:  The Barzans do not have manned space travel, so they had to resort to an automated probe. Its findings are limited. It cannot be determined from these charts how stable the wormhole really is or how long it will remain intact.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  The Federation could wind up \"buying\" itself the proverbial lemon, Mister Mendoza.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  And once the contract is negotiated and closed, we would be obliged to fulfill the terms.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  We really ought to see for ourselves.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  I don't think Bhavani could object to that...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Geordi has continuous visual contact with the wormhole, Captain. He's the logical choice...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  I would also like to volunteer, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})

(:Text {content:  Before anyone goes in there, we're going to conduct a full sensor analysis. I want to do everything possible to determine that it's safe. If we're satisfied, Data, you and Commander La Forge will enter the wormhole tommorrow.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Just a moment of discomfort for a good cause, DaiMon.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  You understand this will not be lethal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Doctor, you surprise me. I have no wish to kill anyone. A short term crippling will suffice.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Then, this will be just fine.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})

(:Text {content:  A distillation of your own blood pyrocytes... harmless to you... undetectable by the ship's bio-filters... but when absorbed through your victim's skin, it will provoke an extreme allergic reaction.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  I'd say it is time to extend the hand of the Ferengi to the representative of the Federation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Much... better.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Thank you. Come in for a drink?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Ah, Federation decor...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Not your style?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Conformity is not my style.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  What would you like?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  I'd even like another.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  There she is again... Counselor Troi...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  I am not... computer, champagne...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  A beat. The champagne arrives. He looks at her. She doesn't quite meet his eyes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Am I moving too fast for you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  No, I'm moving too fast for me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Mmm, I like that better...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  I haven't been able to stop thinking about you all day...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  You must've had a nice day.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Anticipation is fun.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  We'll be late for dinner.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Very late.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Mister Mendoza?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23A})
(:Text {content:  I seem to be a bit warm...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23A})
(:Text {content:  I need some help here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23A})
(:Text {content:  You attempt to gain every unfair advantage, Picard...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23B})
(:Text {content:  Premier Bhavani has no objection...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23B})

(:Text {content:  Well, I most certainly do... First, you conveniently arrange to play host... now you plan to send your own manned probe into the wormhole... the Federation thinks it can do anything it wants to. And I will not tolerate it any longer...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23B})
(:Text {content:  We will gladly share the results of our exploration with all the delegates...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23B})
(:Text {content:  And you expect us to believe what you report?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23B})
(:Text {content:  Then send in your own probe, Goss.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23B})
(:Text {content:  That's exactly what I intend to do. And I strongly suggest you stay out of our way.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23B})
(:Text {content:  Tell Data and La Forge to do themselves a favor and stay out of their way.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23B})
(:Text {content:  Captain Picard, please come to Sickbay...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23B})
(:Text {content:  Acknowledged, Doctor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23B})

(:Text {content:  Whatever he's got is obviously not life threatening -- it's some kind of system-wide histaminic reaction. He certainly can't go back to the negotiations for several days.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Keep us advised.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  The Federation's top negotiator taken out by a mysterious ailment. Suspicions?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  With the Ferengi around, always.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Well, I guess you'll have to fill in for him, Number One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})

(:Text {content:  I am the designated host. It would be a most awkward transition. The next likely choice is you. Mister Mendoza would agree. He was quite impressed with your natural instincts.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Excuse me, sir, but those weren't natural instincts... they're poker instincts... A parlor game doesn't exactly prepare me for this...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Yes, the stakes are higher. But then... that's when the game gets interesting, doesn't it, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  The wormhole will reappear in thirty seconds.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Shuttle nine, stand by...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Ferengi pod is moving into position, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Ferengi pod, this is Lieutenant Commander La Forge in the Enterprise shuttle.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  This is Doctor Arridor, go ahead.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Would you care to take the point, Doctor?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  We will gladly yield that honor to you, Lieutenant Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Proceed when ready.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Contact with the shuttle, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Pipe it in, Lieutenant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  What the bridge crew is hearing is gibberish. Picard frowns.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
