(:Text {content:  It's the relativistic time dilation, sir. Time is moving more slowly inside their part of the wormhole. I can process the audio to compensate...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Make it so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  appear to be stabilizing the wormhole. It is not clear why... Now approaching the singularity...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  They've passed beyond our communication capabilities, sir...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Commander, I appreciate what a difficult position this is for you. If you don't understand something, I hope you won't be embarrassed to ask me...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  I think I have an idea what the rules are.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  That's what makes it so interesting... the rules of the game change to fit the moment.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  In that regard, it's not unlike commanding a starship, Mister Ral.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  Commander, Mister Mendoza has already presented many of the details of the Federation proposal. Is there anything you would like to add?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  A complete analysis of our bid is available on the ship's computer for your consideration, Premier... If I may summarize...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  Our proposal includes technology that will enhance your food production, your mining capabilities, and space travel.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})

(:Text {content:  We offer scholars and scientists to investigate the wormhole's potential. And perhaps most critical of all, we offer Starfleet. The security of this passage must never be compromised. We offer protection of the wormhole in perpetuity.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Mister Ral... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Mister Riker's placed a great deal of emphasis on defense... a subject he obviously knows well, having served Starfleet in many a conflict.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  The Chrysalians are enemies of no one... and choose to remain that way. Neutral.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Neutral. And uninvolved, sir, in virtually all interstellar matters of consequence.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})

(:Text {content:  No one would claim that the Chrysalians are as powerful as the mighty Federation, but we have resources and technology and scientists too. We have also had peace for ten generations.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  This is a fine proposal, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  I was just thinking...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Mmmm?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Maybe I could stretch out these negotiations a few extra days.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Mmmm.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Would you like that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Mmm-hmmm.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Devinoni Ral, who are you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  What do your Betazoid senses tell you about me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Not very much... My human physical response must be blocking them out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Good.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  It's never happened before.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  I rather like it that I'm more difficult to read than your other men...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  I don't have any others... currently.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  How about Commander Riker?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Who have you been talking to... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  No one. I just sensed something when I saw the two of you together.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Will Riker and I are good friends.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Uh huh...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  It was once a little more than that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Mmmm-hmm...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  And how come we're talking about me and not you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Don't you have enough people telling you about their lives? Who counsels the counselor?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Uh uh, I want to know about you now...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})

(:Text {content:  I am a man of commerce. And I'm what you see right now. No games, no strategies. Just me, wanting to run away with you. And knowing that if I asked you, you'd never leave this damned ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  When I first saw you, I felt as if I'd been waiting for you. I've been trying to understand why or how that's possible.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Does it matter?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  It will... when I tell you. But you must promise never to tell anyone else.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  What?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  I am partly Betazoid too. My mother was half... I am one quarter.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  You're empathic?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  The only one of five children. I must admit I was never as comfortable sensing emotions as you seem to be...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  That's why you left Earth...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})

(:Text {content:  I've learned to live with it, use it... as you have... but still, it isolates us, doesn't it... ? I thought it would always be that way for me. Now, all of a sudden the rules I live by don't mean anything any more. I had tucked my heart away... didn't need it, didn't want it. At the negotiating table it can be fatal to have a heart... but I never realized how much I missed it until I looked at you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  I'm picking up an increase in accretion matter filtering in from the terminus.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  We made it...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51B})
(:Text {content:  Monitors are functioning normally again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51B})
(:Text {content:  Ferengi pod, everybody in one piece over there?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51B})
(:Text {content:  Our condition is no concern of yours, Enterprise shuttle. We are competitors in this venture, not partners. Ferengi pod, out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51C})
(:Text {content:  Happy landings to you too.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51D})
(:Text {content:  Curious.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51D})
(:Text {content:  Huh?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51D})
(:Text {content:  We are not where we are supposed to be.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51D})
(:Text {content:  What do you mean... we're on the other side of the wormhole, aren't we... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51D})

(:Text {content:  According to the Barzan probe, we should be in the Gamma Quadrant... but the readings clearly indicate we are nearly two hundred light years away. In sector three-five-five-six of the Delta Quadrant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51D})
(:Text {content:  Maybe the Barzan's readings were wrong...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51D})
(:Text {content:  Maybe their readings were correct. Their probe could have exited the wormhole at a different location.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51D})
(:Text {content:  Data, I'm picking up a subatomic fluctuation... meson and lepton activity is increasing...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51E})
(:Text {content:  Gravitational acceleration is also increasing...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51E})
(:Text {content:  Something very strange is happening to this wormhole.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51E})
(:Text {content:  Sorry.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  You're unusually \"limber\" this morning.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  I'll say.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Uh huh... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Devinoni Ral.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  It's ridiculous. And wonderful. I feel... completely out of control. Happy. Terrified. There's nothing rational about this.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Who needs rational when your toes curl up... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  I'm afraid I'm going to lose myself... I can't get enough of him. Is it possible to fall in love in one day?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  I did.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  It was like this for you and Jack?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  No, it was another fellow. Fell in love in a day. It lasted a week. But what a week. Then I met Jack... took months to figure it out with Jack.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Maybe I should slow down... catch my breath, not let this get out of control...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Nah.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  To be honest, I was surprised to see the Caldonians here at all, Leyor...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  You must think Caldonia very insular, Mister Ral.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  Not at all... on the contrary, I've respected your world's commitment to pure research. It's just that, well... Go ahead, please...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  Well, scholars don't always enjoy administrative demands...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  And certainly we've seen here that the administration of the wormhole...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  Yes... I must admit I have begun to feel some trepidation about that...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  I'm sure you have. I'm sure we all have, Leyor... Do you realize that during the next century, the number of ships...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  Gentlemen, this open session is called by request of the Caldonian delegation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Madame Bhavani, Caldonia withdraws from these proceedings.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  For what reasons, Leyor?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  It has been made very clear that the maintenance and administrative requirements are beyond our ability...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})

(:Text {content:  Leyor, the Federation would like to negotiate a trade agreement to acquire your planet's rich deposits of Trillium 323 which we will add to our bid, Premier Bhavani...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  My apologies. We have already reached an agreement with the Chrysalians...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Mister Ral, you either had very good instincts -- or foreknowledge of the Caldonian withdrawal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})

(:Text {content:  Some people just don't wish to transact business with the Federation, Commander. The Chrysalians hereby add the Caldonian Trillium 323 to its bid, Premier...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  I have no intention of leaving yet. We are not finished taking our readings...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56A})
(:Text {content:  I'm telling you, it's changing... Look, your readings must be showing you the same things we're getting... this is not the Gamma Quadrant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  I will not confirm your speculations...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  It is not a speculation, Doctor. We are not where the Barzans said we should be... which would indicate that this side of the wormhole is not stable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})

(:Text {content:  There are meson and lepton fluctuations... local gravitational fields are increasing exponentially... everything says we better get the hell out of here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  It will be visible again in forty seconds... we will make our own judgments then...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  I can see it now... and I'm telling you that you don't have time to wait... not even forty seconds...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Ferengi pod, out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Dammit, Arridor, we're seventy thousand light years away from our ships... follow us... we'll lead you in...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Idiots.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  It's getting worse. I'm taking us in, Data... with or without them...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57A})
(:Text {content:  Thrusters at half power... three-quarters...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57A})
(:Text {content:  Entering outer event horizon...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57A})
(:Text {content:  They panic quickly under pressure.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  There, precisely as scheduled, right where I expected it to be.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  Everyone's talking about the way you absorbed the Caldonian bid today...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  It was there for the taking... So I took it...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Commander Riker didn't know how you managed it...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Let me tell you something, Will Riker's good... the most dangerous man in the room to me... he has every instinct of a fine negotiator...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Our edge... and you make it sound unethical.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Isn't it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Deanna, it's just business...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Why haven't you told anyone that you're an empath?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  I find it makes people uncomfortable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  I think you don't tell them... so you can gain an advantage.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  I used it to gain an advantage with you... and you didn't mind...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})

(:Text {content:  The point of negotiating is to take advantage, Deanna. I don't know what the other side is offering, they don't know what I'm offering. We dance around each other until someone wins. I never cry foul when I lose.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  But you're reading their emotional states, their inner selves, then using that to manipulate them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})

(:Text {content:  Deanna, people have been doing that for thousands of years, by listening carefully, by watching body language. I just happen to be better at it. You do it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  I do it to help my crew, not outmanueuver them. And I don't hide that I'm an empath.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})

(:Text {content:  You announce it to every alien culture you encounter? Or do you use it to give your side an advantage. Do you tell the Romulan in the ship about to attack that you can feel that he's bluffing or do you just tell it to your captain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  That's different. It's a matter of protection...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})

(:Text {content:  Your protection... your captain, your crew... your edge. Yes. It's a matter of life and death when you take the advantage. Me, I deal in property, in exchange... no one gets hurt. Which of us would you say has the greater problem of ethics?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  May I join you, Commander?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Bought out the Ferengi yet, Ral?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Think I should try?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  No. But I think you will. One way or another, it'll come down to you and me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  You know, you're very good at this... better than you realize.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  I hope I'm better than you realize, Ral.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  The last mile of the marathon is always the toughest. That's when the winners are willing to take the big risks... are you ready to do that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  We'll see, won't we...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Well, let's see right now... I'm prepared to reach a firm agreement with Bhavani before we learn the results of your probe's expedition. Are you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})

(:Text {content:  Mmmm, that would not be looked upon favorably by the Federation, I'd imagine. See, you have to be willing to take that last step alone... or it isn't worth playing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Your point of view, not mine.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Oh, I see that, Commander... otherwise you wouldn't be second in command of this ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  You know, I feel responsible for you in a way... related. Deanna. We both love Deanna... in different ways, of course.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  I'll remove the burden of that responsibility right now. My relationship with Deanna stands on its own. Without help from you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Of course it does. She's an extraordinary woman. Lovely, brilliant --- very passionate.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  She could have been yours, Will. But you didn't do enough to keep her, and now, I'm here and I'm going to take her too.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  You know, I think this is the first bad play I've seen you make...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})

(:Text {content:  If you bring happiness into Deanna's life, nothing would please me more. You're not really a bad sort, Ral, you just don't have any values... beyond the value of today's bid, that is. She's just the one to give some meaning to your sorry existence... if you're smart enough to take it. I doubt that you are.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  To the last mile.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Federation women have a game they call \"playing hard to get\".})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Yes, I do not at all find it amusing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  On Chrysalia, the women outnumber the men four to one. They virtually throw themselves at your feet...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Sir, the Ferengi vessel is moving out of orbit, impulse power... They are approaching the entry to the wormhole, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75})
(:Text {content:  Computer, is the Ferengi Goss still aboard the Enterprise?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75})
(:Text {content:  DaiMon Goss departed the Enterprise at fourteen hundred hours.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75})
(:Text {content:  Ferengi are powering forward missile launchers...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75})
(:Text {content:  Yellow Alert. Hail the Ferengi.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75})
(:Text {content:  DaiMon Goss responding.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75})
(:Text {content:  On screen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75})
(:Text {content:  Request an explanation for your actions, DaiMon Goss.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})

(:Text {content:  I have learned from informed sources that the Federation has manipulated these negotiations from the very beginning... and has already signed a secret agreement with the Barzans.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  That is not true...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  The Ferengi offer was never seriously considered.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Premier Bhavani welcomed you to these proceedings, Goss... despite my better judgment...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  We will be ignored no longer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  They've fired a missile directly at the opening, sir!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Destroy it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Firing phasers.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Your offers both have merit, gentlemen... if I could find a deciding factor...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 78})
(:Text {content:  Riker to Picard. What's happening, Captain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 78})
(:Text {content:  Goss has fired a missile at the wormhole... I need you on the bridge, Number One...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 78})
(:Text {content:  Excuse me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 78})

(:Text {content:  Excuse me for saying so under the circumstances, Premier... But this fight is really between the Federation and the Ferengi... it is unconscionable that your wormhole is being used as a pawn in their power struggle.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 78})
(:Text {content:  You must know we will not allow you to do this, Goss.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  If the Ferengi cannot have the wormhole, no one will...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  Can he possibly believe that a missile will have any destructive effect on a wormhole?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  One of those missiles would have a destructive effect if it exploded near our shuttle...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  Goss... don't you realize we both have shuttlecraft in there?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  Casualties of war, Commander. My men are prepared to die. Are yours?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  Viewscreen off.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  He's lying. I'm almost sure of it. He does not mean what he says.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  Why... what is he doing it for then?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  Permission to enter the bridge, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  Premier, with all due respect...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  Captain, I believe I am in a better position to settle this with DaiMon Goss than you are... May I address him?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  DaiMon Goss, this is Devinoni Ral...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  I have nothing to say to you, Ral.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})

(:Text {content:  Then, just listen. The planet of Barzan has reached an agreement with the Chrysalians for long term control of the wormhole. On behalf of the Chrysalians, I am prepared to offer the Ferengi free access to the wormhole in perpetuity...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  I have your word on this?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  My word, sir. In return for some Ferengi convoy privileges to be negotiated in good faith.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  This is an acceptable offer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  Ferengi vessel has shut down forward missile launchers.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  Stand down, Red Alert.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})

(:Text {content:  Commander Riker, I'm sorry you had to learn about my decision this way. You represented the Federation well. But I have come to believe that the Chrysalians' neutrality and tradition of peace is more desirable to my planet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  Excuse me, Premier. There is something you should know...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  I'm sorry, was there something you wanted to say, Mister Ral?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  No... not at all...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  I sense you are uncomfortable suddenly...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  Well, after all, this was a tense situation...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  But that's what is so odd about it... it was not tense at all... I sensed no tension from DaiMon Goss... or you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  I was tense... I was ready to blow it up... I strongly protest...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  Off screen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  It was almost as though... you both were performing a scene for all of us...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  Excuse me, Captain, I think there's a slight conflict of interest here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  I agree. Entirely. Devinoni asked me not to tell anyone about his empathic powers... which he uses to manipulate competitors in a negotiation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})

(:Text {content:  Certainly, that put me in a conflict of interest which I hope I have now resolved. Premier, I believe Ral has used your fear of continuing aggression between the Federation and its enemies to undermine our position. I also believe this incident was staged by Ral and Goss to provide you with a reason to decide in favor of the Chrysalians.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  At first, it's just broken phrases and hiss, slowly coming together...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  Shuttle nine to Enterprise... Shuttle nine to Enterprise...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  Shuttle, this is Picard... do you read... On screen...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  This is Shuttle nine... reporting back... barely.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  The Ferengi pod?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  They're trapped on the other side, sir. In the Delta Quadrant. We tried to warn them. They wouldn't follow us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  Elaborate.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})

(:Text {content:  Captain, this end of the wormhole is currently stable but the other end apparently shifts position periodically. The Barzan probe had no way to recognize this. Eventually, both sides will be unstable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  It's a dry well, Captain. Worthless.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  Acknowledged, Shuttle nine. Main Shuttlebay, prepare for final approach.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84A})
(:Text {content:  Captain, DaiMon Goss is demanding to know where his men are.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84A})
(:Text {content:  Advise him to set his coordinates for the Delta Quadrant, Lieutenant... He might run into them in eighty years or so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84A})
(:Text {content:  Mister Ral, I congratulate you on winning the rights to the Barzan wormhole...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84A})
(:Text {content:  I take the risks. I stand by my agreements.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84A})
(:Text {content:  Come in...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  When do you leave?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88})
(:Text {content:  Soon. I've... been recalled by the Chrysalians... explanations demanded and so forth.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88})
(:Text {content:  I'm sorry.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88})
(:Text {content:  I've done all right for them over the years... they know the stakes. It'll be fine.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88})
(:Text {content:  I had to do it, Troi...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88})
(:Text {content:  Bhavani was ready to go with the the Federation. I sensed it. And I'd used up every card in the deck... I had to change the rules.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88})
(:Text {content:  You must have known that I couldn't allow you to do that...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88})
(:Text {content:  My human physical response must have blocked out my Betazoid senses.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88})
(:Text {content:  In a way, I'm glad you did it. It's made me take a hard look at who I am. I don't like what I see.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88})
(:Text {content:  Deanna... I once asked you to run away with me. I'm asking you again. I need you. You could help me change. You could be my conscience.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88})
(:Text {content:  I already have a job as a counselor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88})
(:Text {content:  Someone sure stripped this place.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  The reactor is gone.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  That's why no one answered our hail for two days -- they had nothing to answer it with.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Life signs five meters straight ahead, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Blood?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3A})
(:Text {content:  Yes, but not human. I'll have to do some analysis on it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3A})
(:Text {content:  It's jammed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  FADE IN:})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5A})
(:Text {content:  The two scientists are suffering from phaser stuns... I'd guess several hits each.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Several... when one would surely have sufficed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  It'll take us a while to bring them around, but they'll recover.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  We found a sample of blood. It's a rare iron-copper composite, unique to one humanoid species: the Acamarians.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Acamarians. That would suggest... the Gatherers.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  A likely hypothesis. The nomadic marauders who refer to themselves as Gatherers have raided other outposts in neighboring sectors.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  But they've never ventured this far before.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  And we cannot permit them to spread their violent ways further. Mister Crusher, set course for the Acamar system.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Stardate 43562.9. In an effort to put an end to the Gatherer raids, we have come to the Acamar System to enlist the aid of Marouk, the sovereign of Acamar Three.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Their raids have made this sector unsafe. Our research facilities have been ransacked; trade routes disrupted...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  The Gatherers are elusive; we've only managed to capture a handful of them. However, with Starfleet's help...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Hunting them down is not what I'm proposing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Reconciliation with the Gatherers is impossible. It's been tried. Every time we've offered amnesty, they've rejected it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  When was the last attempt made?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Eighteen years ago.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Eighteen years?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Yes. We gave up trying.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Why?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})

(:Text {content:  Because the Gatherers aren't willing to change! For almost a century, they've been parasites... moving from star system to star system, living on what they could find... or steal. They're little more than barbarians.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  They are still your people.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})

(:Text {content:  No. Captain, you have to understand our history. A hundred years ago, before the Gatherers split off from our culture, we were a savage, violent race. Clans battled clans... bloody, vengeful feuds that lasted for generations. But we overcame those ways... broke the cycle of fighting and revenge. All except the Gatherers.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  After a century of wandering, they may be ready to come home.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Despite all your progress, your society is still divided. And it will remain so until the Gatherers return to Acamar.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  The attempt may be futile.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  You have much to gain and little to lose in making the effort. The problem affects us all... it cannot be ignored.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Sovereign Marouk, how soon will you be ready to leave Acamar?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  I am ready now, Captain. I need only bring aboard two more servants...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  I'll see to that... and to your accommodations, Sovereign.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  I have reason to believe there is a Gatherer encampment somewhere in the Hromi Cluster.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Mister Data?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  The Federation has charted but not explored several Class M planets in that area. Any of those planets might well serve as a base.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Mister Crusher, set course for the Hromi Cluster.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  A fine ship, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  We're very proud of her.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Yuta --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  A light meal in twenty minutes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  May I be shown to the kitchen, Commander?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  You're the chef?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Yes. I'll prepare all meals for the sovereign and her servants.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  We can provide you with a kitchen if you wish... but it's not really necessary. The food dispensers can synthesize anything you want.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  I'll show you. Sovereign, may I offer you a drink?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Yes, thank you. Cold water.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  A glass of water... five degrees.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Please.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  You're also the food taster?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  That's part of the cook's duties.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  I'm sure the sovereign will wish to sample many of the cuisines your ship has to offer, but there are certain Acamarian dishes she will insist upon.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  I'll arrange for a technician to help you program your recipes into the computer. I'd like to try some myself. What's your specialty?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  I have none.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Don't be modest. You can't tell me you haven't come up with a few original triumphs...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  There is a spiced parthus dish...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  \"Parthus?\"})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  A green vegetable with fleshy roots.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  But Marouk's still gazing with fascination out the port, doesn't hear him. Riker turns back to Yuta, gives her a respectful nod:})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Chef...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Entering standard orbit of Gamma Hromi Two, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  I am detecting life readings on the surface, sir... and several small areas of heat and carbon dioxide emission indicative of combustion.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Campfires, Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  It's worth a look.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Make it so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Artonian lasers, Tonkian homing beacons... quite a collection.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Noranium alloys. Their salvage value is low.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Looks like the Gatherers aren't very discriminating in what they steal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  The spoils of animals without honor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Ambush!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Rigellian phaser rifles. Not very powerful.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Powerful enough...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  FADE IN:})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  We want to talk --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Your words are wasted, Commander. They understand only this.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  We're here to establish a dialogue.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Data... noranium vaporizes at... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24B})
(:Text {content:  Two thousand three hundred fourteen degrees. Of course, noranium carbide alloys vaporize at a slightly higher temperature.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24B})
(:Text {content:  Phaser setting seven ought to do it...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24B})
(:Text {content:  Now!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Enterprise -- four to beam up! Energize!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Cowards.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Your ambushes would be more successful if you bathed more often.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  We've brought the sovereign of Acamar...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Marouk... here?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  With an offer of amnesty.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Full dispensation will be extended to all Gatherers who are willing to return to Acamar Three.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  You don't trust me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Should I?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Oh, but you expect me to trust you. Perhaps you just poisoned it yourself.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Taste it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Barbarians... this is futile...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Sovereign...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Go home, old woman...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Brull...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  You people haven't changed in a hundred years.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  You were there. You should know.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Sit down.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  We are here to talk.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  It is a waste of time, Captain... they don't care how they live...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  And I am supposed to believe that you do care how we live?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Yes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  She is here, isn't she, Brull?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps you forced her...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Nobody forces me anywhere, Brull... nobody.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  What is there for us on Acamar Three?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  A life. A home. You can end your wandering, your miserable existence...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Do I look miserable?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  The clan wars are over, Brull. It is a past we are ashamed of. It is why you had to leave. Now it is time to come home.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})

(:Text {content:  The other Gatherers get to their feet. Yuta and Marouk's bodyguard look to Marouk. She nods to them -- As everyone -- including Riker, Troi, and Worf -- leave Picard, Marouk, and Brull to negotiate. Riker looks to Troi:})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Any insights, Counselor?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  Brull's ready to negotiate. He wants privacy so he won't appear weak in the presence of the other Gatherers.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  You are of the clan Lornack.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  So?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  I've seen you before.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Yes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  But it's impossible.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  No. Look closer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  I am Yuta --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})

(:Text {content:  as Yuta's fingertips come in contact with his skin. It's a feather-light touch -- but Volnoth's suddenly in horrible pain. He opens his mouth to scream -- nothing comes out but a desperate GASP.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  I am the last of my line. But my clan will outlive yours.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Marouk's offer has value... still, I'm not sure...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  But you agree it's worth presenting to your leader.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Chorgan is a better judge of such things... I will go to him... you will hear from me in twenty days.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Brull, in twenty days, I hope to be... very far away from here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  With all due respect, Brull, I would like to make the offer to Chorgan myself.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})

(:Text {content:  We will gladly take you with us aboard the Enterprise. It will give you a chance to enjoy Federation hospitality. How many of your men do you want to accompany you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  I'll come alone. If this is a trap --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  It isn't.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Mallon -- you'll take charge while I'm gone. If I don't return in ten days --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Brull!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Away team to Enterprise. Medical Emergency.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  Volnoth was an old man. There's nothing to be done.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37B})
(:Text {content:  There's a chance our doctors can do something...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37B})
(:Text {content:  You found him?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37B})
(:Text {content:  Yes. And there are no other members of the Lornack clan here... so I claim his possessions.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37B})
(:Text {content:  Granted.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37B})
(:Text {content:  Have you no respect for the dead?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37C})
(:Text {content:  What's there to respect about a corpse?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37C})
(:Text {content:  He's been dead too long.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37C})
(:Text {content:  How?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37C})
(:Text {content:  Cardiac arrest...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37C})
(:Text {content:  You don't sound convinced.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37C})
(:Text {content:  No, it was a heart attack, all right. But I can't figure out what caused it. Cardiac muscle is strong... no sign of arterial occlusion...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37C})
(:Text {content:  Is there anything you need to bring with you, Brull?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37D})
(:Text {content:  Like what?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37D})
(:Text {content:  Anything... a change of clothes, perhaps...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37D})
(:Text {content:  No, I just changed into these... recently.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37D})
(:Text {content:  Very well then... Picard to Enterprise... two...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37D})
(:Text {content:  My quarters are to be just as big as hers...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37D})
(:Text {content:  As they DEMATERIALIZE...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37D})
(:Text {content:  Brull -- show Mister Crusher the course to plot.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  A child?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  That \"child\" is one of the finest ensigns under my command. He also happens to pilot this ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  That does not inspire my confidence. But if you want me to show him, I'll show him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  This is our present position.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Then set a heading of three-four- three mark seven-two.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  That'll take us through the center of an asteroid belt.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  What's the matter -- can't you fly your way around a couple of rocks?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Sure I can. But if we take this heading... and we only lose twelve point one minutes at warp seven.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Have it your way.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  For centuries, my planet was in chaos. Loyalty to one's clan was absolute, and the slightest injury to one member demanded violent retaliation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  And these blood feuds could last for decades?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  The obsession for vengeance would be passed on from generation to generation. And with each act of retribution, the violence would escalate...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  It's not unlike the history of my own planet, Marouk.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Your pardon, Sovereign; may I be excused briefly? Commander Riker requested I prepare him an Acamarian dish.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Of course, Yuta.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  What are you doing?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  My studies.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  What is this?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Math.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  I can see that. What's it mean?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  It's the locally Euclidean metrization of a k-fold contravariant Riemannian tensor field.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  You good at it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  You don't like me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  I didn't say --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  That's no problem. I have many friends that don't like me. What do you know about me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  You're a thief.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  I do it to survive -- not because I enjoy it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  And we Gatherers value freedom. We do as we want and answer to no creature.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  But you're helping Sovereign Marouk to change all that...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Maybe I just want something better... for me, and for my children.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  You have children?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Two sons. One's almost your age. He's not so good at math.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Parthus a la Yuta?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  With the help of one of your food stations.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  It's wonderful.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  Truly excellent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  Thank you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  Will you join us?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  I don't want to intrude...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  Not at all; I was just about to leave. Please -- sit down.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  It really is delicious.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  I am glad it pleases you, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  I'm not your commander. My name is William.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  I will call you William if you prefer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  I do. You say \"Commander\" to me the same way you say \"Sovereign\" to Marouk.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  As a servant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  You're an excellent commander, but you'd make a poor sovereign.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  Why's that? Not that I disagree...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  You're not comfortable with servants.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  No. I prefer the company of equals.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  So you treat me as an equal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  And you're not comfortable with that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  I'm not used to it. I've always been a servant. I'm not complaining -- the sovereign treats me well. I have all that I could want.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  What about freedom?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  I can never have that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  You're the property of the sovereign?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  No. I'm not her slave. I can leave whenever I wish.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  But you have no place to go?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  Just the opposite. My path is all too clear.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  Yuta, you're an excellent cook, but you talk in riddles.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  I've never been very good at conversation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  I think the sovereign wants me to return. Enjoy the Parthus.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  Sickbay to Commander Riker. I've discovered something interesting, Will...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  I'll be right there...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  Doctor, you're scowling.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  I'm thinking.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  And?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  The old Gatherer on the planet? I've found what caused his heart attack.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})

(:Text {content:  The medical tricorder almost missed it, but there was a microvirus in his body... it attached to parasympathetic nerves and acted as a cholinesterase inhibitor, blocking autonomic nerve impulses.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  And that stopped his heart?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  But here's the interesting part. The microvirus will only attach to cells which contain a very specific DNA sequence.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  How specific?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  Without knowing more about their genetic makeup, I can't be sure... but my guess is, this virus would only kill one Acamarian in a million.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  That's an awfully single-minded bug.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  Too single-minded. I can't believe it's a naturally occurring virus.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  Meaning somebody engineered it...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  Meaning Volnoth was murdered.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  Sir, Acamar Three has agreed to your request for access to its databases. They are now transmitting them to our computer over subspace link.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  Good. Notify Doctor Crusher when Acamar's medical database is online. Riker out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  Come in.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  I'm disturbing you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  Not at all.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  As the sovereign has no further need of my services this evening, she suggested I might spend some time with you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  What a charming suggestion...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  She appreciates the... affection Was it so obvious...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  Yes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  Well, I've already dined... but, maybe you know a good Acamarian dessert recipe.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  Does that please you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  Tell me what you want, William. I will do anything you wish...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  You've got the night off, remember?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  I don't understand.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  You don't want me to give you pleasure?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  Not as a servant. I told you... I prefer equals.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  Even in matters of love?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  Especially in matters of love.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  I've offended you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  No.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  I only want to make you as happy as you want to make me. You're entitled to that...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  No. I'm not.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  Yuta...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  I do not feel pleasure. Or passion. I haven't been able to... for a long time.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  I don't know who did this to you or why... but it can change.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  I wish it could. Tonight most of all. I'm sorry...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  Your people have provided a warm welcome.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  That's Chorgan's ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Shields holding.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Worf -- contact Chorgan and tell him Brull has brought us here to talk.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Chorgan's not responding.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Mister Worf, can we knock out their shields without seriously damaging their ship?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  I believe we can, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Prepare phasers and open channel...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Phasers locked. Channel open, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  This is Jean-Luc Picard...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Let's focus their attention. Fire.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Their forward shields are inoperative.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48B})
(:Text {content:  Well done, Lieutenant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48B})
(:Text {content:  They're hailing us, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48B})
(:Text {content:  That's better. On screen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48B})
(:Text {content:  Brull -- you traitor! You led them here to destroy me --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Chorgan, if I had wanted you destroyed, you wouldn't be talking now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Obviously, I want something else.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  And what is that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  I have on board Sovereign Marouk of Acamar Three. I want you to hear what she and Brull have to say.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  It's worth listening to her, Chorgan.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  I don't wish to hear either of you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  You have no choice. Prepare to receive us -- we're coming aboard your ship. Picard out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Cancel Red Alert. Have Sovereign Marouk meet me in Transporter Three.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  You're going alone, Captain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  The danger is minimal, Number One. Chorgan's not likely to do anything rash while the Enterprise's phasers are trained upon his ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  It's still a risk.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  For these negotiations to succeed, I must be a mediator -- not an enforcer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  You have the bridge, Number One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Chorgan. May I introduce Sovereign Marouk.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  You may sit.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  I think you will find Marouk's proposal --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  You know, Picard -- I could take you prisoner.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Don't worry, I've no intention of doing so. You've gone to a lot of trouble to get here -- I'm curious why.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Then let's proceed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Quite simply, I propose amnesty for every Gatherer...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Amnesty. You mean slavery.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Chorgan, if you want to know what I think...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  I don't. Say what you came to say. But I tell you right now I doubt that I'll believe it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})

(:Text {content:  I didn't believe this very persuasive Federation captain when he suggested that we could reconcile our differences. But I am convinced now it is the right thing not just for you, but for us too. We need you back.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  I've brought some Acamarian brandy... I'm sure it's been a long time...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53A})
(:Text {content:  You have spent a century hunting us down --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53B})
(:Text {content:  She's trying to put an end to that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53B})
(:Text {content:  By luring us back and putting us in prisons.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53B})
(:Text {content:  No -- by accepting you back as free men.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53B})
(:Text {content:  And will you feed and clothe us, too?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53B})
(:Text {content:  No, of course I won't! What I will do is give you the means to feed and clothe yourselves. We've already set aside land you can...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53B})
(:Text {content:  Do we look like farmers to you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53B})

(:Text {content:  Then don't farm. Use the land as you wish. It is yours. And the moment you set foot on it, you'll be better off than you are today. You won't be running any longer...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53B})
(:Text {content:  We would need autonomy...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53B})
(:Text {content:  Autonomy...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53B})
(:Text {content:  Let us acknowledge, Sovereign, that Chorgan appears willing to discuss your offer...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53B})
(:Text {content:  There are many levels of autonomy, certainly your region would have home rights...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53C})
(:Text {content:  Those rights will be spelled out before I agree to anything...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53C})
(:Text {content:  Commander, I'm afraid the only entry on Volnoth in the Acamarian database is a birth record.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  Probably one of the last of the Gatherers to be born on their planet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})

(:Text {content:  I've been digging through the medical database from Acamar Three for hours and I've found another victim of the microvirus that killed Volnoth. But just one.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  Fifty-three years ago. A Gatherer named Penthor-Mul.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  Data -- got anything in your files on this Penthor-Mul?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})

(:Text {content:  Yes. He was captured while leading a Gatherer raid on an Acamarian outpost. He died of a heart attack before his trial ended. Commander, he was a member of the Lornack Clan.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  Display Volnoth's birth record again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  Lornack... the same clan....})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  The only two recorded deaths from this microvirus... members of the same clan... what does that tell us, Doctor?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  If these microbes were engineered for murder, I'd say somebody's going after the whole family.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  Commander, Chorgan, the present leader of the Gatherers, is also from the Lornack clan.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})

(:Text {content:  I want to know just how this clan was involved in the Acamarian blood feuds... any clues to their enemies you can find... How could this virus be transmitted?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  More ways than I can count. And it's perfectly safe to the carrier... as long as he doesn't have the same DNA patterns.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  Tailor made for their victims...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  Sir, eighty years ago, the Lornacks massacred a rival clan, the Tralestas. It ended a feud that had lasted for two hundred years.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  Ended it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  According to these records, there were no survivors. The Tralesta clan was annihilated.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  Something tells me they may not have all been wiped out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  There's got to be a missing link here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  Computer, any members of the Acamarian delegation in the Tralesta clan?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  Clan affiliation is not within provided records.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  Commander, I believe I have found a correlation between the two deaths... your \"missing link\" ...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  That is Penthor-Mul being led from his trial.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55B})
(:Text {content:  I don't see the connection...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55B})
(:Text {content:  Behind him to the left, sir...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55B})
(:Text {content:  Computer, scan left and magnify.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55B})
(:Text {content:  The computer can extrapolate and reconstruct the rest of the face, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55C})
(:Text {content:  Do it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55C})
(:Text {content:  But the photograph was taken over fifty years ago.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55E})
(:Text {content:  Fifty-three years... and she hasn't aged a day.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55E})
(:Text {content:  Three seats on the ruling council?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  If we're going to be subject to your laws, we want a part in making them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  I agree you're entitled to representation... but not on the ruling council.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  Unacceptable. The real power is in the council. You're trying to shut us out already --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  No -- you're trying to take too much! No group has three seats on the council.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  I don't care what others have --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  Yes -- you only care about what you can take.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  Sovereign -- were the situation reversed, you would be demanding the same levels of representation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  You're right, Captain. I apologize for my temper.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps a short pause would be helpful.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  I agree. Excellent thought. Yuta...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  It's quite remarkable how much alike the two of you actually are...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65A})
(:Text {content:  I'm being quite honest... both able negotiators... strong leaders.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65A})
(:Text {content:  We don't obey weak leaders.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65A})
(:Text {content:  We have nothing at all in common... we have agreed to nothing...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65A})
(:Text {content:  Wrong, Chorgan... we've agreed to have some brandy together.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65A})
(:Text {content:  Treachery! A Federation trap --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Don't move!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Everyone's motionless -- including Yuta, who's a yard behind Chorgan.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Yuta. Move away from Chorgan.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Do it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Why?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Because of a man you once knew... Penthor-Mul.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Penthar-Mul? How do you know Penthar-Mul?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  He was murdered fifty years ago...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Murdered... ? That's not so... he died of...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  He was killed just as Volnoth was... by a deadly virus designed to attack your clan...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  What do you mean? Designed by whom... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Tell him, Yuta...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  I don't understand.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  You were with Penthor-Mul when he died...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  If it was fifty years ago... how could I...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  I know, Yuta...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Stop! Chorgan -- keep perfectly still. Your life is in danger.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Yuta -- step back.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  William, this is not your concern.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  It is now. You're about to commit murder.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  It isn't murder. It's justice.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Who are you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Yuta... of the clan Tralesta.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  There are no more Tralestas.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})

(:Text {content:  Five survived the last Lornack raid... but on that day a century ago, my life ended and my search began. I was the one chosen... transformed... my cells were altered... my aging slowed... enough to finish my task.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Murdering innocent people -- is that your task?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  He's not innocent. He's a Lornack.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  You used me in order to get to the last few you couldn't reach.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Sovereign.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  You'll never leave this ship. If I don't kill you myself, my men will.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  You are the last. Once you're dead, what happens to me doesn't matter.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Yuta... the wars are over.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  You cannot understand...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})

(:Text {content:  No, I can't. You're right. Because I've seen the part of you that regrets what you have become... Yuta, listen to me... you don't have to do this any more.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  I have no choice.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  You do...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  William... I --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  I'm... sorry.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  Don't --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Commander, I'm in your debt...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  New orders from Starfleet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  The rendezvous with the Goddard has been postponed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  And in the meantime?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Starbase three four three. We're to take on medical supplies for the Alpha Leonis system.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Sounds pretty routine.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})

(:Text {content:  With the Gatherer truce in effect, it should be. We won't require a full ship's complement. I'm going to extend shore leave on the starbase to anyone who wants it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  I'll pass that along to the crew, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Parthus. A la Yuta.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75})
(:Text {content:  Brother John Bates, is not that the morning which breaks yonder?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  I think it be. But we have no great cause to desire the approach of the day.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  Who goes there?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  A friend.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  Under what captain serve you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  Under Sir Thomas Erpingham.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  I pray you, what thinks he of our estate?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  Even as men wrecked upon a sand, that look to be washed off the next tide.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  He hath not told his thought to the king?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})

(:Text {content:  No, nor it is not meet he should. For though I speak it to you, I think the king is but a man, as I am. The violet smells to him as it doth to me, in his nakedness he appears but a man. Therefore, his fears, out of doubt, be of the same relish as ours are. Yet, no man should possess him with any appearance of fear, lest he, by showing it, should dishearten his army.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  He may show what outward courage he will, but I believe, as cold a night as 'tis, he could wish himself in Thames up to the neck.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Methinks I could not die anywhere so contented as in the king's company, his cause being just and his quarrel honorable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  That's more than we know.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Aye, or more than we should seek after. If his cause be wrong, our obedience to the king wipes the crime of it out of us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})

(:Text {content:  But if the cause be not good, the king himself hath a heavy reckoning to make when all those legs and arms and heads chopped off in a battle shall join together at the latter day and cry all \"We died at such a place\" a surgeon, some upon their wives left poor behind them. I am afeared there are few die well that die in a battle.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  The king is not bound to answer the particular endings of his soldiers, the father of his son, nor the master of his servant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Delightful... you're getting better and better, Data...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Freeze program.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Thank you, sir. I plan to study the performances of Olivier, Branagh, Shapiro, Kullnark...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})

(:Text {content:  Data, you are here to learn about the human condition... and there's no better way than embracing Shakespeare... but you must discover it through your own performance, not by imitating...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Riker to Picard...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Number One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Sensors are picking up an unidentified craft in the Neutral Zone... It's heading toward Federation space...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  On our way... Picard out. We'll get to the next act later, Data... computer, end program.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  It is interesting that a king could pass as a commoner, but why should he wish to? If he is the leader... should he not be leading... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})

(:Text {content:  But listen to what Shakespeare is telling you about the man, Data... a king who has a true feeling for his soldiers must share their fears on the day of battle.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Sir, will I be able to schedule a performance for the crew in the near future?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3A})
(:Text {content:  Let's... not rush it, shall we... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3A})
(:Text {content:  Outpost Sierra Six confirms our readings, sir. They identify it as a Romulan scout ship... bearing two-seven-zero mark one-four.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  A scout ship? Curious. What would bring a scout ship into the Neutral Zone?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Shall we transmit a warning to withdraw, sir... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Open hailing frequencies.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir. Captain, the Romulan is hailing us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Visual... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Not within range yet...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Open channel...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Federation ship... do you read... I require urgent assistance...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  This is Captain Jean-Luc Picard of the...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Federation ship... please help me... requesting asylum... under pursuit...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Pursuit... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Visual contact. On screen, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Red Alert. Open a channel to the warship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Come to intercept course. Keep us out of the Neutral Zone.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Channel is open.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  When will the scout cross into Federation territory?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Forty-one seconds...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Romulan warbird, you have crossed into the Neutral Zone, and are engaged in hostile action. Explain yourself and your intent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  No reply, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Hail the scout.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Responding.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  On screen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Please, you must help me...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  We are moving to intercept... maintain your course and power...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Scout ship is severely damaged, Captain. Engines inoperative, shields down.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Position?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Coordinates one-four-zero by two-zero-five.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Federation space.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Bring us to within five kilometers of the scout. Mister La Forge, prepare to extend our shields around that ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Captain, at that range, the shields won't be able to take much punishment.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Five kilometers, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  All stop.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Extend shields.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Shields in place... we've got the scout ship, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Weapons on the warbird are fully powered, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Lock phasers...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Open a channel.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Ready.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Romulan warbird, you are now in Federation territory... if you do not immediately withdraw...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  No argument?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Warbird has re-entered the Neutral Zone, Captain. Heading for Romulan territory. Cowards.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Massive power failure on the scout ship, sir. All systems are going off-line. Including life-support.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Transporter Room Two, prepare to beam the occupant of the Romulan ship aboard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Riker and Worf then EXIT bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Data, lock onto the scout ship and take it in tow... cancel Red Alert.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Energize.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  I must see your captain immediately.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  We'll take you to Sickbay, after that...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  This cannot wait. I have information vital to your survival.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Stardate 43462.5. We have beamed aboard an apparent Romulan defector. He claims to be a low ranking logistics officer with extraordinary information about a new secret offensive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})

(:Text {content:  The humiliating defeat at the Battle of Cheron has not been forgotten. The new leaders have vowed to discard the treaty and claim the Neutral Zone. Nelvana Three is only the first step.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  And you're saying a whole base is already established there... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  In forty-eight hours, the reactor core will be on line.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  The Federation sensors that monitor the Neutral Zone just... missed it... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  It would seem so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Unlikely.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  In two days, you will have a fleet of Romulan warbirds... within striking distance of fifteen Federation sectors...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  The Federation will not permit it...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Then it is war we're talking about, isn't it? Destroy the base now and the threat is over.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})

(:Text {content:  I'm sure you're tired from your ordeal... and could use some medical attention. Mister Worf, accompany Sublieutenant Setal to sickbay. We'll arrange for your quarters.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  No doubt you will wish to question me further.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  No doubt.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  He tells a hell of a story.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  You don't believe it...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  The empire knows we'd never allow them to maintain a base within the Neutral Zone.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})

(:Text {content:  Commander, it would not be an atypical Romulan ploy. In their long history of war, the Romulans have rarely attacked first... they prefer to test their enemy's resolve.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  And how many times in their history has there been a Romulan defector?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Because loyalty is fundamental to their culture.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  You really think he's a spy, Commander?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  I think he's been planted to draw us into the Neutral Zone... we'd look like the aggressors...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  a legitimate excuse to respond with force.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Exactly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  That would also not be an atypical Romulan ploy, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
