(:Text {content:  It is always a chess game with them, isn't it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Well at least he's given us the chance to get a look at some Romulan technology.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Mister La Forge, you will head the away team over to the scout. Commander, you and Counselor Troi will conduct Setal's interrogation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Permission to observe the interrogation, sir...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})

(:Text {content:  No, I need you with me on the bridge, Data... there's much to be done. We have less than forty-eight hours to prevent a war... or perhaps start one. That depends on establishing the truth of...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  I set the auto-destruct sequencer before I left the ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Why?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Wouldn't you? To prevent your ship from being captured?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Excuse me for being a little confused, Setal, but I thought you were defecting...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})

(:Text {content:  I am not a traitor. All you can see is the opportunity to exploit me. The Federation credo, exploitation. You couldn't get aboard my ship fast enough might it reveal that we can use... ?\" You are a short sighted people... can't you understand I came to stop a war.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  If you could just hold still for a moment...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  With your metabolism, it will take a couple of days to heal...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Thank you, Doctor... I am fortunate that you know something of Romulan medicine.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  I've had a chance to gain some experience recently.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Ah yes... the incident at Galorndon Core, our two officers...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  You are aware of a great deal for a logistics clerk.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  It was common knowledge. I can show you my rating code.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Forged credentials are a simple matter for a spy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  How can you allow Klingon Pahtk to walk around in a Starfleet uniform?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  You are lucky this is not a Klingon ship. We know how to deal with spies...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Remove this tohzah from my sight...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Your knowledge of Klingon curses is impressive. But, as the Romulans might say, only a Veruul would use such language in public.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Mister Worf, please see to the security arrangements for our guest's stay...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  You find something amusing?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})

(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Worf, I like him. Or, to be more accurate, I understand him. He's a warrior. Proud, fearless, living only for combat. Exactly the type who will get us all killed if we're not careful.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  This is the food station... you can reach me through the com panel. Later, there are a few more questions we'd like to ask you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Computer, water.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Temperature?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Twelve onkians.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  This system is calibrated to the Celsius metric system.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Any temperature at all. On the cold side of your system, whatever that is.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  There is no unusual activity in the Nelvana System...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Isolate and magnify the Nelvana star system.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Nothing on the sensors, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})

(:Text {content:  It is hard to believe what we cannot see, Data. And yet, with their cloaking technology, a fleet of Romulan warships could conceivably be passing right before our eyes. There must be a way we can neutralize that advantage...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Captain Picard, priority one message from Starfleet coming in on secured channel.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  In my Ready Room. Delay time, computer... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Two hours, twenty-two minute delay from time of transmission at Starfleet Command on Lya Three.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Computer, key access four-one-two mark eight-zero. Picard. Jean- Luc. Starfleet priority code Gamma. Decode.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Begin message.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})

(:Text {content:  Captain, we have received an official protest from the Romulan Empire demanding the return of your defector. We are obviously refusing to comply. I join in your skepticism, but if it is a deception, the Romulans are certainly going all out to make a good show of it. The Federation Council has convened in emergency session. There's no doubt in my mind this will eventually fall on your shoulders, Jean-Luc. You've got him. You must decide if he's telling the truth. For now, I suggest you proceed along the Neutral Zone border toward a Federation position proximate to Nelvana Three.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  considers thoughtfully for a long beat. To com panel})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28A})
(:Text {content:  You've never actually stepped foot on Nelvana Three.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  That's right.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  You were a logistics officer assigned to sector eight-one-five...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Eight-one-four.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Eight-one-four, yes. So your conclusions about the secret base are solely based on a few files you happened to see in a computer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Massive files, Commander... transport schedules, troop movements... construction reports...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  And where are they? All these files? Why not bring the files to prove what you're saying?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  It was not a simple matter of just taking them... Romulan security is unmatched...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Yet you managed to get all the way across the Neutral Zone in a one man ship... quite an achievement...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  I saw an opportunity... I took it... by the time they realized I had the scout ship... it was too late...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Are all logistics officers taught to pilot scout ships?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  I depended a great deal on the computer to navigate. I have rudimentary knowledge, that's all...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Do you expect anything out of this for yourself?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  The idea of a Romulan pursuing a noble cause is impossible, I suppose.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  It was only a question.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Do you realize I have given up my life for this? I can never go back. Do you think I did this for wealth, a new home, what?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  We're trying to get to the truth here, Sublieutenant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  You have the truth before you. You are too blind to see it. I have seen enough bloodshed for one lifetime.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  So have we all.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})

(:Text {content:  Then do as I ask! I know how difficult it is for you to believe me. I feel the same suspicions toward you. But we must look beyond our long-standing animosity and work toward the good of both our people.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Slow playback... display engine logs and power data of both vessels...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Now... look what happens at zero-nine-five-four-three-three on the clock...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})

(:Text {content:  The scout has sustained engine damage... forcing it to drop to point-six-one-five impulse power... for all intents and purposes he's finished, dead... the warship should overtake him... only it doesn't. Point two-six seconds later, the warbird slows to precisely the same speed...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Three times... three speed fluctuations... the warship always kept its distance... I don't think they wanted to catch up.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  And yet they fired at the scout ship... they could have killed him...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Not necessarily, Doctor... the Romulans have the same capability to direct the impact of their weapons as we do.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Doctor, is there any possibility his wound was self-inflicted?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  It was a bad burn... I hardly think...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  A possibility...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Stardate 43463.7. We are holding a position at the Neutral Zone border proximate to Nelvana Three.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})

(:Text {content:  There are twenty one hours left before the Romulan base becomes functional, if our guest is telling the truth. Counselor Troi, however, feels Sublieutenant Setal is being deliberately deceptive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})

(:Text {content:  The Monitor and the Hood are headed in your direction though they will arrive too late to be of assistance. Warnings have gone out to all outposts along the border... as well as several independent vessels in nearby sectors. No one here wants a war, Captain. But we're prepared to take them on if that's what they want. All Federation starships have been placed on Yellow Alert.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Come.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  You wanted to see me, Captain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Data, prepare a class one probe. Set sensors for maximum scan. I want every meter of Nelvana Three monitored.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  I will start my calibrations, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  One moment.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Sit down.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Do you require something else from me, sir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})

(:Text {content:  Yes. Your clarity of thought, your objectivity... as always... We're very possibly about to go to war, Data. The repercussions of what we do during the next twenty-four hours may be felt for years to come. I'd like you to keep the official record of these events, so we may give history the benefit of a dispassionate view.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  I will begin immediately, sir. Is that all?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  How are the crew's spirits?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  They are concerned, Captain, of course. But confident. Can you not see that yourself?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Unlike King Henry, it's not so easy for me to disguise myself and walk among my troops. That's all, Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  \"Now if these men do not die well, it will be a black matter for the King that led them to it.\"})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Why must we waste time playing this ridiculous game?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  I sense there is more here you wish to tell us, yet you force yourself to hold back.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  I've told you all you need to know about Nelvana Three.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  I am not speaking of the base.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  The base is all that matters.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  You're lying, Setal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  If you'll go to Nelvana Three, you will see...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  We're not going anywhere til we get to the truth...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  You're a spy, aren't you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  No.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Then prove it. You can start by telling me something about the location and strength of the Romulan fleet...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  I don't know it...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  You're a logistics officer...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  For only one sector...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Who's your commanding officer?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Admiral Alidar Jarok.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  The position of Romulan bases along the Neutral Zone...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  I don't know...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  In your sector then...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Irrelevant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Strength of troops under your admiral's command...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Irrelevant. Irrelevant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  I agree with you... it's not worth playing this game.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  What a fool I've been. To have come looking for courage in a lair of cowards.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Captain Picard, priority message from security officer, Klingon vessel Patakt...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Worf, handle this at security station, deck nine...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Sensors are configured for planetary probe, sir... ready for launch.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Proceed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Probe on course. Sensors are functioning...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Coordinate your analysis with Mister La Forge... I want your report with dispatch...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  I don't know, Data... my gut tells me we oughta believe what this guy is trying to tell us...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Your gut?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  It's just a... a feeling, you know? Instinct, emotions...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  It seems to me those qualities interfere with rational judgment.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  You're right. They do sometimes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Then why not rely strictly on fact?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  You can't always trust the plain and simple facts... they lie sometimes...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  They can lead to wrong conclusions, but they cannot lie.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  What do you think? Is he a defector or not?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  The facts to date would lead to an objective conclusion that he is not.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Somehow I think we're gonna catch the Romulans with their pants down on Nelvana Three... Just like he says.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  \"With their pants down.\" A metaphor, catching them in the act... because your \"gut\" tells you so...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})

(:Text {content:  But of course you can't just go with your gut either. It's a combination, Data... let me put it this way... all these feelings that get in the way of human judgment... that confuse the hell out of us... that make us second guess ourselves. We need them. We need them to help fill in the missing pieces... because we almost never have all the facts.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})

(:Text {content:  So a person fills in missing pieces of the puzzle with his own personality... resulting in a conclusion based as much on instinct and emotion as on fact.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Now you're getting it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  What does one do if he has no instinct and emotion?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Data... look at this... the facts just took a left turn...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  As the probe went into orbit around Nelvana Three, it began to pick up low level subspace radio emissions...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  Could they be naturally occuring?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  The patterns are clearly artificial, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  The signal is so faint our ship sensors can't read it from this distance.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  Can we decode it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  We've tried. It's probably Romulan... but we can't be sure. Cloaked Romulan ships could produce this effect.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  What about the planet surface?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})

(:Text {content:  Reading nothing but barren rock. They might be able to hide a base from the probe... its capabilities are limited. The only way we'll know for sure is if we go and take a look for ourselves.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  That will be all, gentlemen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  I take it you've never seen a Romulan before.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  That would be an incorrect assumption.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Then why do you invade my privacy?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  I am attempting to ascertain what my guts tell me about you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  You're the android.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  I know a host of Romulan cyberneticists who would love to be this close to you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  I do not find the concept particularly appealing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Nor should you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  I am told by various crewmembers that this viewport is their favorite on the ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  I thought it would bring me comfort. But these are not my stars. Even the heavens are denied to me here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Synthetic swill...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  I don't suppose your food terminals are capable of preparing a Romulan ale.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})

(:Text {content:  I am afraid they would require the molecular structure of the beverage in question. And, as you are no doubt aware, our knowledge of your planet is quite limited.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  The loss is yours. For I have visited over a hundred different worlds and none possessed the awesome beauty of Romulus.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Am I correct in assuming you regret your decision to come here?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})

(:Text {content:  No, what I did had to be done. But to never again see the firefalls of Gath Gal'thong, or the spires of my home rising above the Apnex Sea. To be exiled from your home is a bitter thing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  It does appear unlikely that you will ever be allowed to return to your world again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  The cold reaction of an android.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  But perhaps we can bring Romulus to you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Program complete.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Run program.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  After you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  The valley of Chula. I know it well.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  You are free to stay here as long as you wish.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Turn it off. I no longer live here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Cancel program.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  This is my home now. My future.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  I've sacrificed everything. It must not be in vain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Arrange a meeting between myself and Captain Picard. Tell him Admiral Jarok wants to see him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Captain, we have confirmed that you are holding Admiral Alidar Jarok...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})

(:Text {content:  He's been identified as the commander at the massacre of the Norkan outposts. The council strongly advises you to consider Jarok an unreliable source of information.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Show him in.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Wait outside, Ensign. Have a seat... Admiral Jarok.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Captain... there is no more time...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Jarok sits, frustrated. Picard finally looks up.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  I am not convinced you are telling the truth.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  What must I do...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  You must convince me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})

(:Text {content:  If I had irrefutable evidence... irrefutable evidence. You brought no evidence at all. In fact, this entire escape stretched your credibility beyond belief. Now we hear that you are not even who you claimed to be. A Romulan defector is virtually a contradiction in terms. But Admiral Jarok crossing the lines...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  I have explained my motives to your interrogators...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Yes, peace in our galaxy. Except you are not a man of peace, Admiral. Your military record, what we know of it, is clear...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Your \"massacre\" was called the Norkan Campaign on my world, Captain. One world's hero is another world's madman. Perhaps I am neither one.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})

(:Text {content:  On what basis shall I decide, Admiral? Your good word? Are you willing to reveal ways to overpower the Romulan B-type warbirds we may encounter? Are you prepared to help us detect them through their cloaking shields?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})

(:Text {content:  You see my problem, Admiral. You ask us for faith in circumstances not only difficult to believe but compounded by your own lies, and your own reluctance to tell us all you know...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  I cannot betray my people...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})

(:Text {content:  You have already betrayed your people. You have made your choices. You are a traitor, sir. If the bitter taste of it disagrees with you, I am truly sorry. But I will not risk the lives of my crew because you think you can dance on the edge of the Neutral Zone. You have crossed over, Admiral. I suggest you make yourself comfortable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Do you have children, Captain Picard? A family?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  No.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Then you have sacrificed too much for your career.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Yes, this is all very interesting, but...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})

(:Text {content:  There's a moment in a man's life, Captain, that you cannot know... when he looks down at the first smile of his baby girl and he knows that he must change the world for her... for all children. It is for her that I am here. Not to betray the Romulan Empire, but to save it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})

(:Text {content:  For months, I tried to persuade the high command that another war would destroy the empire. They grew tired of my arguments, and finally censored me, sent me off to command a distant sector. This was my only recourse. I will never see my child smile again, Captain. She will grow up believing her father was a traitor. But she will grow up. If you act, Picard. If we stop the war before it begins...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  I cannot. And will not. Unless I have your unequivocal assistance.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})

(:Text {content:  Admiral Jarok has provided me with the strength, location and tactical plans for the Romulan fleet. Mister La Forge, he is prepared to give you data regarding engines, weapons and cloaking systems on the warbird class starship. But I believe we'll find his experience as a field commander more valuable in a strategic sense than in the technical areas.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Any edge'll help, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Don't depend on it. For all we know, he may still be lying. We'll find out soon enough. Number One, set a course for Nelvana Three.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Second officer's log, supplemental. We are prepared to enter the Neutral Zone in direct violation of the Treaty of Algeron.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  We must presume Romulan warships are cloaked and monitoring us. We expect swift and heavy resistance as we approach Nelvana Three.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Course plotted and laid in.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  All decks showing condition red.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  Engineering ready, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Defensive systems standing by.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Engage.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Tactical?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Nothing on sensors.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  I don't like it... I would have expected a greeting party...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})

(:Text {content:  Number One, you echo another noteworthy commander in a similar circumstance. One of your countrymen... George Armstrong Custer when his Seventh Cavalry arrived at the Little Big Horn.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  May we have better luck.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Approaching Nelvana system.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Engage impulse engines.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Nelvana Three on screen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Still no sign of them on sensors... In a way, I'd rather be fighting my way there... it's too damned easy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  Prepare to enter standard orbit.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  Data?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Scanning the planet. No life forms. No power sources. No weapons systems.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  No indication of a base at all?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  No sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  The subspace signal the probe detected? The ionization disturbances?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  I am picking them up, sir... but I cannot identify the source... They... seem to be moving in an orbital path with an eight hundred kilometer apogee.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Have Jarok brought to the bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  It's possible they abandoned the base after he defected.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  There is no scarring on the planet surface that would denote heavy construction of any kind.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  A cloaking device, perhaps... something to hide the whole base...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  A cloaking device operating on the surface would be given away by visible distortion effects.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps you'd like to tell us why we're here, Admiral.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  There doesn't seem to be a base.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  I don't understand...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Nelvana Three, Admiral... no base, no weapons, no sign of life at all.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  But I saw the tactical communiques... records... timetables for completion... an entire legion was assigned to the mission...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Could they have been feeding you disinformation?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  You said you had been censored. Reassigned four months ago. They knew of your dissatisfaction... could this have been a test of your loyalty?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  No... no, that's impossible...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  They let you escape with an arsenal of worthless secrets... what other explanation is there?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Captain, permission to withdraw from the Neutral Zone.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Proceed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Helm a hundred eighty degrees about. Get us out of here, Geordi...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  I hear you, Commander...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Three Romulan warships uncloaking... coordinates... They're firing photon torpedoes...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Shields holding...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Damage...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Minor damage in the secondary hull... power transfer fields may be pinched off... working on it...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Captain... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Not yet, Mister Worf. This is just a tap on the shoulder. Or we wouldn't be here talking about it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  They're hailing us, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  On screen...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})

(:Text {content:  Captain Picard, I hardly expected to see you again so soon. It seems this time you are the one who has made an aggressive move across the Neutral Zone...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  Commander Tomalak, as I suspect you already know, we have responded to a warning of a Romulan incursion on Nelvana Three...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  But, Captain, as you can see, there is no incursion...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  There is the matter of an unidentified subspace radio emission... and ionization distubrances...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  Ah, you must mean our orbiting probe... we are studying Nelvana Three for... archaeological research...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  With a cloaked satellite...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  Really, Captain, would you have us believe this satellite is an excuse for your aggressive charge across the Neutral Zone?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  Believe whatever you wish, Tomalak. We will be on our way.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  Without even an apology, Captain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  If an apology will do, I will offer it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  I'm afraid it won't. So I will save you the humiliation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  Get to it, Tomalak.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})

(:Text {content:  You see, Picard, after we dissect your Enterprise for every precious bit of information, I plan to display its broken hull in the center of the Romulan capitol as a symbol of our victory. It will inspire our armies for generations to come and serve as a warning to any other traitor who would create ripples of disloyalty.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})

(:Text {content:  All the communiques, the records, the timetables... they were fiction, written for my benefit... it was all a... a test... a test of my loyalty... and you used me to lure the Enterprise into the Neutral Zone.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  First, Captain, you will return the traitor, Jarok... then you will surrender as prisoners of war...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  Do you seriously expect me to agree to those terms?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  No, Captain Picard, I expect you won't. You have thirty seconds to decide.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  I do not require one second.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  Captain Picard, I urge you. Surrender. Consider the men and women you would lead into a lost cause.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  If the cause is just and honorable, they are prepared to give their lives. Are you prepared to die today, Tomalak?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  I expected more from you than an idle threat, Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  And so you shall have it. Now, Mister Worf.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  Aye, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  Klingon vessels are armed and ready, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  What shall it be, Tomalak?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  You will still not survive our assault...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  Nor will you survive ours, Commander. Shall we die together... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  I look forward to our next meeting, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  Romulan disruptors powering down, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  Mister Worf, extend the appreciation of the Federation... and my personal gratitude... to the Klingons.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  Take us home, Number One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  I did it... for nothing. My home, my family. For nothing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  He ingested a Felodesine chip. He must have brought it with him. I'm sorry, Captain... there was no antidote.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  A letter to his wife and daughter.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Sir, he must have known it would be impossible for us to deliver this.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Today, perhaps... but if there are others as courageous as Admiral Jarok... there is hope for a day of peace when we can take his letter home.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Stardate 43489.2. We have arrived at Angosia, a planet that is eager for membership in the Federation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  I'm greatly impressed with what I've seen so far, Prime Minister.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Then I hope it will reflect favorably in your report, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  It's a tribute to your people to have recovered so rapidly from the Tarsian War.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  It is indeed. We are not warriors. We believe reason can settle disputes. But not every culture agrees with our position.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  An unfortunate reality.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  The development of the mind, the cultivation of the intellect -- these are the pursuits to which the Angosians have dedicated themselves for centuries.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  I'm sorry to interrupt, Prime Minister. There's a problem. May I see you a moment?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Excuse me, gentlemen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  I think they'll make a fine addition to the Federation, Number One...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  I'm not sure I'd want to live here. A little stuffy for my taste.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  A prisoner has escaped from the penal colony on Lunar Five. Two guards are dead. The prisoner has taken a transport vessel.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Do you have means of pursuit?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})

(:Text {content:  The tracking station was sabotaged. The entire base is in chaos. We have ordered ships from the surface to follow him, but to be honest, our civilian pilots are not trained to handle this...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  With your permission, sir... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Mister Data, a stolen transport vessel has departed from Lunar Five. Have you picked it up on sensors?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Good. Detain the vessel and quarantine the pilot. Is he armed?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Yes. And he's very dangerous, Captain. Lunar Five is our maximum security facility.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Did you hear that, Data?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Commander, we will use extreme caution.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Keep us informed. Riker out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  On screen, sir...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Specifications on the vessel, Mister Worf.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  No warp drive. Minimal weaponry.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Heading, Ensign Crusher.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Three-one-nine mark two-five-zero.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Vessel's speed increasing to point-two impulse. He's seen us, Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  The ship's drive section...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  What happened to the rest of his ship?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Scan the drive section for life form readings.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  None.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Mister Crusher, bring us around to the back side of the asteroid.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Sensors indicate wreckage on the asteroid's surface.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  No life signs.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Apparently, he did not survive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Data, the drive section... where'd it go?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  There's no sign of it on its previous heading. Someone must be at the helm.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  Status report, Mister Data?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  I am afraid the prisoner has eluded us, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  We followed procedures precisely. Scanners indicated no life forms present in the drive section. I cannot explain how he escaped.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Incoming message from the Angosian prime minister.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  The planet's surface is replaced by an image of Nayrok, seated in his office.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})

(:Text {content:  We've identified the prisoner, Captain. His name is Roga Danar. His criminal record is too long to go into. But you must be aware that he is given to bouts of uncontrollable violence.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  We appreciate the warning, Prime Minister. We will keep you posted on our progress.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Mister La Forge, how far and how fast can that transport ship travel?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Without warp drive, there's no way it could be outside our range by now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  We've been sweeping the area constantly, Commander. There's nothing within sensor range.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  A cloaking device?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  The Angosians have no cloaking technology...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Unless he's borrowing one... If he's hanging over the planet's pole, its magnetic field could confuse the sensors.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  I believe I can recalibrate our sensors to read through the electromagnetic interference over the poles, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Realign for polar orbit.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  There he is, Commander. You were correct.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  The fellow knows all the tricks, doesn't he...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  There are still no life form readings coming from the vessel.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  It could be the magnetic interference, Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  I have compensated. There are no readings.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  We'll have our answer shortly. Lock on tractor beam, Mister La Forge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Tractor beam locking on.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Sir, the vessel is coming about.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Sensors detect a massive power build up in his aft thrusters.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  On Main Viewer, Mister Worf.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  He's making a suicide run.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Shields have been automatically activated. Tractor beam disengaged.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  He's bounced off our shields.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  That's one trick I didn't even know about...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Ensign Crusher, fix coordinates of that vessel. We'll transport the whole thing to a shuttlebay if we have to.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})

(:Text {content:  I do not think that will be necessary, Captain. He is no longer in the drive section. I anticipated this diversionary tactic based on his pattern to date. We are picking up a cylindrical object approximately seven meters in length and three meters in diameter.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  On screen, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  An escape pod.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  This guy is incredible.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Yet there are still no life form readings.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Transporter Room Four, prepare to beam aboard anything that's large enough to be a humanoid adult from inside that pod.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Security to Transporter Room Four.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})

(:Text {content:  We are holding the contents in stasis pending arrival of security. An illicit weapon has been detected in the transport beam, sir. It's been rendered inoperable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Let's greet our guest.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Just stay where you are.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  What the hell...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Take him to the detention cell. Set phasers on kill.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})

(:Text {content:  We need a few hours to get the containment field on Lunar Five operational before we pick him up. The damage he caused during his escape was considerable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26A})
(:Text {content:  We will await your signal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26A})
(:Text {content:  I appreciate your patience. Our prison psychologist has recommended you keep Danar fully sedated until he's ready for transport.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26A})
(:Text {content:  He's in our highest security detention area... there shouldn't be any more problems...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26A})

(:Text {content:  Do not relax your security for one moment, Captain. He is extremely violent and cunning, as you already know, Commander Riker. I'm so pleased to learn your injuries are not serious. My most sincere apologies...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26A})
(:Text {content:  None required, Prime Minister.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26A})
(:Text {content:  I will send a transport vessel to retrieve him as soon as possible. Nayrok out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26A})
(:Text {content:  Have you run a diagnostic on the sensors, Data?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26B})

(:Text {content:  Yes, Commander. There is nothing wrong with the ship's sensors. The reason that we did not sense any life signs aboard the escape vessel is because the prisoner has no life signs.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26B})
(:Text {content:  Computer, identify the occupant in the detention cell.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26B})
(:Text {content:  The detention cell is vacant at this time.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26B})
(:Text {content:  Can he be some sort of android?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26B})
(:Text {content:  Our sensors can identify artificial lifeforms, Captain. Apparently, he is capable of deceiving the sensors.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26B})
(:Text {content:  Are you all right?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  What is this ship?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  You are on board the USS Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  A war vessel?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  A Federation starship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Federation...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  We were orbiting Angosia when you escaped from Lunar Five.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  It seems I am a victim of my own bad timing. And you are the keeper of this jail?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  I am Deanna Troi. Ship's counselor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  \"Counselor\". Too bad. I'd rather you were a jailer to keep me company during my return trip.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  I assume that we are returning to Lunar Five...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  That terrifies you, doesn't it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  I have just killed two men to get out of there, Counselor. I am fully capable of killing you too. A terrifying thought, isn't it? Even to me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Do they mistreat you there?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Not at all. I am comfortable, well fed and housed. The Angosians take good care of their... prisoners. I am simply not allowed to ever leave.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})

(:Text {content:  Do you visit all the prisoners, Counselor? Are you a specialist in criminal behavior? Or am I just an interesting specimen that landed on your ship like an insect to be studied under your microscope...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Why do you have such anger toward me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  A girl with long dark hair broke my heart long ago... out of bitterness and rejection, I turned to crime...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  How about this one -- my mother abandoned me when I was born and I never had the guidance a wild young man needs...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Why are you doing this?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Playing games? Isn't that what you do, Counselor? Isn't that what all of you mind control experts do?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  I am not a mind control expert. I came because I sensed you were in pain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  And now, what do you sense?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  The pain is gone.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Interesting, isn't it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  There is a duality in the man... hard to describe... he is aware of his crimes... in fact, they deeply trouble him...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  Counselor...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})

(:Text {content:  He is intelligent... a thoughtful man. Typically Angosian. I know what he's done, but when I am with him, I cannot believe he is randomly and deliberately violent... in fact, inherantly, he has a non-violent personality...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  Counselor, it took five men to restrain him... and he took apart half of the Transporter Room in the process.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  I am not opening the door for him, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  I can only tell you I sense something very unusual about this man. Something that is not inherent to a criminal personality...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  Your dedication to helping others in pain is admirable, Counselor. But in a few hours, I will turn him over to the Angosians... and be glad to do so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  I understand.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  Data, do we have a link up to the Angosian central computer?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Counselor... we are copying records for Federation inspection pursuant to their application for admittance.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Can I see a police record on Roga Danar?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  There is no police record, Counselor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  But that's impossible. He's been in prison.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Lunar Five is a military prison facility...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Military... he's a soldier... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  That may provide an explanation for the tactics he was able to use against us when we tried to capture him...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  It doesn't say what he was arrested for. Call up his military record.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  He served in many campaigns during the Tarsian War, received two promotions, to the rank of Subhadar... a very honorable tour of duty...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  What was this man's crime?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  I've learned you are a soldier.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  I was a soldier.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Why were you put in prison?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Obviously, because I am a threat to society.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  There is no police record. What did you do?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Everything they asked me to do. That's why I became such a threat.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  I don't understand.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Why are you bothering to try, Counselor?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  I want to help if I can.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  A beat.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Why does a non-violent man commit acts of excessive violence?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  You can learn to do it if you have to.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Did you have to?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  It was war.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  This started in the war...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  It started the day I volunteered, Counselor... the day training began... the day I met my first instructor. He called himself a \"counselor\" too.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})

(:Text {content:  Roga Danar was an idealistic young man who answered his people's call to service. He joined the military to fight for the Angosian way of life. He didn't realize that by doing so... he would forever have to give up that way of life. He's not the same man who left home to go to war. He's been through intense psychological manipulation as well as biochemical modifications.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})

(:Text {content:  At Troi's request I examined him... his cellular structure has been been significantly altered... They used a combination of cryptobiolin, triclenidil, macrospentol... and a few things I don't even recognize.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Was he a prisoner of war? Who did this to him?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  His own government.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})

(:Text {content:  He has been programmed to be the perfect soldier. He can be absolutely normal, but whenever a danger is perceived, the programming clicks in and takes over. Intelligence, memory, strength, reflexes -- all become enhanced. He is conditioned to survive at any cost.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  One of the new substances in his cellular structure even shields electrical impulses.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  That would explain why our sensors did not detect him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Why was this man assigned to the Lunar Five facility?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})

(:Text {content:  He committed no crime. He says he was ordered there... with others like him. The first soldiers who had returned to Angosia had trouble. The rules changed too quickly. A lost temper could result in murder.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Counselor, did no one try to adjust their progam?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  They were simply exiled to Lunar Five.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  What do you want...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Am I disturbing you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Yes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Then I will leave.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Wait. I'd rather talk to someone. I'm sorry.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Why do you have yellow eyes?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Simply a lack of pigmentation. I am an android. You and I have something in common.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  We do?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Yes. We have both been programmed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Ah, you have been talking with Counselor Troi. It is not at all the same, android.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  I do not mean to belittle your condition. I understand your dilemma. But I am curious. My program can be altered and changed. Yours cannot?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})

(:Text {content:  The man I once was is still inside me... but this conditioning has been imposed... woven together with my thoughts and feelings and responses. How do you separate the program from the man?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Without further analysis of your condition by Counselor Troi or Doctor Crusher, I cannot say. But it would seem possible.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Doctors. Angosian doctors did this to me. If it could be undone, wouldn't they undo it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  I cannot answer that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Nor can I... and I ask the question every moment of every day.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Captain, what he is telling you is full of half-truths... he is a prisoner, what do you expect him to say about us?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Then, perhaps you'd clarify it for me...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  These soldiers were resettled on Lunar Five... it was to be their colony...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Their Gulag...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  I beg your pardon?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Was it a forced \"resettlement\"?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})

(:Text {content:  It was for their own protection as well as that of others. Most of them are quite happy there... we have gone to great lengths to give them a fine quality of life...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Even the most comfortable prison is a prison, Prime Minister.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  A few agitators like Danar forced us to add security...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Prime Minister, my medical team has suggested there may be treatment alternatives...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})

(:Text {content:  Captain, I assure you all alternatives have been explored. And this discussion is now treading upon matters of Angosian security. This is not your concern.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})

(:Text {content:  I have dispatched a ship to rendezvous with you and transport the prisoner back to Lunar Five. On behalf of Angosia, I thank the Federation for its assistance in retrieving our citizen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Were you built for combat, android?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  No. But my program does include military strategy... that is how I was finally able to anticipate your last tactic and capture you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  You did that? Perhaps you would be better at combat than you think.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  I am not programmed to kill.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})

(:Text {content:  My improved reflexes have allowed me to kill eighty-four times. And my improved memory lets me remember the face of each of those eighty-four. Can you understand how that feels?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  I am incapable of any feeling.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Then I envy you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Roga, this is Captain Picard})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})

(:Text {content:  Mister Danar, I am going to transfer you back to Angosian security. They are en route and will arrive shortly. I came to tell you that I have no choice. The prime minister has insisted and we have no right to refuse.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  And you would be foolish if you even considered it, Captain... because they are very correct. I am dangerous. I have no place in a civilized society.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  I do not believe that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Nor do I.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  I respect my officers' judgement, Danar. I wish I could help further. If a way appears to me, I will.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  I appreciate your telling me face-to-face.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  I felt you deserved that much.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  You deserve to know that I must use whatever means I can to escape.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Captain, the Angosian transport vessel has arrived.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Inform them the transfer will take place shortly. Picard out. Mister Data, to the bridge please...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Take care of yourself, android. I enjoyed our talk.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Good-bye, Roga.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps when this planet becomes a member of the Federation, we will be able...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})

(:Text {content:  I will not be here to see it, Counselor. Because even with this overwhelming demand to survive that they've built into my soul... I would rather die than return to Lunar Five.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Captain Picard, we're ready to receive the prisoner. Now transmitting the coordinates of our holding cell.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Coordinates received, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Stand by for transport. Picard out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Mister Worf, have all security precautions been taken?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})

(:Text {content:  Release of the force field and activation of the transporter will be virtually simultaneous, Captain... There will only be a point-one second interval between them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Even Danar can't move that fast.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  There will be a full security contingent present. Phasers will be set on kill.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Proceed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Transporter Room One to Lieutenant Worf. We're ready.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Proceed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Energizing...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Roga, don't, you'll be killed...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  I'm losing him... what the hell... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  Security personnel, full alert. Shut down all shuttlebays, transporters, and turbolifts.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Captain, a phaser is missing. We must assume that he's armed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49A})
(:Text {content:  Sound general quarters. Clear corridors of all non-essential personnel. I don't want him taking any hostages.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49B})
(:Text {content:  General quarters sounded, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49B})
(:Text {content:  Raise security containment fields immediately on decks thirty-four, thirty-five, and thirty-six.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49B})
(:Text {content:  Data... put the turbolifts back on line. If Danar sees they're operating, he may try to use one. Soon as he does, we have him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49B})
(:Text {content:  Sir, unauthorized access of turbolift dive on deck thirty-four.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  He took the bait.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Data -- override its destination and divert that turbolift to a position near Lieutenant Worf's current location.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  We're in position.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Four seconds to arrival.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Phaser on overload! Seal this deck --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Captain, the overload's been averted.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Ingenious.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Drop force field on deck thirty-six.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52A})
(:Text {content:  Sir, containment field down on deck thirty-six.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52A})
(:Text {content:  How the hell did he manage that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52A})
(:Text {content:  He's headed for Engineering.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52A})
(:Text {content:  Riker to La Forge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52A})
(:Text {content:  Engineering -- respond.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52A})
(:Text {content:  Sir -- someone in Engineering is attempting to override the security system lockout.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54A})
(:Text {content:  Riker to Worf. He's in Engineering...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54A})
(:Text {content:  Acknowledged, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54A})
(:Text {content:  Data -- I want you to stall Danar. Allow him to think he's succeeding.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54A})
(:Text {content:  As he bypasses each subsystem, I can reroute it without his knowledge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54A})
(:Text {content:  Make it so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54A})

(:Text {content:  Danar is extremely adept, sir. I am not certain which security measure he is attempting to circumvent. Sir, Danar has succeeded in restoring power to Shuttlebay Two.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54C})
(:Text {content:  I have overridden Danar's bypass; Shuttlebay Two is once again inactive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  Very good, Mister Data. And now we know where he's headed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55A})
(:Text {content:  He surprised us... came out of nowhere. I didn't know anyone could move that fast...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant, I am reading an open access panel... K-twelve, deck thirty.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Acknowledged.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Danar must have climbed the reactor core and gotten into a Jefferies tube. He could be anywhere.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  We believe he is attempting to reach Shuttlebay Two.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  That's twenty-five decks up from here... quite a climb... but I wouldn't put it past him...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  There is a full contingent of security waiting at all shuttlebays.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  You want my advice... double it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Reading another open access panel...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Security team to Jefferies tube J-four, deck fifteen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Security acknowledges. On our way.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Deck fifteen. Only a few decks below the shuttlebay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Captain, I find it highly unlikely that Danar is attempting to reach Shuttlebay Two.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Explain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  In our previous encounter, Danar employed a strategy of misdirection in an attempt to gain his objective.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  And you believe he's using the same tactic now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  He is aware that our sensors are unable to track him. Yet he seems to be purposely leaving a trail for us to follow.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  And where do you think he's headed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  I am afraid his true destination remains a mystery.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Captain, readings now indicate an open access panel... Jeffries tube N-eleven, deck thirty-eight.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61B})
(:Text {content:  He doubled back on us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61B})
(:Text {content:  The cargo bays?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61B})
(:Text {content:  Advise personnel on deck thirty-eight to stay out of all Cargo Bays.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61B})
(:Text {content:  They would appear to be empty, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61B})
(:Text {content:  Good. I want you to flood them with Anastazine.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61B})
(:Text {content:  Sensors show Anestazine concentration of seventy parts per million within the cargo bays.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63A})
(:Text {content:  That should have put our boy to sleep.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63A})
(:Text {content:  Restore normal environmental conditions, Mister Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63A})
(:Text {content:  Move in security teams, Mister Worf.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63B})
(:Text {content:  Acknowledged.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63B})
(:Text {content:  Worf to bridge. We have found no sign of the intruder. But there is a pressure suit missing from Cargo Bay Three.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  A pressure suit...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64A})
(:Text {content:  Could be he's planning to enter Shuttlebay Two from outside the Enterprise... bypassing the security guards.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64A})
(:Text {content:  Mister Worf --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64A})
(:Text {content:  Post security guards at all emergency airlocks on decks thirty-seven through thirty-nine...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir. I'll also cover the photon torpedo launchers... Danar may attempt to leave the ship that way. Worf out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69A})
(:Text {content:  You are cunning, Danar... you must have Klingon blood. But the battle is over.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 78})
(:Text {content:  My battle is never over.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 78})
(:Text {content:  Worf to bridge. I have Danar...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 78})
(:Text {content:  Explosion in Jefferies Tube section T-nine-five. All external sensors are inoperative.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80A})
(:Text {content:  Go to backup systems.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80A})
(:Text {content:  Unable to transfer control...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80A})
(:Text {content:  Worf to bridge. Danar has escaped. He used a phaser to power the cargo transporter. Coordinates indicate he beamed aboard the Angosian transport ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  Data, can you verify that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84A})
(:Text {content:  Negative. External sensors are still nonfunctioning.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84A})
(:Text {content:  Then we have no way to track him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84A})
(:Text {content:  That was his plan all along.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84A})

(:Text {content:  First officer's log, supplemental. We are continuing to repair damage to the ship's sensors following the escape of the Angosian prisoner Danar. He is still at large.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91})
(:Text {content:  Engineering, I'm getting readings at Tactical, are we back up...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91A})
(:Text {content:  That's affirmative, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91A})
(:Text {content:  Sweep the area, Mister Worf...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91A})
(:Text {content:  Captain, the prime minister is hailing us, priority one...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91A})
(:Text {content:  On screen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91A})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Prime Minister.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91B})
(:Text {content:  Captain, I've just been informed that Roga Danar has attacked the penal colony on Lunar Five...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91B})
(:Text {content:  Attacked it... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91B})

(:Text {content:  In our own police shuttle. Several of my people are wounded. Hundreds of prisoners are rioting. Some of them have escaped with Danar. We have reports they are headed for the capitol city... Captain, we are not suited to handle situations like this... that's why we created them...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91B})
(:Text {content:  We'll send an away team, Prime Minister... Picard out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91B})
(:Text {content:  Counselor Troi, Mister Data, Lieutenant Worf... you will accompany me to the planet...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91C})
(:Text {content:  My understanding is that these men were programmed to survive, is that correct?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91D})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91D})
(:Text {content:  And they will not kill unless their survival is at stake?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91D})
(:Text {content:  It is against their nature to do so, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91D})
(:Text {content:  Then let us hope they do not believe their survival is at stake.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91D})
(:Text {content:  Mister Worf, you are personally responsible for the captain's safety.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91D})
(:Text {content:  I understand, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91D})
(:Text {content:  I do not expect them to listen to reason... I loathe the idea of a violent confrontation, but we must be prepared...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  This is all you've brought... ? Where are your security men... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  We're not here to fight your wars, Prime Minister...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  They've been seen moving toward the center of the city... people are scared, Captain... don't you understand... ? They're dangerous.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  You are dangerous. They are only victims. You made them what they are. You asked them to defend your way of life... then you discarded them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  They were not happy here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  They were not welcome here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  It was the will of the people to resettle them...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  Nobody was pleased with the solution, Captain... but we had to act for the greater good...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  Prime Minister, if you have the skills to create a master soldier, can you not contradict the effect... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  The chemicals can be removed from their systems. But we're not convinced the psychological conditioning can be entirely reversed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  Have you tried?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  We've studied it thoroughly... even before the training began, we knew there would be problems reversing it. It was a risk we had to take.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  Did you reveal that \"risk\" to the men who volunteered for service?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  We were helping them to survive the, war, don't you understand? They needed these skills...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  They are your sons, your brothers. And you have turned your backs on them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  There are methods of treatment... until you try them, you can't know if they will work. Even a partial recovery would give them some peace...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  It was the will of the people...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  There was a referendum. The people weighed the costs involved. They chose the resettlement solution.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  Besides, we may need to use them again some day.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  Unless you are prepared to die, I'd suggest you put that down.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 99})
(:Text {content:  Do as he says.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 99})
(:Text {content:  Shoot us. Destroy us. Do what you have to do. But, by God, you will no longer ignore us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 100})

(:Text {content:  Danar, it appears to me that you are deliberately attempting to provoke a response... so you may justify your own attack on men who do not wish to fight...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 100})
(:Text {content:  Cowards...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 100})
(:Text {content:  Yes... But you are not programmed to murder cowards... and if they will not fight back, what will you do?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 100})
(:Text {content:  We will not go back...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 100})
(:Text {content:  You are programmed to survive... you can survive at the Lunar Five settlement...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 100})
(:Text {content:  Survival is not enough... to exist is not enough...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 100})
(:Text {content:  Roga, tell them what you want.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 100})
(:Text {content:  We want our lives back. We want to come home.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 100})
(:Text {content:  I'm not prepared to negotiate under a threat, Danar... but if you will put down your arms and return peacefully to Lunar Five... I would be willing...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 100})
(:Text {content:  Mister Prime Minister. Our respects, sir. But you'll have to force us... or try to.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 100})
(:Text {content:  Captain, you must do something, call your ship...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 100})
(:Text {content:  You're quite right, Prime Minister. Enterprise, prepare to beam the away team back.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 100})
(:Text {content:  At your command, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 100})
(:Text {content:  You can't leave us like this, Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 100})

(:Text {content:  We have everything we need for our report. Your prisoner has been returned to you. You have a decision to make... either try to force them back or welcome them home. In your own words, this is not our affair. We cannot interfere with the natural course of your society's development and I'd say it's likely to develop significantly during the next several minutes. It's been an interesting stay. When you are ready for membership in the Federation, we will be pleased to reconsider your application.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 100})
(:Text {content:  Four to beam up, Mister Riker.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 100})
(:Text {content:  Success, Captain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 102})

(:Text {content:  Number One, note in your report that if the government of Angosia survives the night, we will offer Federation assistance in the efforts to reprogram their veterans.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 102})
(:Text {content:  And if the government doesn't survive?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 102})
(:Text {content:  I have a feeling they will choose to.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 102})
(:Text {content:  Mister Crusher, set coordinates for the starbase at Lya Three.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 102})
(:Text {content:  Coordinates set, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 102})
(:Text {content:  Engage.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 102})
(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Stardate 43510.7. The Enterprise has put in at Rutia Four to deliver medical supplies following an outbreak of violent protests.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  Although non-aligned, the planet has enjoyed a long trading relationship with the Federation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  We've still got a few minutes before our next meeting...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Excuse me --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Doctor...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Put that thing away. I'm a doctor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Just lie still... don't try to move...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant, I need bandages... Disinfectant... something with alcohol in it ...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Doctor, it is not safe...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  That's an order, Mister Worf...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  There's a lot of bleeding, but it's not as bad as it looks. Don't be afraid.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  The Klingon is right. These Ansata... they're madmen... there could be another bomb. Clear this area. Everyone out of the plaza.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Doctor, a return to the Enterprise would be prudent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  This planet does have physicians...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Who aren't here yet. I am.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Thank you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Not at all, Doctor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Captain, there has been an incident.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Your security status?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Vulnerable, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Transporter Room Three, lock onto the away team, prepare to beam them back...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Sir, I recommended such a course, but there are several wounded people and Doctor Crusher...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Yes, I understand. Picard to Doctor Crusher...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Go ahead.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  I've been advised of your situation by Mister Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  I already know what you're going to say.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Doctor, will you at least allow me to...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  The longer we argue, the longer...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  You are endangering yourself and the away team...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
