(:Text {content:  Captain, right now, I'm trying to pull a life back into a wounded body with brandy and sleight of hand. I'm not going anywhere... Data and Worf don't have to stay. Crusher out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Transporter Room, do you have lock on the away team?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir. Shall I transport them?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  I wouldn't want to be in the Transporter Room to greet her.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Picard to Data. Hold your position until the Rutian medics arrive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Aye, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  The tricorder is not reading any other explosive devices in this vicinity...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  You don't understand... I'm a doc...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  A transporter would leave residual ionization in the air... but the tricorder readings found no trace after the incident...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  People don't just appear and disappear... there has to be some way to track her...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  We have been unable to detect the signal from her communicator. It has either been deactivated or she is being held in a shielded location.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Why... her?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Sir, I believe she was the intended target of the abduction.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Why would they want a Federation hostage? Their fight doesn't involve us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  It does now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Are you hungry? Do you want something to eat?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  I doesn't matter to me. You want to be hungry? Be hungry.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  What's your name?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})

(:Text {content:  You're a doctor on a Federation starship? I always wondered what it would be like to travel across the galaxy. It's not something I've exactly had time for.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  This isn't the best way to meet new people, is it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  If you want something, just ask for me -- Kyril Finn. They know me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  We have no reason to believe she's been hurt in any way...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  In fact, it's more likely that they will take good care of her... if they want to use her as a bargaining chip.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  A bargaining chip?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  The innocent become the pawns in a conflict like this, Wesley.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})

(:Text {content:  The Ansata separatists have been trying for generations to be freed from the rule of the Eastern Continent. If they can get the government to even acknowledge their demands, then kidnapping your mother will have served a purpose.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})

(:Text {content:  That may be what they are after. It may not. Frankly, I don't care. All I care about is getting her back, Wesley... In a few minutes, we're leaving to meet with the authorities...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Request permission to be on the away team, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})

(:Text {content:  No. You have an important job to do here. If we are to find your mother, we must have a way to trace the movements of these terrorists. I want you on the team that will investigate this new technology of theirs.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  I understand.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Report to Mister Data. Dismissed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  He needs your strength right now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  History has shown us that strength may be useless in the face of terrorism, Counselor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  What exactly is Ansata policy in regard to hostages?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  I doubt they have one. They don't usually take hostages.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})

(:Text {content:  These aren't people we're dealing with here. They're animals... Fanatics, who kill without remorse or conscience... who think nothing of murdering innocent people.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  They could just as easily have shot her where she stood...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Don't ask me to explain them. I can't. The atrocities I've seen...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})

(:Text {content:  And now they have this new device that makes them even more deadly. How do I combat an enemy who fails to register on any scanner until they're literally standing in front of you with a phaser pointed at your head?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  What can you tell us about this device?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Not much, really.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})

(:Text {content:  They first started using it two months ago. We've taken several of these off dead terrorists. Our people have looked at them... Nothing they can explain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  You mind if we take this with us... give our people a chance to study it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Not at all. And I'll put you in touch with our research people, if you wish.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  I appreciate your help.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps if we found ourselves in possession of some of that advanced Federation weaponry of yours it would shift the balance of power back to our favor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  That we cannot do for you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  No, of course not.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  I would like to leave Commander Riker to assist in your search for Doctor Crusher.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  If you like...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  You don't sound very optimistic.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  I know my enemy, Commander... They don't leave much room for optimism.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  As before, Finn enters with a plate of food. Same line})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Relax, I'm just going to...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Come on. Eat something. What's the point of not eating? You're the only one who suffers. Do I look like it's bothering me? Okay, it's bothering me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  No forks. Sorry.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Did I mention my name is Finn? And you're... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  I need a doctor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  There are doctors on Rutia.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  I need someone better... I heard you were here from the Federation flagship and I knew you had to be...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  How did you know that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  I heard. Now you'll help me. Just like you help them...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  What are you talking about?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Your ship carries medical supplies for them... for the other side... why does the Federation ally itself with the Rutians...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  We didn't... all we did was to bring...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Medical supplies...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  People were hurt...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  I know. I hurt them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  You're finished eating. Get up.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Get up.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  I have... a son.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  You'll be with him again, Doctor. I see no reason to kill you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  I need instruments from my ship to diagnose something like this...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  You think if I allowed you to call your ship, they would transport your instruments... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})

(:Text {content:  When I inform the captain how serious the situation is, I'm sure he'll agree. I've told you, Finn, the Federation is not allied with Rutians... we came on an errand of mercy...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  And since the Federation does not wish to take sides, he will send you the medical supplies we need.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Absolutely.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  I anticipated your needs.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  These are Federation supplies... we just delivered them to the medical dispensary this morning...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  I heard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  You're telling me all these people belong to the Ansata?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})

(:Text {content:  Not really. We suspect the organization itself only consists of some two hundred members. There are over five thousand names on this list. Citizens we know to be sympathetic to their cause. They pass along weaponry and information. March in pro-Ansata demonstrations... participate in general strikes.. or the occasional riot.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  How did all of this ever get started?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  We denied them independence. That gave them a noble cause... seventy years ago. And now it's just an excuse for more violence.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  You hate them as much as they hate you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Believe it or not I always considered myself moderate.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  What changed your mind?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Being stationed here the last six months. Watching the body count grow. The three assassination attempts on my life.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  I can see where that could affect your point of view.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})

(:Text {content:  But I guess the event that really opened my eyes took place only a few days after my arrival. A terrorist bomb destroyed a shuttlebus... sixty school children. There were no survivors.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})

(:Text {content:  The Ansata claimed it was a mistake. That their intended target was a police transport. As if that made everything all right. That day I vowed to put an end to terrorism in this city. And I will.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  The boy just looks at her curiously.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  They're dying.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27A})
(:Text {content:  I'm seeing a complicated set of conditions... their DNA is warped somehow; it's disrupting their entire cellular chemistry...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27A})
(:Text {content:  You can't do anything?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27A})
(:Text {content:  I can make them more comfortable. That's all. The damage is too extensive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27A})
(:Text {content:  If I could detect the condition earlier...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27A})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps. I don't know. What happened to them...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27A})
(:Text {content:  It's the inverter.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27A})
(:Text {content:  It has given our cause a new life. But asks for our lives in return.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27A})
(:Text {content:  What does it do?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27A})
(:Text {content:  We transport through a dimensional shift that the Rutian sensors can't trace.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27A})
(:Text {content:  Dimensional shifting? You can't do that with humanoid tissue.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27A})
(:Text {content:  There are risks... the designers warned us... but it works.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27A})
(:Text {content:  You're showing the same distorted readings. Not as severe as the others but --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27A})
(:Text {content:  Doesn't matter.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27A})
(:Text {content:  It does if it kills you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27A})
(:Text {content:  Don't you know? A dead martyr's worth ten posturing leaders.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27A})
(:Text {content:  A subspace field coil with an isolated power source... curious...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  How could something this small manage to get them anywhere?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Hey, guys... look at this...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  The Rutian team picked up a faint nuclear vibration during the terrorist movements...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Nuclear vibration...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  That could possibly indicate subspace transition rebound during transport...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})

(:Text {content:  Wait a minute... computer, call up files on... what was it called... We spent an hour on it in my astral physics course last year... folded space transport...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Alternate dimensions...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Are you referring to the Elway Theorem?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Yes... computer, files on the Elway Theorem... what if they're moving inter-dimensionally?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  But the Elway Theorem proved to be entirely inaccurate... all research was abandoned by the mid- twenty-third century...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Data, look at it... the faint nuclear vibration is consistent... and Elway used an isolated field coil just like this one.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  It would be untraceable by any standard sensing device.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  But it was proven to be fatal. To use this technology would be an irrational act.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  We may well be dealing with irrational people, Data. Is there a way to trace this... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  With an adaptive subspace echogram, maybe... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  If anyone is willing to transport in this manner, Captain, they would suffer significant internal damage which could be detected.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  And it sounds as though they might require the services of... a doctor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  This is no way to live.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  For us or them?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  For both of you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  I know it's not pretty, Riker. But this is what terrorism has done to this city.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  There must be a better way than this to deal with it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})

(:Text {content:  I know my methods seem harsh but believe me, they're gentle compared to my predecessors. Suspects would be brought into police headquarters and... mysteriously vanish. I put a stop to that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  And what happened to this predecessor of yours?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  He was murdered.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Are you going to tell me that boy's a threat?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  It's possible. That shuttlebus I told you about... the bomb was set by a teenager.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  And in a world where children blow up children... everyone's a threat.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  You should be drawing, not killing people.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  I can do both.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  How can you have such a casual attitude toward killing?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  I take my killing very seriously, Doctor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  You are an idealist...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  I live in an ideal culture... there is no need for your kind of violence... we've proven that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Your origins on Earth are from the American continent, are they not?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  North America.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  I have read your history books. This is a war for independence. I am no different than your own George Washington...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Washington was a military general. He was not a terrorist.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Doctor, the difference between a general and terrorist is only the difference between winners and losers. You win, you're called a general. You lose...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  You are killing innocent people... Can't you see the immorality of what you're doing... or have you killed so often, you've become blind to it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})

(:Text {content:  How much innocent blood has been spilled for the cause of freedom in the history of your Federation, Doctor? How many good and noble societies have bombed civilians in war? Wiped out whole cities. And now that you enjoy the comfort that has come from their battles, their killing... you frown on my immorality... ? Doctor, I am willing to die for my freedom. And, in the finest tradition of your own great civilization, I'm willing to kill for it too.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  All right you can go.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  If you want, I could become more persuasive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  No.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  You're Katik Shaw, the waiter from the Lumar Cafe. You witnessed both the explosion and the kidnapping.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  I saw nothing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  We are aware of your ties with the Ansata... For all we know you planted the bomb yourself... Where have they taken her?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  I don't know what you're talking about.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  I've had enough of this.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  I want you to take a message back to your people. Tell them the Federation is willing to negotiate for the release of Doctor Crusher.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Riker... !})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  She's a Starfleet officer. That makes her my responsibility.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Your side has demands, we're willing to listen to them. We want her back. It's as simple as that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  I don't think it's necessary to detain this gentleman any longer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Get out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  I should have him followed, but we'll try it your way.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Is that what you want?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})

(:Text {content:  What I want is to go home. Back to my own country. To leave behind the roundups, the interrogations, the bodies lying in the street. To be able to walk without bodyguards, and not have to jump at every unexpected noise. That's what I want Riker.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})

(:Text {content:  The dimensional jump creates a subspace pressure modulation, Captain. By setting up a magnetosphere faint echogram that can monitor each of their movements, we may be able to collect enough data to trace their power source.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Can you estimate the number of jumps it will take?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Dimensional shifting is such an unstable procedure that I cannot say.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})

(:Text {content:  Captain, I am finding it difficult to understand many aspects of Ansata conduct. Much of their behavioral norm would be defined by my program as unnecessary and unacceptable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  And by my... \"program\" as well, Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})

(:Text {content:  But, if that is so, Captain, why are their methods often successful? I have been reviewing the history of armed rebellion and it appears that terrorism is an effective way to promote political change.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  I have never subscribed to the theory that political power flows from the barrel of a gun, Data...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})

(:Text {content:  In most instances, you would be correct. But there are numerous examples where it was successful... the independence of the Mexican State from Spain, the Irish Unification of 2024, the Kenzie Rebellion...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Yes, I'm aware of them...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Then, would it be accurate to say that terrorism is acceptable when the options for peaceful settlement have been foreclosed?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Data, we cannot condone violence.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Even in response to violence?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  These are questions that mankind has been struggling with since creation. I am afraid your confusion, Data... is only human.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Everyone is being rounded up.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Because of her?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  The Federation wants to negotiate her release...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Rutian police to fill up the detention cells...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  A Starfleet officer is working with the director. He wants a meeting with you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  I'm sure he does.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Your Federation colleagues have engineered mass arrests to pressure me into releasing you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  I'm sure you've misunderstood...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  They are working with the police. He's seen it with his own eyes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  All they want is to get me back safely.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  I'm not going to release you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  I need you here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  To find a way to reverse the effects of the dimensional shift... ? I can do that right now. Stop using it. Finn, I have a life, a son who needs me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  He is on the ship?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  I am sorry he is on the ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  No...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  They have joined forces with the Rutians against us...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  We are not your enemy...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})

(:Text {content:  They are more valuable to me than an enemy. For seventy years we've been shouting, and no one's heard us. Destroy the Federation flagship... someone will listen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Please...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  They are the ones who interfered. They brought medical supplies. They organized mass arrests. They are killing your son, not me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Please, don't do this, Finn. I'll do anything you ask.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  I had a son, too. He was thirteen when he died in detention.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Intruder alert deck twelve...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  I've got a subspace reflection. It's a dimensional shift...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Red Alert. Sound general quarters.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Security to Engineering.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  Intruders in Engineering...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Casualties reported on deck twelve. Sickbay is responding.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Seal off all decks... lock on transporters to intruder signals.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Intruder signals unstable, Captain, I cannot lock on...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  They are moving inter-dimensionally... neither the transporters nor forcefields will be able to contain them, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Explosive charge on the main warp chamber...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Transporter room three, lock on the explosive device and energize.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  It's scrambling the sensors, Captain... I can't pinpoint it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Begin emergency evacuation... prepare for saucer separation... Mister La Forge, can you remove the charge from the engine core...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Stand by... I'm trying...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  They've got it locked on somehow... hold on...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Got it. Transporter Room, stand by to lock on my signal and transport two kilometers off the starboard nacelle.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  His signal... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  Transporter Room, now...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Commander La Forge. Report.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Transport complete...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  I have a man down.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  More subspace reflections...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Can you calibrate their destination?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  No, sir, the readings are --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Transporter Room. Code one evacuation: Picard. Transporter Room...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Worf is recovering in Sickbay. The wound was not severe.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Dead and injured?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Three dead, four wounded.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Another millisecond, and there would have been a big dust cloud orbiting Rutia instead of the Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Why. I just asked if they would talk...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  You have your answer, Riker.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Sir, the next time the Ansata use the dimensional jump we should be able to get a fix on their power source.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Worf went down... I don't know if he's alive or dead... there were other casualties...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Was... Wes... on the bridge...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Yes...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  He took cover... I didn't see any more than that... Are you all right?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  They needed a doctor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Side effects of their transport?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  We're getting closer to tracing their movements... actually, it was Wesley who put us onto this dimensional jumping of theirs...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  He's been extraordinary throughout this. He'll make a fine officer, Beverly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  He's had good role models...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  I'm sorry. If I'd just returned to the ship...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  I could have had you beamed up.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  You wouldn't dare.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  I would and I should have.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Without my permission...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  If you won't follow orders...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  If you give reasonable orders, I'll obey reasonable orders...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Doctor, I will be the judge of reason when it comes to my orders...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  There aren't any exits to the surface.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Then the only way out is by transporter or the dimensional jump.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  A mode of travel I'd encourage you to avoid. It's killing them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  They're mad.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  I don't know any more. The difference between a madman and a committed man willing to die for a cause... it's begun to blur over the last couple days...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Beverly, I don't have to warn you about the psychological impact of being a hostage...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  I know. I understand that. But their leader, Finn, he's not what you'd expect...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  No, he's certainly not what I'd expect. Without cause or reason, his little band of outlaws has attacked my ship...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  But he did have reasons... the medical supplies, the arrests... Jean-Luc, if we really examine our role in this...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Beverly, you are arguing for a man who may have murdered your son.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  I didn't kill your son... Beverly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})

(:Text {content:  We were not able to destroy the ship. We had to settle for him... She wouldn't even tell me her name. How many days? I call her \"Doctor.\" Are you hungry? Do you want something to eat?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  You've made a grave miscalculation...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  Oh?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  You've assaulted a Federation starship, killed and wounded members of her crew, kidnapped two officers... do you not expect a response?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  On the contrary, I'm counting on it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  You want Federation involvement?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})

(:Text {content:  Captain, there's a lot to admire in the Federation, but there's a hint of moral cowardice in your dealings with non-aligned planets. You do business with a government that's crushing us. And then you say you aren't involved. But of course you are. You just don't want to get dirty.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  You accuse us of cowardice while you plant bombs in shadows...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})

(:Text {content:  I've been fighting the only war I can against an intractable enemy. Now, I'm fighting a big war against a much more powerful adversary. Can't you see how that helps me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  I'm afraid I don't.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  He has added a chair to the negotiating table.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})

(:Text {content:  You added the chair, Captain. I am simply forcing you to sit in it. The Federation will quickly tire of our little war... they will want you back... they will want to get as far away from Rutia as they can. And I will not make it easy. Eventually, the Federation will force the government to make concessions. And then a few more. And then a few more. Until we can finally reach an honorable agreement that saves face for all sides. Except we win.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  You understand I will not cooperate in any way...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  You have already cooperated, Captain... just by coming here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  I'm not here to hurt you. Just hear what I have to say.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})

(:Text {content:  Your people are safe. How long they stay that way depends on you. We demand an embargo and trade sanctions levied against Rutia. The Federation will blockade the planet... allow no ships in or out. This will continue until the government of Rutia consents to talks mediated by a Federation counsel. You have twelve hours to make your decision.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Got it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  We've pinpointed the Ansata base some three hundred kilometers from the city, on the southern tip of the continent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  Sensors indicate it is located thirty meters below ground, implying a cave or cavern-like dwelling.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  Any passages leading to the surface?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  Our readings show no evidence of any, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  Then whatever light they have must be artificially generated.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  If we can shut it down, you could use the confusion to find your people.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  Request permission to join the rescue party, sir. I owe it to the captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  Permission granted.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  Mister Data... You have the bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  Commander Riker?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  Riker is all too aware of the boy's concerns.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  We'll bring them home, Wes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  You're glad to see your captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65A})
(:Text {content:  Yes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65A})
(:Text {content:  I may have to kill him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65A})
(:Text {content:  I just wanted to warn you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65A})
(:Text {content:  Finn, he can help you... he is very influential...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65A})
(:Text {content:  He will not help us...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65A})
(:Text {content:  If you could convince him that your cause is...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65A})
(:Text {content:  You could convince him perhaps. Not I.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65A})
(:Text {content:  I've talked to him. I'll... try...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65A})
(:Text {content:  If our places were reversed, I would expect to die...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65A})
(:Text {content:  Your places would never be reversed. He wouldn't forcibly abduct you... or play games with your life. He would treat you with respect...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65A})
(:Text {content:  I have treated you with respect...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65A})
(:Text {content:  You've scared the hell out of me, Finn. You've controlled me through fear... just like you've tried to control this whole continent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65A})
(:Text {content:  You haven't tasted real fear yet, Doctor...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65A})
(:Text {content:  Is that the best you can do? Is fear the only weapon you have...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65A})
(:Text {content:  No, but it's a good one.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65A})
(:Text {content:  You know what scares me the most, Finn? It scares me to think that you might win this fight and gain real power.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65A})
(:Text {content:  Doctor... I don't want you to fear me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65A})
(:Text {content:  How dangerous would another ride through the inverter be to us?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  I'm not sure. But I don't want you to start thinking...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  It is our obligation to think of escape...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  He's prepared to kill you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  A fine reason to escape... Do you think you've gained his confidence?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Indeed, you have... and a bit more... this might prove to be an advantage, Doctor...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Jean-Luc, there are some things... I want to say... just in case we don't get out of this...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Have they found us... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Finn...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  He's dead.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73B})
(:Text {content:  You didn't have to kill him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73C})

(:Text {content:  As a prisoner he would have been a focus for violence as his followers tried to free him. Now, he's a martyr, but the death toll may be lower -- at least in the short term. An imperfect solution for an imperfect world.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73C})
(:Text {content:  Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73C})
(:Text {content:  No more killing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73F})
(:Text {content:  Already another one to take his place... it never ends.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73F})
(:Text {content:  He could have killed you. He didn't. Maybe the end begins with one boy putting down a gun.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73F})
(:Text {content:  I hear I owe my rescue to you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 78})
(:Text {content:  I was just part of the team. It's good to have you back. Both of you. Sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 78})
(:Text {content:  Take us out of orbit, Mister Crusher.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 78})
(:Text {content:  At your convenience.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 78})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Stardate 43539.1. We have moved into orbit around Bre'el Four to investigate a potentially catastrophic threat to the population from a descending asteroidal moon...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  The satellite's trajectory continues to deteriorate, Captain... This orbit will bring it to within five hundred kilometers of the planet's surface.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  We're predicting the atmospheric drag will bring it down on the next orbit.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Have you been able to find any explanation for this?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  No, Doctor... it is a most unusual phenomenon.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Won't the moon disintegrate prior to impact?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  No, it has a ferrous crystaline structure and will be able to withstand tidal forces, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Couldn't we just blow it into harmless chunks?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  The total mass of the moon would remain the same, Commander. And the impact of thousands of fragments would spread destruction over an even wider area.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  How long before impact...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Twenty-nine hours... projected somewhere on the western continent. It would destroy an area eight hundred kilometers in radius.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  That damage would be insignificant, Captain, compared to the seismic repercussions... massive landquakes, and tsunami...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  The force would raise a cloud of dust around the planet, leading to a significant temperature reduction. We could be looking at our own ice age.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Commander La Forge, is there any way the Enterprise might be able to coax this satellite back where it belongs... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})

(:Text {content:  We'd need to apply a delta-vee of at least four kilometers per second. Even with warp power to the tractor beam, it would mean exceeding recommended impulse engine output by at least forty-seven percent. It'd be like an ant pushing a tricycle... a slim chance at best...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Given a choice between slim and none, I'll take slim any day...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Make it so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Worf, signal all ships in this sector to rendezvous and join us in relief efforts.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  We'll keep you informed of our progress. Picard out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Can you give us any more, Geordi... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Not without burning out the tractor beam emitter... the circuits are already beyond their thermal limit.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Delta-vee is ninety-two meters per second. The mass is too great. We are having an effect but it is negligible.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  What is that...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Unable to identify source...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Impulse engines passing saftey limits. We're seconds from automatic shutdown.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Reduce engines... tractor beam off...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Worf, what the hell do the sensors show... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  The sound is not registering, Commander...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Red Alert.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Q.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  FADE IN:})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, supplemental. We are no closer to finding a solution to the deteriorating orbit of the Bre'el Four moon... but with the arrival of Q, we now have a good idea of the cause.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  We couldn't drive the tractor emitters hard enough, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  The beam was flexing, and it was impossible to transfer enough kinetic energy to the moon...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Our options?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})

(:Text {content:  We did everything by the book and a little extra... we need more time or more power and we're short on both. I'll take a look and see if there are any rules I haven't broken.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Keep me advised.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  We know you're behind this, Q...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  It's not at all my best color... Behind what... what are you blathering about, Riker...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  What kind of twisted pleasure does it give you to bring terror into their lives... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  What? Whose lives?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  The millions of people down there who are watching as their moon falls out of the sky...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})

(:Text {content:  I haven't the vaguest idea what you're talking about... and I have a much more serious problem... I am no longer a member of the continuum. My superiors have decided to punish me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  And punish us as well, it seems...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  They said I've spread too much chaos through the universe and they have stripped me of all my powers.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  You do not believe me... ? Would I humiliate myself like this?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  If it served your purposes, yes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  It is the truth. I stand before you, defrocked. I'm condemned to be a member of this lowest of species. A normal, imperfect, lumpen human being.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Turning you into a human was part of their punishment... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})

(:Text {content:  No, it was my request. I could have chosen to exist as a Markoffian fire lizard or a Belzoidian flea, anything I wished... so long as it was mortal, but I only had a fraction of a second to mull and I chose... \"this\"... and asked them to bring me here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Because in all the universe you are the closest thing I have to a friend, Jean-Luc.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  He is reading as fully human.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  I'm even sensing an emotional presence in him. I would normally describe it as being terrified.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  How rude.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Q, what is it you want...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Your compassion... All right... Sanctuary on your ship... dreary as that may sound to both of us...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Return the moon to its orbit.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  I have no powers. Q the ordinary.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Q, the liar. Q, the misanthrope.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Q, the miserable. Q, the desperate. What must I do to convince you people...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Die.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Very clever, Worf. Eat any good books lately?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Fine. You wish to be treated as a human?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Absolutely.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Mister Worf, throw him in the brig.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Delighted, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Jean-Luc... you can't do this...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  You will walk or I will carry you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Given the options -- I'll walk.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  You've disappointed me, Jean- Luc... I'm very disa...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})

(:Text {content:  It was a mistake... I never should have picked human... I knew it the minute I said it. To think of the future in this shell... forced to cover myself with fabric because of outdated human morality, to say nothing of being too hot or too cold, growing feeble as the years pass, losing my hair, catching a disease, being ticklish, sneezing, having an itch, a pimple, bad breath, having to bathe...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18A})
(:Text {content:  Too bad.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18A})

(:Text {content:  \"Klingon\"... I should have said \"Klingon\". In my heart, I am a Klingon, Worf... So you understand I could never survive in confinement... The universe has been my back yard... this is cruel and unusual punishment. As a fellow Klingon, if you would speak to the captain on my behalf, I would be eternally grateful... which doesn't mean as much as it used to, I admit.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Be quiet or disappear back where you came from.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19A})

(:Text {content:  I can't disappear any more than you can win a beauty contest. If I ask a very simple question, do you think you can grasp it without troubling your intellect too much... ready? If I still had powers, would I permit you to lock me away?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19A})
(:Text {content:  You have fooled us too often, Q.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19A})
(:Text {content:  Perspicacity incarnate. Please don't feel compelled to tell me the story of \"the boy who cried Worf\"?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19A})
(:Text {content:  Computer, activate forcefield.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19A})

(:Text {content:  I demand to be let out of here, do you hear me? You will deactivate this cell immediately. \"Romulan\". I should have said \"Romulan\", you Klingon goat!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19A})
(:Text {content:  The question is -- what sort of jaded game is he playing this time?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Maybe he just wants a big laugh. He'll take Bre'el Four to the edge of disaster, then pull the moon back.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Or he may have nothing to do with it at all.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Do you honestly believe Q is telling the truth?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Oh, I agree that is highly unlikely. But we have to proceed with our current dilemma as though Q is powerless to prevent it, don't we?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  As he sits, and watches us struggle...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  I don't see much choice. Mister Worf, hail the Bre'el Four science station...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  They're standing by, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  I'm sorry to report that our first attempt to restore the moon to its proper orbit has failed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  We have less than twenty-five hours before impact...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Our chief engineer is working on ways to reinforce our tractor beam.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  There is hope... but if you have an evacuation plan...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  We have already started moving people from the coastal areas of the western continent...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  We will make another attempt shortly... Picard out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  I gotta tell you Geordi is not optimistic...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  What the devil... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Data... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Sensors are showing broad band emissions... including Berthold rays...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Lethal?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})

(:Text {content:  No, Commander. Overall exposure is under seventy-five rems. Very low intensity. More like a soft medical scan... I would speculate that we are being probed...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  By whom?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  The sensors cannot identify point of origin. It seems to be coming from all around us...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  FADE IN:})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22B})
(:Text {content:  Ah, you've come to apologize... how nice... no offense taken... all is forgiven...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Enough. I want to know exactly what is going on, Q...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  But Jean-Luc, how can I know what is going on? I have been in this dungeon of yours, helpless and alone... bored to tears...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  We have a moon that is inexplicably falling out of orbit... and now the ship has been probed with Berthold radiation...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})

(:Text {content:  When? I wasn't aware of it. Truthfully, Jean-Luc. I have been entirely preoccupied by a most frightening experience of my own. A couple of hours ago, I started realizing this body was no longer functioning properly... I felt weak, the life oozing out of me... I could no longer stand... and then I lost consciousness...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  You fell asleep...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  It's terrifying... how can you stand it day after day...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  One gets used to it...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  What other dangers are in store for me... I am totally unprepared for this... I need guidance...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  I am unwilling to play along, Q. If you must keep up the charade, you will do it alone...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Jean-Luc... wait...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  This is getting on my nerves... now that I have nerves...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})

(:Text {content:  You have a moon with a deteriorating orbit... I've known moons across the universe... big ones, small ones... I'm an expert... I can help you with this one... if you let me out of here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Q, we're dealing with millions of lives... if you have the power to...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  I have no power... But I still have the knowledge... locked in this puny brain. You cannot afford to dismiss that advantage, can you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Mister Data, please report to Detention Cell Three. Computer, remove the forcefield. If this is what I must do to save those lives, I will.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})

(:Text {content:  You will not be left alone for one moment while you are on this ship, Q. If you are human, which I seriously doubt, I suggest you work hard to earn our welcome.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Oh, I'll earn your welcome. You only dislike me. There are others in the cosmos that truly despise me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  You are hereby assigned to Q for the remainder of his stay... escort him to Mister La Forge in Engineering...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Can I have a Starfleet uniform...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  What are you looking at?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  I was considering the possibility that you are telling the truth... and really are human.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  It's the ghastly truth, Mister Data... I can now stub my toe with the best of them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  An irony. It would mean you have achieved in disgrace what I have always aspired to be.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Humans are such commonplace little creatures. They roam the galaxy looking for something, and they don't even know what it is.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23A})
(:Text {content:  The human race has an enduring desire for knowledge, and for new opportunities to improve itself...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23A})
(:Text {content:  There is certainly room for improvement. The truth is, Data, they are a minor species in the grand scheme. Not worth your envy...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23A})
(:Text {content:  Oh, I do not feel envy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23A})
(:Text {content:  Good.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23A})

(:Text {content:  I feel nothing at all. That is part of my dilemma. I have the curiosity of the human... but there are some questions I will never be able to answer... what is it like to laugh or to cry or to experience any human emotion... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23A})
(:Text {content:  Believe me, life's a lot simpler without feelings... a lot simpler...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23A})

(:Text {content:  The moon will hit its perigee in ten hours... we match its trajectory... increase emitter coolant rate so we can apply continuous warp-equivalent power nine to the tractor beam. We can keep pushing it for nearly seven hours and I think that might do it... but there's a problem...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  The Enterprise will be dangerously close to the atmosphere.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  That's the problem.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  This is incredible.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  You see something here, Q?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  I think I just hurt my back. I'm feeling pain. I don't think I like it. What's the right thing to say... \"ow\"?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Yeah...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Ow. I don't think I can straighten up...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Medical assistance to Engineering...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Q, I've got a few people down on Bre'el Four who are gonna be hurt if we don't...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Yes, with your marvelous plan, you will not only tear the moon to pieces... but your precious ship as well.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  You have a better idea... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  I would certainly begin by examining the cause and not the symptom.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  We've done that, Q... and there's no way to determine...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})

(:Text {content:  This is obviously the result of a large celestial object passing through at near right angles to the plane of the star system... probably a black hole...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Can you recommend a way to counter the effect?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Simple. Change the gravitational constant of the universe.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  What... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Change the gravitational constant of the universe. And thereby alter the mass of the asteroid...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Redefine gravity. How am I supposed to do that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  You just do it. Where is that doctor anyway... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Geordi is trying to say that changing the gravitational constant of the universe is beyond our capabilities.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Oh. In that case, never mind.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Ah, Doctor Crusher, Starfleet shipped you back into exile, I see...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Q says he has hurt his back...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Uh huh.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Well, I wouldn't believe it if I didn't see it with my own eyes, it... according to this, you have classic back trauma, muscle spasms...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  I've been under a lot of stress. Family problems...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  You won't get any sympathy from me. You've been a pain in our backside often enough...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Your bedside manner is admirable, Doctor. I'm sure your patients recover quickly just to get away from you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  You know, it might work...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})

(:Text {content:  We can't change the gravitational constant of the universe but if we wrap a low level warp field around that moon, we could reduce its gravitational constant... make it lighter so we can push it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Glad I could help. Ow... I think.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Now what?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Something's wrong with my stomach...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  It hurts?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  It's making noise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Maybe you're hungry.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  What do I ask for? I've never eaten before.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  The choice of meal is determined by individual tastes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  What do you like?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Although I do not require sustenance, I occasionally ingest a semi-organic nutrient suspension in a silicon-based liquid medium.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Is it good?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  It would be more accurate to say it is \"good for me\" as it lubricates my bio-functions.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  It doesn't sound too appealing. What else is there?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  A wide variety of items... the replicator can make anything you desire.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  How am I supposed to know what I desire?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  I have observed that many food selections are influenced by the mood of the person ordering...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  I'm in a dreadful mood... get me something appropriate...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  When Counselor Troi is in an unhappy mood, she often has something chocolate...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Chocolate...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  For example, a hot fudge sundae. I cannot speak from personal experience, but I have seen it often has a profound psychological impact.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  I'll have ten hot fudge sundaes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  I have never seen anyone eat ten.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  I'm in a really bad mood. And since I've never eaten before, I should be very hungry.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  This... is not a moment I've been looking forward to.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  I heard you were drummed out of the continuum.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  I prefer to look at it as a significant career change.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  Just one of the boys, huh?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  One of the boys with an IQ of two thousand and five.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  The Captain and much of the crew are not yet convinced that he is truly human.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  Is that right?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  AAAH...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  He's human.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  This is a dangerous creature. You have no idea... how could Picard allow her to join the crew and not me...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  It must be frightening... totally defenseless... after being omnipotent all those centuries...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  I'm warning you... I still have friends in high places...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  another... teasing them like helpless animals... delighting at the fear of your victims...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  From now on, I'll do missionary work...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  That would be a very noble cause, Q.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  You could learn a few things from this one.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  Sure, the robot who teaches the course in humanities.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  I am an android, not a robot.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  I beg your pardon.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  Get used to it, Q.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  What?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  Begging. You're a pitiful excuse for a human and the only way you're going to survive is by the charity of others.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  I'm not hungry.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  Captain, sensors are picking up a cloud of energetic plasma... bearing three-four-one mark two-zero... range twelve kilometers and closing...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  On screen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Energy patterns are reading as highly organized...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  A lifeform?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  Mister Worf, attempt to make contact...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  Receiving a signal, sir... on speaker...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  Computer, analysis of signal...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  Signal patterns indicate intelligence. Unable to derive necessary referants to establish translation matrix.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  Calamarain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30B})
(:Text {content:  We're being hit by a field of energetic tachyons... penetrating the hull... location... deck ten... forward...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30C})
(:Text {content:  Red alert.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30C})
(:Text {content:  Increase power to shields...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30C})
(:Text {content:  Increasing power by twenty percent...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30C})
(:Text {content:  No effect...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30C})
(:Text {content:  Increasing to forty percent...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30C})
(:Text {content:  Still no effect...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30C})
(:Text {content:  Adjusting shield harmonics... Diverting power to the forward grids.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30E})
(:Text {content:  The added harmonics are blocking the tachyon field.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30E})
(:Text {content:  HELP ME. SOMEBODY HELP ME...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30F})
(:Text {content:  How the mighty have fallen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30F})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, supplemental. We have sustained light damage from an attack by an alien species known as the Calamarain. They apparently have a grievance with Q... no doubt one of many lifeforms that do.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  The Calamarain are not very hospitable creatures. They exist as swirls of ionized gas.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  What did you do to them to motivate such a vengeance?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Nothing bizarre. Nothing grotesque.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  You tormented them --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})

(:Text {content:  A subjective term, Riker. One creature's torment, is another creature's delight. They simply have no sense of humor... a character flaw with which you can personally identify.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  I say we turn him over to them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Oh, my mistake... you do have a sense of humor... a dreadful one.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  I'm serious.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Of course. You knew this would happen, didn't you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  I assure you one cannot anticipate the Calamarain, Picard... they're intelligent, yes... but undependable... very flighty...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})

(:Text {content:  But you have so many enemies, Q, of various shapes and sizes... certainly you must have been concerned that once you became mortal... some of them might try to look you up...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  It occurred to me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  With all your chatter about \"friendship\", the real reason you're here is for protection, isn't it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})

(:Text {content:  You're so bright, Jean-Luc. Yes, of course, you're correct. I know human beings. You are all sopping over with compassion and forgiveness. The human race can't wait to absolve almost any offense. It's an inherent weakness in the breed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  What you call weakness, some of us would call strength.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Call it what you want, Picard. I know you'll protect me even though I've tortured you now and again...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Fighting off every species you've insulted would be a full time mission. And it's not the one I signed up for.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Indeed. Human or not, I want no part of you. We will deposit you at the first starbase. Let them deal with you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  But I can be a valuable member of your team, Picard...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  As though you have the faintest notion about team-work or cooperation...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  I can learn. I'm human.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Then I suggest you apply to Starfleet Academy...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Don't use me as a reference.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  He has provided important theoretical guidance for Geordi's analysis of the Bre'el satellite, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  It seems you have an advocate, Q.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  I am only stating a fact, Counselor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Mister La Forge, your status?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})

(:Text {content:  I've been putting together a program to extend the forward lobe of our warp field. The field coils are not designed to envelop such a large volume. But I'm attempting to modify their alignment parameters.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Maintaining field integrity will be difficult, Geordi.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  I think we can do it manually. The moon's reaching its perigee in fourteen minutes...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Mister Data, escort Q to Engineering... You will assist Mister La Forge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Mister Worf, hail the Bre'el Four science station.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Picard really thinks I can't cut it on his starship... I can do anything his little trained minions can do.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36A})

(:Text {content:  I do not perceive that your skills are doubted, Q. I believe the captain is more concerned with your ability to interact successfully with... his \"little trained minions\".})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36A})
(:Text {content:  Human interpersonal relationships are most complex... your experiences may not have adequately prepared you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36B})
(:Text {content:  I don't want human interpersonal relationships. I just want to prove to Picard that I'm indispensable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36B})
(:Text {content:  To function aboard a starship, or in any human activity, you will have to form relationships.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36B})
(:Text {content:  Why does this have to be so hard...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36B})
(:Text {content:  Of more immediate importance is your ability to work within groups...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36B})
(:Text {content:  I've never been any good in groups... it's difficult working in a group when you're omnipotent...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36B})
(:Text {content:  The tides reached ten meters on the last orbit. They are already beginning to swell again. We have a lot of frightened people down here, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Your moon has begun moving toward its perigee, Doctor... we are prepared to make our attempt...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})

(:Text {content:  Our population has already taken shelter... but I'm afraid no shelter will be adequate if you fail... Especially for the people on the western continent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Whatever the results, we know you've done your best, Picard. It's appreciated.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  I'll keep you advised, Doctor. Picard out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Captain, sensors are reading increased energy output from the Calamarain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  La Forge to bridge. The moon has reached its minimum orbital distance... it's time, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39A})
(:Text {content:  We'll have to lower shields...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39A})
(:Text {content:  Proceed. Mister Worf, keep a close eye on Q's friends out there...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39A})
(:Text {content:  Understood.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39A})
(:Text {content:  Okay, everyone, here's what we're going to do...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Q, everybody already knows what they're going to do, except for you... now here's what I need...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  La Forge, obviously my knowledge and experience exceed yours... by about a billion times... so if you'll just step aside gracefully...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Your experience will be most valuable to me if you can manually control the field integrity...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Don't be foolish. That's a waste of my talents...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Get to the controls or get the hell out of here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Data, you're my liason to the bridge... I'll need you with me...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Who does he think he is to give me orders...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Geordi thinks he is in command here... and he is correct.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Engineering, holding at station keeping, range six hundred and forty meters.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40A})
(:Text {content:  Containment fields to flight tolerance.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40A})
(:Text {content:  Warp core to ninety percent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40B})
(:Text {content:  Engage field coils. Tractor beam to stand-by. Field output... ? Field output... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40B})
(:Text {content:  Two-seventeen...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40B})
(:Text {content:  Impulse engines to full. Ready to engage tractor beam.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40B})
(:Text {content:  Lowering shields. Engage tractor beam.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40B})
(:Text {content:  Extending warp field forward.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42A})
(:Text {content:  Engineering, is that the forward limit?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42B})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Captain... we are unable to encompass the entire moon...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42B})
(:Text {content:  Do you recommend we proceed... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42B})
(:Text {content:  The two parts of the moon will have different inertial densities...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42B})
(:Text {content:  I can adjust the field symmetry to compensate...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42C})
(:Text {content:  I doubt it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42C})
(:Text {content:  You don't know what this ship can do, Mister... Yes, Captain... I think it still might work... increasing power to tractor beam and warp field...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42C})
(:Text {content:  And if you're wrong, the moon will crumble due to subspace stress... don't say I didn't warn...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42C})
(:Text {content:  Shut up, Q.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42C})
(:Text {content:  I will not be spoken to in this manner...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42C})
(:Text {content:  Data...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42C})
(:Text {content:  Q, I strongly advise that you return to your post.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42C})
(:Text {content:  Inertial mass of the moon has decreased to approximately two-point-five million metric tons...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42C})
(:Text {content:  It's working. We can move it. Firing impulse engines...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42C})
(:Text {content:  The moon's trajectory has moved point-three percent... point-four percent...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Emergency... shields up...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Disengage tractor beam...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Calamarain attacking...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Shields holding... tachyon field repelled...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Captain, the impact of the blast is pushing us into the upper atmosphere...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Hull temperature rising... two thousand degrees... two thousand five hundred degrees.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45C})
(:Text {content:  Moving to full impulse power... we've gotta get out of here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45C})
(:Text {content:  Calamarain are resuming attack...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45D})
(:Text {content:  They've overpowered the shields... hull penetration... deck thirty-six... Engineering...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45D})
(:Text {content:  Geordi, can you direct any more power to the shields... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45D})
(:Text {content:  We need all the power we have to get out of the atmosphere, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45E})
(:Text {content:  Try activating the structural integrity field.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45E})
(:Text {content:  It's not working. Structural field harmonics on manual.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45E})
(:Text {content:  Hull temperature falling, Geordi... we're in the clear...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45E})
(:Text {content:  Diverting power to forward section. Now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45E})
(:Text {content:  Data... Data... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45E})
(:Text {content:  What about me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45E})
(:Text {content:  FADE IN:})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45E})
(:Text {content:  The charge nearly knocked out his positronic net.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46C})
(:Text {content:  What can you do for him?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46C})
(:Text {content:  We'll try to discharge and reset the motor pathways, recouple autonomic nodes...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46C})
(:Text {content:  There's overpressure in his fluidic systems, thermal shock... If he was mortal, he'd be dead.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46C})
(:Text {content:  Let us not overstate matters here, Doctor... I am mortal and I survived...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46C})
(:Text {content:  The cheers are overwhelming.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46C})
(:Text {content:  You exceed your own standards of selfish preoccupation. Have you no concern for the officer who very probably saved your life?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46C})
(:Text {content:  Osmotic pressure still negative. Maybe if we by-passed the flow regulator...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46C})
(:Text {content:  It would be helpful if everybody just got out of here now...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46C})
(:Text {content:  We'll let you know as soon as there's anything to tell you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46C})
(:Text {content:  Geordi, the moon's trajectory... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46C})
(:Text {content:  All we did was buy ourselves another orbit at most... we can try again when it comes back to the perigee...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46C})
(:Text {content:  And when we drop our shields, the Calamarains go after Q again...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46C})
(:Text {content:  He's not worth it, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46C})
(:Text {content:  Come...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  You're right, of course. I am extraordinarily selfish. It's served me so well in the past...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  It will not serve you here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})

(:Text {content:  Don't be so hard on me, Jean-Luc. You've been mortal all your life. You know all about dying. I've never given it a second thought. Or a first thought for that matter. I could have been killed. If not for Data... that one, brief delay he created, I would have been gone. No more me. And nobody would have missed me, would they?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  And yet Data may have sacrificed himself for me. Why? Why would he risk his own life for mine?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  That is his special nature. He has learned the lessons of humanity well...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  I ask myself if I would have done the same for him. And I am forced to realize the answer is no. And I feel... I feel ashamed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})

(:Text {content:  I am not your father confessor. You will not receive absolution from me, Q. You have brought nothing but pain and suffering to my crew. And to this very moment, I am not entirely convinced that this is still not your latest attempt at a bad joke.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})

(:Text {content:  It is a bad joke. On me. I am the joke of the universe. The king who would be man.
