As I learn more and more about what it is to be human, I am more and more convinced that I will never make a good one. I just don't have what it takes, Jean-Luc. Without my powers, I'm frightened of everything. I'm a coward. I'm miserable. And I don't think I can go on this way.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  He's going to be all right.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  We're recalibrating his language circuits... he can't talk to us yet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})

(:Text {content:  There are creatures in the universe who consider you the ultimate achievement, android. No feelings, no emotions -- no pain. And yet you covet those qualities of humanity. Believe me, you are not missing anything. But if it means anything to you, Data... you are a better human than I.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Where's the Main Shuttlebay?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49A})
(:Text {content:  Main Shuttlebay is located on deck four.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49A})
(:Text {content:  Take me there...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49A})
(:Text {content:  An unscheduled shuttlecraft has just been launched.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  On Main Viewer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  Opening hailing frequency.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56A})
(:Text {content:  Frequency open.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56A})
(:Text {content:  Shuttle occupant. Identify yourself.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56A})
(:Text {content:  Don't try to talk me out of it, Jean-Luc.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56A})
(:Text {content:  Q? Return to the ship at once.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56A})
(:Text {content:  I just can't get used to following orders.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56A})
(:Text {content:  Captain, the plasma cloud is moving toward the shuttle.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56A})
(:Text {content:  It's easier this way. They won't bother you after I'm gone.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56A})
(:Text {content:  Engineering, prepare to extend shields...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56A})

(:Text {content:  Please, do not fall back on your tired cliche of charging to the rescue in the nick of time... I do not wish to be rescued... My life as a human being is a dismal failure. Maybe my death can have a little dignity.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56A})
(:Text {content:  There is no dignity in suicide...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56A})
(:Text {content:  Yes, I suppose you're quite right. The death of a coward. So be it. Anyway, as a human, I'd die of boredom.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56A})
(:Text {content:  This goes against all my better judgment... Transporter Room Three, lock on to Shuttle One... beam it back to it's bay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Aye, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Well, it's a perfectly good shuttlecraft...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Captain, unable to transport... For some reason, I can't lock on...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Worf, are you sensing any sort of interference from the Calamarain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  No, Commander, but they are continuing to move toward the shuttle.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Geordi, extend shields around Shuttle One...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Extending shields ... Commander... the shields are frozen...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69A})
(:Text {content:  Cause...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69A})
(:Text {content:  Unknown.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69A})
(:Text {content:  Lock on tractor beam...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69B})
(:Text {content:  Tractor beam is not functioning either...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69B})
(:Text {content:  What the hell is going on?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69B})
(:Text {content:  Not bad, Q. Not great. But not bad.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  Q...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  Sacrificing yourself for these humans... ? Do I detect a selfless act... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  You flatter me. I'm only trying to put a quick end to a miserable existence.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  What a dreadful color.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  What are you doing here?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  I've been keeping track of you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  Really? I always felt you were in my corner...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})

(:Text {content:  Actually, I was the one who got you kicked out... You're incorrigible, Q, a lost cause. I can't go to a single solar system without apologizing for you... and I'm tired of it...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  I wasn't the one who misplaced the entire Deltived asteroid belt...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})

(:Text {content:  This is not about me. I have better places to be. But, somebody had to keep an eye on you in case you still found a way to cause trouble... even as a member of this limited species...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  I hope I've kept you amused.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})

(:Text {content:  Barely. But these humans are rather interesting... I'm beginning to understand what you see in them. After all the things you've done, they're still intent on keeping you safe.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  A genetic weakness of the race.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  And they're still at it. They just tried to beam you back or whatever they call it... I stopped them...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  Well then, if the Calamarain will just hurry up and finish this, we'll get you on your way...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  No, I put them on hold too. There's still this matter of the selfless act...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  You and I both know that the Calamarain would have eventually destroyed the Enterprise to get to you... and that's really why you left...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  It was... a tiny bit selfless... wasn't it...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})

(:Text {content:  And there's my problem. I get back to the continuum and tell them you committed a selfless act just before the end... I'm gonna be tied up with questions and explanations for centuries...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  Q, I've learned my lesson...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  Remember who you're talking to here... all knowing, all seeing... Fine. You have your powers back. Try to stay out of trouble...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  And they wanted to destroy me, did they?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  If you think I tormented you in the past, my little friends -- wait until you see what I do with you now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  Q --?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  I was just seeing if you were still watching})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  Sir, the aliens have disappeared. And so has the shuttle.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  Scan the sector...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  I have, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  Well, I guess that's the end of Q.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  Au contraire, mon capitaine... heee's back...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  I have been forgiven, embraced by my brothers and sisters of the continuum... I am immortal again, omnipotent again...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  Swell.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  Don't fret, Riker... my good fortune is your good fortune.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  I don't need your fantasy women, Q...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  You've become so stolid, Commander... you weren't like this before the beard... Very well...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  Q...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  But I feel like celebrating...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  I don't.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  All of it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  Now, at the risk of being rude...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})

(:Text {content:  Yes, I have once again overstayed my welcome. As a human, I was ill-equipped to thank you, Picard. But as myself, you have my everlasting gratitude. Until next time, of course. But before I go, there is a debt I must repay...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  humanities... I have decided my dear Data to give you something very, very special...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  If your intention is to make me human, Q...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  No no no no no... don't be foolish... I would never curse you by making you human... Let's just call it a going away present.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  Uh, Data... Data? Why are you laughing?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  I do not know. But it was a wonderful... feeling.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  Bre'el Four hailing us, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  On screen, Lieutenant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})
(:Text {content:  Captain Picard... you've done it...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 90})
(:Text {content:  I'm sorry... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 90})
(:Text {content:  The moon is back in its normal orbit. How did you manage it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 90})
(:Text {content:  I didn't. Stand by, Bre'el Four...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 90})
(:Text {content:  Let's see it, Worf...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 90})
(:Text {content:  Mister Data, your analysis...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 90})
(:Text {content:  The moon's altitude is fifty-five thousand kilometers, projected orbit is nearly circular. There is no further danger to the planet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 90})
(:Text {content:  Good. Ensign, set a course for Station Nigala-Four. Perhaps there's a little humanity left in Q after all.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 90})
(:Text {content:  It warps away to continue its journey.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 90})
(:Text {content:  We have arrived at Tanuga Four, Captain. The away team has completed its survey of Doctor Apgar's work and is ready to return to the ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Data is curious about Picard's artwork and is trying to get a better look at it when Picard notices his interest.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Please... and examine the work of the other students as well.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Ensign Williams' striking style is heavily influenced by geometric constructivism.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Wright has effectively fused the incongruities of the surrealists with the irrationality of Dadaism.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4A})
(:Text {content:  Interesting.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  How so?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})

(:Text {content:  While suggesting the free treatment of form usually attributed to Fauvism, this quite inappropriately attempts to juxtapose the disparate cubistic styles of Picasso and Leger. In addition, the use of color suggests a haphazard melange of clashing styles. Furthermore, the unsettling overtones of proto-Vulcan influences...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Thank you... Mister Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  You are welcome, sir. If I may be of any further assistance --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  No... thank you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Stardate 43610.4. After completing a delivery of dicosilium to the Tanuga Four research station, our away team is receiving an update from Doctor Nel Apgar on his efforts to create Krieger Waves, a potentially valuable new power source.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Welcome back, Mister La Forge. Where's Commander Riker?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Still on the station, sir. Doctor Apgar wanted a word with him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Any problems... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Not... with the scientific part of the mission, sir...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Riker to Enterprise. I'm ready to leave now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  I'm sure Commander Riker will explain, sir...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Stand by, Commander. Engaging transport.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Transporter Room to Engineering. I have a power drain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Transporter Room! Is Commander Riker aboard?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Not yet, Captain. I'm having trouble clearing the signal...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Transporter Room to bridge. He's aboard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  You sound surprised, Mister O'Brien...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  For a moment, we weren't sure you left the space station in time...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  In time for what... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  It just exploded, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  FADE IN:})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, supplemental: Commander Riker has informed me that Doctor Apgar was the only one aboard the space station when it exploded. We remain in orbit investigating the accident...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  I've gone through the whole system, sir... I can't find any malfunction in the transporter, nothing that would cause an explosion like that...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Why was there a power drain before transport?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13A})
(:Text {content:  I don't know, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13A})
(:Text {content:  I want an answer to that question... I'm sure the Tanugans will too...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13A})
(:Text {content:  Yessir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13A})
(:Text {content:  Captain, the radiation and debris are consistent with an overload of the station's reactor core.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13B})
(:Text {content:  Any indications of reactor core problems while you were on the station?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13B})
(:Text {content:  No, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13B})
(:Text {content:  Number One... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13B})
(:Text {content:  Commander La Forge suggested this was not an entirely routine mission...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13B})
(:Text {content:  His voice sounds uncertain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13B})
(:Text {content:  Captain, Chief Investigator Krag of the Tanugan security force requests permission to beam aboard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13B})
(:Text {content:  Granted, Lieutenant, please escort our guest to the bridge. Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13B})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps you should tell me as much as possible prior to his arrival, Number One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13B})
(:Text {content:  I am Lieutenant Worf, head of ship's security. I will take you to the captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17A})
(:Text {content:  Chief Investigator, welcome to the Enterprise. I'm Captain Picard... my first officer, Commander William Riker.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Commander Riker, I am here to take you into custody...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  On what charge?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Suspicion of murder.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Murder... now wait a minute...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Chief Investigator... we are more than willing to cooperate fully with you, but...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Then you will release the prisoner for transportation to the planet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Why don't we discuss this in private...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  You have the bridge, Number One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Just what is your evidence against my officer?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Two witnesses have come forward to describe Commander Riker's threats against Doctor Apgar...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Threats... ? I am aware of an altercation between the two of them...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  It apparently was much more than just an altercation, Captain... but he will have a chance to prove his innocence...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  In our system of legal jurisprudence, a man is innocent until proved guilty.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})

(:Text {content:  In ours, he is guilty until he is proved innocent. And you are in our jurisdiction. If I understand the Federation regulations on these matters, and I just happened to look them up before I...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  I'm aware of the Federation regulations, sir... and if you will check further, they say the captain will decide if extradition is warranted...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Are you saying it is not?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  I'm saying...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  If I find that there is sufficient cause to warrant a trial, I will... release Commander Riker to your custody.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Would you say you're close to your first officer, Captain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  That's irrelevant here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Really, Captain, you cannot believe that. And how can I expect a fair and impartial decision?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  I will protect the rights of my officer...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  I appreciate that. But you'll have to do it on the planet, not here. After all, what if you were suddenly to decide to leave this star system... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  You have my word as an officer of Starfleet that I will not.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Unacceptable. You must turn him over to me for interrogation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Interrogate him here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})

(:Text {content:  Captain, we must recreate step-by-step, moment-by-moment, the events leading to the explosion... we need immediate access to all the witnesses, as well as the data from the lab's ground computers. It would be impossible to accomplish here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps not. Mister Data, please report to my Ready Room. In fact, I may be able to assist you in recreating the events.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Commander Data, Chief Inspector Krag.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})

(:Text {content:  Data, by taking testimony from both the away team and from witnesses provided by Investigator Krag, would it be possible to program the Holodeck to recreate what happened aboard the science station?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})

(:Text {content:  It would require construction and design specifications, full orthographic representations of the Krieger equipment, as well as visual representations and voice analyses of the persons involved... but yes, it is possible.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Very well. Arrangements will be made to provide you with all available information. I shall return shortly with our witnesses.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Data, escort the chief inspector to Transporter Room Three.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})

(:Text {content:  Mister La Forge, Ensign Crusher, we are going to recreate the research station on the Holodeck. I want you to work with Mister Data on the preparations. In addition, Mister La Forge, you and Commander Riker will give the computer detailed depositions on everything you heard and saw while aboard. Counselor, you will assist me during this inquiry.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  My decision on extradition will be based upon the evidence presented in these re-creations.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Captain, may I have a word with you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Under these circumstances, I believe it would be inappropriate, Number One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  FADE IN:})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Second officer's log, Stardate Holodeck has taken eighteen hours and is now complete.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})

(:Text {content:  All participants have entered their depositions. Technical schematics, and complete records from the lab's ground computers, as well as Doctor Apgar's personal logs, have been included. The recreation has a nominal eight-point-seven percent margin of error.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Is there anything you'd like to say before we begin, Number One?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})

(:Text {content:  Just this. I'm not a murderer. I went to the Tanugan lab as an official representative of Starfleet. And I acted accordingly. I was there to evaluate Apgar's progress on development of a Krieger Wave converter. That's all I was interested in. Computer. Load deposition program, Riker One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Run the simulation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Doctor Apgar? I'm Commander William Riker; Lieutenant Commander Geordi La Forge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  My assistant Tayna... well, let's get on with it, shall we?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Don't be in such a hurry, dear...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps our guests would like some refreshment...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  My wife, Manua...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  Pleasure to meet you, Mrs. Apgar.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  Doctor, if you're prepared to get started, so are we...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  Prepared? Of course I'm prepared...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  All right... then why don't you give me the overview of your research while Mister La Forge and your assistant look at the experimental data...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  Fine. Whatever. I must say, Commander, I resent your early arrival. Starfleet will get its converter... I've had a few setbacks, that's all...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  Doctor, we're not here to pressure you, we just want an update on your progress.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  Tayna -- show the commander's assistant whatever he wants to see. Give him full access to our records.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24B})
(:Text {content:  If you'll come with me...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24B})
(:Text {content:  Our Lambda Field generator is on the planet since it requires a minimum of five thousand kilometers for the field to collimate.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24B})
(:Text {content:  Really, darling, you're being rude... after all, Commander Riker is willing to sit through all your prattle about Krieger Waves...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Commander, let me get you a drink... and we'll hear all about Krieger Waves...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  To your success, Doctor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Apgar scowls, makes a point of not joining in their toast. Apgar gets down to business, states his grievances:})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Riker -- what is Starfleet doing here anyway? My delivery wasn't scheduled for another three months.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Actually, we're in this sector on another mission... and you had asked Starfleet for additional dicosilium.... it seemed like a good opportunity.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  How interesting. Tell us about this other mission.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  It's just a study of a proto-star cloud. The Enterprise will be returning tomorrow.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  The Enterprise just left you here?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  We have no wish to inconvenience you. We've arranged for quarters on the planet...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  I won't hear of such a thing. Commander, I insist you and Mister La Forge stay with us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  I hardly think --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  I know you'd prefer to be alone with your important work... but I, for one, am glad for the company.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})

(:Text {content:  Good. I must apologize for my husband's lack of social graces. He may be one of the great scientific minds in the galaxy... but he does come up a bit short in other areas.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Stop.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  computer -- freeze program.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Then it's your testimony that it was Mrs. Apgar's idea for you to spend the night aboard the station.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  It's my testimony... and it's the truth.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Resume program.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Our guest quarters aren't luxurious... but I've tried to make this room warm... and inviting.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  I'll be very comfortable, thank you. Good night.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  The environmental controls are here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Manua brushes past Riker to show him the controls -- no})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  And the door shuts by touching this panel.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Mrs. Apgar...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  She looks directly at Riker -- Riker ignores her meaning.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  It's late. And I'm tired.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Are you still tired, Commander?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Ma'am, excuse me, but I really think you ought to leave...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  I knew I'd find you with him. Did you think I didn't notice how you looked at him? I'm not the fool you take me for...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Doctor...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Doctor, believe me, this is all a terrible mistake...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  You won't get away with this. I'll see to it. I swear I will, Riker.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Freeze program.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})

(:Text {content:  I didn't see Doctor Apgar again until the following morning when he asked to see me alone. Commander La Forge returned to the Enterprise... Resume program.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  I suppose if I make a formal complaint, your report on my work won't be very good...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})

(:Text {content:  Doctor, this will have no impact on my report. It was a misunderstanding of the worst kind... and I feel I could straighten it out if you would ask Mrs. Apgar to join us...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  My wife and my assistant have transported down to the planet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})

(:Text {content:  What are you going to put in your report, Riker? That there's no justification for all the extra dicosilium I've requested? That is why they sent you early, isn't it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Doctor...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  I can explain why I needed it. They have no idea what my problems are... there are explanations for all of it...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  I don't need explanations.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Then we have nothing further to say to each other.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  I will tell my captain to expect your grievance.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Do that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Riker to Enterprise. I'm ready to leave now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Stand by, Commander. Engaging transport.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Freeze program.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38A})
(:Text {content:  And then I returned to the Enterprise...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38A})
(:Text {content:  And there's nothing you'd like to add... about firing a phaser, Commander?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38A})
(:Text {content:  I fired no phaser aboard the science station.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38A})
(:Text {content:  That's very odd, Commander. Very odd. Captain Picard, isn't it true that your sensors picked up a power drain just before transport?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38A})
(:Text {content:  That is correct.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38A})
(:Text {content:  Have you been able to explain it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38A})
(:Text {content:  Not to my knowledge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38A})

(:Text {content:  We have. Our readings are quite clear about it. Information retrieved from the lab's ground computers show that a focused energy pulse was fired just as Commander Riker began transport. Furthermore, by analyzing the trajectory and angle, it is clear that it came from the very spot that Commander Riker was standing. In short, allow me to show you my own recreation of the end of this story, a speculation if you will... computer, play hypothetical Krag One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38A})
(:Text {content:  Riker to Enterprise. I'm ready to leave now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Stand by, Commander. Engaging transport.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})

(:Text {content:  Just before the dematerialization effect begins on the hologram of Riker, he takes out his phaser and aims it behind Apgar. Riker FIRES the phaser at the reactor})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Three seconds later the station exploded.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  No question about it, the Tanugans are right... something was fired at the reactor core just before transport...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41A})
(:Text {content:  The energy signature would seem to indicate a phaser-like blast...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41A})
(:Text {content:  Well, it wasn't the commander's phaser. It couldn't be. There's gotta be another answer... we're just not seeing it yet...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41A})
(:Text {content:  Was there anything else in the lab capable of creating this kind of energy discharge... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41A})
(:Text {content:  Nothing I saw. And besides, how do you explain that it came from Commander's Riker's exact position... Dammit, I should have stayed with him...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41A})
(:Text {content:  Sensors indicate a radiation burst on Deck Thirty-Nine. Outside Cargo Bay Twelve.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41A})
(:Text {content:  Source?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41A})
(:Text {content:  Unknown.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41A})
(:Text {content:  Computer identify type of radiation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41A})
(:Text {content:  Emission is not consistent with any known radiation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41A})
(:Text {content:  It is subsiding, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41A})
(:Text {content:  Make any sense to you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41C})
(:Text {content:  I don't recognize it. Even the main deflector doesn't put out that kind of spillage.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41C})
(:Text {content:  Where would it be coming from...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41C})
(:Text {content:  I don't know, Wesley... but whatever it is, it's capable of putting a hole in solid duranium.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41C})
(:Text {content:  In a sense we've all met Mrs. Apgar, so shall we dispense with the introductions?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Mrs. Apgar, do you understand the purpose of this hearing?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  We understand how difficult this will be for you. If you need a recess, please don't hesitate to ask.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Would you like to make a statement before we begin?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  No. I just know he did it. He killed my husband.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Load Manua Simulation One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Run program.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48A})
(:Text {content:  If you greet them with such a long face they're going to assume something is wrong with the experiment.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  I just need time... A little more time.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  I'm certain they'll give you the time you need if you just show a little charm.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  You do that so much better than I.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Manua, someday I'll be able to reward you... for all your patience. I'll get you everything you ever dreamed of.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  I have all the reward I need.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Go on, I'll be right in...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Doctor Apgar? I'm Commander William Riker; Lieutenant Commander Geordi La Forge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  My assistant Tayna... well, let's get on with it, shall we?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Don't be in such a hurry, dear. Perhaps our guests would like some refreshment...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49A})
(:Text {content:  My wife, Manua...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49A})
(:Text {content:  It's a... pleasure... to meet you, Manua.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49A})
(:Text {content:  I'm anxious to get started...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49A})
(:Text {content:  If you wish.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49A})
(:Text {content:  I must say I resent your early arrival, Commander... I have much work to do...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49A})
(:Text {content:  I'll try to make this as painless as possible. For both of us. Do you assist your husband in his work?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49A})
(:Text {content:  Oh, dear, no. I'm no scientist.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49A})
(:Text {content:  Frankly, neither am I.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49A})
(:Text {content:  But I find this all fascinating, don't you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49A})
(:Text {content:  Mister La Forge, why don't you go over the doctor's experimental data... Later on, you can give me an overview...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49A})
(:Text {content:  Fine. Whatever. Starfleet will get its Krieger Wave converter... These things take time. I've had a few setbacks, that's all...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49A})
(:Text {content:  Doctor, I'm not here to put pressure on you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49A})
(:Text {content:  I'm sure my report will only underscore the need for continued support of your research.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49A})
(:Text {content:  Tayna, I'll call up the records... show the commander's assistant whatever he wants to see.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49A})
(:Text {content:  If you'll come with me... Our field generator is on the planet, since it requires a minimum of five thousand kilometers for the field to collimate.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49A})
(:Text {content:  Darling, let Tayna take care of that... I'm sure Commander Riker wants to hear how close you are to a breakthrough...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49A})
(:Text {content:  I'll make the two of you a drink and you can talk all about Krieger Waves...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49A})
(:Text {content:  To success.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  Success.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  Well, in a way, I suppose it's good you're early. Manua's right you the progress we've been making.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  I'd appreciate it if Commander La Forge and I could stay here until the Enterprise returns.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  It's a little inconvenient --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  It might help accelerate the process...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  If you wish, Commander...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  Now, where shall I start... well, first of all, you should know that I'm very close to being able to collimate a Krieger field...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  Very... charming. It has your touch.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  The station is very small, and we don't often have guests. So I use this as my sanctuary.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Who do you need sanctuary from?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  The environmental controls are here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Commander... it's late and I'm tired.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  A husband more interested in Krieger Waves than in a woman like you... how is it possible...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  My husband is one of the great minds in the galaxy... and we love each other very much...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Please... don't...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  It must get very lonely for you up here... a princess in a very high tower...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  My husband will be looking for me...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Your sanctuary, remember... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  She's lying... this never happened...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Freeze program...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Captain, you know I would never act like this.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51A})
(:Text {content:  Commander Riker...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51A})
(:Text {content:  This isn't me. I wasn't the one who closed the door... I didn't proposition her... I certainly didn't try to rape her... Why are you doing this?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51A})
(:Text {content:  It's exactly what happened...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51A})
(:Text {content:  Come on, Will. Sit down.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51A})
(:Text {content:  Resume program.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51A})
(:Text {content:  I knew you'd try this, Riker. Do you think I didn't notice how you looked at her? I'm not the fool you take me for...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51B})
(:Text {content:  You won't get away with this. Your career is over. I'll see to it. I swear I will, Riker.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51B})
(:Text {content:  If you report this, you'll be making a terrible mistake, Doctor. A terrible mistake.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51B})
(:Text {content:  Freeze program.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})

(:Text {content:  Your career was safe. He was a scientist. In another day some fascinating bit of technical trivia would have distracted him. He would have forgotten about you and his complaint to Starfleet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Excuse me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  We'll, uh... take a short recess.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Why would she lie like that... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  She was lying. You must have felt it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Will, I sensed no deception from her...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Then you must think that I...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  No, of course not. I know you. You don't have to convince me of anything.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  We can't both be telling the truth.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  It is the truth... as you each remember it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Yes, but her version is going to put a noose around my neck.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  This is healing beautifully. I think you can begin to work on strengthening these muscles again...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Security to Doctor Crusher... evacuate, repeat evacuate... radiation emissions are indicated in Sickbay...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  It is definitely the same radiation that penetrated deck thirty-nine... highly focused, very powerful... but of unknown origin.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  If this should happen in the engine core or the anti-matter containment tanks, we'll be in trouble, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Do you have any theories?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Data noticed something too strange to be a coincidence...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})

(:Text {content:  The two radiation events aboard the Enterprise occurred five hours, twenty minutes and three seconds apart. The science station exploded yesterday at almost exactly four times that interval.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  There's a point-zero-zero-one-four second variance we haven't been able to explain yet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Are you saying there's a connection between the radiation bursts and the explosion?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  We do not have the evidence to support that conclusion at this time, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  If they're right, we should be able to predict the next event...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  We expect it in just over five hours.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})

(:Text {content:  Take every precaution you can to protect the ship's vital areas... if you haven't identified the source before the time interval is up, we will leave orbit. If you perceive any further danger, advise me immediately.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  We'll figure it out, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Deck eleven.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Halt.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Number One...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  I'm not going to try to influence your decision, Captain. I know you may have to turn me over to Krag. I can accept that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  It hasn't come to that yet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  But it might... and it's more important to me that you know I didn't do it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  If you could just keep your trousers buckled... things like this wouldn't happen to you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  I never even gave her a second glance...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Number One, even I gave her a second glance.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Did I ever tell you about the mayor's wife in Brussels...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  The one who collected Starfleet cadets...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  I did tell you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  No, you didn't...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Brussels is lovely this time of the year. Isn't it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  All things considered right now, I'd rather be in Brussels.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  As would I, Number One. As would I.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Will, giving you to them would be like handing over a part of myself.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Resume.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  After the... the fight, Doctor Apgar came to find me... he was very upset...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  And he told you what happened?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Yes, he told me everything that happened...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Based on Tayna's deposition, we have reconstructed the incident in Commander Riker's quarters as Doctor Apgar described it to her... computer...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Inspector, this is hearsay... She wasn't a witness to this incident...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Doctor Apgar is dead. Tayna's statement is admissible under Tanugan law... and I insist you consider it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  We will... watch this evidence. And I will weigh it accordingly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Computer, run Tayna Simulation Three.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  I knew I'd find the two of you together. Do you think I didn't notice how you were looking at each other? I'm not the fool you take me for...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64B})
(:Text {content:  I'm going to report this, Riker. You can count on that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64B})
(:Text {content:  You're a dead man, Apgar. A dead man.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64B})
(:Text {content:  Freeze program.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64C})
(:Text {content:  And then Doctor Apgar came to find you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64D})
(:Text {content:  Run Tayna Simulation Four.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64D})
(:Text {content:  I want you to take Manua and beam down to Tanuga immediately.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  Doctor, if he threatened you, you shouldn't stay...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  I'm not leaving him here alone. He's capable of anything. I've got to protect our work...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  I'll contact the authorities.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  No, I'll take care of that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  Doctor, be careful...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  It'll be all right. Go on...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  Computer, freeze program. What happened next?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65A})
(:Text {content:  I left the station with Manua. The next morning when I heard that the station had exploded... I knew what had happened. He'd killed Doctor Apgar.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65A})
(:Text {content:  Thank you. You're excused.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65A})

(:Text {content:  Captain, I have established motive, method and opportunity. In any court in the Federation, it is enough to warrant the extradition of the accused. I await your decision forthwith.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  I don't see any alternative, do you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  We both know Will is innocent...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})

(:Text {content:  Of course he is. But as a Starfleet captain, I don't have the luxury of yielding to my personal feelings. The evidence certainly warrants a trial... I will have to allow extradition.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Do you think there's enough evidence to prove his innocence?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Frankly... no.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Captain, we have discovered the source of the radiation... can you join us on the bridge?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Acknowledged. Why don't you spend some time with Commander Riker...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  I'd like that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Captain, as you know, we have been looking for a phenomenon that reoccurs every five hours, twenty minutes and three seconds...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67B})
(:Text {content:  The interval between radiation bursts...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67B})
(:Text {content:  We have found one such phenomenon on the planet's surface.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67B})

(:Text {content:  It's the field generator that Apgar used in his research. When it's fully charged, it emits an energy pulse and then requires five hours, twenty minutes and three seconds to recharge itself.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67B})
(:Text {content:  It must have been left on after the explosion of the lab.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67B})
(:Text {content:  But why would the generator be affecting the Enterprise this way... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67B})
(:Text {content:  It should not be. It is a harmless Lambda Field generator.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67B})
(:Text {content:  But we knew that somehow it was related to our radiation bursts We now know what is causing the bursts, sir, and why the science station exploded.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67B})
(:Text {content:  We also know who killed Doctor Apgar.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67B})

(:Text {content:  Chief Inspector, we've watched the events replayed over and over again... I've been impressed... and admittedly dismayed... by the body of evidence you've prepared against Commander Riker.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})

(:Text {content:  But isn't it remarkable that with all the witnesses, all the different points of view of the events aboard the space station... that we've never seen what really happened at all?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  I don't understand.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  Allow me, with the help of Mister La Forge, to explain. computer, load Manua Program One, time code fourteen-four-one...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  Play program.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70A})
(:Text {content:  Fine. Whatever. Starfleet will get its Krieger Wave converter. These things take time. I've had a few setbacks, that's all...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70A})
(:Text {content:  Freeze.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70A})
(:Text {content:  Mrs. Apgar, this was from your deposition. It would suggest that your husband had failed to create Krieger Waves...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70A})
(:Text {content:  Yes. But he was very close to a breakthrough.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70A})

(:Text {content:  He says here he needed more time... and he was upset by our early arrival. In fact, I maintain he already had made a breakthrough... and that he was lying to us...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70A})
(:Text {content:  On what basis... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70A})
(:Text {content:  For the last several hours, the Enterprise has been experiencing unusual radiation bursts. We've identified them as Krieger Waves.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70A})
(:Text {content:  Krieger Waves... but that's impossible. From where?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70A})
(:Text {content:  From right here. In the Holodeck.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70A})

(:Text {content:  We recreated your science lab in every conceivable detail... from all technical sources available including Doctor Apgar's own personal records... There is a slight margin of error, but essentially whatever was in the original lab is here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70A})
(:Text {content:  Including the Krieger Wave converter that Doctor Apgar claimed didn't work... except it does work.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70A})

(:Text {content:  Your field generator on the planet surface has been sending out harmless energy charges... and this facsimile has been converting them into Krieger Waves.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70A})
(:Text {content:  But the Holodeck can't create anything dangerous...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70A})

(:Text {content:  It didn't. When you get down to basics, the converter is nothing more than a complex series of mirrors and reflective coils. The energy from the field generator on the planet simply reflects off elements in the convertor which turns it into highly focused Krieger Waves...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70A})
(:Text {content:  And those waves have been randomly striking different areas of our ship as we orbit the planet and our angle to the generator changes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70A})
(:Text {content:  Why would Apgar lie about his own success... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70A})
(:Text {content:  Computer, run Manua Program One, time code, fourteen three-eight.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70A})
(:Text {content:  Manua, someday I'll reward you for all your patience. I'll get you everything you ever dreamed of.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70C})
(:Text {content:  I have all the reward I need.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70C})
(:Text {content:  Freeze.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70C})
(:Text {content:  Run Riker Program Two, time code, sixteen-one-zero.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70C})
(:Text {content:  To your success, doctor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70C})
(:Text {content:  And the rewards that come with it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70C})
(:Text {content:  I never said that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70C})
(:Text {content:  Nevertheless, it seems clear that your husband was motivated to earn the kind of rewards that would please you, Mrs. Apgar.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70C})
(:Text {content:  What's wrong with that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70C})
(:Text {content:  He wouldn't have earned great profits from his dealings with Starfleet... We were only interested in a new power source...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70C})

(:Text {content:  But if he could turn this into a weapon... it would be worth a lot to the Ferengi or the Romulans or a few others. Doctor Apgar had been ordering extra dicosilium for months... that's a pretty good indication he was trying to create larger reflective coils.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70C})

(:Text {content:  When the away team arrived early he must have been worried that Starfleet was getting suspicious. He needed more time to finish his work. Apgar said that in all three versions. No doubt, he was afraid that Commander Riker might learn the truth and cut off his support prematurely. Discovering Commander Riker with his wife did not improve matters. And, I submit, that he decided to murder Commander Riker.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70C})
(:Text {content:  Ridiculous.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70C})
(:Text {content:  Is it? Computer, run Tayna Program Four, time code eighteen-one-four.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70C})
(:Text {content:  I'll contact the authorities.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71A})
(:Text {content:  No, I'll take care of that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71A})
(:Text {content:  Freeze.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71A})
(:Text {content:  Tayna, what is it that he's doing here... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71A})
(:Text {content:  Activating the generator on the planet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71A})
(:Text {content:  Why would he do that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71A})
(:Text {content:  Maybe he was going to work on the converter, I don't know.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71A})

(:Text {content:  Or he might have already been thinking ahead to his next confrontation with Commander Riker... Computer, play Riker Program Four, time code twenty-four-one.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71A})

(:Text {content:  What are you going to put in your report, Riker? That there's no justification for all the extra discosilium I've requested? That is why they sent you early, isn't it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Doctor...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  I can explain why I needed it. They have no idea what my problems are... there are explanations for all of it...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  I don't need explanations.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Freeze.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  To Apgar, that must have seemed as though Commander Riker was confirming his worst fears. And I believe this is when Apgar decided finally to kill him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  You forget, Picard... we know the energy pulse which blew up the reactor was fired from Commander Riker's position not Doctor Apgar's.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})

(:Text {content:  We are hypothesizing that Doctor Apgar energized the converter at the moment of Commander Riker's beam-out hoping to make his death look like a transporter accident. But something went wrong... the energy pulse hit the Transporter beam and reflected back to the lab's reactor which caused the explosion.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  An interesting hypothesis. But impossible to prove.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})

(:Text {content:  Not really. We know that the field generator on the planet has been repeating a discharge command ever since the explosion. The intervals are like clockwork... except the explosion occurred point-zero-zero-one-four seconds after the first discharge... the only explanation for that variance is the time it would take the energy pulse to bounce back from the transporter beam to the reactor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  I haven't the slightest idea what anyone's talking about.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Nor should you, Mrs. Apgar. We have arranged a demonstration to illustrate. Mister La Forge, I believe it is almost time is it not?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})
(:Text {content:  Computer, load program, La Forge One... coordinate auto-engage time sequence.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 72})

(:Text {content:  The next discharge from the field generator is scheduled to occur in a few moments. We have aligned the Holodeck program to recreate the final events as Commander Riker described them... only this time our facsimile will automatically process the energy charge from the planet and reflect it just as the original convertor did before the explosion.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  If we're correct, we'll know it instantly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  I will tell my captain to expect your grievance.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  Do that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  Riker to Enterprise. I'm ready to leave now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Stand by, Commander. Engaging transport.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Doctor Apgar killed himself... during his attempt to kill Commander Riker.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75})
(:Text {content:  Captain... I withdraw my request for Commander Riker's extradition.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75})
(:Text {content:  Well, Number One... have we any \"further business\" in the Tanuga system?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Not that I know of, sir. I'm more than willing to put it behind me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Then perhaps you'd be so good as to get this ship underway?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  With pleasure, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Mister Crusher, set a course for Emila-Two.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Course laid in, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Engage.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Try this.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  Just try it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  It's an Earth drink... prune juice.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  A warrior's drink.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  Worf looks at her with vague irritation. This conversation is venturing into areas he'd rather avoid.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  I would require a Klingon woman for... companionship. Human females are too fragile.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  Not all of them... I know one or two on board who might find you a bit tame...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  Impossible.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  You never know until you try...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  Then I will never know.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  Coward...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  I am merely concerned for the safety of my crewmates.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  Drink your prune juice.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Worf, report to the bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  On my way, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Analysis, Mister Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Sensors are reading gravimetric fluctuations... most unusual ones.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  \"Unusual\" how? Specify?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Nothing I have seen before.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Is it a wormhole?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Yes... and no. Like a... time displacement, but it does not have a discernible event horizon.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Sir, navigational subsystems are unable to give coordinates on the object.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Confirmed. The phenomenon does not have a definable center or outer edge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Are you saying it is... and yet it isn't there?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  I do not have sufficient information to make an analysis as yet, Commander. The dynamics of the radiation patterns---})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Something's happening, Captain. A new change in sensor readings.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  No...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Mister Data?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Can you identify the ship, Lieutenant? Is it an enemy vessel?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  I'm getting too much interference, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  It's clearing, Captain. Definitely a Federation starship... accessing registry...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8B})
(:Text {content:  Looks like they had a rough ride.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8C})
(:Text {content:  N, C, C, one-seven-oh-one... C. U.S.S.... Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8D})

(:Text {content:  Military log, Combat-date unusual radiation anomaly reported by Starbase one oh five, the Enterprise has encountered what could almost be called a ghost from its own past... The Enterprise-C, the immediate predecessor of this battleship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})

(:Text {content:  Sensors confirm design and specifications, Captain. Analysis of hull and engine materials conform to engineering patterns and methods of that time period.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  But that cruiser was destroyed with all hands about twenty years ago.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Presumed destroyed. The Enterprise-C was last seen near the Klingon outpost on Narendra Three exactly twenty-two years, four months and three days ago.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  And now it's here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Mister Data, is it possible... that it has... traveled through time?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  It is a possibility, Captain. If that is the correct hypothesis, then the phenomenon we just enountered was a temporal rift in space.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  A rift?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})

(:Text {content:  Possibly the formation of a Kerr loop from superstring material... it would require high-energy interactions occuring in the vicinity for such a structure to form. The rift is certainly not stable, Captain. It could collapse at any time.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})

(:Text {content:  I'm able to scan the interior of the ship now, sir... heavy damage to warp field nacelles and hull bearing struts... internal space frame -- Life-signs, Captain!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Readings are sporadic... looks like they have massive casualties, but some are still alive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Bridge to Sickbay. Emergency teams, stand by Transporter Rooms.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Understood.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Belay that order, Doctor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  I respectfully suggest that regardless of how they did it, they are here now and they need our help.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  That ship has traveled into its own future. We are dealing with variables that could alter the flow of our own history.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  But their influence on history has ended, sir. That ship disappeared from the past twenty-two years ago and never returned.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Captain, the Enterprise... C is sending out a distress call, sir. Audio only.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})

(:Text {content:  This... is Captain Garrett... of the Starship Enterprise, to any Federation ship. We... have been attacked by Romulan warships and require... immediate assistance. We have lost warp drive... life-support is failing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  We have no record of a Romulan assault on the Enterprise-C...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Voice message has ended, Captain. All I'm receiving now is their automated distress signal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Hailing frequency, Lieutenant. This is Captain Picard of... a Federation starship. Standby to receive emergency teams.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  We'll handle this one step at a time. Stabilize power systems and attend to their casualties. Avoid discussions of where and when they are.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir. Lieutenant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Message coming in from Starfleet monitor stations, Captain. Klingon battlecruisers have been reported moving toward this sector.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Battle alert, Mister Crusher. Condition Yellow.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir. All decks report Condition Yellow.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  It's changed... it's all changed...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12A})
(:Text {content:  Captain Garrett?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Yes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  I'm Commander Riker. We have emergency teams boarding your ship. Doctor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})

(:Text {content:  The rest of the bridge crew is dead. Her leg is fractured and she has serious internal injuries. I'll have to get her back to the Enterprise, it's more than I can do here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  We'll explain later, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  You'll explain now, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  We're from a Federation starship. We've answered your distress call. Your ship is in good hands, but we need to get you to our Sickbay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Very well.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Crusher to Transporter Room. Two to beam directly to Sickbay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Pretty bad, Commander. Looks like they were in a hell of a fight.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  If you can't stabilize life-support, we'll have to evacuate the ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  I think we can do it. I'll have to get to Engineering...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  La Forge to damage control team alpha. Meet me on Engineering level three.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Thanks...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  I'm Commander Riker.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Castillo. Helmsman.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Your Captain has been sent back to the Ent--... back to our ship. You would appear to be the senior officer left aboard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  So it would appear.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Away team reporting in, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  On screen, Mister Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Go ahead, Commander})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})

(:Text {content:  We've stabilized life support, Captain. Mister La Forge is working on restoring the main power couplings but it'll take time. Things are a real mess over here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Survivors?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  One hundred twenty-five, sir})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Out of seven hundred.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Recommendation?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  I'd hate to scrap her, sir. Starfleet could certainly use another ship, even if it is a little old.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})

(:Text {content:  Agreed. But we can't stay in this area too long. You have nine hours. If you can get her underway in that time, we'll escort her back to Starbase one oh five. If not, we'll evacuate the survivors and destroy the ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Understood, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Keep me posted, Picard out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21A})
(:Text {content:  Guinan... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21A})
(:Text {content:  We need to talk. Now. It's all wrong, Captain. This is not the way it's supposed to be.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21A})
(:Text {content:  I don't know...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  You must have some idea how things have changed...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  I look at things... at people... and they don't feel right.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  What things? What people?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  The bridge...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  What's the matter with it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  It's not right.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  It's the same bridge, Guinan. It hasn't changed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  I know that. And I also know... it's wrong.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  What else?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Families. There should be children here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Children? On the Enterprise... ? We're at war, Guinan.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  No, we're not. I mean, we shouldn't be. This is a ship of peace. Not of war.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Guinan, what you're suggesting...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  It's not a suggestion, Captain. And that ship from the past... it was not supposed to come here. It's got to go back.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  I'm Captain Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  Rachel Garrett. How's my ship?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  Life support systems have been restored. Repairs are continuing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  Where did you come from? We weren't picking up any other Federation ships in this sector...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  What is the last thing you remember?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  We were answering the distress signal...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  Distress signal... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  You must have heard it. From the Klingon outpost, Narendra Three. But you didn't... did you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  I've never seen a Sickbay like this... not even on a starbase. And your uniforms... What ship is this, Captain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  Please... try to keep still...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  I insist on an answer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  You are aboard the Enterprise, Captain... one-seven-oh-one-D.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  You have come twenty-two years into the future.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  Twenty-two years.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  Does my crew know yet?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  No.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  I must tell them... I owe them that, Picard...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  If you wish, I will see to it that they're informed...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  Is there a reason they should not be told?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  I am concerned that if you return to your own time with knowledge of the future...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  Return? To the battle? We barely escaped with our lives. If we return, we'll be destroyed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  Have you any idea how this happened?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  There was a fierce volley of photon torpedoes... we were hit... there was a bright light and then... here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  It is possible your exchange of fire was the catalyst for the formation of a temporal rift. History never recorded your battle with the Romulans.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})

(:Text {content:  We were responding to a distress call from the Klingon outpost on Narendra Three... the Romulans were attacking it... we engaged them... but there were four warbirds.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  The Narendra Three outpost was wiped out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  It is regrettable you did not succeed, Captain. If a Federation starship had rescued a Klingon outpost... it might have averted twenty years of war.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24A})
(:Text {content:  I'm not getting any kind of ready condition on the impulse engines, La Forge...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  Acknowledged, Commander... some of the engine control processors went off-line. And there's probably damage to the accelerator coils... stand by...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  I just can't quite make myself believe it. Twenty-two years...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  I'm reading forty percent on forward shields... what do you have on aft...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  Forty percent...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  That's not going to do... Commander, advise Lieutenant La Forge that shields are below minimum...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  Acknowledged...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  We'll never see our families again. Our homes...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  How do you know your family's not still alive?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  You're right... I don't... but imagine coming home after twenty-two years... Would I even recognize them?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  What are the status readouts on main phaser banks?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  Emitters available -- sixty percent forward, fifty-two percent aft.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  Let's take a look at the torpedo launchers...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  I guess I'm lucky to be alive at all.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  You may not like the future. It's been a long war. The Federation's lost more than half of Starfleet to the Klingons.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  We were negotiating a peace treaty with the Klingons when I left...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  A lot of changes, Lieutenant. A lot of changes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  When we get a break, maybe you could fill me in on some of them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  Photon banks are depleted... auxiliary fusion generators are down...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  The probability is high that the temporal rift is symmetrical, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30B})
(:Text {content:  If that is the case, what would happen if the Enterprise-C were to fly back through it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30B})
(:Text {content:  Back, sir? The Enterprise-C would emerge in her own time period at almost the same instant she left.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30B})
(:Text {content:  Right in the middle of her battle with the Romulans.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30B})
(:Text {content:  Yes, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30B})
(:Text {content:  Based on the logs of the Enterprise-C, is there any possibility she could survive that battle?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30B})
(:Text {content:  None, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30B})
(:Text {content:  Then sending them back would be condemning them to death.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30B})
(:Text {content:  Unbelievable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  She was the first Galaxy Class warship built by the Federation... forty-two decks... capable of transporting over six thousand troops...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  How long have you been on board?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Four years. Straight out of the Academy. I was lucky to get the Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Yeah, me too. I mean... my Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant, how's the ship?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  We've restored minimal shields and the forward phaser banks. Still no photon launchers or warp drive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Concentrate on the weapon systems. From what Captain Picard has told me, the Federation can use all the help it can get.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  And soon. Our sensors have picked up Klingon warships in this sector, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Why wasn't I informed, Mister Castillo... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Captain, you shouldn't --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  As senior officer, I want you to be my liaison to the Enterprise- D... coordinate with Tactical...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  That's me, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Where do you think you're going?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  I'm ready to resume my duties.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Captain, you need at least another twenty-four hours...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Nonsense. Doctors always over-protect their patients.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  And captains always push themselves too hard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  And she EXITS to Crusher's chagrin.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  I need more.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  There is no more. I wish there was, Captain. I wish I could prove it. I can't.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Then I can't send them back.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  You must.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Dammit, Guinan, they will die moments after they return... how can I ask them to sacrifice their lives based solely on your... intuition?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  I don't know.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  This is a mistake. Every cell in my body knows this is a mistake. I cannot explain it to myself so I cannot explain it to you. I... just know.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Who is to say this history is any less proper than the other?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  I guess I am.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Not good enough. Not good enough. I will not ask them to die.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Forty billion have died in the war...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})

(:Text {content:  I cannot justify readjusting history on the basis of saving lives in war... shall I return to Sarajevo and stop the assassination of Archduke Ferdinand... or go back to warn Station-Salem Four of the Bel-zon raid...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  This war was never meant to be. They must return to their own time to correct that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  And what is the guarantee that by going back they will succeed... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
