(:Text {content:  In fact, they could conceivably create a third time line.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Yes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Every instinct tells me it's wrong and dangerous and futile.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})

(:Text {content:  Picard, we have been together for twenty-two years. I have been your advisor, your confidant, your friend and in all those twenty-two years, I have never led you astray. This time line cannot be allowed to continue. I've told you what you must do. You have only your faith in me to help you decide.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})

(:Text {content:  Deflector shield technology has advanced considerably during the war... our heat-dissipation rates are probably double those of the Enterprise-C, so we can hang in a firefight longer...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Guinan... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Have you ordered yet, Tasha?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Not yet... Is something wrong, Guinan?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Not a thing. What can I get you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Just a couple of T-K-L meal rations... we're in a hurry. Oh, this is, Lieutenant Castillo...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  First time for everything.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  First time?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  It's just that I've never seen anything bother her before...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  What's a T-K-L?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Standard rations. Food replicators are on minimum power... Everything else is diverted to defensive systems. So where was I...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  You've told me more about tactical in an hour than I learned my last year in the Academy...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  You're gonna need it, Lieutenant...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Hey, I've known you a whole day now, Lieutenant. I won't salute if you won't. What did she call you... Tasha?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Yeah.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Most everybody just calls me Castillo. My mother calls me Richard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Okay, Castillo.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Naw, I think maybe I'd like it better if you called me Richard...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Richard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  This is the captain. Senior officers will report to my Ready Room immediately.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  So much for lunch.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Captain, are you suggesting they should return and attempt to complete their mission?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  I am, Doctor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Based on Guinan's intuition... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  But it won't accomplish anything. There's no way they can save Narendra Three...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Captain Garrett says there were four Romulan warbirds. The Enterprise-C would be outmanned and outgunned...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Unless we were to re-arm them with modern...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  We can't do that. If we send this ship back with new technology... we would be altering the past...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  But that's what you're talking about doing anyway, isn't it? Altering the past.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  We're talking about restoring the past.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  How could Guinan know that history has been altered... if she's been altered along with the rest of us?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps her species has a perception that goes beyond linear time.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})

(:Text {content:  There are many things about her species that cannot be easily explained. Even she cannot explain how or why she senses that history has been altered. And yet it is very possible she is correct. A ship from the past has traveled through time. Who among us could know what effect that event has had on the present. Indeed, we will never know for certain if Guinan is correct. But I, for one, have decided the consequences of that possibility are too grave to ignore.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Sir, if you wish my opinion...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  I think I know your opinion, Commander. This is a briefing. I'm not seeking your consent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  With all due respect, Captain, we'd be asking one hundred and twenty-five people to die a meaningless death.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})

(:Text {content:  Not necessarily meaningless, Commander. Klingons place honor above all else. If the crew of the Enterprise-C had died fighting for the survival of a Klingon outpost, that would have been considered a meaningful act of honor by the Klingon Empire.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Even their deaths... might have prevented the war.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})

(:Text {content:  If the Enterprise-C returns to the battle and its mission is a success, history will be irrevocably changed. This time line will cease to exist... and a new future will have been created. I've weighed the alternatives. I will follow Guinan's recommendations. Dismissed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  If she's right... we may not even be in the alternate time line...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  Yeah, who knows if we're dead or alive...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  Engineering.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Is Engineering your destination as well?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Oh... Deck six... sorry...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  If I interpret your facial expression correctly, you were preoccupied with something unpleasant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})

(:Text {content:  I was just thinking... a lot of things... I've been working with one of the officers from the Enterprise-C... he's nice, you know? I like him. I'm worried about what's going to happen to him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  We may never know what happens, Tasha. If they succeed, we will not even realize any of these events occurred.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Data, how different do you think your life would be in the other time line?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49A})
(:Text {content:  The possibilities are too numerous even for me to calculate, Tasha.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49A})
(:Text {content:  Kind of scary, isn't it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49A})
(:Text {content:  Scary? I would not know.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49A})
(:Text {content:  Shields are up to seventy-two percent... That's better...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  You believe this woman...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I discovered long ago that she has a special wisdom... I've learned to trust it. If you wish, I can arrange for you to speak with her...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Captain, I'd be lying to you if I told you there was a chance in hell of coming out of this alive. And my crew means a lot to me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Why doesn't your ship come back with us? The Romulans would be no match for your weaponry...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I can't do that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})

(:Text {content:  No, I suppose not. You don't belong in our time... any more than we belong in yours. To be honest, Picard, there are some members of my crew who have expressed a desire to return... even knowing the odds. Some because they can't bear to live without their loved ones... some who don't like the idea that we slipped out in the middle of a fight. But I've told them... that in the here and now, the Federation needs another ship against the Klingons... and we better get used to being in the here and now...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  By going back, you may be a great deal more helpful. The war is going badly for the Federation. Much worse than is generally known.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Starfleet Command believes defeat is inevitable... that within six months we will have no choice but to surrender...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  And you're saying all this may be a result of our arrival here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})

(:Text {content:  One more ship will make no difference in the here and now, Captain. But twenty-two years ago, one ship could have stopped this war before it ever started.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Mister Castillo, inform the crew that we're going back.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  The Romulans'll get a good fight. We'll make it one for the history books.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I know you will, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Yar...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Permission to remain for a moment, sir...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Granted.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I just wanted to say good luck...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I'll try to put some of your tactical briefing to good use when we get back...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Your ship has a lot more maneuverability than the Romulan counterparts of that era... in fact, if you could isolate...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  You'll do fine.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  If you get back to Earth... and you see a man, oh, in his late fifties taking a hard look at you across a crowded room... Hey, you never know.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Good-bye, Lieutenant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Red Alert. Full power to shields.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Shields are up. Functioning.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Initiating evasive maneuvers... Gamma sequence.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Ready phasers... Enterprise-D, has your captain returned safely...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Acknowledged, Enterprise-C. Captain Picard is safely aboard... Fire phasers.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Firing phasers...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Situation report...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  One Klingon bird of prey... off the starboard bow...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Firing phasers...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  Load torpedo bays...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  The Klingon vessel has re-cloaked, sir. I have no readings.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  Captain Garrett -- damage report. Captain Garrett...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  This is Lieutenant Yar, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  Captain Garrett is dead.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  I'm prepared to lead the Enterprise back myself, Captain Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61B})
(:Text {content:  Sir, Lieutenant Castillo is the last senior officer alive... he will have limited support from Ops, no Tactical, reduced staff in Engineering...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61B})
(:Text {content:  I have good people willing to do their best...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61B})
(:Text {content:  But certainly, history never meant this ship to be led into battle without your captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61B})
(:Text {content:  I can't speak to that point, sir... but I can get us back to where we're supposed to be. I believe that's what Captain Garrett would want me to do.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61B})
(:Text {content:  Commander Data to Captain Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61B})
(:Text {content:  Go ahead.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61B})
(:Text {content:  Sir, sensors are showing additional instability in the time rift. Possibly the result of the battle with the Klingons.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61B})
(:Text {content:  Any signs of other Klingon vessels?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61B})
(:Text {content:  No, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61B})
(:Text {content:  I'm sure our coordinates have been transmitted to the Klingon command... we must not remain here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61B})
(:Text {content:  Sir, it is my intention to return, unless you order me not to.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61B})
(:Text {content:  How soon will your ship be ready?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61B})
(:Text {content:  We sustained moderate damage in the attack... I think we can get underway in a few hours...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61B})
(:Text {content:  We will maintain position to provide cover. Make it so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61B})
(:Text {content:  One to beam to the Enterprise-C.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61C})
(:Text {content:  We keep saying good-bye... don't we?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61C})
(:Text {content:  I wish there was more time.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61C})
(:Text {content:  More time... I think we have all the time we can handle as it is.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61C})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61C})
(:Text {content:  What would you like?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61E})
(:Text {content:  Guinan, I have to know something.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61E})
(:Text {content:  What happens to me in the other time line?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61E})
(:Text {content:  I don't have alternate biographies of the crew, Tasha. I told the captain... it's just a feeling...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61E})
(:Text {content:  But there's something more when you look at me, isn't there...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61E})
(:Text {content:  I've seen it in your eyes, Guinan. We've known each other too long...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61E})
(:Text {content:  We weren't meant to know each other at all. Or that's what I sense when I look at you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61E})
(:Text {content:  You're not supposed to be here, Tasha.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61E})
(:Text {content:  Where am I supposed to be?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61E})
(:Text {content:  Dead.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61E})
(:Text {content:  Do you know how?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61E})
(:Text {content:  No. But I know that it was an empty death. A death without purpose.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61E})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Lieutenant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Captain, I request a transfer to the Enterprise-C.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  For what reason?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  They need someone at Tactical.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  You're needed here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Sir, I don't belong here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Sit down. What did she tell you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  I'm not supposed to be here. I'm not supposed to be alive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  She felt it was necessary to disclose this to you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  I felt it was necessary.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})

(:Text {content:  I see. You realize that it is very possible that the Enterprise-C could fail. We may be forced to remain in this time line... in which case your life would go on, hopefully for a long while.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  I know how important it is that they don't fail, Captain. That's why I'm requesting this transfer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant, you don't belong on that ship...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  No. Captain Garrett belongs on that ship. But now that she's dead, there's a certain logic in this request.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  There's no logic in it at all. Tasha, whether they succeed or not, the Enterprise-C will be destroyed...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})

(:Text {content:  At least, with a tactical officer on board, they will have a chance to defend themselves well, Captain... it may be a matter of seconds or minutes... but those could be the minutes that change history... Guinan says I died a senseless death in the other time line. I didn't like the sound of that, sir. I've always known the risks that come with a Starfleet uniform. If I am to die in one, I'd like my death to count for something.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Permission granted.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Thank you, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  I'm showing phaser banks up to seventy percent efficiency... we've got an hour left... see if you can get them up to ninety...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Parker, you've got Ops. Fredericks, you take the Conn...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  I'll handle Tactical.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Tasha Yar reporting for duty, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  You're not part of my crew.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  I am now. Captain Picard approved my request for transfer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  This isn't a joke, Tasha. We're going back in the rift -- into battle -- and we're not coming back.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  I know the mission. These are my orders, Lieutenant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  But I don't want you here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  You need me. Show me someone on your crew that can do the job better than I can.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Tasha, all business, moves to her station.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  We've finished the transfer of equipment, Captain. The new converters should be able to compensate for the damaged units on the Enterprise-C.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Long-range scans have picked up Klingon battlecruisers, Captain. They are on an intercept course.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  E.t.a.?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Fourteen minutes, thirty-one seconds.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Red Alert. All hands to battle stations.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  I'm on my way, sir. Good-bye, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Good-bye, Lieutenant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Damage control teams have all returned to the Enterprise-D... Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Raise shields.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Shields up. Charging weapon systems.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Good luck, Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Number and type of ships, Mister Crusher?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  Three K'vort class battlecruisers.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  Not bothering to cloak themselves.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  They shouldn't be so confident... after the pasting we gave them at Archer Four.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  We won't last long against that many.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})

(:Text {content:  We could, of course, outrun the Klingons, but we must protect the Enterprise-C until she can enter the temporal rift. We may not survive... but we must succeed... Let's make sure they don't forget the name Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  Shields holding.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75})
(:Text {content:  Hold your fire. Mister Crusher, come about to one-four-eight mark zero-zero-three, on my command.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75})
(:Text {content:  Aye sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75})
(:Text {content:  Ready photon torpedoes. Dispersal pattern: Sierra.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75})
(:Text {content:  Ready... and... now!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75})
(:Text {content:  One enemy target hit, sir. Moderate damage to their forward shields.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  Our shields still holding. Minor damage to secondary hull.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  Course one-seven-zero, mark zero-one-four.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  One ship has broken off and is heading toward the Enterprise-C.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  Mister Crusher. Belay previous course change... keep us within two hundred kilometers of the Enterprise-C.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir. Coming to two-one-seven mark one-one-five... increasing to two-thirds impulse.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  Damage control teams to deck fourteen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  Engineering to bridge. Starboard power coupling is down. Containment field generator three is damaged -- attempting to bypass.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  If we lose anti-matter containment...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  Acknowledged, Engineer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  The Klingons are flanking us... trying to draw us away from the Enterprise-C.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  Hold your course. Continual fire, all phasers.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 79})
(:Text {content:  One enemy target destroyed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Damage report!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Heavy casualties in the secondary hull. Navigational sensor array inoperative.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Anti-matter containment fields failing... if I can't stabilize them, we'll have to eject the reactor core or she'll blow...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Shields buckling, Captain. They will not --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Engineer to bridge. Can't hold the antimatter containment fields... Initiating emergency shutdown...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  Coolant leak! bridge, we have a coolant leak in the engine core! I can't shut it down -- estimate two minutes to warp core breach...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  How long until the Enterprise-C enters the rift?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 85})
(:Text {content:  Fifty-two seconds.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 85})
(:Text {content:  All remaining power to defense systems.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  Power couplings severed in forward phaser banks. Attempting to by-pass. Controls not responding.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  Federation ship Enterprise... surrender and prepare to be boarded!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  Like hell.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  Report, Lieutenant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91})
(:Text {content:  Readings fluctuated momentarily, Captain. It appeared to be a ship, but then it vanished.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 92})
(:Text {content:  The rift is closing in on itself, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 92})
(:Text {content:  Very well. Prepare a class-one sensor probe. We'll leave it behind to monitor the final closure. Mister Crusher, lay in a course for Archer Four.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 92})
(:Text {content:  Guinan to Captain Picard... is everything all right up there?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 92})
(:Text {content:  Guinan?... Yes... everything's fine. Is something wrong?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 92})
(:Text {content:  No, sir. Sorry to bother you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 93})
(:Text {content:  Thanks, Guinan.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 93})
(:Text {content:  Geordi... tell me about Tasha Yar.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 93})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Stardate 43657.0 We have arrived at sector four-eight-seven to begin charting this region of the galaxy. Commander Riker has been spared this sometimes tedious duty by virtue of a long overdue personal leave.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  Did he send for you too?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Yes... he was very mysterious about it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Does anyone have any idea what this is all about?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Something happened at that cybernetics conference. Since he's come back he's spent every off duty minute in that lab.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  It is very unlike Data to be secretive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  And cautious. He kept the lab locked.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Now how would you know that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Oh, you are early. Just a moment please.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  You may enter now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3A})
(:Text {content:  C'mon, Data, what is this...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3B})
(:Text {content:  Yeah, what's going on?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3B})
(:Text {content:  I have invited you here to meet someone.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3B})
(:Text {content:  This is Lal. Lal, say hello to Counselor Deanna Troi...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3B})
(:Text {content:  Hello... Counselor Deanna Troi...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3B})
(:Text {content:  How do you do, Lal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3B})
(:Text {content:  I am functioning... within normal parameters.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3B})
(:Text {content:  And this is Geordi La Forge and Wesley Crusher.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3B})
(:Text {content:  Purpose for... exterior drapings, Father?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3B})
(:Text {content:  Father?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3B})
(:Text {content:  It is the custom that we wear clothing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3B})
(:Text {content:  It called you \"Father\", Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3B})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Wesley. Lal is my child.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3B})
(:Text {content:  It has a positronic brain... one very similar to my own... I began to program it at the cybernetics conference...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  But nobody's ever been able to do that... at least not since you were programmed Data...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})

(:Text {content:  There was a new submicron matrix-transfer technology introduced at the conference which I discovered could be used to lay down complex neural net pathways...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  You mean a transfer... from your your brain to Lal's...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})

(:Text {content:  Exactly, Wesley. I realized for the very first time it was possible to continue Doctor Soong's work. My initial transfers have produced very encouraging results... so I brought Lal's brain back with me to continue.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Data...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  I would like to have been consulted.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  I have not observed anyone else on board consult with you about their procreation, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  No, but...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  The intention is the same.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})

(:Text {content:  Lal's creation is entirely dependent on me. I am giving it knowledge and skills that are stored in my brain... its programming reflects mine in the same way a human child's genes reflect its parent's genes...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  It's true, Captain, this technology requires another positronic brain that's fully programmed...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  And Data's the only person around who has one. That does kind of makes him Lal's dad.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Of course, it is not complete. We have only made two transfers.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Why didn't you give it a more human look, Data?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  I decided to allow Lal to choose its own appearance and sex.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Troi and Picard start to leave...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Captain... Have a cigar.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  I believe it is customary.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  I would suggest we do whatever we can to discourage this perception of the new android as a \"child\"...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4B})
(:Text {content:  Counselor, it is not a child. It is an invention, albeit an extraordinary one.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4B})

(:Text {content:  Why should biology or technology determine whether it is a child? I see a man who has created an offspring... a new life out of his own being. That suggests a child to me. If Data wishes to call Lal his child, who are we to argue?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4B})
(:Text {content:  If he must, fine. But I don't understand how he can call a five foot android, with heuristic learning systems and the strength of a ten men a \"child\".})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4B})
(:Text {content:  You've never been a parent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4B})
(:Text {content:  Data, what you have done has very serious ramifications and I am dismayed that you did not inform anyone of what you were doing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  I am sorry I did not anticipate your objections, Captain. Do you wish me to deactivate Lal?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})

(:Text {content:  It is a life, Data. It cannot be activated or de-activated simply. It is a stupendous undertaking. Have you any idea what will happen when Starfleet learns of this?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  I have followed all Starfleet regulations to the best of my ability, Captain... I expected they would be pleased...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  We'll see. My foremost concern is for the safety of this ship and crew. You are faster, stronger, and far more knowledgeable than any human...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  I can assure you Lal's programming includes psychological inhibitor safeguards to prevent any threat to the Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  And in the event of a malfunction?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  A malfunction is of course a possibility, Captain. But Lal's program is equipped like mine -- it will shut down before deleterious behavior can begin.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  You've taken on quite a responsibility, Mister Data...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})

(:Text {content:  To prepare, I have scanned all the available literature on parenting. There seems to be much confusion on the issue. One traditional doctrine insists \"spare the rod and spoil the child\", suggesting a punitive approach... another more liberal attitude would allow a child enormous freedom...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Data...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  And what the Klingons do to their children...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  I'm not talking about parenting. I'm talking about the extraordinary consequences of creating new life.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Does that not describe becoming a parent, sir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  You are seeking to achieve what no one, other than your own creator, has been able to achieve functional android. To make another Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})

(:Text {content:  That is why I must attempt this, Captain. I have observed that in most species, there is a primal instinct to perpetuate themselves. And while I have not been programmed with instinctive behavior patterns, I do understand that I have been, until now, the last of my kind. If I were damaged or destroyed, I would be lost forever. But if I am successful with the creation of Lal, my continuance is assured. I believe I understand the consequences. And I am prepared to accept the responsibility.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Gender female.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  That's right, Lal. Just like me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Gender male.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Correct.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  I am... gender neuter. Inadequate.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  That is why you must choose a gender, Lal. And complete your appearance.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  What are... criteria?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Access your data bank on sexuality, level two. That will define the parameters.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Whatever you choose will be yours for your lifetime, Lal... It is a decision that will affect how people interrelate with you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  I choose... your sex... and appearance.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})

(:Text {content:  No, Lal... that would be confusing. We are taking you to the Holodeck to show you several thousand composites which I have programmed. You may choose from them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Several thousand... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  This is a big decision...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Counselor... Lal has narrowed the choices to four... would you like to see?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Yes... yes, of course, Data...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Computer, Lal -- gender sequence finalists... begin...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9A})
(:Text {content:  An Andorian female...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9B})
(:Text {content:  Interesting. You'd be the only one on board the Enterprise, Lal...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9B})
(:Text {content:  That could make socialization more difficult.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9B})
(:Text {content:  A human male...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9C})
(:Text {content:  Very attractive... no problem with socialization here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9C})
(:Text {content:  The human female.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9D})
(:Text {content:  I like her.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9D})
(:Text {content:  A Klingon male.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9E})
(:Text {content:  A friend for Worf.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9E})
(:Text {content:  They are all very interesting, Lal. Do you have a favorite?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Yes. I have... chosen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})

(:Text {content:  Come in, Counselor. I have completed the assembly of the replicated anatomy. I was able to provide Lal with even more realistic skin and eye color than my own.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11A})
(:Text {content:  Congratulations, Data, it's a girl.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11A})
(:Text {content:  This is home.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Home. Place of residence. Social unit formed by a family living together.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Correct, Lal. We are a family.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  A chair... to sit in.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  A painting.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Painting. Colors produced on a surface by applying a pigment.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  I will teach you how to recognize the artistry of paintings.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Soft.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Yes, very good, Lal. You have correctly processed the sense of touch.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  There are many fascinating experiences I wish to share with you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Painting.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  No, Lal, this is a flower.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Inhale.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Smell.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Show me more, Father.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Second officer, science log supplemental, copy: Starfleet research, Daystrom Institute, Galor Four annex. Reference: development, android designate Lal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Training in social skills at the most elementary level has begun. Lal is progressing very slowly but is not deterred by early setbacks.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Motor coordination has improved by twelve-point-four percent... this reflects the adaptation of second level neural transfers...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18A})
(:Text {content:  Reflexes still need to develop. The integration of hand/eye coordination seems to be proceeding at a slower developmental rate.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18A})

(:Text {content:  Visual comprehension is especially difficult for Lal. Translating her vast data banks into recognizable applications may improve with additional transfers.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  She is also learning to supplement innate android behavior with human responses.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})

(:Text {content:  Most encouraging is her commitment to master the skills necessary to live successfully among humans. Her curiosity is insatiable... although it sometimes creates inappropriate behavior...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19A})

(:Text {content:  And I have been interested to note that as I observe Lal learning about her world... I share in her experience, almost as though I am learning things over again...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19B})
(:Text {content:  The transfer itself is fairly simple. Each neural pathway in my brain has been duplicated precisely in hers...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19C})
(:Text {content:  One advantage of a brain like yours, Data is that we can replicate it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19C})

(:Text {content:  Theoretically, the duplicate brains should be able to store and process the same information... but until all the transfers are complete, we will not know for certain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19C})
(:Text {content:  What does Lal do while you're on duty?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19C})
(:Text {content:  She studies in our quarters. She does not require much supervision, Wesley. Lal is quite self-sufficient.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19C})
(:Text {content:  You could send her to school.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19C})
(:Text {content:  Lal already has access to the sum of human knowledge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19C})
(:Text {content:  There are a lot of things you can learn just by being with kids your own age, Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19C})
(:Text {content:  She is only two weeks old.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19C})
(:Text {content:  Well, closer to her own age.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19C})
(:Text {content:  Doctor Crusher to Ensign Crusher. Aren't you supposed to be getting a hair cut, Wesley?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19C})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Mom. I'm on my way. Parents. Nothing personal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19C})
(:Text {content:  Lal, the third crosslink transfer series is complete.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19C})
(:Text {content:  Father, what is my purpose?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19C})
(:Text {content:  Purpose?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19C})
(:Text {content:  My function, my reason for being?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19C})

(:Text {content:  It is a complex question, Lal. I can only begin to answer it by telling you that our function is to contribute in a positive way to the world in which we live.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19C})
(:Text {content:  Why am I me instead of someone else?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19C})
(:Text {content:  Because you are my child.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19C})
(:Text {content:  Where did I come from?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19C})

(:Text {content:  Your questions suggest we have made a successful transfer of the heuristic associative pathways. You will now begin to process information on logic, aesthetics, metaphysics, and epistemology. You are truly becoming sentient, Lal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19C})
(:Text {content:  How?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19C})
(:Text {content:  By developing the awareness to examine and question your perceptions.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19C})
(:Text {content:  Why do we have two hands... why not three or four... Why is the sky black... why do...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19C})
(:Text {content:  Lal, did you know that tomorrow will be your first day of school?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19C})
(:Text {content:  I assure you, Admiral, there's no better guide into this life for Lal than Data... He's doing an excellent job with her...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19D})

(:Text {content:  We all have enormous admiration for what Commander Data has achieved already. But we have superior facilities and personnel here at Galor Four. And a starship is hardly a proper setting...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19D})
(:Text {content:  This starship's mission is to seek out new life and that is what Commander Data is doing. Under my direction.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19D})
(:Text {content:  We only want what's best for the new android.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19D})
(:Text {content:  As do I. I would be willing to consider releasing Lal and Data to join you... so he may continue his work with her.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19D})
(:Text {content:  I anticipated this suggestion. Frankly, as extraordinary as he is, Data's an imperfect role model. In many ways, he's still developing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19D})
(:Text {content:  Aren't we all, Admiral...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19D})
(:Text {content:  His presence would undoubtedly retard the the new android's progress.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19D})
(:Text {content:  Admiral, to you Lal is a new android. But to Data, she is his child.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19D})
(:Text {content:  His child.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19D})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Admiral. It may not be easy for you and I to see her that way. But he does. And I respect that. They will remain here for now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19D})

(:Text {content:  Starfleet's policy on research is clear... you're making your stand on very uncertain ground... I do hope it doesn't fall out from under you... Haftel out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19D})
(:Text {content:  She achieved a very high score on a test of academic achievement...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  A perfect score.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Yes. Which is why we started her with the older children. But Lal couldn't understand the nuances of how they related to each other.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  I see.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  We decided the best thing to do would be to put her with younger children.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  That would seem to be reasonable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  It isn't working out that way.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  The children are afraid of her.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Father, what is the significance of laughter?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  It is a human physiological response to humor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  Then judging from their laughter the children at school found my remarks humorous. So without understanding humor I have somehow mastered it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  Deck fifteen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  Lal...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Father?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  The children were not laughing with you... they were laughing at you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  Explain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  One is meant kindly... the other is not.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  Why did they wish to be unkind?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  Because you are different. And sometimes differences scare people. I have learned that some of them use humor to hide their fears.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  I do not want to be different, Father.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  Doctor, I require your advice as a successful parent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25A})
(:Text {content:  Well, thank you, Data. I'd like to think I am. Sit down. How's Lal?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25A})
(:Text {content:  Lal is realizing that she is not the same as the other children.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25A})
(:Text {content:  Is it lonely for her?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25A})
(:Text {content:  She does not feel the emotion of loneliness, but she can observe how isolated she is from the others. She wants to be more like them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25A})
(:Text {content:  Sounds familiar.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25A})

(:Text {content:  Yes, Doctor. It is an experience I know too well. But I do not know how to help her. Lal is passing into sentience. It is perhaps the most difficult stage of development for her.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25A})

(:Text {content:  It's also a very human development, Data. As our minds and bodies grow, sometimes quite rapidly, we get confused too... we look around and try to see how we fit in... When Wesley was growing up, he was an extraordinarily bright boy... but he had a hard time making friends. The other children were a little intimidated by him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25A})
(:Text {content:  That is precisely what happened to Lal at school. How did you help him?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25A})

(:Text {content:  Well, first I had to go back into my own childhood and remember how painful it was for me. Because there was a time when I didn't feel very popular either. When I told that to Wesley, it made him feel a little better. He knew I understood what he was going through.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25A})
(:Text {content:  I have not told Lal how difficult it was for me to assimilate. I did not want it to discourage her. Perhaps this was an error of judgement.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25A})

(:Text {content:  You had no one with experience to help you through sentience. At least, she has you. Just help her realize that she's not alone. Be there to nurture her when she needs love and attention.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25A})
(:Text {content:  I can give her attention, doctor. But I am incapable of giving her love.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25A})
(:Text {content:  Why do I find that so hard to believe?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25A})
(:Text {content:  Captain, incoming signal. Starfleet priority one. Admiral Haftel.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  On my monitor, Lieutenant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  Admiral.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  Captain, I hope I didn't disturb you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  Not at all.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})

(:Text {content:  I've discussed my concerns with Starfleet Command. You are to hold your position until I join you. Then I shall personally review the android's development.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  Understood.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  Good. I should advise you, Captain, that if I am not satisfied with what I see... I am empowered to take the android back with me. Haftel out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  Captain's log, supplemental: We are holding position pending the arrival of Admiral Haftel from Starfleet Research.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})

(:Text {content:  Commander Data is completing his final neural transfers to the android he has named Lal... Which I have learned, in the language of Hindi, means \"beloved\".})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31A})
(:Text {content:  Hello, Commander. Lal, how are you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31B})
(:Text {content:  I am functioning within normal I am fine, thank you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31B})
(:Text {content:  Guinan, Lal needs to observe human behavior.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31B})
(:Text {content:  You've come to the right place, Lal. There are all sorts of human behavior in here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31B})
(:Text {content:  In return for this opportunity, Lal is willing to provide services to assist you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31B})
(:Text {content:  Sort of a work-study program...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31B})
(:Text {content:  Father says I would learn a great deal from working with someone as old as you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31B})
(:Text {content:  I believe what I said was that Guinan had much life experience, Lal...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31B})
(:Text {content:  No, the exact words you used were...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31B})

(:Text {content:  You're hired. The most important part of this job is listening... People need a friendly ear to talk to... Happens to be my specialty... There's an art to it and I'll teach it to you, Lal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31B})
(:Text {content:  That would be very beneficial.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31B})
(:Text {content:  How much do you know about food and beverages?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31B})
(:Text {content:  I've been programmed with a listing of fourteen hundred and twelve known beverages as well as recipes for...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31B})
(:Text {content:  What'd did you just say...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31B})
(:Text {content:  I've been programmed with...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31B})
(:Text {content:  \"I've\"... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31B})
(:Text {content:  Lal, you used a verbal contraction.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31B})
(:Text {content:  You said I've instead of I have.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31B})
(:Text {content:  It is a skill my program has never mastered.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31B})
(:Text {content:  Then I will desist.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31B})
(:Text {content:  No. You have exceeded my abilities. I do not object. I just do not understand why it has happened.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31B})
(:Text {content:  Picard to Data. Please report to my Ready Room.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31B})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31B})
(:Text {content:  I am sure the admiral is anxious to meet Lal... I have been sending him regular status reports on her development...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  His visit, Data, is not just an inspection of Lal's progress. He has expressed a concern for her environment.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Her environment, sir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  He believes the Daystrom annex on Galor Four would be more suitable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  He wishes to relocate us?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Not you, Data. Just Lal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})

(:Text {content:  I would not be in favor of that, Captain. There are many things she can learn only from me. My lifetime of experiences, the mistakes I have made and what I have learned from them...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Captain, Commander Riker's shuttle has just returned.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})

(:Text {content:  Acknowledged, Lieutenant. Advise Mister Riker I'll want to meet with him in one hour. Picard out. The admiral is taking the position that Lal's development should be overseen by the most experienced personnel available.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Then he is questioning my ability as a parent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  In a manner of speaking...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Does the admiral have children, sir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  I believe he does... why?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  I am forced to wonder how much experience he had as a parent when his first child was born.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  There, you see?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35A})
(:Text {content:  Visual reconnaissance.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35B})
(:Text {content:  It's called flirting.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35B})
(:Text {content:  They seem to be communicating telepathically.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35B})
(:Text {content:  Well, they're both thinking the same thing if that's what you mean.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35B})
(:Text {content:  Guinan, is the joining of hands a symbolic act for humans?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35C})
(:Text {content:  It shows affection. Humans like to touch each other. They start with the hands and move on from there.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35C})
(:Text {content:  He's biting that female.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35C})
(:Text {content:  No, they're touching lips. Kissing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35C})
(:Text {content:  Why are they leaving?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35C})
(:Text {content:  Lal, there are some things your dad'll have to tell you... when he thinks you're ready.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35C})
(:Text {content:  You're new around here, aren't you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35D})
(:Text {content:  Yes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35D})
(:Text {content:  Lal, put him down...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35E})
(:Text {content:  Commander, what are your intentions toward my daughter?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35E})
(:Text {content:  I'm not... what... who... your daughter?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35E})
(:Text {content:  As Riker looks from one to the other to see if this is a gag... realizing it isn't... to Lal, sheepishly})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35E})
(:Text {content:  I watch them and I can do the things they do... but I'll never feel the emotions. I'll never know love.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  That is a limitation we must learn to accept, Lal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Then why do you still try to emulate humans? What purpose does it serve except to remind you that you are incomplete?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})

(:Text {content:  I have asked myself that many times as I have struggled to be more human, Lal. Until I finally realized that it is the struggle itself that is most important. We must strive to be better than we are. It does not matter that we will never reach our ultimate goal. The effort yields its own rewards.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  You are wise, Father.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  It is only the difference between knowledge and experience.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  I learned today that humans like to hold hands. It is a symbolic gesture of affection.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Prepare to beam me aboard, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  No objective viewpoint could see it any other way...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  I beg your pardon, Admiral, but I thought you were sent here to form an opinion... not to justify one.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Captain, do not make this more difficult than it needs to be.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})

(:Text {content:  It need not be difficult at all. I understand your concerns. What I'm asking for is time, patience. If you keep an open mind, I know you'll see it is imperative to keep Data and Lal together. At least for the formative stages of her development. After that, I'm sure that Commander Data will be delighted to deliver her to Starfleet Research.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Not satisfactory. If mistakes are made during the formative stages, the damage might be irreparable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  I'm convinced the damage would be irreparable if you separate them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Really, Captain... is this about breaking up a family... Rather a sentimental attitude to take toward androids, isn't it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  They are living, sentient beings. Their rights and privileges in our society have been defined. I helped define them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})

(:Text {content:  Yes, yes... I'm more than willing to acknowledge that. And you must acknowledge that Lal may be a technological step forward in the development of artificial intelligence.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  A most significant step.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  And work like this demands strictly controlled procedures.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Which Commander Data is following.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  In effective isolation. And that is unacceptable to Starfleet Research.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  This is not personal, Captain. There are very real dangers here. Without peer review, Starfleet feels we're risking another M-5 catastrophe.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  That is a forced parallel, Admiral. M-5 was a battle computer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})

(:Text {content:  With an artificial intelligence, that led to disaster. Does this new android have the same dangerous potential? I don't know. And that is my point. The blame of the M-5 catastrophe can be laid entirely on the fact that Doctor Daystrom was working in effective isolation. And that cannot be permitted to happen again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})

(:Text {content:  I respect the need for peer review and control precautions. I would submit that you will find them here aboard the Enterprise. My crew has served for years with Data. Unlike your research people, we have enough such experience to reliably judge what is \"normal\" and \"abnormal\" behavior for Soong-type androids. We are uniquely qualified to assist in guiding Lal's development.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  That is what I'm here to decide, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  So Lal now possesses the sum of my programming.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  Her neural nets are laid down identically to yours?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  There do seem to be variations on the quantum level. Lal can use contractions... I cannot.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  An aberration... what have you done about it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  I have maintained records on positronic matrix activity, behavioral norms, and all verbal patterns... I have seen no evidence of other aberrations...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  It would seem that you have actually improved upon yourself, Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  Is that not the goal of every parent, sir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})

(:Text {content:  But... as a good... father... don't you think it would be better, especially in light of this aberration, if Lal could be close to the best possible equipment and the best-trained minds to perform diagnostic, evaluative and repair procedures?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})

(:Text {content:  I have been programmed with all the procedures you have mentioned. And in any meaningful evaluation of Lal, you would require a model for a basis of comparison. I am the only model available, Admiral.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  You haven't mastered human cultural and behavioral norms yourself yet, have you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  Nosir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})

(:Text {content:  Then, if the object of Lal's existence is for her to understand human behavior, wouldn't you admit that you are an imperfect teacher... in fact, she may choose to emulate you rather than humans... even if you instruct her otherwise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})

(:Text {content:  On the other hand, Admiral, how many of your researchers are androids? None. And I would suggest that many aspects of Lal's existence and development may be so alien to human experience that your people simply could not be made to comprehend them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  Where is Lal now?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  This is your idea of appropriate guidance...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  It is an opportunity for her to observe human behavior and more importantly to interact with her crewmates.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  She's capable of running over sixty trillion calculations per second and you have her working as a cocktail waitress.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})

(:Text {content:  Admiral, she is working under the strict guidance of a woman in whom I have absolute trust. Ten-Forward is the center of the ship's social activity. Everyone on board comes here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  I'm not convinced the sort of behavior she observes here will be a positive influence.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  My customers usually behave themselves... if not, they're asked to leave. There's something to learn from that as well, wouldn't you say?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  Admiral Haftel, Guinan. She runs Ten-Forward.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44B})
(:Text {content:  How is Lal doing, Guinan?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44B})
(:Text {content:  She spills a few drinks like the rest of us. But she's learning a lot.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44B})
(:Text {content:  I'm sorry, this is just outrageous.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44B})
(:Text {content:  Come now, Admiral, I'm sure you've been in a few bars in your day...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44B})
(:Text {content:  I want the android out of here... have her report to me immediately for an interview.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44B})
(:Text {content:  Well, I've been looking forward to meeting you, Lal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  Why?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  You're very important to us at Starfleet Research. We've got quite a facility at Galor Four. I'd like to show it to you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  The Admiral is in fact suggesting you be moved to Galor Four, Lal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  Have I done something wrong?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  Not at all. But it is important to broaden your experiences. And there's just so much you can learn aboard a starship, wouldn't you agree?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  Yes, I'd agree.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  Good.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  Thus, the natural conclusion would be when I have learned all there is to learn aboard the starship, I would relocate to Galor Four.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  I don't agree. That is not the natural conclusion here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  I believe it is.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  You see, she resists alternative suggestions to her own father's wishes. That's not a good sign.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  Excuse me, sir, I do not know my father's wishes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  He did not \"warn\" you about this conversation?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  Warn me? No, Admiral. He told me to answer your questions.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  The admiral is concerned that you need more guidance than your father can provide here on the Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  Do not misunderstand. I have great respect for your... father.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  You do not speak with respect.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  I find her very adversarial.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  I am only stating a fact, Admiral.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  Apparently, your father has not taught you about selective judgment in verbalizing your thoughts. This is a skill we can help you develop.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  My father is already helping me, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  Yes, well, the question is whether he's helping you enough.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  Are you asking me, sir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  No, I didn't mean...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  Why don't we, Admiral? In all these discussions, we've never once mentioned Lal's wishes. She's a free, sentient being. What are your wishes, Lal?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  I wish to remain here, Captain Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  Thank you. You're excused.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  Hello, Lal. How are you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  An admiral from Starfleet has come to take me away, Troi. I'm scared.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  You are scared, aren't you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  I... feel it. How is that possible?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  I don't know.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  This is what it means to feel. This is what it means to feel.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})

(:Text {content:  Commander, you have Lal off to a wonderful start in life. And that's what being a parent is all about. But I have decided I must ask you to release her to me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48C})
(:Text {content:  May I know why, sir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48C})

(:Text {content:  All the other arguments aside, there is one that is irrefutable. There are only two Soong-type androids in existence. It is far too dangerous to have the two of you in one place. Especially on a starship. One lucky shot by some Romulan and we lose you both.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48C})
(:Text {content:  That's a fine argument, Admiral. But it doesn't change my feeling that the proper place for Lal to develop is by Data's side.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48C})
(:Text {content:  You're not a parent, Captain. I am. I've learned, with difficulty, that there's a time when... our children... for their own good.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48C})
(:Text {content:  Haftel looks at Picard -- the decision has been made.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48C})
(:Text {content:  Mister Data, it would be much better for Lal if she left knowing you had voluntarily decided this was the best course of action.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48C})

(:Text {content:  Admiral, when I created Lal, it was with the hope that someday she would choose to enter the Academy and become a member of Starfleet. I wanted to give something back in return for all Starfleet has given me. I still do. But Lal is my child. You ask that I volunteer to give her up. I cannot. That would violate every lesson I have learned about human parenting. As Captain Picard told me after he first met her, I have taken on \"quite a responsibility.\" I have brought a new life into this world. It is my duty, not Starfleet's, to guide her through these first difficult steps to maturity, to support her as she learns, to prepare her to be a contributing member of society. No one can relieve me of that obligation. And I cannot ignore it. I am her father.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48C})
(:Text {content:  Then, Mister Data, I regret that I must order you to transport Lal aboard my ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48C})
(:Text {content:  Belay that order, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48C})
(:Text {content:  I beg... your pardon?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48C})
(:Text {content:  I'll take the matter to Starfleet myself.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48C})
(:Text {content:  I am Starfleet, Captain... and this is an order. Proceed, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48C})
(:Text {content:  Hold your ground, Mister Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48C})
(:Text {content:  Do you understand you're risking your command and your career, Captain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48C})

(:Text {content:  There are times, sir, when men of good conscience cannot blindly follow orders. You acknowledge they are sentient, but ignore their personal liberty and freedom. Order a man to turn his child over to the state? Not while I am his captain. If you wish, the Enterprise is prepared to accompany you to Starfleet Command and then we'll see what...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48C})
(:Text {content:  Troi to Commander Data. Report to your lab at once.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48C})
(:Text {content:  Acknowledged, Counselor. He's on his way. Is there a problem?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48C})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Captain, something is terribly wrong with Lal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48C})

(:Text {content:  It lasted barely a moment. She experienced an extraordinary range of feelings... fear, excitement, pleasure... she could barely catch her breath... and then...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})

(:Text {content:  For no apparent reason she got up and walked out of my quarters... she didn't say another word, she just started walking here... and each step became more and more difficult...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Lal is programmed to return to the lab in the event of a malfunction.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Father.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Lal. I am here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  A malfunction. Emotional awareness.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  It would appear to be a symptom of cascade failure. It will require reinitializing the base matrix without wiping out the higher functions.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  I agree. May I assist, Commander?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Thank you, Admiral.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  If you'll excuse us, Commander Data and I have much to do.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})

(:Text {content:  She won't survive much longer. There was nothing anyone could have done. We'd repolarize one pathway and another would collapse. And then another. And his hands started moving faster than I could see, trying to stay ahead of each breakdown. He refused to give up. He was remarkable. It just wasn't meant to be.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49B})
(:Text {content:  Lal, I am unable to correct the system failure.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I... know.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  We must say good-bye now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I... feel...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  What do you feel, Lal?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I... love... you... Father.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I wish I could feel it with you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I... will... feel... it... for... both... of... us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Thank you... for... my... life.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Flirt-ing... laugh-ter... fam-ily... paint-ing... fe-male... hu-man.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Lal suffered complete neural system failure at thirteen hundred hours. I have deactivated the unit.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  The crew grieves for your loss, Mister Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})

(:Text {content:  I thank you for your sympathy. But she is here. Her presence so enriched my life that I could not allow her to pass into oblivion. So I incorporated her programs back into my own... I transferred her memories to me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Mister Data, take your position.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Mister Crusher, set course for the starbase on Otar Two.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Course set, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Engage.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Stardate 43685.2 As part of a continuing exchange program, the Enterprise is taking aboard a Klingon officer to return the recent visit of Commander Riker to the cruiser Pagh.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})

(:Text {content:  We must take care that while he is with us, Commander Kurn is accorded all the rights and responsibilities due the first officer of this ship. If he should feel patronized in any way...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  We'd know about it, sir. One does not patronize a Klingon warrior.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})

(:Text {content:  I'm quite sure your experience aboard the Pagh will prove invaluable during the commander's tour. Be sure that the crew is prepared for any... unusual orders.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  The Klingons are very thorough, Captain. I'm sure Commander Kurn has studied for his assignment with us just as I studied to serve with them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  I understand that he specifically requested the Enterprise...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Commander Kurn is ready for transport, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Energize.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Welcome aboard the Enterprise, Commander. I am Captain Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Thank... you, Captain. I am ready for duty.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  This is Commander William Riker who will be yielding the first officer's position to you during your tour...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  You are relieved. May I take my station, Captain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  I thought that I might show you your quarters...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  I am ready for duty, sir. I ask that I be allowed to take my station.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Very well... If you will accompany us to the bridge...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  May I present your bridge crew...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Unnecessary, Captain. I am prepared to take command.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Proceed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  I am Kurn, commander rank, Klingon Defense Force. You will address me as \"Commander\" or \"sir\" at all times.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})

(:Text {content:  I am fully aware of all Starfleet regulations. They will be strictly adhered to by all personnel while I am in command. It is my intention to bring a sense of discipline that you may not be accustomed to.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  With your permission, of course, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  By all means, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Do you wish to speak, Acting Ensign Wesley Crusher?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Nosir, Commander, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  I have studied all your service records. Impressive. We shall see if you live up to your reputations. The crew awaits your orders, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Take us into the outer cometary cloud, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Set course one-one-four, mark two-three-zero, one-third impulse power!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Aye sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Execute! Execute!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Engaged. Increasing to one-third impulse power, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Mind if I join you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  No, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Something wrong, Wesley?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Commander Kurn perhaps?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})

(:Text {content:  He... just doesn't seem to like me, sir. I can't do anything right for him. Every time I respond to one of his orders... he jumps down my throat. I'm not sure what I'm doing wrong.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  He's just...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Problem, Geordi?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Well, sir... it's our new first officer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  I take it he found something wrong in Engineering?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Just the entire section. He made a surprise inspection in the middle of a maintenance cycle! I tried to explain to him, but...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  He wouldn't listen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  We're all going to be doing double shifts to get things ready for the next inspection.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  His style of command is just different. Klingons believe in a strict formality of command and obedience.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  But this isn't a Klingon ship. He's got to loosen up a little, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Off Riker's look...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Except the one guy who wouldn't mind it...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Sensors picking up asteroidal debris ahead, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Can you identify the coordinates, Mister Worf?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Bearing zero-zero-one, mark point-oh-three, range three hundred thousand kilometers.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Excellent. Please scan the asteroid field for me, Lieutenant, and report.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Approximately two thousand small objects, none in our direct flight path, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  So, no course correction is necessary, is that what you're saying?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  It should not be needed, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Very good, Lieutenant. You handled that well.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Yes?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  Captain's mess... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  Yes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  Resume.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  Getting a little tired of this...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  I would like to make one suggestion, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  A suggestion...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})

(:Text {content:  When I served aboard the Pagh, the hardest part for me was in recognizing and adapting to the demands of the crew. They needed an iron hand. They wanted it. I can imagine how difficult it must be for you to work with a crew that is so different. I'd be happy to guide you in this regard if it would be helpful.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  No. It wouldn't.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  This is not a Klingon ship, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  No, Commander, it is not. If it were a Klingon ship, I would have killed you for offering your... \"suggestion\".})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  How long has the bird been dead? It appears to have been lying in the sun for some time.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8B})
(:Text {content:  It's not really dead, it's replicated. But you do understand we... cook many of our foods...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8B})
(:Text {content:  Ah yes... I was told to prepare for that... I will try some of your burned replicated bird meat.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8B})
(:Text {content:  I have attempted to select a menu that will allow you to sample a variety of dishes, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8B})
(:Text {content:  Try some caviar...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8B})
(:Text {content:  The odor is not palatable. What is it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8B})
(:Text {content:  The unhatched eggs of a large scaleless fish.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8B})
