(:Text {content:  It is from the Caspian Sea on Earth, Commander. A delicacy and a personal favorite of mine. Our replicators have never done it justice. I managed to store a few cases aboard for special occasions...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8B})
(:Text {content:  I am honored, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8B})
(:Text {content:  Are you adjusting to your new environment, Commander?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8C})
(:Text {content:  I find the constraints quite difficult to conform to... I'm sure any Klingon warrior would...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8C})
(:Text {content:  to stop myself from killing Commander Riker.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8C})

(:Text {content:  I believe he was trying to communicate the crew's discomfort with my style of command... under different circumstances, I would take that as a challenge to my authority.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8C})

(:Text {content:  One of the goals of the exchange program is for all of us to learn tolerance, Commander. As for my crew, it may be healthy to shake up the status quo occasionally. Feel free to disagree, Mister Riker...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8C})
(:Text {content:  Well, I'd say the commander certainly has the crew on their toes...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8C})
(:Text {content:  None taken. I never kill anyone at the supper table, Mister La Forge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8C})
(:Text {content:  Don't you like it, Commander?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8C})
(:Text {content:  Our food has much more... taste to it. While I'm sure this is... well prepared, it is far too bland for the stomach of a Klingon...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8C})
(:Text {content:  It seems to agree with Worf.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8C})
(:Text {content:  Yes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8C})
(:Text {content:  Enter.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Worf steps into the room, stands stiffly at attention.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Permission to speak freely, sir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  For what purpose?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  I have questions I wish to pose.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Are your quarters so... comfortable?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  They serve me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  This entire ship seems built for... comfort, relaxation, being at ease. It is not the ship for a warrior... not the ship for a Klingon.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  You cannot ask these questions within the boundaries of protocol?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  They are... of a personal nature, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Permission granted. Pose your questions.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  I wish to know if I have given you offense.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  I am not a human... if you had given offense, you would not need to ask.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps I have not performed my duties to your satisfaction?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  I find you to be a capable Starfleet officer. A credit to your ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Yet you dishonor me at every opportunity.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Have I? I was not aware that being polite to a Starfleet officer would bring dishonor on him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  I am a Klingon.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Really? Perhaps your blood has thinned in this environment. I simply don't want to... hurt you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  mev yap! (That is enough!)})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  So... your blood is not so thin after all.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  I am Klingon... if you doubt it, a demonstration can be arranged.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  That is the response of a Klingon. The response I would expect... from my... older brother.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})

(:Text {content:  I was barely a year old when you went to the Khitomer Outpost. The outpost was new... unfinished. You... our mother and father were not going to stay long. It was decided that I did not need to go. I was left with our father's friend, Lorgh, until you returned. You never did.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  The Starfleet officer that rescued me was told by the Klingon High Command that I had no living relatives.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  They assumed I was killed with the family at Khitomer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Lorgh had no sons. He took me into his family. It was not until I had reached the Age of Ascension that I was told the truth.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  So you asked to serve aboard the Enterprise... to watch me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  It was an excellent opportunity to find out what kind of Klingon you were... or if you were Klingon at all.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Your deception offends me, brother.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  It should. But it was required.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  To satisfy your curiosity.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  No. Much more. You are the eldest son. The challenge is yours to make.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Challenge... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  The Klingon High Council has judged our father a traitor to the empire.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  What are the allegations, Worf?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  My father is accused of aiding and abetting the Romulan attack on the Khitomer outpost.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  The attack in which he himself was killed... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  It is a lie.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  But why now... after twenty years?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})

(:Text {content:  I do not know, Captain. I will hear the evidence when I arrive. The charge has been made by Duras, the son of my father's greatest rival. Our family name will be disgraced for seven generations. It is my responsibility to clear his name or answer for his crimes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Answer for them?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})

(:Text {content:  The family of a Klingon warrior is responsible for his actions and he is responsible for theirs. If I fail in my challenge, I will be executed. Will you grant my leave, Captain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  No.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})

(:Text {content:  If I understand correctly, a Starfleet officer, a respected member of my crew could stand accused of a capital crime. Your actions in this matter reflect on this ship and the Federation. Therefore, it seems only appropriate for your captain to be at your side as you make your challenge, Lieutenant. I'm sure you would do no less for me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Commander Kurn...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  We are changing course. Set coordinates for the First City of the Klingon Imperial Empire.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Mister Crusher...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Sir!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Lay in a course for the Klingon System. Bearing one-four-five by two-four-oh...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Ready sir!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Execute.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  We arrive within the hour.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Yes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  The Council will receive you at high sun in the Great Hall of--})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  I know the procedures of the challenge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  You'll need a cha'DIch to defend you. While you are accused, you will not be allowed combat.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  I would be honored if you chose me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  I ask you to stand with me... to be my cha'DIch.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  jIlajneS. ghIj qet jaghmeyjaj. with fear.) The two sons of Mogh No. For the proceeding, you will not reveal your true father.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  I must...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  You will not.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})

(:Text {content:  Because it would mean my death as well if you fail. A Klingon's honor means more than his life. Perhaps your human values cloud your judgment. I insist...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  On this ship, you are my commander. And I obey. In the council chamber, you are my cha'DIch. You do not insist. You obey.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Yes, brother.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  There was a time... when just standing here would have been a death sentence for us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Captain, I am honored that you... Commander Riker... Counselor Troi... have chosen to accompany me. Your presence will surely impress the council.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  We're here as long as you need us, Worf.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})

(:Text {content:  Once I make the challenge, I assume the sins of my father. I will be in disgrace until his innocence is proven. I would request that you not remain for the entire proceeding.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  You will never be a disgrace to us, Worf.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  It is a matter of personal honor to my brother.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  I understand. You will advise us when it is appropriate to depart.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  It will be clear.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  I am Worf, son of Mogh. I have come to challenge the lies that have been spoken of my father.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Worf, son of Mogh, you have challenged the judgment of the council. Are you prepared to answer for this if you fail?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  With my life, K'mpec.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Why do you come before us, Commander?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  I am Kurn, son of... Lorgh. I will stand by Worf's side. I am cha'DIch.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  You claim a birthright you have forsaken.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  I have not forsaken my heritage. I am Klingon. My heart is of this world... my blood is as yours.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Yet you come to us wearing a child's uniform... And you bring outsiders to our hall.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  I am here at my own request. I am Captain Picard of the Enterprise. I extend greetings on behalf of the Federation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Your words have no meaning here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})

(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Worf has served under my command with distinction. He has earned my admiration and my respect. It is my greatest wish that this council in its wisdom will clear his family name and return him to duty.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  The trust of a commanding officer is admirable... the council has noted it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Speak the accusation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})

(:Text {content:  For many turns, the truth about Khitomer has lain dormant... unknown. Now the truth is revealed. The traitor, Mogh, sent the defense access code to the Romulan patrol ships and allowed them to destroy the outpost. Thousands died on Khitomer... my father died on Khitomer. Their deaths must be avenged!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Your father was a traitor! By posing this challenge, you are a traitor!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23B})
(:Text {content:  You will not wear the emblems of our people!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23D})
(:Text {content:  Picard to Enterprise. Three to beam up.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})

(:Text {content:  Mister Data... I want you to find out everything you can about the destruction of the Khitomer outpost. Cross reference with Romulan tactics and strategic information on the region. Request access to the Klingon central information net. Computer. Presentation overview of Klingon custom and law pertaining to familial accountability.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Acknowledged.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  In my Ready Room.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  You are a fool. Your challenge will only result in a fool's death.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  It is a good day to die, Duras... and the day is not yet over.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  The council stands in recess. We will return for the mek'ba, when the evidence will be presented. Qapla' (Success! -- a traditional Klingon parting)})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  I would speak with you alone.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  You should not have brought the challenge... there was no risk to you... what does it matter... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  I am Klingon...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Of that I have no question. But your life in the Federation would not be affected by this judgment.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  My father...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})

(:Text {content:  Is dead. He died long ago. I knew your father, served with him... this is not the way I wanted to remember him. But we must let the past be and protect what we have now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  If you leave before the mek'ba... no shame will fall on you. Return to your ship... go back to your life. The challenge will be forgotten.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Why would you ask me to lay aside the honor of my father... my family... Are these the words of the council... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  I will not be questioned by you! Leave now or you too will be condemned as a traitor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  The Klingon council is refusing to allow us access to their information net, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36A})
(:Text {content:  On what basis?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36A})
(:Text {content:  Orders of a member of the council.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36A})
(:Text {content:  Duras...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36A})
(:Text {content:  What Federation starship was closest to Khitomer at the time of the attack?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36C})
(:Text {content:  The USS Intrepid, sir. They were the first ship on the scene.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36C})
(:Text {content:  Contact Starfleet, request all logs of the Intrepid... Riker to Doctor Crusher.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36C})
(:Text {content:  Crusher here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36C})

(:Text {content:  Doctor, I want you to look over the medical records of all rescue vessels that responded to the Khitomer massacre... see if there is any information on the aftermath that could help us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36C})
(:Text {content:  Understood.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36C})
(:Text {content:  Uh, Commander, could I see you a moment...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36C})
(:Text {content:  I was just making a few routine entries... and somehow, by accident, I just happened to... access the Klingon information net.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36C})
(:Text {content:  How could you obtain access without the proper authorization codes?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36C})
(:Text {content:  I don't think we want to know, Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36C})
(:Text {content:  I should have known... come then Duras. Worf was right... it is a good day to die.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  That time has not yet come. It does not have to come for many turns. I know who you are, Kurn... son of Mogh.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  What?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})

(:Text {content:  A strange decision to serve as his cha'DIch. I was curious to know why. Nothing can be hidden from me, Kurn. It was a wise choice to hide your family name -- do not err by embracing it again... for you only embrace death.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  We will see.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})

(:Text {content:  Worf has made his choice and he will die for it. But you are still safe. Let him stand alone. He is no longer your brother... he is not one of us. I promise you no one will learn of your family line. You'll have your rank... maybe even a command of your own.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  He is my brother. I will not betray him!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Then you will die for him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  What kind of vicious weapon makes a wound like that... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  A kut'luch... the ceremonial weapon of an assassin.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Fortunately, his metabolic recovery is phenomenal... he'll be all right...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  It does not matter. We should have let him die.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Now that Duras knows his bloodline, we will both be executed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  You sound like you've already lost, Worf.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Commander, I have discovered the basis of the charges against Worf's father.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})

(:Text {content:  Apparently the Klingons recently captured a Romulan ship with logs that provided new information on the Khitomer attack. They clearly indicate a transmission from the outpost to the Romulans moments before the shields dropped.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  From Worf's father?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  It does correspond to Mogh's personal security code.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  How can we be sure these records haven't been falsified?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  We can cross check them against the Intrepid's sensor logs...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  I will try... but the Intrepid was at the edge of sensor range during the attack and we cannot be sure if the scans are complete.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Looks like a pretty good match-up, Data...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Both the Intrepid and Romulan logs show a series of distress signals from Khitomer...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40A})
(:Text {content:  What happens here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40A})
(:Text {content:  Gaps in the Intrepid logs, missing information because of the range...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40A})
(:Text {content:  This is where Mogh's alleged transmission should be.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40A})
(:Text {content:  Right in the middle of a gap.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40A})
(:Text {content:  Wait a second, Data. Back up.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40A})

(:Text {content:  Look at this... just before the Intrepid gap begins, the timebase of both files are in perfect sync... but look at the signals just after the shields dropped.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40A})
(:Text {content:  They are no longer synchronous.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40A})
(:Text {content:  Commander, somebody's been rewriting history.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40A})

(:Text {content:  I will not pretend to fully understand the nuances of your world's law or culture, Mister Worf. But I do understand when somebody is trying to hide something...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  K'mpec urged me to drop my challenge, abandon my family honor... it was impossible to believe I was hearing a Klingon speak...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})

(:Text {content:  Obviously, they did not expect and never wanted this challenge... you're getting close to something, Lieutenant... something they care a great deal about protecting...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})

(:Text {content:  If it is true, it is not just Duras but the High Council itself that is my enemy. Captain, I must choose a new cha'DIch. I would like your permission to ask a member of the crew.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  Of course, Lieutenant. Ask whomever you wish.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  Sir, I would ask that you stand with me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  You may refuse... with no dishonor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  I appreciate the gesture, Lieutenant. But I know there are stronger, younger men from which to choose...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})

(:Text {content:  A Klingon warrior knows that brute strength is not the most important asset in a fight. I have served under you in many conflicts... and know you to be a shrewd and forceful opponent. I can think of no one I would rather have at my side.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  jIlajneS. ghIj qet jaghmeyjaj. I accept.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  My challenge will proceed. No threat, no treachery will stop it. Not even a trap for my cha'DIch set by a coward.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Duras...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  I will not listen to this filth from the son of a traitor...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Keep your place, Picard!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  This is my place.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  He is now my cha'DIch.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  No! This cannot be allowed. This is not your world, human. You do not command here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  I am not here to command.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Then you must be ready to fight... something that Starfleet doesn't teach you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  You may test that assumption... at your convenience.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  The cha'DIch is accepted.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  No!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  You challenge my authority?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Mek'ba will begin.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  I've got something...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  Worf was not the only survivor of the Khitomer massacre.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  Another child?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  No. A Klingon woman was found with Worf.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  Kahlest... who was she?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})

(:Text {content:  I don't know. Just says here she had severe injuries... transferred to Starbase twenty-four for treatment. That's when she was separated from Worf. After she recovered, she returned home.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  We've got to find her if she's still alive. Data, scan the Klingon central net... see if there's any record of her...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})

(:Text {content:  outpost shields themselves. They were given the defense access code! The records clearly show the Romulan patrol ships receiving a personal transmission from Mogh just before they lowered the outpost shields. Mogh betrayed us. Four thousand Klingons died on Khitomer... and only the son of Mogh survived.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Riker to Captain Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53B})
(:Text {content:  Stand by.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53B})

(:Text {content:  The Khitomer commander noted in his log that Mogh had been acting suspiciously... that he was often away from his post for long periods of time. The commander found that Mogh was sending coded neutrino pulses to a sector within Romulan territory. A formal charge would have been made, but Mogh betrayed them and thousands were killed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53B})
(:Text {content:  Go ahead, Number One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53B})

(:Text {content:  We've located another survivor of the Khitomer massacre, Captain... a woman who was found with Worf. Her name is Kahlest... she resides in the Old Quarter of the First City.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  Well done. Picard out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  that Mogh often spoke of his admiration for the Romulans... Their culture... their women.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54A})
(:Text {content:  K'mpec.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54A})
(:Text {content:  May we have a... short recess?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54A})
(:Text {content:  Len'mat. (recess)})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54A})
(:Text {content:  Have you heard of a woman named Kahlest?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54A})
(:Text {content:  She was my ghojmoK... my nurse.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54A})
(:Text {content:  Then it's possible she was an eyewitness to your father's activities at Khitomer...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54A})
(:Text {content:  But she died in the attack---})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54A})
(:Text {content:  She survived. She's living in the Old Quarter. I'm going to find her.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54A})
(:Text {content:  It is too dangerous. You cannot go alone.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54A})
(:Text {content:  I am your cha'DIch.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54A})
(:Text {content:  Kahlest?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  What do you want?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  No.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  You don't even know what I want.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  You are cha'Dich. I know.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Then you know that Worf's life is at stake.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  I cannot help. I am dead. A long time dead.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Were you with Worf's father just before the attack on Khitomer?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  I am dead! My... life ended on Khitomer. I served a proud family... a strong house. All that is gone.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Worf is not gone, Kahlest. The family you served needs you again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  I cannot help.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Was his father a traitor?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  No! Mogh was loyal... to the emperor. Mogh suspected someone of plotting with the Romulans and followed them to Khitomer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Who? Who was the traitor?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  I do not know.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  We know a signal was sent to the Romulans just before the attack... if you were with Mogh and his family...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  I was not. I was with Worf only.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Then, there is no way to prove Mogh's innocence, and Worf will die as the son of a traitor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  You must leave, cha'DIch. I am dead.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  My appreciation, madam.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  You are brave, cha'DIch. Worf chose well. Lessons hold.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  Kahlest, would they know who you are? Would they recognize you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  K'mpec would remember Kahlest. I caught his eye back then. I had many suitors once. He wanted seloh (sex) with me. He was too fat.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  Then, come back with me. They do not know how much you know. Perhaps it will shake loose the truth.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  I will come.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  The mek'ba is complete. The evidence is clear. I ask that the judgment stand... and that Worf be condemned as the son of a traitor to the Empire.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Worf, son of Mogh...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  tam (Be quiet!)})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  The mek'ba is not complete. I bring an eyewitness to the Khitomer massacre... with new evidence, K'mpec.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Mogh was innocent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Len'mat.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  What is it you think you know, old woman?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Do not answer. Rules of the mek'ba require that her evidence be presented in open council.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  You will die before giving evidence.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  You stand there while this patahk threatens an old woman?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Be silent, Duras. Would you kill old women to cover your dishonor?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Duras, it is your dishonor we are protecting here, isn't it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  I have no reluctance to kill you, human.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Are you prepared to hear her evidence in open council, Duras?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Obviously, we are not. Kahlest, you will go now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  It is good to see you again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  You are still fat, K'mpec.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  I asked you to leave, to let this judgment go unanswered... but you did not hear my words, and now it has come to this.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Why did you judge my father guilty when you knew he was not?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})

(:Text {content:  Someone had to be blamed. The warriors who captured the Romulan ship had learned of the treachery. But only the council knew whose security code had been transmitted. Ja'rod, father of Duras.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  This Ha'DIbaH (animal) should have been fed to the dogs!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})

(:Text {content:  His family is powerful. If the truth were known, it would shatter the council... almost certainly plunge us into civil war. You were in Starfleet... we did not expect you to challenge the judgment. Nor did we know that there was another son of Mogh.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Worf's challenge is successful. His family honor must be restored, K'mpec.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})

(:Text {content:  You don't understand. His challenge was defeated before he ever made it. You will not be allowed to present this evidence. The judgment will stand and you will be condemned... as will your brother.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  You admit the truth and still expect him to accept punishment. What does this say of an empire that holds honor so dear?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  The empire will not be destroyed for one family's honor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  This is unacceptable, K'mpec.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  You have no say in this, cha'DIch!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})

(:Text {content:  I speak now as the captain of the USS Enterprise and Lieutenant Worf's commanding officer. You will not execute a member of my crew, sir. Nor will I turn his brother over to you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})

(:Text {content:  You risk much. This is not the Federation, Picard. If you defy the orders of the High Council in an affair of the empire, the alliance with the Federation could fall to dust.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  The alliance with the Federation is not based on lies! Protect your secrets if you must, but do not sacrifice these men.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  A true Klingon will not run from his judgment, Captain. No matter what you would have them do.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})

(:Text {content:  What will you do with Kurn? Make him a Starfleet officer? He is a Klingon. When his tour aboard your ship is complete he will have no place to go. He would rather die.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  I will die for the empire.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  The cha'DIch will be silent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Allow my brother to return to his life. Only you need know his true bloodline.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Not acceptable. His honor would demand revenge. He is too dangerous.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  If you allow him to live, I will give you something that will serve your purpose far more than my death. I will accept... discommendation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  You would do this in open council?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  It would be the same as admitting your father's guilt, Worf.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  So be it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Your heart is Klingon. It will be done. What has been said here will never be spoken of again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  You... are the son of a traitor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  I am ready.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Enough! I will stand alone in the hall.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Why is he doing this? I was ready to die.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Worf wants you to live... the name of your father must someday be cleared. He needs you alive... with your honor intact.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  But to do this...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  There will be another day, Commander. Do not forget what he does here today... do not let your children forget.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  tlhIH ghIj jIHyoj. (I fear your judgment)})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64A})
(:Text {content:  biHnuch (Coward)})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64A})
(:Text {content:  You must also...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64A})
(:Text {content:  May you stand here again someday and roar over the fallen bodies of your enemies.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64A})

(:Text {content:  They share a moment of silent promise, then Kurn reluctantly turns his back on his brother. Picard moves to Worf and they walk side by side, heads held high through the crowd and EXIT. The double doors close behind with a LOUD CLANG as we...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64A})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Stardate 43714.1. We have finally succeeded in eradicating the plague on Cor Caroli Five, and are now preparing to leave orbit and proceed to our next mission --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  Hood to assist their terraforming efforts on Browder Four.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Commander, ship's sensors detect an abnormal energy reading in the captain's quarters.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Type?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Undetermined.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Riker to Captain Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Security team to captain's quarters --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Picard to Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Anyone receiving this transmission, please respond.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Security override. Priority one.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Is something the matter, Lieutenant?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  It's all right. I'm not going to hurt you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Who -- ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Jean-Luc Picard of the Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Captain Picard! We've studied your missions at the Academy...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Mitena Haro, first year cadet, Starfleet Academy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps you can explain what this is all about.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Unfortunately, I can't, Mister...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Tholl. Kova Tholl, of Mizar Two.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Well, Mister Tholl, all I know is that I've been brought here against my will. Wherever \"here\" is...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  The same thing happened to me, sir. I was alone, studying... and I fainted. When I came to... That was about three days ago.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  And you, sir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  I've been here twelve days, possibly more. I had been meditating privately -- and for no reason whatever, I lost consciousness.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  What can you tell me about our captors?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Nothing. They've never shown themselves.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Four sleeping areas... that implies we'll be joined by another captive...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Food?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  It's edible... but I wouldn't call it food.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  I wouldn't touch that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Why not?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  If it's the door lock, the combination is too complex to hit at random -- I tried it, and was punished.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Punished -- how?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Severe pain... some sort of energy beam. I won't get near that panel again...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  The Enterprise will find us, won't it, sir? As soon as they discover you're missing, they'll start to search... Won't they?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Haro takes courage from Picard's words, manages a smile.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Yes, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Sir, the Hood has arrived at the rendezvous point. They are expecting us in thirty-six hours.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Thank you, Lieutenant. Mister Data. The nearest pulsar is in the Lonka cluster, is it not?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Correct, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  And what do we know about that pulsar?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  A great deal, sir. It is a rotating neutron star of approximately four point three five six solar masses.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Mister Crusher -- how long would it take us to get there?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  At warp seven... thirty-four minutes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Mister Crusher -- make it so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Sir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Set course for the Lonka pulsar. Warp two.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Sir, at warp two -- we'll arrive at the pulsar in thirty-one hours...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Thank you, Ensign. Engage.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Captain, are we delaying our rendezvous with the Hood?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  We may have to.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Mister Worf, contact the Hood and inform them of our delay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Aye, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Belay that. There'll be no further communications off this ship without my prior authorization.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Commander -- I'd like a word with you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Mister Data -- you have the bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Data -- any guesses as to what this is all about?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15A})

(:Text {content:  I see no point in randomly selecting alternative motivations for the captain's actions considering that not enough information has been offered to make any one \"guess\" superior to another.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15A})
(:Text {content:  In other words, you don't know either.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15A})
(:Text {content:  Number One... You know I like to keep you well informed as to the nature of our missions.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15B})
(:Text {content:  Yes, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15B})
(:Text {content:  And if I don't inform you -- there's a reason.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15B})

(:Text {content:  I don't like keeping you in the dark, Commander... but for the next few days I won't be able to be as communicative as usual. It may make things difficult for you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15B})
(:Text {content:  Don't worry about me, sir. I can handle it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15B})
(:Text {content:  And the crew?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15B})
(:Text {content:  You can count on us all, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15B})
(:Text {content:  I appreciate that, Number One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15B})
(:Text {content:  Picard -- what are you doing?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Attempting to show our captors that we possess intelligence.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  You don't think they know that already? They can hear us talking...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  They may not realize we are communicating through language.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Captain Picard's letting them know that we comprehend mathematics... by tapping out the first six prime numbers.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  I know what he's doing. I'm trying to understand why.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  To get their attention.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Oh, you may get their attention, all right... and they'll give you a dose of agony for using the keypad.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  I'll take the chance. It's imperative that we communicate with our abductors... find out what they want.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Obviously, they want us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Obviously. But why? What made our captors choose us? What makes us special?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  I couldn't say, Captain. I'm certainly not special -- I'm just one cadet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  You're a Bolian. There are very few Bolians in Starfleet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  I am one of three in the Academy. The other two have academic records much better than mine...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  What's your best area of study?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Impulse propulsion systems. I'm really good with field coils...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Good enough to be useful to our abductors?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  I don't know. Maybe. But if they needed an engineer, sir, why didn't they take a \"real\" one? Why pick a Starfleet cadet?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  That, I can't answer. The Bolians are maintaining an uneasy truce with the Moropa, are they not?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  That's right. But this doesn't look like Moropa technology... and, even assuming the Moropa wanted me, why would they want either of you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  I've never even heard of the Moropa. My race has no enemies.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  None? In the last three hundred years of Mizarian history, your planet has been conquered six times!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  And we've survived by not resisting. Mizarians value peace above confrontation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Then you have no idea who might have done this.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  No. I don't know of anyone who bears malice toward my race.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Or against you personally?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  You can't mean to suggest that someone with a personal grudge against me has gone to all this trouble...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  I'm not suggesting anything. I'm merely trying to come up with an explanation for your abduction.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})

(:Text {content:  I'm sorry, Picard -- I can't give you one. I am neither important enough to hold for ransom nor radical enough to be dangerous. I'm a simple public servant... assistant to the regent of Pozaron, our third-largest city.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Nonetheless, Mister Tholl --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  It would seem a new arrival is imminent...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Stop! We mean you no harm...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  We are prisoners, like yourself! We are not the enemy!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Who has done this?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  We don't know. We were brought here the same way you were. Our captors refuse to show themselves.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  I don't trust you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  You must trust us. We wish only to return to our worlds. Were you abducted from Chalna?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  You know my planet?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Yes. I visited there twelve years ago.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Your five... and twenty more.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Ouch.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  If it's too rich, fold.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  I'm thinking, I'm thinking...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Think less, play more.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  I say he folds.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  I believe you are incorrect, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})

(:Text {content:  In situations where more than two players have asked for three cards and the minimum raise was ten, Geordi has stayed in the game seventy-three percent of the time.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  I still say he folds.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  I don't want to hurt my average.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Enter.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Counselor, gentlemen. Forgive the intrusion... I was just passing by.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  You are always welcome, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Don't let me interrupt... please continue.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Bet is twenty-five to you, Lieutenant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  You are bluffing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  So was I.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  I was wondering, Mister La Forge... what's our engine efficiency status?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Operating at ninety-three percent, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  That's good, but I'd like to increase that efficiency to ninety-five percent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  I'll get on it right away, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  It wasn't an order, Mister La Forge. You can get to it later.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  I don't wish to disrupt your recreation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  No problem, sir. Lady Luck left me long ago.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Would you care to join us, sir? We have an opening.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  I'd rather just observe, if you don't mind.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Of course not. Your bet, Counselor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Pair of threes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Flush. Queen high.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  That beats my three fours.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Well played, Counselor. May I have a word with you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Certainly, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Forgive me, gentlemen. I'll return your player in a moment.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Take your time, sir... she's won almost every hand.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  I wanted to ask you about the crew... how are they reacting to our sudden change in course?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23A})
(:Text {content:  I've sensed no unusual reaction, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23A})
(:Text {content:  After all -- such a change is hardly out of the ordinary.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23A})
(:Text {content:  Aren't they curious or concerned as to why?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23A})
(:Text {content:  Curious, yes -- concerned, no. They trust you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23A})
(:Text {content:  And how far do you think that trust goes?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23A})
(:Text {content:  Sir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23A})
(:Text {content:  I know... the crew has always had full confidence in me. But if that were to change...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23A})
(:Text {content:  I'd inform you, sir... of course.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23A})
(:Text {content:  Thank you, Counselor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23A})
(:Text {content:  My given name is Esoqq.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Has it a meaning?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Yes... it means \"fighter.\"})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  I'll bet half the names in the Chalnoth language mean \"fighter.\"})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Mizarians. Your names all mean \"surrender.\"})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  We are a peaceful race, a race of thinkers --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  A race of cowards. And you? I don't know your people.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Haro doesn't know how to deal with Esoqq, looks nervously to Picard for guidance. Picard nods to her})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Yes, that would follow.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Who would want to imprison a child?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  I'm not a \"child\" --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Esoqq -- I've been trying to determine if we have a common enemy... someone who'd have reason to confine us here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  There are Chalnoth who would kill me if they could... but kidnap? There is no reason.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  You have many enemies?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  None of consequence. I've slain all the ones who mattered.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  That shocks you, Bolian?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  A little...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  I'm not surprised... I've heard about your race. You're uncivilized -- you have no laws, no system of government --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  The Chalnoth have no use for laws or governments! We are strong You live in anarchy, murdering one another -- that mentality may get us all killed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  And you may be the first...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Both of you -- this is getting us nowhere.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})

(:Text {content:  Neither is asking us useless questions, Picard. But if you must pursue the topic, answer this: who are your enemies? The Federation's in conflict with half the galaxy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  That's not true --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Isn't it? How long have you and the Romulans been adversaries?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Quite a while, Mister Tholl. And I'm perfectly willing to entertain the hypothesis that our captors are Romulans. But what would Romulans want with you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  My brainpower, perhaps. It's well known that my species possesses superior intelligence... and I am considered among the smartest of my people.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  And the least modest.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  What is this?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Food.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  The only food?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  It would seem so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Poison!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Then there's nothing here for you to eat?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  You.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Don't even think that! Picard Esoqq -- how long can you go without food?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Three days. Perhaps four.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  No longer?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  No longer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  All tests indicate the same result I've never felt better.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  I see. Then why did you come in? Your annual physical wasn't due for another month.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  You usually have to remind me, then badger me, and finally order me to report. For once, I thought I'd save you the trouble.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Jean-Luc -- be honest with your doctor. Were there any symptoms or warning signs you haven't told me about?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  As far as I know, I'm in perfect health.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Well, then... return to your post.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Will you dine with me tonight?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  In Ten-Forward?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  How about my quarters? More intimate.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  You're full of surprises today, Jean-Luc.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  I take that to be a yes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Picard -- is it wise to attempt an escape?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  It's imperative.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Why? So far, our captors haven't mistreated us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  We've been kidnapped, locked in a room -- you don't think that's mistreatment?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  They haven't hurt us, have they? I think we should just be patient until we find out what they want.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  We can no longer afford to be patient. If we don't act soon, Esoqq will starve...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  If we antagonize them, they may decide we're more trouble than we're worth... kill us, and go capture another four.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  I agree we're taking a risk. But I see no alternative.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Well, I refuse to help.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  As you wish, Mister Tholl. We must open this panel.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Not very sturdy...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Haro -- stand back.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  The design is simple... crosscircuiting the door mechanism should be easy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Make it so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Yes, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  I think I've got it...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  I warned you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Out with it, Jean-Luc.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Out with what?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Whatever's been on your mind all evening long.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Has it been that apparent?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  You know me well, don't you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  After all this time, I ought to.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  I have been preoccupied. I've been thinking about us... and the choices I've made.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  We've both made choices...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  And I've been wondering if they've been the right ones. Sometimes I feel we've allowed our positions to isolate us...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Our positions necessitate a degree of professional detachment...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  But there's a danger in becoming too detached... in never allowing ourselves to get closer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Is that what you want, Jean-Luc? To get closer?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  You're a very attractive woman.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  And you're a very attractive man. But we both know it's not as simple as that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Would it be simpler if I weren't your commanding officer?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Simpler, perhaps, but... that's not the only issue. Right now, I guess, I'm comfortable with our relationship the way it is.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Then I'll respect that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Would you care to dance?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  All right.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  I don't know if I've ever told you... but I'm glad you're back on the Enterprise. I missed our... friendship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  So did I...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Jean-Luc, if I didn't know you better... I'd think you were playing games with me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Are you sorry you came here tonight?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  I didn't say that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Good. Because I'm delighted you did. But perhaps we should call it a night.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Good night.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  I warned you not to provoke our captors. The next beams might be lethal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Not to you. You moved far from the door...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Of course I did! Being stunned once was enough.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  You claim you were hit by the stun beam... before the rest of us arrived. You could be lying. Maybe our enemy is watching us... from inside.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  You accuse me of collaborating with our abductors?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Collaboration is what your species does best!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  You did try to talk us out of attempting to escape...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  For all we know, you may be our captor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Impossible. I'm a Mizarian. My people are not agressive --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  How can we be sure you're a Mizarian? What if you're an impostor?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  This is nonsense! What if you're an impostor? Esoqq was the last one to appear... and he is the only one with a weapon...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Which I may still use...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Tholl -- our captors have transporters and stun beams. I hardly think they'd try to keep us at bay with a knife.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Then maybe she's an impostor. She could have triggered the stun beams deliberately.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  I was hit, too...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  To forestall suspicion! You were very quick to volunteer...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Tholl -- I asked her to open the door.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  You mean ordered her. You've been giving orders from the moment you got here... trying to make everyone do what you want.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  What I want is for all of us to escape.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Why should we believe you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Captain Picard's put his life at stake for others many times... the primitive culture on Mintaka Three, the Wogneer creatures in the Ordek Nebula...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Cor Caroli Five...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Right -- helping to cure the Phyrox Plague.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  And how do we know this is the heroic Captain Picard? We have no proof of his identity...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  You've wasted our time with failed attempts to communicate with them or escape. Is that your task -- to keep us busy so we're off-guard?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  What have you to say, Picard?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})

(:Text {content:  First officer's log, supplemental. Although we're still two hundred million kilometers from the Lonka pulsar, the Captain has ordered us to slow to one-half impulse.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39A})
(:Text {content:  He has offered no explanation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  I don't understand why we're going to this pulsar. And creeping up on it at half impulse makes even less sense...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  The captain's given unusual orders before...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  I know... but this time it's different. He's different. I can't put my finger on it... but I'm worried.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  The captain does seem... detached from his emotions.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Mister La Forge -- we are operating at ninety-six percent engine efficiency. Well done.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Thank you, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  When we arrive at the pulsar, I'm going to need everyone at their best. I know I can count on you all.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Of course, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Excellent. An ale for me, please... In fact, ales for everyone.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Here's to the finest crew in Starfleet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40B})
(:Text {content:  You know, back when I was in the Academy, we would follow each toast with a song.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40B})
(:Text {content:  An unusual tradition.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40B})
(:Text {content:  Let's see if I can remember one...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40B})
(:Text {content:  drinking song -- i.e., \"Garry Owen\")})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40B})
(:Text {content:  Commander... What's the captain up to?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  That's not the captain I know...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})

(:Text {content:  apparent purpose... by itself, I can accept that, all of us can... because the captain says it is important and we trust him... Then he runs the crew through efficiency drills for the first time in my tour of duty... but if he says we need them, we need them... because we trust the captain. But we also have a captain singing drinking songs with his men...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  And he was very odd with me afterwards... he asked me to warn him if the crew started to lose confidence in him...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Any signs of mental stress or trauma?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  He came in for a physical without a word from me...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Anything unusual, doctor?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  He was in perfect health... every test result identical to his last physical... that's kind of unusual in itself, actually...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  It's almost as though he wanted to establish that there was nothing wrong with him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  There was one... other... thing...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  He asked me to his cabin for dinner... I think he tried to seduce me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Which brings us to a most serious possibility -- is there an outside influence at work here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  I can detect no evidence of telepathic coercion.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Commander, there is one other fact we have not considered. The abnormal energy reading in the captain's quarters that was never explained.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  It is not enough evidence to justify mutiny.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Worf -- nobody has suggested removing the captain from command.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Nobody has yet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  And nobody will -- unless we have solid evidence that the captain is unfit for duty.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Right now, all we have are suspicions... not enough to act upon. The next move is his.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Well, Picard? Prove to us you're not the enemy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  I can't.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  You're right, Tholl. Any of us could be the enemy. And there's no way to prove we aren't.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  But unless we set aside our mutual fears and trust one another, we have no hope of escape.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  Sir... how can we trust each other?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  She's right. There may be an enemy among us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})

(:Text {content:  And what if there is, Mister Tholl? Shall we continue accusing one another until hostility leads to violence? Shall we allow our suspicions to destroy us?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  Let's see if we can deactivate that stun mechanism...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45B})
(:Text {content:  Orbiting the pulsar at fifty million kilometers, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  The pulsar is exactly as our records indicate. There appear to be no anomalies or significant changes since the last scan by a Federation ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Helm -- take us in to twenty million kilometers.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Mister Worf, divert enough power to the shields to offset the increased radiation and magnetic fields.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Sir, at twenty million kilometers our shields will be effective for only eighteen minutes --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Noted, Mister Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Captain, may I have a word with you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  You have the bridge, Mister Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  What is our mission?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  I'm under no obligation to tell you that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  If you don't -- you force me to take command of this vessel.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  On what grounds?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  You're endangering this ship... for no reason.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  No reason you're aware of.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  That's not good enough. Your behavior has been erratic --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Erratic enough to justify mutiny? Do you honestly believe you have sufficient evidence to convince a board of inquiry?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  No, I don't. But I can't let you risk the lives of the crew.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})

(:Text {content:  Number One... has it occurred to you that you might be the one with the problem? I realize you've been under stress, and I'm willing to let the matter drop if you report to Sickbay for a full examination. Otherwise... I'll have to relieve you from duty. Think about it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  That would appear to be the power lead to the stun device.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 565})
(:Text {content:  It may be \"live.\" Cutting it could be dangerous.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 565})
(:Text {content:  Picard holds out his hand. Esoqq warily moves away.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 565})
(:Text {content:  You assured me you'd cooperate.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 565})
(:Text {content:  I may have overloaded it, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56A})
(:Text {content:  Mister Tholl...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56A})
(:Text {content:  Picard, I still think this is a mistake --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56A})
(:Text {content:  Now what? We're no better off than when we started!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56B})
(:Text {content:  Captain -- number four shield has failed. Increasing power to number three shield to compensate.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Helm -- move us closer. Ten million kilometers.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Sir -- at that distance, the ship will not withstand the magnetic fields and radiation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Take us in, Mister Crusher.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Belay that order.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  You're relieved of duty, Commander. Confine Mister Riker to his quarters.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Mister Worf, I gave you an order.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Maintain your position, Lieutenant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  You're destroying yourself and anyone who is foolish enough to listen to you. Starfleet will never sanction this.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  I'll take that chance.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  You're making a terrible mistake, Will. Listen to me... as your captain... as your friend...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  You've shown none of the concerns that Captain Picard would show... the safety of this ship, the welfare of its crew...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Mister Worf -- remove Commander Riker from the bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Mister Crusher -- take us away from the pulsar, heading one-eight-five mark three-two, full impulse.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Full impulse -- aye, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Engage.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  I hope you're satisfied, Picard. You've accomplished nothing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60A})
(:Text {content:  The sound of your voice is beginning to anger me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60A})
(:Text {content:  I think this charade has gone far enough, don't you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60A})
(:Text {content:  I don't understand...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60A})

(:Text {content:  Yes, you do. This isn't a holding cell; it's a laboratory maze -- and we're the white rats. A carefully concocted test... an experiment to see how we'd react under pressure.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60A})
(:Text {content:  How do you know?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60A})

(:Text {content:  It's the only explanation. Look at the four of us... we do have something in common: we all react differently to authority. You, the anarchist, reject authority in any form... to whoever's in control... trained to command... to obey a superior officer's authority. Our captors put us here and devised obstacles for us to overcome. We were given food Esoqq couldn't eat -- to make him a threat. We were given a door that wouldn't open -- until all four of us cooperated. And each time we succeeded, we were dealt a reversal -- to set us against each other again. While you observed our reactions.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60A})
(:Text {content:  Sir, I've been trying to help --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60A})

(:Text {content:  I found it unlikely that a first-year cadet would know of the Enterprise's visit to Mintaka Three... so I tested you. Starfleet has classified the Cor Caroli Five plague \"secret.\" No cadet would have knowledge of the incident.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60A})
(:Text {content:  Captain --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60A})
(:Text {content:  You may as well drop the pretense. I refuse to play along any further as I'm concerned, this experiment is over.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60A})
(:Text {content:  You are correct, Captain Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  To further our knowledge of alien interaction, we borrowed you, Tholl, and Esoqq, and replaced you with replicas.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Replicas?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Our transporter is able to replicate living matter -- including the brain's many trillion dendritic connections where memory is stored.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  You mean there's a copy of me on Mizar Two?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  And an impostor running my ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  No longer. Commander Riker has taken charge of the Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Our species is telepathically linked; we are all in continual contact.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Much more efficient than your primitive vocal communications.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  We would like to pursue this study... but, of course, your awareness of it would taint the results.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  We will therefore return you to your places of origin.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Captain!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Hold your positions. Take no action.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Why did you choose to study the concepts of authority and leadership?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Because our species has no such concepts.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  As we are all identical, distinctions among ourselves are meaningless. Hence we have no leaders -- no followers.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  We wanted to examine the nature of command. Under what conditions will authority be obeyed -- or disobeyed?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Our replicas of Tholl and Esoqq explored this issue on Mizar Two and on Chalna... just as our Picard replica did on the Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Your responses were most intriguing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  You had no right to put us through this just to satisfy your curiosity.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Why not?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Because kidnapping is immoral. The lives of other races must be respected.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  This concept of morality is a very interesting human characteristic. We shall have to study it sometime. Until then, Picard --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Number One?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Now, Mister Worf.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  What is this?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Why do you hold us?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})

(:Text {content:  Because there's something more you can learn from us. With an alert crew, even our \"primitive vocal communications\" are unnecessary. Commander Riker understood I wished to hold you here... and pass the information to our security officer... But why?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  I've decided to perform an experiment of my own. I want to see how you react to being imprisoned.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Captain -- our species cannot bear captivity.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  We were merely curious. We meant no harm.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  We did not, after all, injure you in any way.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Captivity is an injury, regardless of how it's justified.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})

(:Text {content:  And now that you've had a taste of captivity, perhaps you'll reconsider the morality of inflicting it upon others. In any event, we now know about your race -- and we know how to imprison you. Bear that in mind. Now get off my ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Mister Crusher. Set course for our rendezvous with the Hood... Warp eight.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Aye aye, sir. It's good to have you back.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Status, Number One?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Ship and crew functioning normally, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Then my doppelganger caused no serious damage. Was the replica convincing?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Very convincing, sir -- but not perfect.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Not perfect in what way?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Well, sir... A singer?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  I look forward to reading your report, Commander. At least, I think I do.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Doctor...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Course laid in, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Engage.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Welcome to Risa. All that is ours is yours.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  We are looking for the lodging chamber of Captain Jean-Luc Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  A file scan reveals no record of a Captain Picard currently visiting Risa.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  When is he expected to arrive?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Where is no arrival date on file for any such individual.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Could we have been mistaken?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  He will come.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})

(:Text {content:  First officer's log, Stardate Gemaris Five where, for the past two weeks, Captain Picard has been serving as mediator in a trade dispute between the Gemarians and their nearest neighbor, the Dachlyds.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Welcome back, Counselor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  It's good to be back. It's been a grueling two weeks.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  I take it the captain was able to negotiate an agreement mutually beneficial to both parties.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  He did. Though I don't know how he managed it. Both the Gemarians and the Dachlyds are incredibly stubborn people.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
