(:Text {content:  The more difficult the task, the sweeter the victory.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})

(:Text {content:  The turbolift doors re-open and out steps PICARD. Though he moves with his usual determination, there is a slight edge of weariness to his gestures. He definitely does not act like a man who has just won a})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Report, Number One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Everything status quo, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Very well...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  If anyone needs me, I'll be in my Ready Room.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Sir...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Congratulations.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  About what?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  About the trade agreement.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Counselor, is it my imagination or is something bothering the captain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  He has been under a great deal of strain lately. While on Gemaris he ate sparingly... and slept even less.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Is there anything we can do?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  I have a solution in mind, but I doubt he'll agree to it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  And what would that be?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Our captain needs a vacation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Come.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Sir, it's come to my attention one of the crew has been neglecting his health again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})

(:Text {content:  He suffers from a classic case of stress related ailments brought about by overwork. Exhaustion, irritability... muscle spasms. Yet he insists on ignoring them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  It doesn't sound all that serious.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  And I plan to keep it that way.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Recommended treatment.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  A week's shore leave.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Impossible.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Jean-Luc... I could make it an order.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  But you won't... Beverly you know I loathe vacations.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  You loathe going on vacation. Once you're there you have a marvelous time. You told me you loved the four days you spent on Zytchin Three.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})

(:Text {content:  I lied. The Enterprise is scheduled to spend a week undergoing a maintenance overhaul at Starbase twelve. While there, I promise to make full use of all available recreation activities.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Watching some technician fill deuterium tanks is not my idea of fun.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  I suppose I could find a few hours to spend on the Holodeck.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Forget about the Holodeck. There must be someplace you'd like to go.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  The Astrophysics Center on Icor Nine is holding a symposium on rogue star clusters. I had given serious thought to attending.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Serious thought is the last thing you need. Why not go some place beautiful? Where you can relax and be pampered. You deserve it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  I'll give it serious thought.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Beverly... enough.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  So have you decided where you're going yet?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5B})
(:Text {content:  I meant for your shore leave.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Not you too.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Halt.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  I know this perfect little vacation spot... In fact, its co-ordinates lie within this sector.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  How convenient. Except I have absolutely no intention of taking a holiday. Do I make myself clear?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Very clear...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Good. I'm glad we've got that straightened out. Resume.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})

(:Text {content:  It's called Risa. And believe me Captain, it's paradise. Warm tropical breezes... exotic food... and nothing to do but sit back and enjoy the quiet. And then there's --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  I'm sure you'd find their sybaritic outlook on life very appealing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  I'm sure I would.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  I'm glad to hear you say so, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Unfortunately, this vessel is about to undergo extensive repairs requiring my personal supervision.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9A})
(:Text {content:  But what about Risa?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9A})
(:Text {content:  Some other time, Number One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9A})
(:Text {content:  Will, I've just received some delightful news.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9A})
(:Text {content:  Really?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9A})
(:Text {content:  There's an excellent chance my mother may be meeting us at Starbase twelve.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9A})
(:Text {content:  Your mother?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9A})
(:Text {content:  Yes, she's returning home from a conference on Achrady Seven. She's going to try to rearrange her schedule so she can spend some time visiting with us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9A})
(:Text {content:  That's wonderful, Deanna.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9A})
(:Text {content:  She mentioned how much she's looking forward to seeing you again, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9A})
(:Text {content:  Did she?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9A})
(:Text {content:  Commander, I'd like a word with you. In private.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9A})
(:Text {content:  Is something wrong, Captain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9B})
(:Text {content:  Tell me, Number One, is the entire crew aware of this little scheme to send me off on holiday?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9B})
(:Text {content:  I believe there are two ensigns stationed on deck thirty-nine who know nothing about it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9B})
(:Text {content:  I suppose this means I can look forward to a week of continual harassment on the subject.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9B})
(:Text {content:  I admit I have been feeling a bit fatigued.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9B})
(:Text {content:  I'll see to it that these bags are beamed directly to your room.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9C})
(:Text {content:  You look very handsome, Captain... If you don't mind my saying so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9C})
(:Text {content:  You're not really bringing all these books with you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9C})
(:Text {content:  I thought I'd take along some light reading... in case I got bored.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9C})
(:Text {content:  Ulysses by James Joyce? Ethics, Sophistry and the Alternate Universe by Ving Kuda -- You call this light reading?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9C})
(:Text {content:  To each his own, Number One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9C})
(:Text {content:  Did I ever mention how imaginative Risian women are?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9C})
(:Text {content:  Too often, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9C})
(:Text {content:  Captain, I do have one request.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9D})
(:Text {content:  You want me to bring you back a souvenir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9D})
(:Text {content:  It's called a Horga'hn. You won't have any trouble finding one.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9D})
(:Text {content:  Consider it done.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9D})

(:Text {content:  Sir, I would feel better if you would allow me to assign a security officer to accompany you. We will be out of communication range as soon as we leave orbit.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9E})
(:Text {content:  I don't think that will be necessary, Lieutenant. Risa has a reputation of being a most peaceful planet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9E})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9E})
(:Text {content:  The ship is yours, Number One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9E})
(:Text {content:  Enjoy your trip, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9E})
(:Text {content:  I'll try, Counselor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9E})
(:Text {content:  He's going to have a great time.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9E})
(:Text {content:  Pardon me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  It's so good to see you again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  I think you've mistaken me for someone else.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  You know, I believe you're right.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Welcome to Risa.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  A simple handshake would have sufficed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Return.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  My apologies. I fear I have yet to master the art of hoverball.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  So it would seem.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  My name is Joval. I am employed here. Is there anything you require to make your stay a more pleasant one?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  You find me amusing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  No. It's just that you're the fifth woman to ask me that this morning... All I require is to sit here in the sun and read my book. Alone.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  And afterward?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  I really haven't thought that far ahead.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Then may I suggest a swim to be followed by a massage?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Some other time perhaps.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  I don't understand. You say you wish to be alone yet you carry the Horga'hn.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  I just purchased that. Why? Are you implying it holds some special meaning?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  The Horga'hn is the Risian symbol of sexuality. To own one is to call forth it powers. To display it is to announce you are seeking Jamaharohn.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Do you seek Jamaharohn?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  I don't even know what it means. Nor do I want to. The Horga'hn is for a friend.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  I see. Someone close to you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  That's right.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Someone you love.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  I wouldn't go that far.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Your attitude is most puzzling. I will leave you now to your book.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  That's all I ask.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  You're blocking the sun.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  I know you're working with her. I warn you, it's a mistake.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Are you addressing me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Don't bother to deny it. I've seen the two of you together.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  I don't know what the devil you're talking about. But whatever it is, I assure you it's no concern of mine.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Tell her I want the disc returned to me immediately.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps I haven't made myself clear. You have the wrong man.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  I am rapidly losing patience with you. I demand you talk business.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  You'll find Ferengi demands carry little weight with me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Obviously you've never dealt with my people before.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  On the contrary, I have. All too often.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Then you know the Ferengi are not to be trifled with.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Or trusted.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  You dare to insult me!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})

(:Text {content:  I advise you to listen closely for I will not say this again. I came to Risa for a holiday, nothing more. I have no knowledge of this woman you refer to, nor have I laid eyes on any disc.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  You expect me to believe such feeble lies?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  I don't particularly care what you believe.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  This is not over yet, human. The disc is mine... And so is the woman. Remember that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Hello!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Oh, it's you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  That's not much of a greeting.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Look, I don't mean to appear rude, but I am not seeking Jamaharohn.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  All right. But you really should try it some time.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  If I \"try it\", it will be at a time of my own choosing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  That's fine with me. It's not as though I was offering to help you find it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  I assumed by the way you welcomed me the other day...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  I'm sorry if I embarrassed you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  I don't recall saying I was embarrassed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Do public displays of affection normally make you uncomfortable?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Let's just say I prefer to be acquainted with the women I kiss.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  That's understandable. The name's Vash.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Jean-Luc Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  So tell me about yourself, Jean-Luc.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Is that really necessary?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Would you rather I guess? I can be very persistent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  I'm captain of a Federation starship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Well then that explains it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Explains what?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  I noticed you arguing with that Ferengi. For a moment there it looked like it was going to come to blows.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  You're the woman he was talking about?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  I hope your disagreement wasn't over me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  For the answer to that I suggest you ask him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Where are you going?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  To find some privacy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Wait a second.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  What did he tell you? I'm sure there wasn't a bit of truth to any of it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  And you said you didn't know her.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  I don't. And I don't want to.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Return the disc to me and all will be forgiven.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  The disc doesn't belong to you, Sovak. It never did.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  It would seem you two have a lot to discuss. If you'll excuse me...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  I'm sorry, Jean-Luc. Perhaps one day I can explain this all to you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps you can.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  I have a proposal I believe you'll find most interesting.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Save your breath.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  I am willing to pay you your weight in gold in exchange for the disc. Is that not a generous offer?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  I must have that woman.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  What are you doing in my room?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  We are Vorgons. I am Ajur. This is Boratus.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  We come from the twenty-seventh century. We've traveled three hundred years into the past to find you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Let's assume for the moment I believe you. That you are indeed from the future. What is it that you want from me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Have you heard of the Tox Uthat?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  I'm aware of the legend. It tells of a visitor from the future who left behind a mysterious device known as the Tox Uthat.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Essentially that story is correct.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Then the Uthat actually exists.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})

(:Text {content:  It was invented by a scientist named Kal Dano in the mid-twenty-seventh century. The Uthat is a quantum phase inhibitor... capable of halting all nuclear reaction within a star.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  But why bring such a powerful weapon into the past?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})

(:Text {content:  Criminals attempted to steal the device from Dano. He was determined to keep it out of their hands, so he fled back to the twenty-second century... where he hid it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})

(:Text {content:  Ajur and I were the security team assigned to protect the Uthat. Having failed in our duty, we followed Dano into the past, hoping to return him and the weapon safely to our own time.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  I gather you were unsuccessful.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Though we searched for many years, we were unable to find any trace of it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Returning home in defeat we began to search through the historical records for some clue to the Uthat's fate.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  For years we looked through the archives of the many cultures that reside in this part of the galaxy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  And the search led you to me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})

(:Text {content:  We came upon a brief account stating you had discovered an object of unknown origin while vacationing on Risa. From its description -- a crystal cube that fits in the palm of the hand -- we surmised it could very well be the Uthat.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  I'm sorry to disappoint you, but I haven't found a thing -- including peace, which is the only thing I'm looking for.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  You will find such a device, Captain -- to us it's already part of history.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  And if I do find it, what then?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  You will give it to us immediately so that we may return with it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Can we expect your cooperation, Picard?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Upon hearing Picard's answer, the aliens seem to relax for the first time.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  It would appear that history is correct in its assessment of you, Captain. You are a very wise man.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  May I come in?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Excuse the mess.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Sovak has taken to searching my room periodically.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Is this what he's looking for?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  I'm sorry I had to hide it like that, but I was afraid he'd start searching me next.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  This disc must contain some very valuable information.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  I doubt it's anything you'd be interested in.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  That depends.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  On what?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  On whether or not this has anything to do with the Tox Uthat.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Did Sovak tell you that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Let's just say I've heard... rumors that the Uthat is located somewhere on Risa.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Look, the last thing I need is a partner.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Then it's true.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  I don't suppose you ever heard of Professor Samuel Estragon?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  As a matter of fact, I have. He spent half his life searching for the Uthat. Archaeology is a hobby of mine.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})

(:Text {content:  I served as his personal assistant for the past five years. Shortly before he died, he uncovered new data pinpointing its location. That disc contains his research notes and maps.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  So you're continuing his work?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Exactly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  With a Ferengi as an associate.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Sovak and I are definitely not working together.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  But the two of you are well acquainted.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  At times he aided the professor in his explorations. Especially in situations that weren't quite ethical.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  And now with typical Ferengi logic, he's convinced that the Uthat belongs to him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  All he cares about is selling it to the highest bidder.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  I take it you have a more noble purpose in mind.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  I told the professor I'd present it to the Daystrom Institute. But first I have to find it. And that won't be easy with Sovak watching me every minute.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Then I'll go in your place.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  And what about me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  You'll remain here. It's safer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  This isn't a starship, Jean-Luc. And I don't follow orders.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  You'd never find it without me. The professor's notes are in code.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  From the moment we met I knew you were going to be trouble.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  You look like a man who could handle trouble.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  How far is it to our destination?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  According to the professor's notes, a series of subterranrean caves lie twenty-nine kilometers due east. That's where we'll find the Uthat.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  I'll meet you in the lobby in fifteen minutes. Be punctual. I advise you to change clothing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Jean-Luc...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Picard isn't quite so confident. He EXITS.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  I expected such treachery. Did you think you could sneak away from me so easily?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  The disc -- where is it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Didn't anyone tell you weapons aren't allowed on Risa?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  You're making a grave mistake putting your trust in this woman.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  It would be a worse mistake to trust you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Silence! Do you know how she acquired the disc in the first place?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Sovak!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  I paid her to steal it. But instead she betrayed me, and used my money to make her way here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  That's not the way it happened.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  She's a greedy and unscrupulous woman. A perfect mate for a Ferengi.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  You are becoming quite an annoyance, Sovak.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  As are you, human. Perhaps I should kill you and then take the disc.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  No wait... you can have it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  You see, I told you we'd make a good team.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  We have a long trip ahead of us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  So it finally begins.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Picard must not be allowed to destroy the Uthat.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  He will surrender it to us... or die.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Have you calculated how much further we have to go?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Another eleven kilometers.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  We'll remain here for the night.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  I was hoping you'd say that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  We made better time than I expected.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  I'll take that as a compliment.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  As it was intended.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Vash sits up -- moves closer to Picard. She hesitates})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Forgive me if I don't act surprised.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Sovak did pay me to hand over the disc.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Then you did steal it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  It wasn't stealing. The professor was dead... Someone had to continue his work. I had already devoted five years of my life to tracking down the Uthat.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  But you took Sovak's money.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  It was the only way I could afford to get to Risa. As for Sovak, he got exactly what he deserved.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Well, any woman who can beat a Ferengi at his own game, bears watching.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  I'll take that as another compliment. I am flattered.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  We should get some sleep.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  You know Jean-Luc, it's lucky for you we met.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  If it wasn't for me, you'd still be back there sitting in the sun... relaxing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  That happens to be why I came to Risa.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  I'm sure you hated every minute of it. That kind of vacation isn't for a man like you. You need excitement.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Excitement? Sleeping in a damp cave... chasing after something we'll probably never find?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  You are enjoying yourself, aren't you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  I suppose I am.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  I just wanted to hear you say it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Good. Now go to sleep.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  I'll never forget that look on your face when you thought I was offering you Jamaharon.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  That was a simple misunderstanding.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  You did seem a little disappointed when I turned you down.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  You can be the most irritating woman sometimes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  You're kind of prickly yourself. Don't you see, we're a lot alike. That's probably why we get along so well.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  You call this getting along?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  All right. We don't get along.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  But you do admit we're attracted to one another.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Do I?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  If you want to pretend otherwise, that's fine with me, but...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  You still think I'm trouble?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  I'm sure of it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  This is it. We've reached the end of our journey.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Do you have an exact location?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Six meters in from the large outcropping.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  That should put it right about here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Is something wrong?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  I can't get a reading. There must be Starithium ore in these rocks.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  That leaves us but one alternative.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Shall we?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  We are here to witness a great moment, Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Who the hell are they?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  They're security officers from the twenty-seventh century. They're here to take back the Uthat.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  You knew about this and didn't tell me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  My apologies Vash... But if I had told you, would you have brought me here?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Probably not.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  My point exactly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  So the betrayer is herself betrayed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  You've put together quite a little team.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  You must not interrupt Captain Picard...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Quiet. Move back with the others.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  How did you get here?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  I found the disc in her room.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  That's impossible. I made a copy as a precaution. But I burned it before we left.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Only the outer casing was incinerated. Now, I had no intention of interrupting you. Please... Continue digging.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  No one told you to stop digging, human.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  I see no reason to continue.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  You will do as I say. Now pick up that shovel!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Look around Sovak, by now it must be obvious even to you... the Uthat is not here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Is this some pathetic attempt at trickery? Of course it's here. We simply haven't found it yet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Are you saying the professor's findings were wrong?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  It would appear so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  But how could that be? His evidence was overwhelming.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Enough with this foolishness. Can't you see he's trying to deceive us? Return to work this instant!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  I'm afraid he's right, Sovak. According to the disc we should have reached it hours ago.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Lies! Treachery! This cannot be happening. Not another failure. Not after having come so close.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  It is most puzzling.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  It's over, Sovak.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  No, I will not be cheated out of my prize. Tell him. Tell him the professor's research is irrefutable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  I... I don't know anymore...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Then step aside...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  The Uthat is here... somewhere... Just waiting to be found... It can't hide from me forever.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Five years of my life... wasted.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  There are other treasures to be found, Vash.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  Not like the Uthat. I hope you won't mind... but I need to be alone for awhile.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  I quite understand.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  Enterprise to Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Picard here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})

(:Text {content:  I hope we're not interrupting anything important, Captain. I just wanted to inform you that we have achieved orbit around Risa and are ready to beam you up at your convenience.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  I will be returning shortly, Commander. In the interim, stand ready to initiate Transporter Code Fourteen at my signal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Transporter Code Fourteen?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  You heard me, Number One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Yes, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Leaving so soon?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Jean-Luc -- I was just about to come say good-bye.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  Well then, I've saved you the bother.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  I want to put all this behind me as soon as possible. You understand.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  Of course. However, there is one last thing you can do for me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  Anything.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  Show me where you've hidden the Tox Uthat.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  That's not funny, Jean-Luc.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})

(:Text {content:  You never intended to burn that second disc. If you had, you wouldn't have been so careless as to allow Sovak to salvage any of it. You wanted him to follow us so he could see for himself that the Uthat wasn't at the cave site. It was the only way to convince him your quest had been futile.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  But how could I have known the Uthat wasn't there?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  Because you had gone there once before. Probably the moment you arrived on the planet. That's when you found it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  You're a man of many talents, Jean-Luc.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  Open it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  A piece of the future.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  A very dangerous piece. Were you really going to give it to the Daystom Institute?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Well, maybe not give it. Five years is a huge investment, Jean-Luc. I deserve to make a reasonable profit.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Congratulations Picard. We knew you would not fail us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  You're not going to just hand it over are you? You didn't trust me... what makes you think you can trust them?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  I assume the Vorgons have proof to back up their claims.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Our being here is proof enough.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})

(:Text {content:  Wait a second, Vorgons? According to the professor's notes, it was two Vorgons... a male and a female... who tried to steal the Uthat in the first place. For all we know it could be them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  You're going to have to prove you are who you say you are.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  As you yourself said, the Uthat belongs to the future.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  But not necessarily to you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  You will return what is ours, Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  No!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Enterprise... Code Fourteen... Lock on present coordinates... three second delay... Mark!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Are you all right?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  Go. Return to your own time. There's nothing for you here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  History recorded that you destroyed the Uthat.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  You have fulfilled your destiny all too well, Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  I don't suppose there are any openings for an archaeologist aboard the Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Somehow I doubt you'd find life aboard a starship suitable to your taste.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Probably not. I could never tolerate all that discipline.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  What are your plans?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  I thought I'd explore the ruins on Sarthong Five. No telling what I might find there.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  But the Sarthongians deal harshly with trespassers.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Why Jean-Luc, you really do care about me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  You will try and stay out of trouble.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  I always try.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  I wish we had more time together.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})

(:Text {content:  Perhaps we do. The Vorgons are time travelers. Now that they know where and when the Uthat can be found, they may very well come back and try for it again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  So we may be doing this all over again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Good-bye Jean-Luc.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Picard to Transporter Room. One to beam up.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Welcome aboard, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  Thank you, Commander. Status report.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  All went well on Starbase twelve. I think you'll find the ship to be in splendid condition.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  I'll present my compliments to the crew. Oh yes... and Number One... about that Horga'hn you requested.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  Yes, sir...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  We need to have a little chat about that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  Was it a relaxing trip, Captain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  I knew he'd have a great time.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  Welcome to Risa. All that is ours is yours.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  We are looking for the lodging chamber of Captain Jean-Luc Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  A file scan reveals no record of a Captain Picard currently visiting Risa.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  We're early.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Stardate 43779.3. The Enterprise is preparing detailed atmospheric charts of the Hayashi system. Although tedious, this endeavor is the first step toward planet colonization.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  Sensors report the USS Hood closing on an intercept course at high warp.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  That's odd... I wasn't notified of a rendezvous.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  They seem to be in an awful hurry.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Sir, we are being hailed on a secured channel by Captain DeSoto.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Sorry to sneak up on you like that, Jean-Luc --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Robert, why didn't you inform us --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  who's listening. Keeps you on your toes, anyway. Hey, Will, you getting soft on that luxury liner?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  So, old friend. How are you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Ah, you know, they send you Galaxy-Class boys out here to the far reaches. Me, I'm hauling my butt back and forth between starbases --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  But not today.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Nope. Starfleet's got new orders for you. This is top priority. They need the fastest ship in the fleet -- and the best people. That's you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  If time is so important, why didn't they transmit the orders by subspace?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  They're worried about Romulan eavesdropping on this one. And we've got a passenger for you. Hard to send by subspace.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  What sort of passenger?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Mission specialist. He'll bring your orders aboard with him. Name's Tam Elbrun.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Elbrun? You mean Tam Elbrun as in the Ghorusda disaster?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  The same. What can I say? Your orders are to cooperate fully with him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Best of luck, folks. Hood out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Sir, the Hood is slowing to impulse.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Mister Data, come with me --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Captain, let me come with you to greet Tam --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  You know him?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  I do... He was at the university on Betazed when I studied psychology there.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Ah, I see. He was a colleague, then.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  No, sir. He was a patient...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})

(:Text {content:  Tam is a telepath of extraordinary talent, even for a Betazoid. He's a specialist in first contact with new life-forms, and... a rather unique person. He's not what you might expect, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Welcome aboard the Enterprise. I'm --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Captain Picard. Here --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  You want to know all about your mission. Everything's on there. Orders and briefings. Destination and heading, all that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  I sensed you were out here. How've you been?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  They laugh -- this is a familiar routine to them both. Data now has come to stand behind Tam, unnoticed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Sir --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Who -- what are you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  My name is Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Incredible, an android. I can't read you at all. It's like you're not there.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})

(:Text {content:  Oh. You better hurry up to the bridge with that. Captain wants you to run the orders, scan the technical schematics, and be ready to brief him in ten minutes. Right?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Number One?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Riker here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Meet Mister Data on the bridge. He has our orders and new heading.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  And assemble the bridge staff for a mission briefing in -- fifteen minutes. Picard out. Mister Elbrun. Would you --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Like to see my quarters. No. I'd rather get this briefing over with. Then be left alone until I'm needed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  I've heard something about Ghorusda. Weren't about forty people killed --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Forty-seven, including the captain of the Adelphi -- and two friends from my class at the Academy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Sorry. What happened?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  It was a first contact situation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  The Ghorusdans values are so complex, and so different, that the Federation sent along a specialist. To prevent misunderstanding.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  That was Tam Elbrun? And what happened was his fault?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})

(:Text {content:  Not directly. Board of inquiry blamed Captain Darson's carelessness about Ghorusdan cultural taboos. But if Elbrun's so good, why didn't he warn Darson? What was he there for, if he couldn't sense that much hostility?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Commander, Geordi... do you ever feel as if I am not \"there?\" That is to say... not \"here.\"})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  You seem to be all here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Our destination is the Beta Stromgren system, following the path of the Vega Nine probe.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  That's twenty-three parsecs beyond our furthest manned explorations.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})

(:Text {content:  Present are Picard, Riker, Geordi, Troi, Data, Worf and Tam Elbrun. Tam is seated next to Data. NOTE: throughout this scene Tam should appear distracted by pain, as from a bad headache.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  This is the star Beta Stromgren...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})

(:Text {content:  Scientists have discovered that it is in the final stages of an alternating cycle of expansion and collapse, which will soon result in a supernova. However, the long-range unmanned probe which Starfleet sent to observe the process has discovered something much more --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Oh, Data -- don't waste time.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  They call it \"Tin Man\". The Vega Probe found it orbiting Stromgren.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Looks like a ship of some kind.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Its energy source is unknown. The people who've studied the transmissions think it's a starship. And they're sure it's alive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Alive? How so?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  A cybernetic organism -- like the Borg?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  No, no, NO! Here --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Starfleet believes it's an organic creature, born in space, living its life in the wastes between stars.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Riker regards Tam dubiously.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Have attempts been made --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})

(:Text {content:  To communicate with it by subspace. Of course -- linguacode, universal translation, all that. It won't work. Tin Man is too different. Direct mind-to-mind contact is our only hope.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Tam turns to Troi, a little blankly -- the telepath is lost in imagination.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  The Romulans --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Hell, I forgot -- the Romulans...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  They claim the sector of space in which Beta Stromgren is located.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  The Romulans claim all that is within their field of vision.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  And they routinely monitor the telemetry of our deep-space probes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  So it's quite certain they'll be sending a ship of their own to investigate this Tin Man.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  No... Actually, they're sending two. Uh, Data --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})

(:Text {content:  That is correct. Starbase one twenty-three detected two D'daridex class cruisers on an intercept course. The top speed of this class vessel is known to be less than our own, sir. We therefore have some advantage.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})

(:Text {content:  So, it's a race? An alien intelligence -- a new life-form -- representing a technology far beyond that of either the Romulans or ourselves. The Romulans will take whatever measures -- military or otherwise Study as in dissect, I'd bet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Data, you're our resident honor student in exobiology. I'm assigning you to head up life sciences on this mission.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Yes, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Excellent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Meeting adjourned, then.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  So, Data -- I guess you're the brains of this outfit, huh?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})

(:Text {content:  Mister Elbrun -- one reason I want you to work closely with a member of my staff is to avoid any further... omissions. The possibility of an encounter with Romulans on this mission is hardly trivial. Yet you --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  All right, all right... I should have brought up the Romulans earlier, but I was distracted.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})

(:Text {content:  And no, Billy boy, I wasn't \"distracted\" on Ghorusda. If Darson had listened to me, no one would have died. And I don't care whether you believe that or not.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Stardate 43782.6. Travelling at top warp, we are still several days from rendezvous with the mysterious entity which Starfleet has christened Tin Man.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  My immediate concern is with Tam Elbrun. Starfleet considers his unique abilities crucial to our mission. Yet he seems to me... unstable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Well, according to his medical records and psych profile, he's very high on the ESP scale. A sort of prodigy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  A prodigy? In what sense?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  In most Betazoids their telepathic gifts develop at adolescence.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  They're not born reading minds?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  No. Except... for some reason that no one understands, occasionally a Betazoid child is born different.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  How \"different?\"})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Born with their telepathic abilities \"switched on.\" Most Betazoids born like that never lead a normal life.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  The noise of other people's thoughts and feelings must be... overwhelming. Incomprehensible... especially for a child.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  And painful. Early diagnosis and special training helped Tam adjust You mentioned a hospitalization For stress. Repeatedly, throughout his life.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  I always wonder... what holds one person together through that kind of struggle, while another goes under?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})

(:Text {content:  Yes, well, he's evidently done more than \"hold together\". He's the indispensable man -- the Federation's finest specialist in communication with unknown life-forms.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})

(:Text {content:  It looks like the more unusual a life form is, the better he likes it. His personnel file shows that he's gravitated toward assignments that isolate him from other humanoids.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Commander Data, I'm picking up an unusual echo from my navigational sensors.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  There is something there, sir, tracking us -- matching our speed and heading. Something which doesn't fully register on our instruments.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})

(:Text {content:  Since there is no known natural phenomenon capable of travel at warp velocities, there are but two possibilities: either it is a sensor malfunction, or it is another ship, following us covertly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  It is not a sensor malfunction.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Agreed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  A Romulan ship? With their cloaking device, we shouldn't pick them up at all.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Unless they're pulling so much power for something else that they can't fully cloak.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Like what?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Ask the Romulans... if it is the Romulans.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant, continue monitoring the precise position of the echo Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Come in.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  How're things in the land of the living?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  I thought you might be lonely. No one sees you, except Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Lonely? I can hear everything that everyone on this ship thinks. No one besides you seems to be missing my charming --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  You want them to dislike you. Why?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Because I'm not a nice guy? Okay -- because they scare me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})

(:Text {content:  Too many minds, Deanna. I can't shut them out -- never could learn. All their loves, their hates, their fears, their... needs. It's like a tide that never ebbs. I could drown.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  I remember.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  You understood -- at least a little -- how I felt. I see you finally found a place to fit... people to care about...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  And you're still looking.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Then there's Ghorusda. I've got enough doubts about my... reliability... without having to listen to Riker's, and Picard's What happened there?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  I thought everyone knew --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  No. What happened to you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})

(:Text {content:  Maybe... I got too involved with the Ghorusdans, with their point of view. It happens to me. I wanted everyone to get along. I could have warned Darson more forcefully.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  So after that, you ran away? The last I heard, you were the only Federation delegate assigned to Chandra Five.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Beautiful creatures, the Chandrans. Their minds are glacial. They have a lovely three-day ritual for saying \"hello.\" Peaceful, untroubled people...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Unlike humanoids?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Well, except for your friend Data. I like him. He's... restful.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  I believe your impression of Data is probably unique.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})

(:Text {content:  Yeah? Well, having to get to know someone, just once, has its appeal. I mean, talking to them, instead of getting it all at once up here But you accepted this mission. You could have stayed on Chandra Five. You willingly came aboard a ship of over a thousand people How could I not? Think of it, Dee. This intelligence that swims naked through space like a fish in the sea. Totally alien, mysterious -- not like us at all. Ancient. And alone. How can you know that? Tam?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  You're in contact with it. With Tin Man. Aren't you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  No -- well... yes. A little. Not quite on a conscious level.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  But we're still light-years away. That must be impossible -- even for you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Impossible for me. Maybe not impossible for Tin Man.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Status, Number One?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  We've reached the outer regions of the Beta Stromgren system, sir. On course for orbital intercept of Tin Man, e.t.a. eighteen minutes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Grand.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Not altogether. Astrophysics reports that the star's rate of collapse is increasing -- it could go supernova within the next few days.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Captain, we are receiving relayed sensor data, from the Vega Probe On screen, Mister Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Magnify.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Remarkable. Computer -- locate Tam Elbrun.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Tam Elbrun is in Turbolift One, en route to the Main Bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Of course.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Commander...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Problem, Worf?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Sir, I am reading a wave front of ionized particles preceding the object which is tracking us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Go to Yellow Alert.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  On screen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Romulan warbird, closing. They're arming main distruptors, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  Go to Red Alert -- shields at maximum.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  Worf, arm photon torpedoes and stand by.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  I thought you said the Enterprise was faster than this Romulan --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  In fact, we are, Commander. However --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  Evasive, Mister Worf. Data, open hailing frequencies --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  I guarantee that they don't want to talk to you, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  The Romulan has passed us, sir, and recloaked.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Damage report.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  No casualties reported. Seventy percent loss to main shields, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Captain, their attack on us was incidental.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Incidental?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Yes. To delay us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})

(:Text {content:  Captain, it would appear that the Romulan's intent is to contact Tin Man first, at any cost. According to my sensor readings, the warbird exceeded maximum engine output by nearly thirty percent... They appear to have suffered irreparable damage to their warp coils.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  So -- they kept up with us by sacrificing their ability to return to Romulan space.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  A one-way trip.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  There is one more trailing us, Captain -- a day or two behind. Data's right -- this one's job is to beat us to Tin Man at any cost.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Picard exchanges looks with Riker -- can Tam be that good? Evidently so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Very well, then. Mister Crusher all stop.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Commander La Forge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  La Forge here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Geordi -- how long to restore shields?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Working on it. Computer, reconfigure structural integrity power to feed inner deflector grid.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Unable to comply. Requested reroute would compromise operational safety limits.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  To hell with the limits. Override. Authorization La Forge theta two-nine-nine-seven.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Rerouting structural integrity power supply.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Russell! Watch the lateral grid balance. Nope, too much. We gotta do it manually. La Forge to bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Go ahead.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})

(:Text {content:  Captain, I'm trying to feed the inner grid by stealing some power from the structural integrity field. You should have partial shielding in thirty minutes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  You have ten.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Picard out. The Romulans wish the honor of the first contact, let them have it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  You're out of your mind, Picard! What if the Romulans find a way to persuade Tin Man --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  I think the chances of that are remote. And, Mister Elbrun, if you'll be still you may learn --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  What?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})

(:Text {content:  That being first, at any cost, is not always the point. Data, while we await repairs, I want Life Sciences and Engineering to continue collecting information on the alien. Query the Vega Nine probe, and the long-range sensors.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  Yes, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  You do a lot of your work here?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Yes. I have configured these instruments to display information with greater speed and efficiency than stations used by the others.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Nice. A little Spartan.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Spartan?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Lots of work space, not much room to live. I don't guess you sleep?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  I have tried it, from time to time. But you are correct. I do not require rest.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  But you paint.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  The creature's anatomy appears most peculiar.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  In what way?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})

(:Text {content:  It is indeed laid out as a vessel, with what appear to be corridors and chambers. An internal environment suitable for carbon based life forms is being maintained. Yet there is no evidence of a crew aboard. Tin Man is a living being yet it was bred or adapted itself to serve a purpose. I find that very interesting.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Why? Must living beings have a purpose? Or do we exist for no reason but to exist?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  I do not believe I am qualified to express an opinion.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})

(:Text {content:  Ah, Data -- you're uniquely qualified. You think a great deal about humanity -- and you're an honest researcher. You don't treat anything as trivial, or irrelevant. You want to try it all.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  You said in the Transporter Room that you could not read my mind.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  True enough. But I think I understand you pretty well. It worries you -- that I can't read your mind?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps there is nothing to read. Nothing other than mechanism and algorithmic response --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps you're just different. Not a sin, you know -- though you may have heard otherwise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Captain, the Romulan ship is hailing the alien using their equivalent of linguacode.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Response?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  None so far, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Why should it answer? What can it have in common with them?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  But you're so sure it'll \"talk\" to you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Well, I --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Captain, the Romulans are arming all disruptors.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Yellow Alert. Prepare for evasive action at the first change in the Romulans' course.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  With our shields in their present condition, we can't risk --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  No!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  We're not the target. It's Tin Man --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  What do you mean? They intend to destroy it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Those are their orders if they can't secure the alien.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Increase speed to intercept the Romulans.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  Their lead is too great.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Worf, hail them. I cannot allow They won't listen to you!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  Danger... Gom-tuu... Do not allow!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 67})
(:Text {content:  Worf! Damage report!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Not yet available, Captain. We have partial failure of the main computer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75})
(:Text {content:  You did this. You woke your Tin Man.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  We've got impulse power, but I've got to take the warp engines off line while we recalibrate the intermix regulators.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  How long?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  For just the warp drive, or for everything?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  All of it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  We're looking at twenty hours work, double shifts.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  Geordi, we don't know that we have twenty hours. The star could explode at any time --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  I know. Okay, first we need to get the main computer working right --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  No -- fix the shields first.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  Commander, whatever Tin Man hit us with, it fried circuits I thought were unfryable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  It's not Tin Man I'm worried about. It's more Romulans showing up.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  Right. First priority, get the shields up. Only, let's not have any more surprises till I'm done.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  Don't ask me about surprises. Ask Tam Elbrun.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 80})
(:Text {content:  Brain activity suggests that you're coming out of a sort of fugue, or seizure... blood pressure and glucose indicative of general systemic stress --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  But I'm gonna live?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  No doubt about it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  Good. I want to know exactly what you did. I want to know how closely you are in communication with the alien, and what you've learned about it. Now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})

(:Text {content:  I... just warned it, that's all. I've been in contact with it... sensing impressions from it... It calls itself Gomtuu. It's old, Captain. It's roamed the universe for many thousands of years.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  Where did it come from? How many...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  Far away, I think. Maybe beyond the galaxy. Once there were millions of them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  Once?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  It hasn't seen another of its kind for millennia. It's alone. It may be the last of its species.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})

(:Text {content:  Perhaps we can help it in some way. Can you ask it to return with us to Federation space? Or at least to remove itself from the vicinity of Beta Stromgren, before the star explodes?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  Captain, Gomtuu knows that the star will go nova soon. That's why it came here. It wants to die.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  Why?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  There was... an explosion, in space... radiation penetrated the outer layers. The crew... the crew died. Such loss... empty pain... Hollowness.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  Stop this! Tam -- Tam, you're losing yourself in this -- this merging.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})

(:Text {content:  I -- I know. Tin Man hurts... and wants to die. I can't do any more from here. If you want me to really reach Tin Man, I've got to be in physical contact. I've got to go aboard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  No. Absolutely out of the question.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  You don't trust me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  No. I don't believe that I do.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 82})

(:Text {content:  Tam -- when you reached out to the alien, to warn it -- did you give any thought to this vessel? To the danger, however inadvertent, the creature might pose to our crew? Or did you simply react out of instinct?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 83})
(:Text {content:  Captain --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  Deanna -- he's right... I don't know what might happen -- but if you don't let me go, we fail in our mission.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  Besides, at this point, you need all the help you can get -- even Tin Man's.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 85})
(:Text {content:  Russell -- reactivate the sensor assemblies.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 86})
(:Text {content:  Okay, let's do a program reload on the port array only.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  Good. Computer, run level two diagnostic.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  Port sensor array remains offline.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  Damn.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  Riker to La Forge. How's it coming?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  Not great... I think all the control processors are shot. Maybe if I swap the chips from the secondary array, I can give you a minimum EM scan.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  Do it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  Russell -- try restarting sensor element thirty-two only.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 87})
(:Text {content:  Well, the good news is that we have partial long range sensors. Riker here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 88})
(:Text {content:  I'm picking up another echo on the long-range sensor display here. You getting that on your panel?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 89})
(:Text {content:  Worf?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 89})
(:Text {content:  One moment, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 89})
(:Text {content:  Confirmed. Sir, the other Romulan ship... on an intercept course.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 89})
(:Text {content:  Geordi, are we gonna have shields anytime soon?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 90})
(:Text {content:  I'm doing the best I can... But shields won't help if that star explodes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 90})
(:Text {content:  Data, you and Tam Elbrun seem to have developed an affinity. Troi, you've known him for years. How far can he be trusted?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91})
(:Text {content:  Captain, the issue isn't one of trust in Tam's intentions, but in his judgment. I would trust him to do what he believes is right --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91})
(:Text {content:  Yes, of course. But his judgment...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91})
(:Text {content:  exposure to so many minds on the ship has been bad enough. Now he's strongly drawn to this creature. I'm afraid for him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91})
(:Text {content:  Afraid of what?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91})
(:Text {content:  I sense that the alien is somehow calling him. If we allow him to do as he insists -- to beam over to it. That he will lose himself.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91})

(:Text {content:  Captain, I agree that Tam's motives are trustworthy. I do not believe it is possible that he might act against us, or cause Tin Man to act against us out of malice.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 91})
(:Text {content:  If Tam breaks down over there, we'll be no closer to accomplishing our mission, Captain. It would be a grave mistake.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 93})
(:Text {content:  Thank you both.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  Captain, the Romulan has uncloaked.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  Data?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  I am puzzled, sir. We have come this far. But you may not allow Tam to fulfill his mission.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  Data -- Elbrun warned Tin Man, and the first thing it did was to destroy a space vessel.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 95})
(:Text {content:  I think I understand, sir. If you feel that the risk is too great to send Tam Elbrun, alone, then send me with him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 95})
(:Text {content:  Counselor Troi understands him better.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 95})

(:Text {content:  But I distress him less. It is humanity he is fleeing. I can serve as an intermediary... a bridge back, and a reminder of his obligations... both to us and to Tin Man.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 95})
(:Text {content:  Status Number One?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  Shields at forty percent, Captain. We can maneuver on impulse.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  Phasers available on manual, sir. computer target lock not functioning.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  Well, let's hope they're in a mood to talk. Open hailing frequencies.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 97})
(:Text {content:  Romulan vessel -- this is Captain Jean-Luc Picard of the USS Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 98})
(:Text {content:  Enterprise -- your presence here is a violation of Romulan space. You will leave immediately.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 98})
(:Text {content:  We are not familiar with the terms of your claim on this sector, Commander. We are here engaged in scientific research. Do you wish to participate --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 98})

(:Text {content:  We have monitored the destruction of our sister ship by the star creature. We claim right of vengeance. We will destroy the alien. If you interfere, we will destroy you as well.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 98})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Supplemental. Light-years beyond the edges of explored space, and virtually disabled, our survival may now depend upon Tam Elbrun's telepathic rapport with an alien intelligence.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 100})
(:Text {content:  Picard to Tam Elbrun.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 102})
(:Text {content:  Captain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 102})
(:Text {content:  Report to Transporter Room Six immediately.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 102})
(:Text {content:  Captain, I don't --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 102})
(:Text {content:  Commander Data will meet you there.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 102})
(:Text {content:  Counselor, we no longer have a choice.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 102})
(:Text {content:  No... Too much. Too much.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 107})
(:Text {content:  Tam?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 107})
(:Text {content:  I can't.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 107})
(:Text {content:  Data to Enterprise. Come in Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 107})
(:Text {content:  No... No, don't.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 107})
(:Text {content:  If it is harming you, we must return.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 107})
(:Text {content:  Enterprise, respond.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 107})
(:Text {content:  I cannot contact the ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 107})
(:Text {content:  It's alright... Gomtuu tried to communicate a lifetime of experiences to me in a few seconds. It's alright now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 107})
(:Text {content:  O'Brien to bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 109})
(:Text {content:  Go ahead, Chief.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 110})
(:Text {content:  I lost the transporter lock on them. Some kind of force field went up.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 110})
(:Text {content:  Confirmed. The alien has thrown up a shield -- it's blocking all our sensors.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 111})
(:Text {content:  The Romulans' weapons systems are now at full power.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 112})
(:Text {content:  Red Alert... Mister Worf... arm photon torpedos.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 114})
(:Text {content:  Yes...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 115})
(:Text {content:  There is a large chamber twenty meters ahead.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 116})
(:Text {content:  Yeah, I know.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 116})
(:Text {content:  I know everything, now. Come on.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 117})
(:Text {content:  Intriguing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 120})
(:Text {content:  This is the control center where Gomtuu's crew guided their journeys. The ship and the crew existed symbiotically.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 120})
(:Text {content:  They needed one another. When Gomtuu had no one left to care for, it no longer had a reason to exist.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 120})
(:Text {content:  And is that the purpose of existence? To care for someone?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 120})
(:Text {content:  It is for me. Deanna was right. I'll lose myself here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 120})
(:Text {content:  An invitation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 120})
(:Text {content:  I must remind you that our objective is to bring Tin Man out of danger and report our findings to Starfleet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 120})
(:Text {content:  I'm not going back, Data. I'm staying here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 120})
(:Text {content:  Captain Picard, if you interfere with us, we will fire upon you as well --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 123})
(:Text {content:  Commander -- we are prepared to defend the life of the alien. Shields up.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 124})
(:Text {content:  Power levels aboard the alien are increasing, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 124})
(:Text {content:  Captain, the diameter of the star has decreased by one hundred thousand kilometers.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 124})
(:Text {content:  It's beginning.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 124})
(:Text {content:  Explain to them... make them understand.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 126})
(:Text {content:  But our mission...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 126})

(:Text {content:  will... but he's going to save me as well. All my life I've waited for this. A chance to find peace. Finally all the the voices are silent. Only Tin Man speaks to me now. Don't you see, Data? This is where I belong.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 126})
