(:Text {content:  The star is gonna go any minute, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 132})
(:Text {content:  The Romulans know that as well as we do.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 132})
(:Text {content:  Power levels aboard Tin Man increasing beyond our sensor range.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 132})
(:Text {content:  Conn -- report.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 139})
(:Text {content:  Dead stop, Captain. Sir-- We've been thrown clear of Beta Stromgren. Distance -- three point eight billion kilometers.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 139})
(:Text {content:  There is no sign of Tin Man or the Romulans, sir. Captain -- on screen!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 139})
(:Text {content:  Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 141})
(:Text {content:  Sir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 141})
(:Text {content:  Data -- what happened, over there?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 141})
(:Text {content:  Difficult to explain, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 141})
(:Text {content:  Tam?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 142})
(:Text {content:  I believe he has found what he was looking for, Counselor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 142})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, supplemental. With all main systems at least temporarily restored, we are proceeding to Starbase one fifty-two for inspection and additional repairs.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 143})
(:Text {content:  We have had no further encounter with the Romulans. As for the whereabouts of Tin Man, and Tam Elbrun -- we can only speculate.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 145})
(:Text {content:  You sent for me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 145})
(:Text {content:  Tam's final request was for me to explain his decision to the crew. But I believe his hope was that you would understand.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 145})
(:Text {content:  What did happen, Data?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 145})
(:Text {content:  I witnessed something remarkable. Individually they were both so...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 145})
(:Text {content:  Wounded? Incomplete?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 145})
(:Text {content:  Yes. But no longer. Through their joining they have been healed. Grief was transmuted to joy. Loneliness to belonging.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 145})
(:Text {content:  Data, you do understand...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 145})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Counselor, when Tin Man returned me to the Enterprise I realized that this was where I belong.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 145})
(:Text {content:  I don't want any trouble, Barlcay...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  Trouble? Why would there be trouble?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  There's always trouble when you come in here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  You're on duty, Lieutenant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  Is that a fact?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  It is, and you'll observe it. Get back to your post.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  Look, pal. Do me a favor. Take yourself and your holier-than-thou attitude and get out of my life.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  This is insubordination, Mister Barclay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  So punish me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  Security to Ten-Forward!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  \"Insubordination.\"})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})

(:Text {content:  Riker, you're nothing but a pretty mannequin dressed up in a fancy uniform. You're full of hot air, and if Picard has a problem with me, he can come and tell me himself...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  I feel your confidence, your arrogant resolve. It excites me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Barclay, report to Cargo Bay Five now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  This will have to wait, darling. Um... Be right there. Freeze program. Exit.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  Save program.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})

(:Text {content:  I just don't know what to do with him. He's always late, never gives his best effort, always slides by... I can't deal with it anymore. How does a guy like him ever make it through the Academy...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  I think it's time we talked to the captain about Broccoli. That's what Wesley calls him. Keep it to yourself.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  It fits.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  A broken seal, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3A})
(:Text {content:  You better destroy it. Those samples will be tainted.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3A})
(:Text {content:  Is it a problem for you to report to duty on time, Lieutenant?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3A})
(:Text {content:  Problem? Nossir. I'm... I'm very sorry, sir... it's just... I had a very important communique... it required my immediate response and...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3A})
(:Text {content:  I don't want to hear it... we're having intermittent problems with the anti-grav unit, see what you can do...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3A})

(:Text {content:  Mister Barclay, I'm tired of seeing your name on report. I don't know what you got away with on your last posting, but this is the Enterprise. We set a different standard here. Understood?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3A})
(:Text {content:  Understood... sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3A})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Stardate 43807.4. We are taking on a load of special tissue samples donated by the Mikulaks for shipment to Nahmi Four. The samples could prove vital to the containment of an outbreak of Correllium Fever on that world.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Everything looks... it looks normal to me...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Dammit..})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  I... I don't understand...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  La Forge to Engineering... I'll need more people in Cargo Bay Five... anyone you can spare. Out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5A})
(:Text {content:  We could use a hand, Mister Barclay...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5A})
(:Text {content:  I'll... I'll disassemble it later, Commander... it shouldn't do that... well, of course, it shouldn't do that... I mean... well, it shouldn't do that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5A})
(:Text {content:  I'm not accustomed to seeing an unsatisfactory rating for one of my crew.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  I guess the issue is whether Mister Barclay is Enterprise material.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  I assume from your request for his transfer that you don't think he is, Commander...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})

(:Text {content:  I hate to say it... I always thought I could work with anyone... but I just can't stand the guy. Broccoli makes me nervous... he makes everyone nervous...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Broccoli?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Young Mister Crusher started it. I'm afraid it's caught on.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Let's get it uncaught, shall we?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})

(:Text {content:  By all indications, Barclay has served honorably in Starfleet for many years. His rating aboard the Zhukov was satisfactory... I recall Captain Gleason speaking quite highly of him before his transfer...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  In retrospect, I wonder if Captain Gleason wasn't buttering our bread a little... He knew we were looking for a diagnostic engineer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  I've reviewed Barclay's psychological profile. He's always had seclusive tendencies... it was noted at the Academy more than once...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})

(:Text {content:  And yet he chose this way of life; he's made the same commitment to Starfleet that we all have... It's easy to transfer our problem to someone else. Too easy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Captain, it's not like I haven't tried...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Try harder.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  He's on your team. Manage him. Pull him in. Find ways to help him make a positive contribution. Get to know the man. Make him your best friend.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  With all respect, sir... my best friend? I can barely tolerate being in the same room with the man...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  I suggest you put your personal discomfort with him aside, Commander. Dismissed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  My best friend.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6A})
(:Text {content:  Hey, Reg...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6B})
(:Text {content:  Uh, how's it going?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6B})
(:Text {content:  Oh, it's... I still haven't traced the problem, Commander...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6B})
(:Text {content:  That's okay. No rush. Take your time.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6B})
(:Text {content:  I've... I've been planning to run diagnostics on the graviton invertor circuits...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6B})
(:Text {content:  Smart plan... well, I'd say we're in good hands here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6B})
(:Text {content:  I'll get a preliminary report to you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6B})
(:Text {content:  Before the end of the day.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6B})
(:Text {content:  Fine. And say, Reg, how about sitting in on the mission briefing with my senior officers in the morning...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6B})
(:Text {content:  The briefing? Me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6B})
(:Text {content:  I'd just like your input...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6B})
(:Text {content:  On what? I mean, should I prepare something...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6B})
(:Text {content:  No... no... just be there. Eight hundred hours.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6B})
(:Text {content:  I'll be on time, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6B})
(:Text {content:  Good.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6B})
(:Text {content:  Morning. Start your brains, and let's do it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})

(:Text {content:  Okay, this trip to Nahmi Four is pretty routine. We'll have plenty of time to realign the magnetic capacitors in both the matter and anti-matter injectors. Duffy, Costa, that'll be your assignment.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  We probably ought to do the flow regulator maintenance at the same time, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})

(:Text {content:  Good idea. Ensign Crusher is putting in some hours with us this week as part of his training duties... he'll be assigned to assist you, Mister Myers. Be sure and teach him the difference between impulse and warp drive. Lieutenant Barclay is working on the mystery of the anti-grav failure we had yesterday... your preliminary report had a couple of interesting theories, Reg...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Why don't you summarize your findings so far, Reg...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Yes. It wasn't a maintenance problem... everything checked out. I... I'm going to check for... a surge in... the transfer coils.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  A coil surge wouldn't have resulted in a field dissipation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  I... I... I realize that...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  But we shouldn't ignore the possibility, Wes...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  You ought to take a look at the flow capacitor. That could have forced a chain collapse of the antigrav field.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  I... was going to.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  Good. Okay, then... let's go over the realignment procedure...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  I just didn't know what to say.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  What do you wish you had said?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})

(:Text {content:  I should have told him to mind his own damned business... I knew about the flow capacitor... I didn't need to hear about it from a seventeen year old kid.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  You're letting it get you much too upset.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  You think so?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Why are you so hard on yourself?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  You don't know... it's hard out there.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  I understand, but let go of it. You're here now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  You're right, of course.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Of course.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Let me help you relax.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  I'd like that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  I knew you would.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Mmm, nice... but I'm in the mood for someplace a little more... unusual... Computer. Run Barclay Program Fifteen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  I am the Goddess of Empathy. Cast off your inhibitions and embrace love, truth, joy...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9A})
(:Text {content:  But I thought that's the point of the briefing... to discuss different approaches...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  I'm not saying you did anything wrong, Wes... it's just that Barclay's... well, my new project.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Yeah, Broccoli's a real project all right...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  I just gotta draw him out more...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  And I shut him down. Poor Broccoli.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Pardon me, but why is Lieutenant Barclay being referred to clandestinely as a vegetable?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  It's a joke, Data... you know, a nickname.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Nicknames generally denote fondness, a diminutive shared between friends. This does not sound friendly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Data's absolutely right. The nickname stops here and now. Captain's orders.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  What the hell... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  What happened to your glass?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  FADE IN:})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Nucleo-synthesis. The structure of the glass has been altered at the atomic level.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  A problem with the replicator?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})

(:Text {content:  Unlikely. A problem with the replicator would have affected the contents as well as the glass. But the liquid in the glass was a perfect replication of a dark ale of Earth origin which I believe is what Lieutenant Duffy ordered.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  I can't detect any residual radiation or unusual chemical compounds that would have caused this.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  The most probable explanation is that the glass came into contact with an unshielded power source.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  That means a complete diagnostic check of the Enterprise power systems. All four thousand of them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Have I got the man for this job... Hey, Reg...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Busy?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Well, I was just... no, not really... what?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Got another mystery for you... somehow the molecular structure of this cup from Ten-Forward has been altered...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Mister Barclay is the Sherlock Holmes of the technical support crew...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  A fascinating vocation, Mister Barclay. I am a student of Sherlock Holmes mysteries and I would enjoy discussing some of your cases at your leisure.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  My cases... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Uh, Reg, we're gonna have to run through the power systems, to see if there's some kind of leak that caused this.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  I had to... I was going to do it anyway...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  You were?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  To... to try and explain the anti-grav unit failure... I still can't... nothing about it makes sense.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Then it is possible these two very disparate incidents could be related.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  I wouldn't bother you with something this minor, Commander... but it may be a symptom of a more serious problem...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  You think we'll need to put in to a starbase?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  We'll have a better idea after Mister Barclay runs a check of the power systems...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  It was Lieutenant Barclay who first suggested the link between the two incidents, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  No, it wasn't. Not really.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Will your investigation affect our available power during the mission, Lieutenant?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  No... nossir... we'll have to shut off some systems... they'll be down a few at a time... it shouldn't... I don't think so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Good. I look forward to your report, Mister Broccoli.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Barclay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  If you'll excuse me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Metathesis is one of the most common of pronunciation errors, sir... a reversal of vowel and consonant, \"bark\" to \"broc\"...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Yes, I know him... comes in here, stands at the bar, doesn't say much... always orders a warm milk.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  Figures.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  Warm milk helps you sleep, La Forge. You should try it. What's that got to do with Barclay?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  I don't know. I'm just trying to figure the man out, that's all. You ever talk to him?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  He's not much for talking.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  Does he have any friends?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  Not that I've seen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  What do you do with a guy like that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  I give him his warm milk and let him be.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  Yeah, well, I'm not so lucky. I can't let him be. He's my problem.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  He's imaginative.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  How do you know that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  I just do.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  Well, then maybe he's in the wrong line of work.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  You engineering types don't appreciate imagination... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  That's not it, Guinan... he just doesn't fit in here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  Terkim.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  What?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  Reminds me of Terkim. My mother's brother. A kind of family misfit. Everybody told me to stay away from him. Bad influence.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  Did you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})

(:Text {content:  Are you kidding? He was the only member of the family with a sense of humor. But no one ever stayed around him long enough to realize it... except me. My mother says I take after him. I probably do. Because the idea of \"fitting in\" repels me, too.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  Maybe I didn't make myself clear... Barclay, he's always late... he's nervous... nobody wants to be around him...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  If I had the feeling that nobody wanted to be around me, I'd probably be late and nervous too.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  Guinan, that's not the point...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  Are you sure?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  I'll take another one of these.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  Get it yourself.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  Computer, where is Lieutenant Barclay?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14A})
(:Text {content:  Reg... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16A})
(:Text {content:  Beverly?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16B})
(:Text {content:  Good morning, Mi-lord. Manners, my son. Manners. You embarrass me before our guest.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16B})
(:Text {content:  Master Barclay will spank you if you don't behave.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16B})
(:Text {content:  I don't care.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16B})
(:Text {content:  Wesley... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16B})
(:Text {content:  What do you want?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16B})
(:Text {content:  Ah, well, I guess I want... Master Barclay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16B})
(:Text {content:  The boys got into another little scrap, I'm afraid. But boys will be boys.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16B})
(:Text {content:  You cannot withstand our assault forever, Barclay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16C})
(:Text {content:  Say you will yield and it ends here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16C})
(:Text {content:  I will speak with my sword, sir...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16C})
(:Text {content:  Where in God's name did you learn to fight like this, man?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16E})
(:Text {content:  Self-taught, my good capitaine. Shall I give you a few lessons?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16E})
(:Text {content:  Who is that? One of your allies?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16E})
(:Text {content:  Jean-Luc. Not that old trick. I'm disappointed in you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16E})
(:Text {content:  I'll... I'll make it easy for you, Commander. I'll just request reassignment...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Now, wait a minute...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Look, we both know... the whole ship knows... I can't cut it here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Hey, Barclay... I've spent a few hours in the Holodeck myself, you know.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Far as I'm concerned... what you do in the Holodeck is your own business... as long as it doesn't affect your work.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  You're... you're not going to tell anyone about this?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  I'm not sure everyone would appreciate your... imagination... like I do.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  It is kind of unusual... recreating people you already know...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  I was just kind of really... well, it was just... I needed to blow off some steam... because one... one of the officers had been on my back...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Let me guess...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Okay, it was you. And I couldn't tell you what I wanted to, to your face... and it just sort of... I guess it got out of control.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  I don't know... sounds like maybe there's a side to this that's kind of therapeutic... we ought to tell Counselor Troi about it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  It's... it's just more comfortable... when I'm in there. You don't know what a struggle it is for me, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  I'd like to help if I can.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})

(:Text {content:  Being afraid all the time that I'll forget somebody's name. Or not knowing what to do with my hands... I mean, I'm the guy who writes down things to remember to say when there's a party. And when I get there, I'll wind up alone in a corner trying to look comfortable examining a potted plant. Sometimes, I just don't want to get out of bed in the morning.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Sometimes, neither do I.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  No, but you're good. You were born to be in Starfleet. Me...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  You're just shy, Barclay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  \"Just shy\"... sounds like nothing serious, doesn't it... You can't know.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  O'Brien to La Forge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Go ahead.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  I need you in Transporter Room Three, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  On my way, Chief.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  I really do want you to talk to Counselor Troi, Reg.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Troi? No, no, I couldn't.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  I mean it. As your friend and as your commanding officer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  I was synchronizing the phase transition coils... I didn't do anything I haven't done a hundred times before...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  The test object is made of pure duranium.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  Seems normal enough...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  Watch this...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  FADE IN:})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  Chief engineer's log, Stardate Transporter Room Three has yielded no suggestion of a cause for the latest malfunction aboard the Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Is this part of the same pattern?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21A})
(:Text {content:  We don't know, Captain. And we don't know why only Transporter Room Three is affected... None of the other Transporter Rooms are malfunctioning...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21A})
(:Text {content:  Yet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21A})

(:Text {content:  We have twenty-two hours before we reach Nahmi Four. We'll need the transporters operational by then. I want a level one diagnostic across the board. Advise Mister Barclay to meet us on the bridge immediately...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21A})
(:Text {content:  Ah, could we push that back, just to fourteen hundred hours, Commander... I've got him doing something...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21A})
(:Text {content:  Fourteen hundred hours. Mister O'Brien, no maintenance on the Transporters until further notice.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21A})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21A})
(:Text {content:  I can tell this is difficult for you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Is there anything I can do to make you more comfortable?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  No!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Have you ever been with a counselor before?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Yes. No.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Which one?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Yes. But she... it wasn't real... really a counselor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Most people find a counselor intimidating at first. It's okay if you feel that way toward me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Not... at all.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Good. Close your eyes... Lean back.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Why?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  I just want to help you relax.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  You do?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Put your feet up... it's okay. And close your eyes...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  What are you going to do?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})

(:Text {content:  Just listen to the sound of my voice... Take a slow deep breath through your nose... and let it out through your mouth just as slowly... good... there, that's better, isn't it...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Oh, yes. Oh, yes, much better. This has been... extremely helpful... Well, thank-you for your time.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  But...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Really... very helpful... in through the nose, out through the mouth... I'll practice and let you know... thank you again...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  I had a very strange visit from one of your officers today.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25A})
(:Text {content:  Barclay. Yes, I can imagine. Were you able to do anything for him?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25A})
(:Text {content:  To be honest, I'm not exactly sure what happened...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25A})
(:Text {content:  Where is Mister Barclay... it's past fourteen hundred hours...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25A})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Barclay to the bridge. Lieutenant Barclay report.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25A})
(:Text {content:  Computer. Locate Lieutenant Barclay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25A})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Barclay is in Holodeck Two.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25A})
(:Text {content:  I'll get him...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25A})
(:Text {content:  No, I'll handle this. I've had it with him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25A})
(:Text {content:  Counselor, you better come along...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25A})
(:Text {content:  I think you should know that Barclay's been running some... unique programs.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  I don't care what he's been running. My patience just ran out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Like I said Commander, Barclay's been running some... unusual programs.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  This is a violation of protocol. Crewmembers should not be simulated in the Holodeck...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Ah, Commander... I don't think there's any regulation...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Then there should be... computer, discontinue program and erase...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Computer, belay that order!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Counselor...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  If Barclay is having a difficult time facing reality, to suddenly destroy his only means of escape would be brutal and could do considerable damage.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  They are quite disagreeable, aren't they... shall we have a go at them?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28A})
(:Text {content:  Delighted.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28A})
(:Text {content:  We shall thrash them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28A})
(:Text {content:  En garde.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28A})
(:Text {content:  Stop it. Put that down.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28A})
(:Text {content:  Your sword, sir...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28A})
(:Text {content:  I don't have a sword.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28A})
(:Text {content:  How do expect to fight without your sword?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28A})
(:Text {content:  I don't expect to fight.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28A})
(:Text {content:  Do I detect a streak of yellow along the good fellow's back?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28A})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps we can supply a more appropriate adversary for him. Number One...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28C})
(:Text {content:  Number One...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28C})
(:Text {content:  Am I late? Did I miss the fight?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28C})
(:Text {content:  En garde... Sir... you have a familiar bearing... is it possible we have crossed swords somewhere before?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28C})
(:Text {content:  Where is he? Where is Barclay?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28C})

(:Text {content:  Ah, a personal grudge. I warn you... you would be wise to put your affairs in final order before you meet him in combat. You challenge the greatest sword in all the...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28C})
(:Text {content:  Troi suppresses a laugh.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28C})
(:Text {content:  You think this is funny?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28C})
(:Text {content:  You are very tall. It could be very threatening to some people.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28C})
(:Text {content:  Barclay'll find out what it means to be threatened. Computer, discontinue image of Riker.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28C})
(:Text {content:  Sir, you have no sense of fair play.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28C})
(:Text {content:  Just tell us where to find Barclay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28C})
(:Text {content:  You're gonna make us search through this to find him?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28C})
(:Text {content:  It could provide us with valuable information about what's troubling him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28C})
(:Text {content:  There's nothing wrong with a healthy fantasy life, as long as it doesn't take over.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28C})
(:Text {content:  You call this healthy?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28C})
(:Text {content:  You're taking it so seriously. This is not without its element of humor...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28C})
(:Text {content:  I am the Goddess of Empathy! Cast off your inhibitions and embrace love, truth, joy...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Oh my God...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Discard your facades and reveal your true being to me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Computer, discontinue --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Belay that order, computer! We want to get more insight into what's troubling the poor man. Remember? Quite a healthy fantasy life, wouldn't you agree?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Report...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Sir, our velocity increased to warp seven point two five.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Compensating, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Confirmed. Velocity now warp seven.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Maintain that. What the hell happened?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  The matter/anti-matter injectors locked for a split second, Captain. I am not certain why. They seem to be working properly now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Picard to La Forge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Go ahead, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Any explanation for the injector problem?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  I'm not in Engineering, sir. I'm in Holodeck Two.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Another malfunction?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Not exactly, sir. I'll return to Engineering immediately.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Yes, I would say you should, Commander. Your Holodeck activities can wait until later. And Commander...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Yessir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  It would be wise to consult Lieutenant Barclay on this latest incident.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  I'd like to, very much, sir. La Forge out. We need to find Barclay. Now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Cast aside your masks and let me slip into your minds...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Muzzle it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Shhhhh!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  We have a lot to talk about.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Sir, Barclay and I better get to Engineering.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Dismissed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  I just couldn't keep my eyes open... I'd worked twelve hours on the power systems and then the transporter went down and...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  Reg... you had a chance to get some help from the real Counselor Troi... but instead you went back in there...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  I know... I didn't want to... I just couldn't help myself...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  You're gonna be able to write the book on holodiction. Look, I know how easy it is to get caught up in it. I... fell in love in there once.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  Really?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  But I knew when it was time to turn it off and say goodbye... Wasn't easy. But I did it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  You know... the people I create in there have started to become more real to me... than anyone out here. Except maybe for you, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  I need you out here, Reg... right now, more than ever.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  The injectors aren't responding to the diagnostic commands.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  I... think we should drop out of warp.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  La Forge to bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Go ahead, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Recommend we go to impulse power sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Take us out of warp.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Controls are not responding, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  It's the injectors.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Override.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  It's not a computer problem. The mechanism is physically jammed. I can't clear it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Speed increasing, Captain. Warp seven point six... seven point six five... seven point seven...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  We can't shut it down, Captain. The anti-matter flow is increasing. She's accelerating out of control.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  FADE IN:})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Approaching warp nine sir...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42A})
(:Text {content:  Red Alert.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42A})
(:Text {content:  Data, estimated time to structural failure.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42A})
(:Text {content:  At this rate of acceleration, fifteen minutes, forty seconds, Commander...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42A})
(:Text {content:  Geordi, did you copy?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42A})
(:Text {content:  Aye, Commander...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42B})
(:Text {content:  Recommendations.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42B})

(:Text {content:  I'll let you know as soon as we have some. La Forge out. Okay, this ship will start tearing itself apart in fifteen minutes... I want every idea on the table... I don't care how outrageous...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42B})
(:Text {content:  What about attempting a magnetic quench on the fusion pre-burners?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42B})
(:Text {content:  No, I tried that already... the magnetic fields won't reset.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42B})
(:Text {content:  Could the fuel inlet servos be caught in cycle?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42B})
(:Text {content:  If they were, the swirl dampers would be frozen too... and they aren't...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42B})
(:Text {content:  Nothing showed up in the diagnostic sweep... at all?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42B})
(:Text {content:  The tests... uh, showed problems... I mean no problems with the flow... the flow of the...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42B})

(:Text {content:  There's nothing wrong with the computer control protocols or the power transfer systems. As far as we can determine, the injectors are just physically jammed...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42B})
(:Text {content:  Injectors freeze... antigrav unit goes down... transporter malfunctions...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42B})
(:Text {content:  And a twisted glass...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42B})
(:Text {content:  What's the connection?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42B})
(:Text {content:  Exceeding warp nine point four.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  Begin evacuation of secondary hull. Prepare for emergency saucer separation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  Standing by to release docking clamps.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  Re-route systems to primary hull power sources.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  Captain, the plasma flow to the nacelles is uneven due to the injector lock. An emergency saucer separation could rupture the warp field.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  Twelve minutes to structural failure.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43A})
(:Text {content:  None of the systems involved interact directly with each other... I don't see anything in common...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  What if... what if... what if one of us is the connection?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  Us? How?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})

(:Text {content:  I don't know. But we're looking for... a, a systemic explanation and there isn't one. We work with all the systems that are affected something ourselves... by touching it, or something...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  The computer sensors would've picked up anything dangerous.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})

(:Text {content:  But... if it were something... something that we couldn't scan... You might've passed it to the injectors when you were realigning the magnetic capacitors.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  It was your glass, Duffy... and both of you were in the cargo bay when the anti-grav failed...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  So was O'Brien.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  The transporter malfunction. That's a connection too.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  Danger. Approaching safety limits of engine containment field.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  Computer, list all physical substances that wouldn't normally be picked up by internal scans.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  There are fifteen thousand five hundred twenty-five known substances that cannot be detected by standard scans.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  Great. How many of those can exist in an oxygen atmosphere?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  Five hundred thirty-two.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  And could alter molecular structure when it comes in contact with... Five.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  The screen shows five names and a small graphic representation of the molecular structure of each chemical.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  Jakmanite has a half life of about fifteen seconds. There wouldn't be enough time to spread it around the ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44C})
(:Text {content:  Right.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44C})
(:Text {content:  Selgninaem and Lucrovexitrin are extremely toxic.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44C})
(:Text {content:  We'd all be dead by now. That leaves Saltzgadum and Invidium. Neither of which has been used for decades.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44C})
(:Text {content:  Could either one be causing all these malfunctions?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44C})

(:Text {content:  Most of the affected systems weren't even invented when those substances were in use. Who knows what they could do to a transporter or a magnetic capacitor... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44C})
(:Text {content:  Wasn't Invidium used in... medical containment fields?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44C})
(:Text {content:  Not for over a century.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44C})
(:Text {content:  But the Mikulaks might still be using it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44C})
(:Text {content:  And one of those canisters was broken.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44C})
(:Text {content:  La Forge to bridge. We have a working theory, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44C})
(:Text {content:  There's a chance we picked up some Invidium from a broken canister in the cargo bay... and have been spreading it around the ship...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45})
(:Text {content:  Working theories are fine, Geordi. But we need a working solution in about five minutes...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  Understood, Commander. We're on our way to Cargo Bay Five for confirmation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 45A})
(:Text {content:  Nothing from the tricorder...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Danger. Exceeding safety limits of engine containment field. At current acceleration, structural failure will occur in three minutes, thirty seconds.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  There it is...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Duffy and O'Brien picked up the broken canister and became contaminated..})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  If we can get it... the invidium... down to minus two hundred degrees Celsius, it'll become inert.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  La Forge to bridge. Invidium is confirmed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Recommend we flood the injector pathway conduit with liquid nitrogen. That should neutralize it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46A})
(:Text {content:  The question is, will the injectors come back on-line?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46A})
(:Text {content:  The injectors have sustained considerable damage, sir. I can't guarantee we'll be able to regain control...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46A})
(:Text {content:  We don't have much choice, do we?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46A})
(:Text {content:  Nossir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46A})
(:Text {content:  Make it so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46A})
(:Text {content:  Route primary coupling through starboard transfer conduit.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46A})
(:Text {content:  Routing... ready for engine core injection.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46A})
(:Text {content:  At current acceleration, structural failure will occur in forty-five seconds.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46A})
(:Text {content:  Injector conduit temperature minus one hundred degrees Celsius.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Transfer injector control to manual.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Ready... temperature now minus one hundred ninety degrees... minus two hundred degrees, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Injector status?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Matter injector... is on-line. Anti-matter injector... still locked.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  At current acceleration, structural failure will occur in thirty seconds.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Cycle power through ventral relay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Anti-matter injector... on-line. Reducing flow capacity. Commencing warp engine shut-down.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Stand down from Red Alert.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50A})
(:Text {content:  Nice work, Geordi.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50A})
(:Text {content:  Mister Barclay and I thank you, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50A})
(:Text {content:  Acknowledged.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50A})
(:Text {content:  The ship is seriously contaminated with Invidium, sir. Recommend we set course for Starbase one-two-one for a complete systems and bio-decontamination.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50A})
(:Text {content:  Understood.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50A})
(:Text {content:  Glad you were with us out here in the real world today, Mister Barclay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50A})

(:Text {content:  It has been most difficult to reach this decision to leave you... but after thinking it over, discussing it at length with Counselor Troi... I think it is for the best... I just wanted to thank you all for your support...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53A})
(:Text {content:  You'll always be welcome here, Barclay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53A})
(:Text {content:  I know. That's what makes it hard to go.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53A})
(:Text {content:  It was a pleasure to serve with you, Mister Barclay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53A})
(:Text {content:  Good luck, Reg.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53A})
(:Text {content:  It's been fun. Computer, end program.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53A})
(:Text {content:  Erase all programs filed under Reginald Barclay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53A})
(:Text {content:  Except... Program Nine...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53A})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Stardate 43872.2. In order to neutralize a sudden contamination of the water supply at the Federation colony on Beta Agni Two, we are procuring one hundred and eight kilos of hytritium from the Zibalian trader, Kivas Fajo.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  Because pure hytritium is too unstable for our transporters, Lieutenant Commander Data has been shuttling the material to the Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Go ahead, Mister Data.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  This will be the last trip... the remaining cases of hytritium are now being loaded.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Acknowledged. Mister Worf, advise Beta Agni Two that our departure is imminent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Aye, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  At warp six, we should be there in just over sixteen hours.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})

(:Text {content:  Loading is complete. I am proceeding with departure. Enterprise Shuttlebay Two, prepare for docking, level one precautions for incoming material remain in effect.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4A})
(:Text {content:  If you'll just acknowledge this last load, Commander...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Twenty-four point six kilos of tripolymer composites... eleven point eight kilos of molybdenumcobalt alloys... one point three kilos Bioplast sheeting...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Shuttle twelve containment field reads nominal... Now leaving the Jovis.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  On viewer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Containment field stable... gravitational fluctuations within acceptable parameters... flight pattern...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Why didn't the containment field hold?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Unknown, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Hail the Jovis -- I want to speak with Kivas Fajo.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Sir, Mister Fajo is hailing us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Captain Picard -- what happened?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  It is unclear at this time; we're running a full analysis.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  We detected no malfunctions before the explosion. Everything seemed to be proceeding as smoothly as the other flights. Were you able to save the pilot?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  No.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  I'm sorry.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Mister Fajo, I would like to analyze your sensor readings of the explosion.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Compared to the Enterprise's, our sensors are rather primitive -- I doubt they contain any information yours have overlooked.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps, but I want to leave no avenue unexplored.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  I understand. We'll transmit the information.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Link established... Receiving.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Can we be of any further assistance?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  How much hytritium did we manage to bring on board?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Eighty-one kilos.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  That might be barely enough to complete our mission, Captain... but it's not leaving us any margin for error.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  I realize we have acquired your complete supply of hytritium. Do you know where we could obtain more?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  That may be difficult. The only source I know is in the Sigma Erani System.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Three weeks away.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})

(:Text {content:  And I can't guarantee they'll have any -- for obvious reasons, no one wants to keep it around. In fact, even I may stop selling it -- it's just too dangerous.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  I guess we're fortunate you had any at all, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Transfer of information is complete, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Mister Fajo, thank you for your help.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  Mister Crusher, lay in a course for Beta Agni Two, warp six.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  The Grissom is currently near the Sigma Erani system... I'll have them stand by in case we need more hytritium.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Very good, Number One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Course laid in, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Engage.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  That accomplished, he attempts to contact the Enterprise -- but his insignia's missing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Wondrous. The detail... the balance. A remarkable piece of work.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Why have I been brought here?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  The voice simulation is perfect. Inflections, timing...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  It took a lot of effort to get you here... but I was sure it would be worth it. I was right.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  I have been delivered here against my wishes. I would like to know the reason.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Certainly. You're here for my enjoyment and appreciation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Am I to infer that you intend to keep me captive?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Captive? A most inappropriate description, my good android. May I call you Data?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  It is my name.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  I know. Data, you will be catered to, fawned over... you will be cared for as never before... every wish will be fulfilled...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  I wish to leave.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Almost every wish.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  This is unacceptable. I have no desire to remain here... and even if I did, my Starfleet duties would not permit it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Single-minded, isn't it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Very persistent...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  But polite. A nice touch. I decline to allow you to leave.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Then I am forced to attempt escape.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Ten androids like you might be able to force it open. But there aren't any other androids like you, are there?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  It's keyed to the touch... reads galvanic skin response, DNA patterns, and two or three other things. Trust me... you can't open it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Then you will have to open it for me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  I wouldn't try that again. It's a proximity-actuated field that impedes positron flow. Not good for your brainpaths in the long term.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  I fail to understand the value you place upon my presence.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Do you? Look around. This room contains items gathered from half the galaxy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})

(:Text {content:  The very first Basotile ever created by the Rodulans... centuries old. Priceless. A vase carved by the late Mark Off-Zel on Sirrie Four. The only known Roger Maris trading card from Earth circa 1962... smell it...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Bubblegum... I've preserved the scent... A Lapling...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  But I thought they were extinct...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})

(:Text {content:  Yes, that is the general belief. She's the last surviving member of her species... defenseless little creature, pity. Everything you see -- the only one of its kind. Unique. An original. Just as you are. Here, this is for you... your place of honor... sit... if it is not comfortable... but of course, you have no thought of comfort, do you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})

(:Text {content:  When Palor Toff learns of this, he will swallow his tongue with envy... I cannot wait to see his face... You are the crown jewel of my collection. A treasure beyond comparison.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  You should be flattered.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  I am not. Most intelligent lifeforms find involuntary confinement offensive and inequitable. Moreover, you have violated Federation law --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Yes, I know. What I've done is evil, selfish, immoral, illegal, and unprincipled. I've learned to live with it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  The Andorians wish to bid for the shipment of Tellurian spices you offered.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  They've had four days... they would have to make up their minds now. Ah, well...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  I must emphasize, Mister Fajo, that I consider this captivity a hostile act on your part.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  You'll get used to it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  I can't believe he's gone.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Wesley and Geordi are uncomfortable with the task they must perform. They move to the easel and Wes uncovers Data's last painting...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  He'd been working on this for months... never felt it was quite finished...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  You know what a critic Data was... especially about his own work.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  It was a gift from the captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Then he should have it back.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Those should go to Commander Riker.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Data always fell for Riker's bluffs...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  These are some of Starfleet's highest honors.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Not bad for a walking pile of circuitry and memory cells.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})

(:Text {content:  I keep going over and over the accident in my mind. Trying to figure out what went wrong. I can see him in the shuttle... almost like I'm sitting next to him... going through the departure sequence... What the hell happened? Why didn't I see it coming? Did I miss something...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Kivas wishes you to wear this set of clothes. And sit in your chair.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  I have no reason to accede to Mister Fajo's wishes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  He will give you reasons if you force him to.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  He is deluding himself if he believes he can keep me here. The Enterprise is certain to find me --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  They're not even looking for you... they believe you're destroyed. Your shuttle blew up... a hytritium explosion.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  They will scan the debris and discover I was not aboard...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  They'll find exactly what they expect to find: traces of your component elements. We placed them aboard the shuttle in just the right proportions.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Plainly Mister Fajo has no moral difficulties with my imprisonment here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  \"Mister Fajo\" has no moral difficulties. At all.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Do you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Clever, android... Is it part of your program to seek out vulnerabilities in your enemies?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Yes. Are you my enemy?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  I obey Fajo. And so does everyone on this ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Why?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  You are a curious... thing... aren't you... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Do you object to the question?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})

(:Text {content:  Kivas finds a way to get what he wants from his people. His rewards for loyalty are lavish. His punishments for disloyalty are equally lavish. You won't find anyone here who'll help you escape. Face it, android. He has you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  It appears he has us both.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Computer, did the containment power supply or the backups fail prior to the explosion?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26B})

(:Text {content:  Telemetry indicates no interruption in containment field power supply. Backup safety field and reserve power was available up until the instant of explosion.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26B})
(:Text {content:  Analyze telemetry from gravity generator, impulse vents, fuel cells, inertial dampers, and related subsystems.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26B})
(:Text {content:  All readings negative.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26B})
(:Text {content:  What about external factors? Local stellar phenomena?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26B})
(:Text {content:  Negative. Interstellar radiation and EM spikes all within normal tolerances.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26B})
(:Text {content:  Was the shuttle close enough to the Enterprise to have been affected by our warp fields?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26B})
(:Text {content:  Negative. Warp systems were operating at twelve percent idle, insufficient to disrupt containment fields.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26B})
(:Text {content:  Return file to start... Let's go through it all again...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26B})
(:Text {content:  The reason I can't find anything is there's nothing there to find. I've run the analysis a dozen times over... there's no indication of a malfunction...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  No possible explanation at all... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Well, yeah, there's one, but I don't believe it. Pilot error.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  I know it's hard to accept, but even the best...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Captain, it's not hard to accept... with Data, it's almost impossible. I can't even begin to calculate the odds. If Data were here, we could ask him...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  What are you suggesting, Commander?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  I don't really know, sir. It just doesn't make sense. I like things to make sense... that's all.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Geordi, if you got a little rest, came at it with a fresh mind...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  A little rest isn't going to change the computer analysis, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})

(:Text {content:  I'm sure you've done a complete investigation. If you wish to continue it, you have my support of course. But we'll be reaching the Beta Agni system shortly. I expect you to be rested.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  I understand, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Dismissed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Geordi... I understand how much we want... even need to explain an accident like this. Sometimes there just aren't any explanations.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  For an android without feelings... he sure managed to evoke them in others.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  We must select an officer to replace Data at Ops. Recommendations?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  My first choice would be Lieutenant Worf, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Mine as well. Make it so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  provides the perfect epitaph to Data.)})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  You're still wearing your uniform. Why?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  I am a Starfleet officer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  You're not in Starfleet any longer. It's time you adjusted your program to accept reality.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Even if I chose to do so, it is doubtful whether my programming could be sufficiently altered to accede to your wishes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Oh?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  I have been designed with a fundamental respect for life in all its forms... and a strong inhibition against causing harm to living beings.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  A military pacifist. What a marvelous paradox. Tell me -- whose dreadful decision was it to enlist you in Starfleet?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  It was ultimately my own decision. My skills seemed appropriate...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  My dear Data, it was a mistake. A grievous error. You no more belong in Starfleet than I belong in a verbal contract. Have you killed yet, Data?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  No, but I am programmed with the ability to use deadly force in a cause of defense.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Shame on you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Shame on you. How neatly you rationalize your capabilities. How can you casually accept your role in murder?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  I would not participate in murder. Perhaps you misunderstand...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})

(:Text {content:  Can't you see how much better it will be for you here... the intellectual rewards, our own personal exploration of the galaxy... I am at war with no one... I have liberated you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  You are a fine debater, sir. It is a shame you have used your verbal gifts for mere hucksterism and the advancement of your own greed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  You're going to be more of a challenge than I thought. Put on the new clothes and sit in your chair.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  I must decline.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Finoplak. One hundred denkirs.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})

(:Text {content:  And Fajo dashes the contents of the container onto Data's chest. Where the liquid touches it, Data's uniform starts to dissolve. Data's surprised -- what was the point of that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})

(:Text {content:  Don't worry -- the solvent won't damage your skin. But in minutes it will completely dissolve your uniform. I'd be delighted to have you go naked... I assume you have no vanity. But I would guess that decency is the rule of your Starfleet training.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  So, decide which alternative you dislike the least.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  Decide by dinnertime tonight. I have invited a guest to meet you. I expect you to be as entertaining with him as you have been with me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30A})
(:Text {content:  Proceeding with departure. Enterprise Shuttlebay Two, prepare for docking, level one precautions remain in effect.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34B})
(:Text {content:  I did miss something.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34B})
(:Text {content:  Your first watch on Ops?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  I've served at the position before.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  I've been concerned about you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  About me? Why?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Because I know how I'd feel if I were asked to replace Data at his station.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Bridge. Promotion due to the death of a crewmate is commonplace on Klingon ships.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  I know... but this isn't a Klingon ship... and Data was your friend. And it is the second time you've replaced a crewmate who's died.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  I honor Data's memory as I did Lieutenant Yar's by attempting to perform their duties as well as they did.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  In true Klingon fashion.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  I appreciate your... concern.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Okay, computer, now replay shuttle audio transmission... time index zero-four-two-three... Data's second trip...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36A})
(:Text {content:  Proceeding with departure. Enterprise Shuttlebay Two, prepare for docking, level one precautions remain in effect. Shuttle has cleared Jovis cargo bay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36A})
(:Text {content:  It sounds the same as the first trip...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36A})

(:Text {content:  Exactly the same. That's protocol. And that's Data. Following protocol to the letter. Computer, replay shuttle audio transmission, time index zero-four-three-nine... Third and final trip.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36A})
(:Text {content:  Loading is complete. I am proceeding with departure. Enterprise Shuttlebay Two, prepare for docking, level one precautions remain in effect.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36A})
(:Text {content:  That's it. The last communication.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36A})
(:Text {content:  He didn't report when the shuttle had cleared the cargo bay of the Jovis.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36A})

(:Text {content:  Of course, there really wasn't any reason for him to make voice contact. He knew we'd be monitoring his position... and any other pilot might not bother. But Data... not following standard procedures?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36A})
(:Text {content:  What do you think it means?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36A})
(:Text {content:  I'm not sure, Wes. I suppose he could've been too busy... maybe he saw something was wrong...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36A})
(:Text {content:  Without communicating it? That doesn't sound like Data either.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36A})

(:Text {content:  Which means maybe something was wrong with him. But there's no other indication of that. In anything he said or did during the mission. None. I'd sure like to talk to the last people who saw him alive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36A})
(:Text {content:  Did I mention that I've added a Veltan sex idol to my collection...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36C})
(:Text {content:  I have four of them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36C})
(:Text {content:  With the pearls intact?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36D})
(:Text {content:  The pearls were added by the Ferengi agents to increase the value. Veltans would never dishonor their gods with garish jewelry.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36D})
(:Text {content:  What... is that? Something new? And you didn't tell me...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36D})
(:Text {content:  Mister Data, I'm delighted to see you have dressed for the occasion. Say hello to my very good friend Palor Toff...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36D})
(:Text {content:  Come now, don't be shy... as if you could be shy...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36D})
(:Text {content:  A mannequin of some sort?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36D})
(:Text {content:  It is not a mannequin. It is Data... formerly Lieutenant Commander Data of the Federation Starfleet. The only sentient android in existence.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36D})
(:Text {content:  It doesn't look particularly sentient right now...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36D})
(:Text {content:  I fear he's playing a little game with us...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36D})
(:Text {content:  Well, someone certainly has played a game on you, Fajo.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36D})
(:Text {content:  I assure you it is the real thing. Tell him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36D})
(:Text {content:  It is an android. Perhaps its batteries have run down. Did it come with a guarantee? I hope.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36D})
(:Text {content:  I am not amused. I demand you behave normally. Dammit, I know you can hear me!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36D})
(:Text {content:  He falls well.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36D})
(:Text {content:  I apologize for this.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36D})
(:Text {content:  Don't be silly, my friend. I'm having a delightful visit.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36D})
(:Text {content:  Come along, Varria. You're much more fun to play with than Fajo's new toy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36D})
(:Text {content:  You will regret it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36E})
(:Text {content:  Entering the Beta Agni system, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Slow to impulse, Mister Crusher.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  La Forge to bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Go ahead, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Captain, a class two probe has been loaded with the hytritium compound and is ready to launch.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  Acknowledged.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  Approaching Beta Agni Two.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  Mister Crusher, take us into a close orbit. Mister Data, scan the --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  My apologies, Mister Worf. Scan the colony's subsurface water.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  Scanning... Tricyanate contamination is confirmed. Levels approaching forty-two parts per million.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  Area affected?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  Thirty square kilometers.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  Any indication of the source?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  Highest concentration is eight kilometers west of the colony.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  Adjust target coordinates.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  Aye, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  Captain, based on these figures, the eighty kilos of hytritium we have should be enough to neutralize the contamination.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  We're approaching the target coordinates.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  Launch probe.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  Probe on target. Hytritium entering water table... disbursement slightly faster than expected. Sir... something unusual.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Specify.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  I'm getting concentrated tricyanate readings of seventy grams per cubic centimeter at the source coordinates. Much higher than would normally occur.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Any theories, Mister Worf... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Possibly the result of seismic activity.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Computer, report on geologic instability on Beta Agni Two.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  No significant geological activity has been recorded on Beta Agni Two since the settlement of the Federation colony.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Another theory, Mister Worf?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Number One, perhaps you should take an away team down and have a closer look.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Yes, sir. Doctor Crusher, report to Transporter Room Three.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  On my way.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Mister Worf... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Our relationship is about to change.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  You may expect me to use every means at my disposal to resist your wishes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  No, from now on, you will comply. You will not argue. You will begin by sitting in your chair.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Sit!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  I do not intend to sit in the chair.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  You will. You don't believe it yet. But you will.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Have you ever seen one of these, Data?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  I do not recognize it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  I'm not surprised. This is the prototype of the Varon-T disruptor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  The Varon-T disruptor is banned in the Federation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Yes. Only five were ever manufactured. I own four. I sleep with one under my pillow. I sleep very well knowing it's there.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  It is a most lethal weapon.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})

(:Text {content:  Oh, it's much more than lethal, Data. It's vicious. It tears a body from the inside out, quite slowly by phaser standards, a tortuous, painful death. I've always wanted to try it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  I am prepared to die. However, I doubt very much that you would destroy me since you assign so much value to possessing me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  That goes without saying.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Please. Come in.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Sit down, my dear. Right here on the sofa.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  How long have you been with me, Varria?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Fourteen years.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})

(:Text {content:  Fourteen wonderful years. She was barely an adult when I found her. Idealistic. Naive. Full of dreams. And I made all her dreams come true. Didn't I? At a slight cost of course. She had to lose all those pesky ideals. But then maybe that was what made these years so wonderful, watching her lose them one by one until none were left.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  I'm going to miss you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Fajo...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  The contamination has been neutralized. Water's clean.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  Most curious. The process of neutralization should have taken several hours. Naturally occuring tricyanate doesn't respond this quickly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  Are you saying this was not naturally occuring?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  There are no natural trace elements present in these tricyanate crystals.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  If it's artificial, then we're talking about sabotage.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})

(:Text {content:  With tricyanate? That's hard to believe. It's slow to assimilate, difficult to replicate, and hard to transport. There are a lot easier ways to poison a water supply. A lot more effective ways too. Toxins that can't be neutralized. Bacteriologic agents with no cures at all.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  Can you think of any reason why a saboteur might choose tricyanate?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})

(:Text {content:  Not really. It might pass for a natural disaster. And since there's only one way to treat it... with hytritium, maybe someone figured we wouldn't locate any... it is hard to come by.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
(:Text {content:  You know it really was lucky, wasn't it... ? That we were able to find hytritium when we did. Just enough hytritium for this crisis.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47A})
