(:Text {content:  Fajo showed up in the right place at the right time... just when we needed him the most...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  You're suggesting he created the problem just to solve it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Possibly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  To make a profit from his sale of hytritium... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  That doesn't add up. The cost of producing tricyanate is too expensive. He wouldn't make a profit... quite the contrary.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Then, why would he do it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  What could he want?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Computer, biographical file on trader Kivas Fajo.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Accessing file... Kivas Fajo: A Zibalian trader of the Stacius trade guild... a noted collector...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  including the Rejac Crystal, The Starry Night by Van Gogh and the Lawmim Galactopedia... educated on Iraatan Five...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48A})
(:Text {content:  Computer, that will suffice.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48A})
(:Text {content:  A rare and valuable object...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48A})
(:Text {content:  If Data wasn't on the shuttle...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48A})
(:Text {content:  Mister Crusher...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48A})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48A})
(:Text {content:  Set course for the site of the shuttlepod explosion. Warp eight.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48A})
(:Text {content:  He would have killed me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  It seemed a distinct possibility.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  I'm sorry I did this to you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  You can stand up if you want to.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  You're... you're not what I thought you'd be...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  What did you expect?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  A machine. A robot, I guess. Not anything so... well almost human.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Thank you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Is something troubling you, Varria?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Your lips. They're warm.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Thirty-seven degrees Celsius. Adjustable. I chose this temperature to approximate human skin texture.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  How human are you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Physically, I am capable of performing many human functions. However, I have no emotional responses.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  You're not the first man I've known like that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Have you ever made love, Data?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  I have had one sexual encounter. But I am incapable of making love as you describe it since I cannot feel love.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Would you... do it with me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Why?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Why not?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})

(:Text {content:  It is an act that symbolizes the highest level of intimacy between beings. I have told you that I am unable to feel intimacy. I find it difficult to accept that you could have intimate feelings toward me under these conditions. Therefore you are either simply curious. Or you have been sent by Kivas Fajo to test my sexual abilities.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  You are just too smart for your own good, android.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})

(:Text {content:  I was hoping to see a little spontaneity but obviously neither one of you is capable of it. This mating dance is really quite dull. We'll try it again tomorrow. You may leave, Varria.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})

(:Text {content:  The Jovis has a maximum speed of warp three. He's had twenty-three hours... so we can define a perimeter of point-one-oh-two light years as his possible range...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  And Fajo doesn't know we're onto him, so he probably isn't taxing his engines by going at top speed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  He could have made it to the Nel Bato system... maybe even the Giles Belt...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  He's a trader... he doesn't attract customers by being hard to find...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  We could put out a coded level two query to all Federation ouposts within the perimeter...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Make it so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  If I help you escape... will you take me with you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  This is not another test. He's asleep. And there isn't much time...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  The consequences to you if we're caught...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  I know the consequences.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Fourteen years... you learn a few things...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  There's an escape pod in the aft cargo bay...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Sir, affirmative response from station Lya Four...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59B})
(:Text {content:  Fajo spent almost half a day in orbit... departed just over seven hours ago.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59B})
(:Text {content:  Mister Crusher, new coordinates... set a course for Lya Four...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59B})
(:Text {content:  Coordinates already laid in, sir...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59B})
(:Text {content:  Engage.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59B})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps if I attempted to communicate with the Enterprise...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})

(:Text {content:  You can't... Fajo has communications access restricted to the bridge. Once we're out, the shuttlepod will emit an emergency beacon. We'll have to hope somebody responds before Fajo is able to destroy us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  I have been trained in evasive maneuvers...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  We'll need a few. Get ready... As soon as I initiate the escape sequence, an alarm will sound... we won't have much time...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  Varria...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61A})
(:Text {content:  This is your fault. You knew the price for disobedience. And so did she.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  Well, there's always another Varria.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  You can't hurt me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  A fundamental respect for all living beings. That is what you said. I'm a living being... therefore you cannot harm me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  You will surrender yourself to the authorities.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  Or what? You'll fire?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  An empty threat and we both know it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})

(:Text {content:  Accept your fate. You will return to your chair and you will sit there. You will entertain me and you will entertain my guests. And if you do not, I will simply kill somebody else... Him or him maybe... anyone, it does not matter... and their blood will be on your hands too... just like poor Varria's.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})

(:Text {content:  Your only alternative, Data, is to fire. Murder me. That's all you have to do. Go ahead. All your troubles are over. Fire. Are you searching through your program for a loophole, perhaps? Is there one? If only you could feel rage over Varria's death... feel the need for revenge... then maybe you could fire. But you're only an android. You don't feel anything, do you? It's just another interesting intellectual puzzle for you. Another of life's curiosities.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  I cannot permit this to continue.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  You can't. Your program won't allow it. You cannot fire. You will not...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  I'm reading a weapon in transit with Commander Data. It seems to have discharged, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Discharged... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  I'm deactivating the weapon.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Welcome back, Mister Data. Are you all right?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Commander. Please arrange to take Kivas Fajo into custody for murder, kidnapping, theft...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Arrangements have already been made.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  A Varon-T disruptor. It belongs to Fajo.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Mister O'Brien says the weapon was in a state of discharge...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps something happened during transport, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  So. Have you come for your final satisfaction? You wish me to repent? Beg for mercy? You'll have none of it from me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  I expected none.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  It seems our roles are reversed... aren't they, Data... you are now the collector... and I...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  So it seems.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  Do not count me out so quickly. I had you once. I may have you back in my collection again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})

(:Text {content:  Unlikely. Your collection has been confiscated pending your trial. All of your stolen possessions are being returned to their rightful owners. You have lost everything you value.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  I'm sure that gives you great pleasure.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})
(:Text {content:  No, sir, it does not. I do not feel pleasure. I am only an android.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Stardate 43917.4 The Enterprise has been given the singular honor of hosting the first face to face meeting between the Federation and the mysterious race of beings known as the Legarans. We are in orbit around Vulcan preparing to welcome aboard the Federation ambassador that has made this historic event possible.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  I can remember studying his career in school... the treaty of Alpha Cygnus Nine, the Coridan admission to the Federation, the Klingon Alliance...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})

(:Text {content:  I met him once... Many years ago, just briefly at his son's wedding. But I'll tell you it was quite a moment for a young lieutenant. Standing in the presence of such history... I was a little tongue-tied to be quite frank...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  You... tongue-tied?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Indeed. After all, how does one make small talk with a man who has virtually shaped the Federation...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Is it true that he'll be retiring after this mission?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})

(:Text {content:  Unofficially, that's what I hear. And what a crowning achievement this will be to his career. The benefits of relations with the Legarans are incalculable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Ah... Captain Picard. I am Ki Mendrossen, the ambassador's chief of staff. This is Sakkath, his personal assistant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Has the ambassador been delayed?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  He will be joining us momentarily. But first we must discuss some matters of the utmost delicacy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  By all means.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  To be frank Captain, the ambassador is not a young man. He tires easily.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  He is going to need a great deal of rest to prepare himself for the difficult job that awaits him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})

(:Text {content:  Which is why it's imperative that he be allowed to conserve his strength. I must request that you dispense with any official ceremonies you would normally accord a visitor of his rank.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  We had planned for a ship's concert this evening.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Yes, I believe that the ambassador is extremely fond of Mozart.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})

(:Text {content:  I'm afraid it would be impossible for him to attend. Upon his arrival he will be taken directly to his quarters where he will remain in seclusion until we reach Legara Four.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  You have my assurance that the ambassador will not be disturbed during our voyage.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  That's all we ask. Well, now... that's settled. The ambassador is waiting.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Welcome aboard the Enterprise Ambassador Sarek.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  We come to serve.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Your service honors us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Allow me to present she who is my wife.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Mrs. Sarek.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Please call me Perrin, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  This is my first officer, Commander Riker.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Captain, if you'd be so kind as to show us to our quarters.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  I prefer to view the conference room first.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Ambassador, I'm sure Sakkath and I can handle all the necessary details...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  I will examine it for myself.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Dear, perhaps it would be best if we settled in first.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  They worry about my health, Captain. Too much. You will take me to the conference room, please.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  If you'll follow me, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Are the Legarans really going to sit in this stuff?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Well, I'm sure not.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Can you believe this smell?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  What smell?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  What can I say... to us it's a slime pit, to them it's home.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  The environmental controls are ready. What's next?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Why? Are you in some kind of hurry?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  I have... sort of a date.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  With who?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Ensign Dumont.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  That is one attractive lady. I've got to admit I'm surprised.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  What, that she'd go out with me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  No, that you had the nerve to ask her. Way to go Wesley.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  The room is not ready.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  No Ambassador. Commander La Forge and Ensign Crusher are---})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  The Legarans are very sensitive in matters of protocol. You will remove all furniture from the room. The walls must be bare.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  I'm sure that by the time the Legarans arrive, everything will be set up according to our specifications. Isn't that right, Captain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Ambassador, please be assured that everything will be ready by the time the conference begins.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  My husband and I have every confidence in you, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  I have worked for ninety-three years in preparation for this meeting. It is vital that no detail be overlooked.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps we should allow these gentlemen to return to their work, Ambassador.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  That will be acceptable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  These walls are too bright.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  So what was the ambassador like?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  The way Mendrossen described him, I expected him to be a frail old man.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  I hope I'm that frail when I'm two hundred and two. His aides did seem a little overprotective, didn't they?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  From what I could see, the ambassador doesn't need to be protected from anything.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})

(:Text {content:  Nevertheless, we will honor Mister Mendrossen's request and allow Ambassador Sarek his privacy. I suppose they were foolish and vain, my expectations of this voyage. Sharing his thoughts, his memories, his unique understanding of the history he has made...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Does this mean you're going to cancel the concert this evening?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  No, the concert will go on as scheduled. But it is a pity that the guest of honor will be absent.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  For all we know, the ambassador might enjoy an evening's entertainment...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Why not ask his wife if she'd like to attend?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  I think that's an excellent idea.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  The bridge is yours, Number One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Come in, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  I hope I'm not intruding.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Not at all. But I'm afraid that Sarek is in meditation at the moment.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Actually, I came to see you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Why, how nice Captain. I so rarely get visitors of my own. Usually everyone wants to see the ambassador.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  I find that hard to believe.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})

(:Text {content:  These quarters are lovely. The ambassador and I were both very pleased when we heard that the negotiations would take place aboard the flagship of the Federation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  The honor is ours.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  My husband has followed your career with interest. He finds it to be satisfactory.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  High praise from a Vulcan.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})

(:Text {content:  Ah, then you have had experience with Vulcans, Captain. Some people who expect an emotional response often find Vulcans quite cold when they are merely being...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Logical.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Exactly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  I have come to extend my personal invitation to you... and your husband, if he is available, to attend a Mozart recital this evening.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Mozart? That would be wonderful. Any chance that they will be performing the string quartet number six?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  I'm sure it could be arranged.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  It's a very tempting offer... I doubt that the ambassador will be able to attend, but I will make it a point to ask him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  Well, then I hope to see you tonight.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  As do I.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  You are still unable to meditate?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  It is of no importance.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  It has eluded you for many weeks.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  I said, it is of no importance.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  You know I am right.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  My wife, you will leave me now. I require solitude.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  The temperature in the tank is now one hundred fifty degrees Celsius.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Okay, lock it off.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Is that it? Can I get out of here?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  What's your hurry? You don't really think something's gonna happen between you and Suzanne Dumont...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  At least I'm not spending the night with a good book like some people...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  What's that supposed to mean?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Just what it sounds like.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  You'd get more action out of a good book than you'll ever see on this date, I guarantee it... she's not going to waste her time with someone like you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Someone like me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  She's way out of your league.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Since when did you become an expert on women?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Compared to you, every man on this ship is an expert on women.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  At least I don't have to find my women in the Holodeck!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  What did you say?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  You heard me!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Something wrong?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  No, sir. Nothing wrong here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  May I be excused, Commander?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Anything you want to talk about, Geordi?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  No, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  I noticed that Lieutenant Worf put Ensign D'Amato on report... for insubordination.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  D'Amato's been an exemplary officer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Indeed he has. Look into it, Number One. I assume work has been progressing in the conference room?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})

(:Text {content:  Yes, sir. I checked on Geordi and Wesley a few hours ago. For a moment there... I thought that the two of them were actually going to... hit one another.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Ambassador Sarek, Perrin... on behalf of my entire crew, welcome.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  It was my wife's suggestion that we attend... and it seemed an ideal diversion. My wife can be quite logical when she so chooses.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  It seems the ambassador had more free time than I anticipated.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  This is Commander Data. He will be the featured soloist this evening.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})

(:Text {content:  We will start the evening with Mozart's string quartet number six. I am programmed to reproduce the individual musical styles of over three hundred concert violinists, including Heifitz, Menuhin, Grak-tay and Tataglia. Do you have a preference?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Tataglia would be lovely.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  I hope you find the performance pleasing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  I look forward to it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  At your convenience, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Hi Mom. I got a message you wanted to see me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  I thought you were going to be at the concert last night.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  I said I might be going. Suzanne wanted to go to the arboretum.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Captain Picard asked where you were. I don't like having to make excuses for you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Excuses? Come on, Mom... it wasn't an official function.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  You have responsibilities young man and I expect you to live up to them!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Don't you think you're overreacting a little?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Don't talk back to me!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Okay, I won't.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Where do you think you're going?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Away from you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Mom!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Really hard. I slapped Wesley.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28A})
(:Text {content:  Do you know why you did it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28A})
(:Text {content:  I never hit my son in his life.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28A})
(:Text {content:  Beverly, this is important. What were you thinking when you hit Wes?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28A})
(:Text {content:  That's just it... I wasn't thinking about anything. I was... just angry... so angry.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28A})
(:Text {content:  And Wesley didn't provoke you in any way? It wasn't anything he said, anything he did?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28A})
(:Text {content:  No. It was a sudden... burst of anger. I still can't believe I did it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28A})
(:Text {content:  I don't know why you did it either, Beverly. But I can tell you that I've heard the same kind of story from ten different people in the past two days.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28A})
(:Text {content:  Yes. It is normally occupied by Captain Picard, Commander Riker, and Counselor Troi.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Counselor Troi is Betazoid?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Half-Betazoid. Her father was human.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Then she is not a true telepath?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Her skills are empathic in nature. She can sense the emotions of other beings.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  What is Captain Picard's background in diplomacy?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Extensive. The captain's first diplomatic contact dates back to Stardate---})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  And what of his knowledge of the Legarans? Would he be able to conduct negotiations with the Legarans should the need arise?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Do you foresee such a circumstance occurring? Is Ambassador Sarek unable to --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Forgive me. I was merely exploring various possible permutations of our mission. Your tour of the bridge has been most informative.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Excuse me, we were sitting here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Well, we're sitting here now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Come on fella... this is our table.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Really? Funny... I don't see your name on it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Didn't your mother teach you manners?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Hey guys, some kind of problem here?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  There seems to be a question of who's table this is.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  There are plenty of other tables.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  I suppose you're right.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Why don't I get everyone another round of drinks?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  I don't need to tell you that insubordination is a serious charge to level against any officer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  I am aware of that Commander. However, Ensign D'Amato directly challenged my authority.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Is it my imagination, or have tempers aboard this ship been getting a little frayed lately?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  I hadn't noticed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  I see what you mean.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Geordi, what the hell is going on here?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  I wish I knew.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Security team to Ten-Forward.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  All right, that's enough!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  somebody's left hook is on its way to my chin.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Captain, this is not an isolated incident. There have been reports of random violence all over the ship...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Are you suggesting it is somehow contagious?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  There's no indication of a virus or bacteria... I've run every test I know... I've checked the water, the food replicators, airborne samples...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})

(:Text {content:  This is one hell of a time... Whatever it is, I don't want it to affect the ambassador... I want his quarters isolated from the rest of the crew until we can identify the cause.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  It's not that simple, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  We've been able to determine that these outbreaks of violence started... at virtually the same time Sarek's party beamed aboard the ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  We do have a working theory...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  We believe it's possible that Ambassador Sarek himself is responsible for these incidents.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  Sarek?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  I felt something from him during the concert... it was vague and undefined... but very disturbing...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  He cried. I saw that. I didn't believe it. A Vulcan moved to tears by music... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  Vulcans have the same basic emotions that we do. But they have learned to repress them. At the concert, I was sensing that Sarek had lost control...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  What would cause such a loss of control?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  There is a very rare condition that sometimes affects Vulcans over the age of two hundred. Bendii Syndrome.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  The early symptoms include sudden bursts of emotion, mostly irrational anger. Eventually, all emotional control is lost.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})

(:Text {content:  I can't imagine anything that would be more offensive to a Vulcan. Their emotional detachment is the very core of their being. But why would it affect others aboard the ship?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  Vulcans possess telepathic ability. Sarek could be unintentionally projecting these intense emotions onto other people... at random.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  And when the Legarans beam aboard...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  They could very well be affected too.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  Is there a treatment?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  Can't anyone take his place?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  Sarek has built a personal relationship with them. They will accept no one else. How can we confirm your diagnosis?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  We grow a culture from the tissue of the metathalamus... but the results will take several days.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})
(:Text {content:  I have twelve hours.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33A})

(:Text {content:  That's impossible, Captain Picard. I cannot delay the conference... not for a day, not for an hour. The schedule itself required three months of negotiations.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Nevertheless, I believe we are facing a potentially far worse...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  I give you my word of honor that the ambassador is in perfect health. Is that not enough?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Mister Mendrossen...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})

(:Text {content:  You are dealing with a theory full of holes, Captain. Why am I not affected by Sarek's supposed condition? And Perrin, how could his wife function normally if this theory of yours is correct?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})

(:Text {content:  I cannot explain that. Hundreds of others on board have not been affected either. I have not. The effects appear to be random. Proximity apparently has no bearing on the phenomenon.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  You are accusing the greatest man of his time of losing his mind. On the eve of his greatest triumph. And you cannot explain why... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})

(:Text {content:  I won't report this to the ambassador. For the moment. I do not want to divert his attention from the mission. And I don't want to jeopardize your career unnecessarily. But if I were you, in the interests of your career, I'd be very concerned about finding the real cause of these outbursts before the Legarans arrive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Mister Data, please report to my Ready Room.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})

(:Text {content:  Captain Picard is not satisfied with Ki Mendrossen's assurances that the ambassador is in good health. Do you consider Sarek capable of carrying out his mission?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Have I given you cause to think otherwise?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  You have voiced certain reservations about his abilities to me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  I do not recall making such a statement.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Directly, no. However, you did question me on the diplomatic capabilities of both Captain Picard and Counselor Troi.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  I am honor bound to help Sarek carry out his mission. That is the only answer I can give.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Then you must decide which is your greater obligation: your loyalty to Sarek or your duty to the Federation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Can you accept the logic of continuing the mission?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Tell your captain... the mission is in jeopardy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})

(:Text {content:  Sakkath has been able, until very recently, to use his telepathic skills to reinforce Sarek's emotional control and thus protect others from the effects of his deterioration.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  He hasn't been doing a very good job...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  The strain of this mission on Sarek has made it impossible.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})

(:Text {content:  Ironic isn't it? Despite our magnificent technology, we find ourselves still susceptible to the ravages of old age. The loss of dignity, the slow betrayal of our bodies by forces we cannot master.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  Still want to be one of us, Data?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  Sir, it is conceivable that even for me, time will eventually lead to a irreparable circuit failure. But there is one thing I do not understand...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  Yes... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  Sarek is a logical, intelligent being. The effects of Bendii Syndrome are apparent. Why would such a man choose to ignore them?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})

(:Text {content:  Logic fails us sometimes, Data. This is one of those times. I can only guess that he does not see or does not wish to see the truth. And he is being insulated from that truth by those who love him the most.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  Someone has to confront him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  It is not a task I look forward to.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  I don't understand this... everyone's protecting Sarek... his wife, Mendrossen, even you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  What would you have me do... march down there and destroy the man?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  The mission with the Legarans cannot go forward with Sarek in this condition.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  I know --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  Then tell him that there is no---})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  Don't you tell me...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  Captain... Commander...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37A})
(:Text {content:  You're right of course, Number One. But I am loathe to do what I must do.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37B})
(:Text {content:  I don't think I really understand what you're telling me, Captain. My husband is responsible for your crew assaulting one another... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  He is very ill, Perrin.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Bendii Syndrome is more a folk tale than a disease. There hasn't been a true case in my husband's lifetime.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  There is one now. Sakkath knows.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Sakkath? Sakkath knows nothing my husband didn't teach him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  He knows. More than that, he has been consciously holding Sarek's mind together on this mission as well as he could...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  That is not true!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  I must see Sarek.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})

(:Text {content:  Captain, I know a good deal about the Vulcan mind and I know a good deal about the heart of one particular Vulcan. I am his wife and I tell you he is fine. He does not have Bendii Syndrome. And that shall be the end of it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  I'm sorry.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Please... you must not do this to him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 39})
(:Text {content:  Must not do what, my wife?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  If Captain Picard wishes to see me, he may do so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  I regret that we have seen so little of each other on this voyage, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  The loss is mine, Ambassador.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Captain, may I talk to you in private --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  You were speaking of your belief that I suffer from Bendii Syndrome. I have been accused of many things in my life... but never an excess of emotion.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Sarek, I see no reason to continue this discussion...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})

(:Text {content:  On the contrary, I wish to assuage any fears that the captain may have regarding my capabilities. I believe there is a test for Bendii Syndrome, I will take it immediately.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Unfortunately the results would not be available for several days... which is why I must ask for a postponement of the conference.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  That would be a mistake. Captain I give you my word that I am in perfect health.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Then why must Sakkath help you contain your emotions?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Is what the captain says true?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  No, Ambassador, absolutely not.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Perrin were you aware of this?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Sakkath, I await an answer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  I have used my limited abilities to strengthen... your mental discipline.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Your efforts will no longer be required.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  That would not be wise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  It may not be wise... but it is necessary.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Leave us. I wish to speak with Captain Picard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Sarek, I ask you to reconsider.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  Obey my wishes. There is nothing to fear.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 42})
(:Text {content:  I hope I have not embarrassed you, Ambassador.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  You seem to forget I am a Vulcan, Captain. I am not affected by emotional considerations.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  I believe you are affected, sir... far more than you realize.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  I am a logical being. Present your arguments. I will listen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  There has been an epidemic of violent incidents aboard the Enterprise. As we speak, the situation is worsening.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  And it is your hypothesis that I am the cause of these incidents?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  My chief medical officer has explored all other probable causes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  I share your concern for your crew. However, you must agree it is not unusual for a starship to encounter unexplained phenomena.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  That is correct.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Therefore, since I can assure you that I am not the cause of your difficulties, the logical course of action is for your doctor to continue her search.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  She is... but the fact remains that these incidents began shortly after your arrival.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Is your entire argument to be based on mere coincidence?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Is it also coincidence, that your wife and chief of staff have been carefully isolating you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})

(:Text {content:  I believe I now see the flaw in your logic. You are reacting to their overprotective attitudes towards me. They are both somewhat emotional regarding my... age.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Surely Sakkath is not influenced by emotions.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Am I to be branded by the judgment of a child? Sakkath is young and inexperienced. He erred in his assumption that I needed help.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  But you did need his help at the concert.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Or perhaps you have a logical explanation for what happened that night?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  What... happened?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  I saw you crying.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  I did not... cry.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  I was there... I saw the tears.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  You exaggerate, Captain. I recall... only one tear.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Then you were emotionally affected by the music.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  You still have not answered me, Sarek. Is it logical for a Vulcan to cry?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  It was late... I was fatigued. Nothing more.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})

(:Text {content:  The Legarans trust only me. They will not meet with any other representative of the Federation. I must be allowed to complete my mission. There are no other logical solutions.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  No other logical solutions? But Ambassador, there are always other solutions. You have said so yourself many times.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  What I meant was... Sarek of Vulcan was never afraid to look straight at something he did not want to see.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  I warn you Captain, your efforts to discredit me will not succeed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Sarek of Vulcan never confused what he wanted with the truth.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  I will not be spoken to in such a manner.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Is that anger I hear in your voice?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  It would be illogical for a Vulcan to show anger... it would be illogical... illogical...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, supplemental. In three hours time we are scheduled to meet with the Legaran delegation. However it is now all too evident that Ambassador Sarek is in no condition to proceed with the conference.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  We're entering the Legaran system, Captain. Shall I have Mister Worf contact their ambassador?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  No. I will present our regrets to the Legarans personally. It is vital that they understand our reasons for cancelling the negotiations.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Captain, with all due respect... I think you did the right thing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  But at what cost, Number One?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Come.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Perrin?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  I must speak with you, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  I'll be on the bridge, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  How is the ambassador?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Resting. I've come to ask you to reconsider your position.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  You know that's impossible.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Sarek is a... good man, Captain. He has given the Federation a lifetime of service. I beg you, let him keep the respect he has earned.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  He will never lose that respect.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})

(:Text {content:  If you need to blame someone, blame Mendrossen and me. But we never wanted to deceive you. My husband's... condition... came on him so... gradually. It was so easy to... delude ourselves, to pretend that nothing was wrong. We convinced ourselves that he could complete this one last task... and end his career... the way it began... with dignity.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  I'm not blaming anyone.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Then help him, Captain, please. Help him regain his pride... his honor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  Believe me, nothing would give me greater pleasure. But there's nothing I can do.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  The mission can be saved. But he needs your help to do it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  A mind-meld... between the two of us? Do you realize the dangers involved in what you are proposing?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Ambassador, I do. But I also realize the potential benefits.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  We would be telepathically linked... exchanging our thoughts... becoming in essence one mind.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Which, for a few hours, should provide you with the emotional control you need. Enough time for you to meet with the Legarans and conclude the treaty.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})

(:Text {content:  It is a generous offer. But I must warn you that while I would gain your stability, you would experience the fierce onslaught of emotions unleashed by my... condition. Vulcan emotions are extremely intense... we have learned to suppress them. No human would be able to control them. They would overwhelm you... the mind-meld can be a terrible intimacy. I cannot allow it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I am aware of the risks, Sarek. But I believe it is the only... logical solution.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Your courage honors me, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I can't say I approve of this, Jean-Luc.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  I didn't expect you would, Beverly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Is there some way I can talk you out of it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  I'm afraid not. Though I do admit to a certain... trepidation. Your company is appreciated.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Come.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  I see you are ready, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Doctor Crusher will be monitoring our responses.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  A sensible precaution.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  My mind to your mind... your thoughts to my thoughts...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53A})
(:Text {content:  Commander, the Legarans are ready to beam aboard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Very well...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Number One, please inform the Legaran delegation that Ambassador Sarek is on his way to welcome them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Yes... Ambassador.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  NO!!!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})

(:Text {content:  It is wrong. A lifetime of discipline washed away, and in its place... bedlam... Nothing but bedlam. And I am helpless to prevent it! I am old! Nothing left but dry bones and dead friends. Weary, so weary.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  It will pass. All of it. Another hour or so at most. You're doing fine... Just hold on.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})

(:Text {content:  No! This weakness disgusts me! I hate it! Where is the logic? I am betrayed by desires... I want to... feel... to feel everything! But I am Vulcan. I must feel nothing. Give me back control...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Jean-Luc...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})

(:Text {content:  Perrin... Amanda... I could have given you so much more. I wanted to show you tenderness. But it is not our way. Spock... Amanda did you know... ? Perrin, can you know... how much I... love you? I do love you!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Beverly...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  I'm here... I'm not going to leave you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  It's so... difficult.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  The anguish in the man... despair... pouring out... so many... feelings... regrets...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  I can't stop them...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Don't even try.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})

(:Text {content:  First officer's log, Stardate successfully concluded the negotiations with the Legarans. The USS Merrimac has arrived and will transport the ambassador and his party back to Vulcan.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 63})
(:Text {content:  I hope your journey aboard the Merrimac will be uneventful.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  With the pressures of the conference behind him, I believe I can help maintain his control until we return to Vulcan.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  What will happen to him then?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  The effects of Bendii syndrome are irreversible. Medical research is always continuing, of course...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Thank you, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  He... loves you... very much.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  I know. I've always known.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  I will take my leave of you now, Captain. I do not think we shall meet again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  I hope you are wrong, Ambassador.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  We shall always retain the best part of the other inside us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  I believe I got the best part of that bargain, Ambassador.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Peace and long life, Sarek.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Live long and prosper.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Captain's Log, Stardate 43980.7. The Enterprise has been in attendance at the biennial Trade Agreements Conference on Betazed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  For the first time, the Ferengi are present, and I have reluctantly consented to their boarding the Enterprise for the closing reception.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Check... and mate.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2A})
(:Text {content:  Perfect. A queen's gambit... finished off with the Aldabren Exchange.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2A})
(:Text {content:  Unfair. I couldn't concentrate with all that noise...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2A})
(:Text {content:  It's Algolian ceremonial rhythms.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2A})
(:Text {content:  Hyoo-mans...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2A})
(:Text {content:  A toast to the success of the trade conference, Reittan. I must admit, I had some doubts when you invited the Ferengi.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2B})

(:Text {content:  They made a profit and behaved themselves. What more could one ask? Still, they trouble me. We Betazeds are uncomfortable with species like the Ferengi... whose minds we can't read.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2B})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps your telepathic abilities are ineffective owing to the anomalous construction of the Ferengi brain, which is composed of four different...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2B})
(:Text {content:  Thank you, Data. It was thoughtful of you to include Lwaxana Troi as part of the Betazed delegation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2B})
(:Text {content:  Her first husband and I were old friends. And I've known Deanna since she was a child.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2B})
(:Text {content:  I'm sure Counselor Troi appreciates this opportunity to spend time with her mother.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2B})
(:Text {content:  It's so marvelous to see you, Deanna, darling. At least pretend you're happy to see me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Mother, we're among non-telepaths... it's impolite not to speak aloud.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  You mean talk with my mouth full? Deanna, please!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  All right, I will say something aloud. Have you considered if you had stayed on Betazed just where your life might have...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Let's not guess what I might have done. I love my work aboard the Enterprise...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  I know. But all business and no play? You should enjoy life more, like I do. Find the right man, think of your future. Think of my future...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Deanna, Lwaxana. Anything I can do for you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  She is as repulsive as the rest of them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Repulsive? I find her exotic! And what an advantage their telepathy would be in negotiations...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  To read our competitors' minds... yes, that would be valuable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  She'd never agree to use her powers to help us...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  I'm not so sure.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Lwaxana Troi of Betazed, I believe. I am Daimon Tog of the Ferengi vessel Krayton. May I join you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  I was just going to see Captain Picard. Excuse me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Jean-Luc! Come have a drink and tell me what you've been up to.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Uh... perhaps later, Lwaxana. Data and I were just about to show Reittan Grax the new door mechanisms on the aft Turbolifts. Would you excuse us?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Lwaxana Troi, I desire you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Wha... what?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Your Betazed skills would be very useful to me... and I find you attractive. I'm willing to pay handsomely for you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  I don't believe this...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  You must be aware that every female has her price.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})

(:Text {content:  Let's get one thing straight. I am not for sale. And I'd rather eat Orion wing-slugs than deal with a toad-faced troll like you. Go find someone else to become your property.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  As you wish.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Now that you've totally humiliated us, may we return to our vessel?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  She's exhilarating, isn't she?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Now I want her more than ever. Lwaxana Troi will be mine.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Are we at war with the Ferengi yet?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Daimon Tog has returned to his vessel and the Ferengi have left orbit.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  I'm sure Mother will be relieved.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  I hear she handled the situation quite skillfully. An admirable woman.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  I'll be sure to tell her you said so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Come in, Little One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Mother. Mother, please.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Just a moment, Little One. I'm at one with All Being.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})

(:Text {content:  After that horrible little Ferengi insulted me, I needed to center myself. Can you imagine that creature talking to me like that? Didn't he realize I am the Daughter of the Fifth House of Betazed, keeper of the Chalice of Rixx?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Mother, the Chalice of Rixx is an old clay pot with mold growing inside it!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  My dear, when you become old enough and wise enough, you'll understand. Now sit down and talk to me. We don't spend enough time together.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  That's true. I'm sorry, and I didn't mean to be upset with you at the reception.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Deanna... you must understand, you're all I've got. My only concern is for your happiness.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  I am happy. Why can't you believe that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  I wish I could. How much happiness is there in always being there for someone else, but never being there for yourself?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  I get great satisfaction out of my work.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  I'm sure it's rewarding, in its way. But what about a family?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})

(:Text {content:  This is my family -- my friends I am your family, or have you forgotten? And if I have to spell it out for you, I'm talking about finding a husband, having a child. That's what made me happy. At least until now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Look, Mother. Perhaps some day I'll marry. But you've got to let me make my own choices... live my own life, not the life you'd choose for me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  You had a chance... with Commander Riker. And look how you ruined that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  I did not ruin anything. We became very good friends.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  All the better. You certainly wouldn't want to marry an enemy. But I see we can't discuss this. So have it your way, Little One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  Little One? When I was five you called me that. Stop demeaning me and address me as an adult.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9})
(:Text {content:  I'll be home on Betazed if you need me, Lit -- Deanna.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})

(:Text {content:  Adding preprocessors to the neutrino counters boosted efficiency by eleven percent. Of course, Commander La Forge and Commander Data did most of the work...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Not so fast, Wesley. Preprocessing the data with an optical chip was your idea.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Correct, sir. Although Commander La Forge and I designed the chip, Ensign Crusher derived the equations governing its operation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  The point is, you've completed our upgrade well ahead of schedule. Most impressive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Wesley can't help it. He knows what's coming and the grin just grows until he's all smiles.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})

(:Text {content:  As you might guess, your final entrance examination scores for Starfleet Academy have arrived. Congratulations. As soon as you complete the oral exam, you'll be formally admitted.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  We'll have you back at Betazed in plenty of time to meet the Academy transport ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Thank you, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  That will be all.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  A moment, Number One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Captain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Your science team is very efficient. How many days would you say they managed to shave off our mission?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Approximately three. Thanks to the equipment upgrade, we'll be able to complete our survey in less than twenty-four hours.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Splendid, Number One. You'd agree that this is a rather routine mapping mission?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Yes, sir...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Counselor Troi had the good sense to request shore leave. I see I'm going to have to suggest it to you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Have a good time, Number One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  I'm sure it was around here somewhere...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  It's been a few years. Maybe it died.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  You know Muktok plants live for hundreds of years...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Here it is...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  It's lovely. I remember this music... and all the good times we had.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  A certain junior lieutenant will always remember meeting a very serious psychology student. It was the best thing about being assigned to Betazed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Put the food down over there, Mister Homn.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Isn't it a beautiful day for a picnic?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Mother! How did you know about this place?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Your father used to bring me here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  And you even brought provisions. Very thoughtful.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Try this oskoid. The sap keeps it deliciously warm.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Very, very tasty. Tell me, Lwaxana, the last time we met, you were searching for a husband. Did you have any luck?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Alas, no, but what happens to me isn't important. I'm more concerned about other people getting on with their lives.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Mother, this isn't the time or the place...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Did I mention any names?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  You didn't have to.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Can I help it if all my friends are becoming grandparents? How about you, Will. Have you ever thought of having children?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})

(:Text {content:  There was a time when I thought having children and a career in Starfleet were incompatible. But with Galaxy class starships having families aboard, I've considered that possibility...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Yes, the Enterprise would be a perfect environment to raise a family... with someone...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Mother!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Mister Homn, I saw some uttaberries along the path. Be a dear and pick some for dessert...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Mister Homn and I can go back home if you two want to be alone. It's such a romantic setting...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Mother, stop it!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Darling, you're so excitable these days. Have you thought about a leave of absence? I could talk to Jean-Luc...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Deanna, try one of the oskoids. They're different.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  What the... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  A gift for one whose beauty surpasses even these pericules.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Daimon Tog! I thought the Krayton left orbit hours ago.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  It did. But when I tried to put the image of Lwaxana Troi out of my mind... I could not succeed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  This is ludicrous! You came back to Betazed -- for me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Why continue to search for perfection once you've found it? And when I considered how useful you would be...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  I don't believe this...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})

(:Text {content:  Look, Demon Tog, or whatever you call yourself, I am the Daughter of the Fifth House of Betazed, Keeper of the Holy Rings. And unless you want to create an interstellar incident, you had better beam back to your ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Returning to my ship is exactly what I had in mind. Krayton, transport four immediately.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  No, Tog!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Deanna? Lwaxana?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Where are we?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  From the smell of things, I'd say we're aboard a Ferengi vessel.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  The Ferengi can't do this! You're Starfleet officers!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Tog must have missed that chapter in the Ferengi Book of Etiquette.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  The Enterprise is too far out of range.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Daimon... they have regained consciousness.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  Very good.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  What have you done with them?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 18})
(:Text {content:  I should have known. Even their transporters can't be trusted.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Why have you removed our clothing?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  Females do not deserve the honor of clothing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  We are not Ferengi females. They're as bad as humans. Look at the leer on his face.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 19})
(:Text {content:  No, his is an expression of revulsion. But it is a feeling I do not share, Lwaxana.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  It's cold in here. Do you want me to become ill?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  No, I don't. Farek, please arrange for their clothing to be returned.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Thank you, Daimon Tog.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  You must forgive the Doctor. He is not accustomed to dealing with Betazoid females. I have a business proposition for you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Thanks, but I'm not interested in any of your propositions.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Hear me out. Your telepathic powers could bring us both great profit.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  And why would I want to bring you profit?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  In order to keep your daughter alive and healthy, for one...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Farek! There's no need for threats. Lwaxana is a sensible female...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  I don't like the sound of this, mother.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  I believe I can control him, Little One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  I'm sure we can talk about this. Just the two of us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  A wise choice. Farek, leave us. And you may rejoin your friend.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  And now, Lwaxana Troi, let us \"talk\"...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20})
(:Text {content:  Fifteen hours from Gamma Erandi, and the subspace static is already playing hell with communications...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Just what we might expect in a stellar nursery.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Wesley, my congratulations on passing your Starfleet written examinations. An excellent achievement.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Thanks, Data. Now if I can just do well on the oral exam...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  You will. And when you return, we'll be gaining the best ensign in the fleet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})

(:Text {content:  Actually, there is no guarantee Wesley will be reassigned to the Enterprise. Eighty-four per cent of Starfleet graduates are not posted to Galaxy class starships for their first assignment.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  I never thought about that... I always assumed I'd be coming back to the Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  I'm sure Captain Picard will request you... if he's still commanding the Enterprise when you graduate.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  I hadn't thought about that, either. I never thought I'd feel this way about leaving the Enterprise... and all of you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Is that not a part of the human experience -- growth and change?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  I suppose so...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})

(:Text {content:  I felt the same way when I left my family to go to the Academy. But it was one of the best times of my life. You're going to meet new friends, have adventures you can't even imagine yet...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  I hope you're right, Geordi.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  Little One --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  perfectly hideous to wear... he says it flatters my beauty.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  So far, mother's in no danger. I hope she knows what she's doing...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  She's bought us some time... let's make the most of it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  I wouldn't do that...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  I don't need your help.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  The hell you don't. You're two moves away from being mated.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Hey, I warned you. Now you've only got one possible escape...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  The Ferengi crewman smiles, makes his move, then stands up. The end. The crewman EXITS, smirking. Nibor sullenly starts setting up the chessboard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  See? You should've moved the bishop --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Ridiculous! The bishop was pinned...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Okay, don't listen. Forget that I beat you in thirty moves...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Pure luck.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  I was being polite. I could've won in twenty moves.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Then prove it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Pawn to Queen Four, King's Level.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Pawn to King's Bishop Three, Queen's Level.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  I must admit, when you first approached me on the Enterprise, I was intrigued.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  You mean revolted.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Maybe a little. Do you forgive me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Yes. With your powers we could be a formidable team.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  You have great strength in your hands.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  And you like that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  I have always admired strong males.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  You are beautiful... it is impossible to resist you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Then don't.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Initial scans of ionization patterns complete, sir. Now correlating sensor readings.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  It's almost incomprehensible, the amount of energy being expended...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Actually, it is five point three four times ten to the forty-first watts... well within the norm for phenomena of this type.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps... but that takes away none of the wonder.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Come in.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Hi. I brought you something...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  I hope it's small, because I'm taking way too much as it is...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Your friend Guinan sent this up from Ten Forward. It's not to pack -- it's for me to propose a toast with.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  To a future Starfleet officer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Mom -- thanks.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})

(:Text {content:  I won't say \"give it your best\" because I know you will. I won't say \"make me proud\"... because you already have. So I'll just say... here's to your future.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  This was Dad's...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  From the Stargazer. Do you have room for it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  No... but I'm taking it anyway.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Check.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  I'm sick of this game.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Of course -- now that you're losing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Who's losing? I'm just tired of standing up.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  You can't resign now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  It's too hard to play from in here. I can't even see the whole board.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Ah, then you'll finish the game if I let you out of the cell.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  I might...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Clever, hyoo-man, but I'm not that foolish.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  What -- you're afraid I'd try to escape? What would that get me? You'd still have her. And besides... where would I go?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  I do not trust you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Fine. Thanks for the game.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Come out here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Now save your rook... if you can.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Not much of a conversationalist, but what a lover. Then I met --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  I do not want to hear about your other romances. It makes me jealous.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  My, what big ears you have. Has anyone ever told you how attractive they are?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Some females think they are my best feature.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  No one has ever given me oo-mox like this before.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Oo-mox?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  There is no translation. But the ear is one of our most erogenous zones.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Then you shall have as much oo-mox as you desire.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Those Ferengi have iron jaws...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Little One --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32A})
(:Text {content:  Good work, Mother.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32A})
(:Text {content:  According to mother, Daimon Tog is... extremely relaxed at the moment.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32A})
(:Text {content:  Tell Lwaxana to keep him relaxed while we call the cavalry...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32A})
(:Text {content:  Access to communications denied. All transmissions to be authorized by Daimon Tog.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32A})
(:Text {content:  Let's see just how relaxed Daimon Tog is...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32A})
(:Text {content:  Mother -- we're out of the cell and we're trying to contact the Enterprise... but we can't do it without Tog's access code. Do you think --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Say no more, Little One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Lwaxana... you and I are going to make such a wonderful team... With your telepathy and my cunning, I foresee --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Tog is in ecstasy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Subspace interference is subsiding... communications have been restored...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Good. Contact Commander Riker on Betazed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Message coming in from Betazed, sir. Priority One.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  On screen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Captain Picard, at last. We've been trying to reach you for two days.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Our communications were blocked by the nebula, Reittan. Is there a problem?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  I'm afraid so, Captain. Lwaxana, Deanna and Commander Riker have disappeared.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  I knew I wanted you the moment I saw you... you have fulfilled all my expectations.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  How sweet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Farek thought it was a bad idea... but I knew better...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  How clever.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  I knew best... I always know best...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  How repugnant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
