(:Text {content:  I said, \"how romantic.\" I can't resist a man who knows what he wants... and goes after it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  That's me. And that's why I'm Daimon of this ship... I take charge of every situation. Whatever you say...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  My darling, would you like something to drink?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  You're so attentive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Does your food synthesizer know how to make an Arcturian Fizz?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  I don't think so...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  They have certain pleasure-enhancing qualities.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Mmmm...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Let me teach the computer how to make one. I'll need your access code...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  Yes, beloved... Computer -- access code Keh-ee Yoor-ee Dah-teh-ee Tog! Be silent!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  I knew you were not to be trusted.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Doctor Farek! I was... going to make Daimon Tog a drink...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Save your lies for this fool...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Daimon Tog, he's misunderstood... Don't listen to him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  No -- you've misunderstood. You've been tricked by a sly female who finds you repulsive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  She was only trying to serve...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Tog falls silent, realizing Farek's got him by the short hairs.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  It's time you took my advice. Let me study her.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Study her? Your mind probes could kill her.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})

(:Text {content:  You brought her aboard for her telepathic powers. If I can determine what neural configuration gives her those powers, we may be able to duplicate them. We could still profit from this.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  I don't know...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  A true Daimon would not be blinded by lust. Give her to me or I will be forced to report your transgression.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  Very well... take her.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38})
(:Text {content:  I wish I had some answers for you, Lieutenant Worf.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Mister Homn was no help?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  None. He last saw them as he was leaving this clearing. When he returned, all three of them were gone.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Lieutenant Foley found these in the pond. The species is Zan Periculi. It is not indigenous to Betazed, but to Lappa IV... a Ferengi world.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  We now have a reasonable hypothesis as to whom.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  The difficult question is where.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  The Ferengi ship is almost as fast as the Enterprise... she could be just about anywhere by now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})

(:Text {content:  Commander Riker will assume that we'll be searching for them... he'll find some way to send us a message. Mister Worf, I want continual monitoring of all Ferengi subspace frequencies. Mister La Forge, can you extend our sensor range?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  If I narrow the band and tie in long-range sensors to the subspace scanners, I can boost the gain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  Make it so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  Do you wish to leave orbit?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  Not until we have someplace to go.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44A})
(:Text {content:  I've tried everything I know... and it's no use. Without Tog's security code, I can't get near the communication system.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  We're running out of time... Farek's about to begin the neural scan on mother.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Maybe I'm going about this the wrong way. If I pick a minor subsystem... something non-essential...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Like this... the warp field phase adjustment. All this does is suppress the subspace interference generated by the warp engines.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Meaning what?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})

(:Text {content:  Meaning if I set up a simple oscillation, I can send out a signal. The trick is to create a message that the Enterprise will understand... but that the Ferengi will think is just normal subspace static.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  What's wrong?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Mother...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Riker makes a decision, picks up Nibor's phaser.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46B})
(:Text {content:  Come on.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46B})
(:Text {content:  Thanks for the help, but you'd better get aboard the Bradbury Soon as we're sure this works...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Initiating scans now, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Can we locate the Krayton?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Ferengi transmissions are routinely scrambled and encoded, sir. Without breaking the code, we will be unable to identify any specific Ferengi vessel.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  And Ferengi codes are damn near impossible to break...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Gentlemen, I have the utmost confidence in your ability to perform the impossible.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Captain, the Bradbury is hailing us. They can no longer delay their departure.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Mister Crusher -- now. We have no time for lengthy farewells. Good luck.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Thank you, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  The repetitive nature of the subcarrier pattern would imply a modified Greenlaw-Huffman encoding scheme...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Okay, I'll reverse-engineer the algorithm using a Pileggi sequence...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  Wesley... take care.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  You too, Mom.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Something the matter?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  We've been scanning Ferengi transmissions, trying to find the Krayton. One of the signals was... I don't know... familiar somehow...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Something in the message?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  No -- the message was scrambled... It was the static.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Where are you going?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  Sir, the Bradbury informs us they can wait no longer for Mister Crusher to come aboard.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Captain, I think there's a pattern to the subspace interference I heard on one of the Ferengi messages.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Wesley, unless you leave immediately, you'll miss --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  The interference itself could be a message. If I could just hear a replay of the subspace scans...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Signal the Bradbury they may depart. Play back the Ferengi transmissions...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Wait -- repeat that one. Put it on a continuous replay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Hear that popping noise? Data, can you filter out everything but that sound?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  That's Cochrane distortion... a fluctuation in the phase of the subspace field. All warp engines generate that kind of interference.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  But listen to the pattern... it's the Algolian ceremonial rhythm the musician was playing at the reception.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Mister Crusher is correct, sir. There is a temporal correlation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Then it is a signal from Commander Riker. Ingenious. He selected a signal we'd recognize... but one the Ferengi would dismiss as static.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Signal source located, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Plot an intercept course.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Course plotted and laid in, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Well done, Mister Crusher. Warp Eight.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Engage.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Get away from her.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Standoff, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Tog, can't we strike a bargain? All I'm concerned about is my daughter's safety... what happens to me isn't important.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  What are you suggesting?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Let me be candid, Daimon Tog. Deanna is of no use to you. She's only half Betazoid. And if you keep Riker, Starfleet will never stop searching for you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  If you release them, I'll stay with you willingly... and use my telepathy to aid you in your negotiations.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  I will also show you some of my other exotic skills...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  A tempting offer. I would like to believe you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  The offer is genuine. I give you my word as a Daughter of the Fifth House of Betazed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Lwaxana, don't.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  I've made up my mind.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  I can't let you do this...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  William, I'm a grown woman. I can make my own decisions, and I'm fully capable of entering into a contract.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Mother -- we can't just leave you here --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Yes, you can -- before he changes his mind. Please, Little One. Do as I say... just this once...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Do we have an agreement?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  You have my word. I will release your daughter and the Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Oo-mox is only the beginning...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Daimon -- we are being hailed by the Enterprise -- they demand the return of the captives --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  The Enterprise has found us --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Slow to impulse... raise shields. Inform the Enterprise that two of our guests are ready to return. The other will be staying with us -- at her request.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Daimon, I must protest --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  There is nothing to protest. Lwaxana will cooperate... therefore we have gained what we set out to gain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  But you cannot trust her --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Lwaxana has given her word. Now leave us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  You're both all right?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  None the worse for wear.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  My mother bought our freedom, Captain. But believe me, she doesn't want to stay with Tog.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Hail the Krayton.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Sir, Daimon Tog responding.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Captain Picard, so good of you to meet us. We were on our way to Betazed to return our guests.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Of course you were. But you're still holding Lwaxana Troi.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  When will you get it through your thick head that it's over between us, Jean-Luc?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  I think I know what she's doing. You must fight to get her back, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  It's not over, Lwaxana. You're mine and I refuse to let you go. Return to my side immediately.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  You mean... you still care?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  \"My love is a fever, longing still For that which longer nurseth the disease.\"})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Tell me more...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})

(:Text {content:  \"In faith, I do not love thee with mine eyes, For they in thee a thousand errors note; But 'tis my heart that loves what they despise; Who in despite of view is pleas'd to dote.\"})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  You didn't tell me that you and Captain Picard were --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  You said you didn't want to hear about all my romances. I have a new love, Jean-Luc. And you can't keep killing all my lovers. That simply has to stop.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Killing?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  He's insanely jealous.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Listen, Tog, no one possesses Lwaxana but me. And if I have to destroy your ship in the process, so be it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Captain, I had no idea Lwaxana was your woman.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Don't let him threaten you. You can defeat him. The only way you'll get me back is over Tog's dead body!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})

(:Text {content:  That can be arranged. Mister Worf, arm all phaser banks and photon torpedoes. If my beloved is not in my arms in ten seconds, throw everything you've got at the Krayton.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  But you'll destroy Lwaxana!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  than never to have loved at all... Eight, seven...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  No, wait!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Six... five...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Beam her to their Bridge... now!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Three... two...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  You wonderfully jealous fool.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  I trust there will be no further action taken against us?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Such as reporting this incident to your superiors who may question your competency as Daimon? I'll think about it. Screen off.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  And Picard cuts the communication. He looks to Lwaxana})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Mrs. Troi, I'm truly grateful that you risked your life for my... Really, that isn't necessary, Captain... I'd love to hear more of that poetry...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps another time. Mister Crusher, set course for Betazed. Warp Nine.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  There's so much to talk about, Little One... such as your future. Reittan Grax was telling me the other day that he has the nicest nephew...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  You asked to see me, Captain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  I've been in touch with Admiral Hahn at Starfleet Academy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  The Admiral regrets your missing the oral examination and hopes you'll reapply next year.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  I understand, sir. I do intend to reapply.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  In the interim... the Academy's loss is our gain. I'm gratified the Enterprise will continue to benefit from your talents for another year.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Is that all, sir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  There is one more thing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  For some time now I have been contemplating a certain action. Your conduct today has convinced me to take that action.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  I've reviewed your service record thoroughly... and I've decided upon the appropriate course.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  I am granting you a field promotion to full Ensign.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Congratulations. You're dismissed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 64})
(:Text {content:  Lwaxana Troi has beamed down to Betazed, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Notify Starfleet we are en route to the Xanthras system for our rendezvous with the Zapata.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Ensign Crusher, take us out of orbit and set course for Xanthras Three, Warp Factor Six.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir. Course set.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Engage.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})

(:Text {content:  Captain's Log, Stardate 43957.2. We are presently charting an unknown star system located in the Zeta Gelis cluster. This rather routine assignment has made for a refreshingly quiet time aboard the Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  That's her.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Don't stare.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Why not?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Because she'll see.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Good. You must let her see the fire in your eyes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  But what would I say... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Words come later, it is the scent that first speaks of love.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Thanks Worf, that really helps me a lot.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Hi, Geordi.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Hi, Christy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  So... how have you been?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Good.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  How are things down in Engineering?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Fine... uh really... fine.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Well, see you around.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  I have much to teach you about women.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Mister La Forge, report to Transporter Room three.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  What's this all about, Commander?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3B})
(:Text {content:  Sensors have discovered a small one-man ship crashed on the planet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3B})
(:Text {content:  We're picked up life-signs... humanoid, very faint and fading.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3B})
(:Text {content:  Radiation levels within acceptable limits.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  We can beam him out from under there, get him up to Sickbay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  He's not stable enough for transport. There's damage to his brain stem, his autonomic functions are failing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  His heart needs active neural feedback, it can't regulate itself. I need a volunteer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  I'm here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})

(:Text {content:  I'm going to hook your nervous systems together through my tricorder -- your brain will regulate both systems. That should stabilize him long enough to get him up to the ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Take deep, regular breaths. If anything goes wrong I'll break the connection.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  I'm fine... no problem.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})
(:Text {content:  Transporter Room, three to beam directly to Sickbay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 4})

(:Text {content:  Autonomic responses are still low... begin cardiostimulation... Sixty cc's of inoprovaline... massive infection is setting in... use the protodynoplaser to stabilize his immune system. We need to design a virus that can infiltrate his cell structure and boost his ATP production.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  What about Commander La Forge... he's waiting in the diagnostic center.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  I want you to give him a full bioscan. See if there are any residual effects from that energy discharge during the neuro-link.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  Keep his arm in cryogenic stasis until his vital signs are strong enough to begin surgical procedures.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})

(:Text {content:  From the size and shape of the wreckage, it appeared to be some kind of escape pod. The control system had been heavily damaged, that's probably what caused the crash.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  An escape pod... then it couldn't have travelled very far. Mister Data, any signs of other ships in this area?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  I am picking up a scattering of debris in extended orbit around the planet. It reads as refined metals and other synthetic compounds.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  The remains of a larger vessel. He must have left in the pod before the ship was destroyed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Sensors show trace elements in the debris that would indicate phaser fire was recently exchanged.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Were you able to salvage anything from the escape pod?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  This is all that is left of the pod's computer system.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Can you access it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  It will take time. Downloading it into our system will require fabrication of a matrix translator to emulate the alien's computer system.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Keep me apprised of your progress.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Limb re-fusion appears to have been successful, Doctor. Tissue oxygenation is within norms.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  That's all we can do for now. We won't be able to test neuromuscular function for a few days.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Can I go now, Doc?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  No need to keep you here. Your bioscan came out negative.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  I could have told you that. I feel great.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  How's your patient, Beverly?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  I never thought he'd make it this far. There was major trauma to the head and chest cavity, massive plasma loss, and severe damage to most of his organs.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  What are his chances?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})

(:Text {content:  I believe he'll live... but I'm afraid I can't take the credit for it. His body is showing amazing recuperative powers. The damaged tissue is repairing itself at a phenomenal rate. There's only one thing that troubles me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Go on.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Take a look at this.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Cell regeneration?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Yes... the thing is that it has nothing to do with his injuries. These are undamaged cells, but they seem to be mutating.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Any theory as to what's causing it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})

(:Text {content:  No. I've never seen anything like it. It's possible this could be part of his natural healing process. I hope it is... because there's nothing I can do to stop it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  I'm telling you Data, there's got to be some way to decode the information in this thing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9A})

(:Text {content:  I agree Geordi. But the data matrix within the capsule does not correspond to any standard format. All we have been able to determine is that the device uses a chemically based system for molecular energy encoding.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9A})

(:Text {content:  Yeah, and the computer still can't analyze the specific chemical elements involved. It's got to be part of the data processing system... What if it's a feedback loop controller?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9A})
(:Text {content:  The compact shape does suggest a rapid chemical processing and storage capacity.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9A})

(:Text {content:  We found it close to the escape pod instrumentation assemblage... this capsule might process the ship's dynamic motions and augment the manual control inputs. We could send it a few test signals... make it think the entire assemblage was awake and operating.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9A})

(:Text {content:  An intriguing experiment. The capsule might provide us with information without the need to decode the storage medium itself. Perhaps we could examine your theory immediately.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9A})
(:Text {content:  Less talk, more synthehol. We came here to relax.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9A})
(:Text {content:  I am relaxed. In fact, I've never felt better.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9A})
(:Text {content:  But you know, Worf you do have a point. I think the storage capsule can wait awhile.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9B})
(:Text {content:  Hi. Not leaving, are you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9C})
(:Text {content:  Oh hi, Geordi... I was just on my way down to the arboretum.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9C})
(:Text {content:  Care for some company?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9C})
(:Text {content:  I'd love some. But I didn't think you were interested... in that kind of thing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9C})
(:Text {content:  There are a lot of things you don't know about me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9C})
(:Text {content:  I have been tutoring him. He learns quickly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 9D})

(:Text {content:  Medical Log, Stardate 43958.8. I have removed patient \"John Doe\" from the emergency bio-support unit. In just thirty-six hours most of his major organ systems have regenerated themselves to the point where they can now function on their own.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10})
(:Text {content:  I am... alive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10A})
(:Text {content:  You certainly are.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10A})
(:Text {content:  Thank you... for my life. Tell me... who am I?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 10A})

(:Text {content:  Captain's Log: Stardate 43960.6. Our mission to map the Zeta Gelis star cluster is proceeding on schedule. Meanwhile, Doctor Crusher reports that the recovery of the patient she has named John Doe continues at a remarkable pace.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Are you experiencing any discomfort?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  None. I can feel the life returning to my body.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  Your neurofibrowaves are functioning almost normally again. That puts you... about six weeks ahead of my original schedule.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})
(:Text {content:  That should give you and your colleagues something to talk about.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  You're all we've talked about since your arrival.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  I believe I'm ready for the next phase of my treatment.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  You're right... I think it's time you stopped taking up valuable bedspace.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})

(:Text {content:  Now remember... you've been off your feet for almost a month. These motor assist bands will provide electrical stimulation to your arms and legs. They'll help you re-learn to control your muscles. Now, don't be disappointed if your mobility is restricted at first... your limbs are still weak.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  I appreciate your concern Doctor. But I think I'm going to surprise you again. I feel strong enough to fly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  But perhaps I should concentrate on walking first.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Let's try again. But this time... a little more slowly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Much more slowly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  I envy your reflexes, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  And I envy your strength of will. Doctor Crusher has kept me informed of your progress. It's quite extraordinary.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  I have an extraordinary doctor. She gave me back my life. I hope that I'm worthy of her efforts.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Tell me John, are you still unable to recall anything at all about your past?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  No... my memories begin the moment I woke up in Sickbay. Doctor Crusher told me... you think I was in some kind of battle.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  We're quite certain of that. But you have no idea how you came to be in that escape pod, or what happened to your ship?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  No. Believe me, Captain it's a horrible feeling. Not knowing who you are, where you're from...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Have you tried synaptic induction?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})

(:Text {content:  His neural nets don't conform to any known patterns. Conventional neurotherapy has proven ineffective. Hopefully, in time, his memory pathways will reestablish themselves naturally.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  That same pain again?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  I think I've made enough progress for one day.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Not a relapse I hope.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  This has nothing to do with his wounds. I think it's related to the continuing mutation of his cell structure.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Still no theory as to what's causing it?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  None. I've run every test I could think of... it just doesn't make any sense.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  I seem to be a mystery, Doctor. To you... and to myself.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  This is where I get off. See you tonight in Ten Forward?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  I'll be there.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  Hello Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  Miss Henshaw.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  Bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  Deck six.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  So... you and Miss Henshaw have certainly been seeing a lot of each other.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  Every night this week.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  Is that all? Seems like you've been walking around with a smile on your face for a lot longer than that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  I guess I have. This last month or so... everything seems to be going my way. I don't know what it is, but something's changed around here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  The only thing that's changed is you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  Me? I'm the same guy I've always been.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  If you say so... but I don't remember the old Geordi having much success with Christy Henshaw.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  Maybe I am a little more confident than I used to be.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 20A})
(:Text {content:  What happened to you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  I was... uh... kayaking on the Holodeck again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  And now you've dislocated your shoulder. Sit down, I'll get the osteotractor frame.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Hi mom. We still on for dinner tonight?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Seven-thirty sharp. I'll be right back.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Kayaking again?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  So how's my mom's favorite patient?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Judge for yourself.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Hey... not bad.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Your mother promised me a tour of the ship tomorrow. You may find this hard to believe, but Sickbay can be an incredibly boring place.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Hey Doc... I'm dying here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Don't worry my friend... you'll be alright.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  The pain's gone.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  It's completely healed. I don't understand... what did you do, John?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})
(:Text {content:  I... don't know. It was... instinct. I just... touched him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 22})

(:Text {content:  I've run every test and scan that I can think of... there's no physiological evidence that would indicate he would possess such powers. But then, there's so much about John that's a mystery...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  You know... I really like him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  He does have a certain charm doesn't he? The whole medical staff has commented on it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  You seem pretty taken with him yourself.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})

(:Text {content:  I guess I am... taken with him. There's a strength and serenity about him that's very attractive. Yet, he's filled with such pain and turmoil... he's so vulnerable. I find him... very intriguing.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Sounds like there's more to it than that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Is that your way of asking if I'm getting romantically involved with him?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  You said it, I didn't.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})

(:Text {content:  My feelings toward him aren't romantic... exactly. I mean... I know that the... doctor/patient relationship can sometimes create a... false sense of intimacy... but this is different. There's an almost... spiritual connection. I guess I'm not making much sense, am I?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  I think I understand.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})

(:Text {content:  Data, I was thinking about the storage capsule last night. And I was wondering... what if we've been going about it the wrong way. We've been trying to analyze its mechanical properties. What if it is a biochemical storage medium?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Are you suggesting that it employes memory RNA like an organic cell?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Well, it does contain quantities of nucleic acids.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps the information sequences are encoded in the molecular patterns themselves.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Computer, scan the storage capsule. Analyze molecular sequences on nucleic acid chains.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Well what do you know. A navigational chart.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  It appears that your hypothesis was correct, Geordi.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  I knew it. Captain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  You found something?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  We have determined that the storage cube from John Doe's escape pod contains navigational information.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Can you match these stars to our charts?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Computer, run transformational matrix calculations. Match navigational referents to known stars in this sector.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Information on this sector is incomplete. No correlation.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})

(:Text {content:  I'm not giving up yet. Not after coming so close to cracking this thing. That might be flight path information from John's ship, but without a frame of reference, I can't determine the origin points.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Computer, assume those points are course corrections and derive gravitational values for stellar objects near the flight path.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Most of these are ordinary G-type stars... But this would appear to be a neutron star, possibly a pulsar.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Which means this might be a rotational time reference.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Computer, assume these symbols are pulsars. Translate associated values into standard temporal notations.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Computer, is there a pulsar with a rotational period of... one-point-five-two-four-four seconds within sensor range?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Affirmative.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Bingo! Overlay navigational chart using referenced pulsars and project a flight path back to origin.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Flight path originated at bearing zero-zero-three, mark zero-one-five. Distance, two-point-three parsecs.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  That's it, Captain. That's where John Doe came from.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  That bearing is almost directly along our planned course.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Good. Then we can continue our mission without significant interruption.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 25})
(:Text {content:  Home?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Yes... using the information we found in your escape pod, we may be able to return you to your people.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  I... cannot go back.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  And why is that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  You must not take me home, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  John, your memory... has it returned?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  All I know is that we came out here to escape.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Escape what?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  There were others with you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})

(:Text {content:  Yes... I was not... alone. But what happened to the others or what we were escaping from... I cannot remember. But I do know that I cannot go back... not yet.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  We will not arrive in your star system for at least three weeks. That gives us plenty of time to discuss this matter further.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Hopefully by then, you'll have regained more of your memory.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  You're right of course. I apologize for my outburst, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  It is... understandable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  This ship is astounding. It seems to stretch on without end.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  We can see the rest of it some other time. This is your first day out of Sickbay... I don't want you to overexert yourself.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  This looks like an ideal place to rest.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  My thoughts exactly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Truly remarkable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  What is?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  These people... they're all so different from one another... yet they work together freely.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Is it that surprising?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  It is... new to me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  My people are different... somehow. If only I could remember! Yesterday... for one terrifying moment, there was clarity.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  You mean that energy pulse... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Yes. For that moment, my purpose seemed clear... but then it was gone.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  The pain... the energy pulse... they must all be linked to the cell mutation in your body. I wish there was some way I could help you get to the truth.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Thank you... Beverly, you've done so much for me already. I only wish there was some way I could repay you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  But you have...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  The... friendship... that we've developed has made me... very happy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})

(:Text {content:  The rapport that exists between us... also means a great deal to me. But I believe that I am on some kind of journey. Whatever brought me here... whatever is happening to my body... it's all part of that journey... and I must complete it... before any other consideration.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 28})
(:Text {content:  Sir, I am reading a vessel on long-range scanners... it is coming from sector nine five six nine.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  What configuration?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Impossible to identify at this distance. However, it is on an intercept course.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Captain, the ship is traveling at warp nine point seven two.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Nine point seven two?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Time to intercept?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  At present course and speed... ten hours fifty-three minutes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Try to hail them, Mister Worf.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  No response, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Monitor their approach... repeat hail every half hour.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Aye sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Whoever they are, they're in a big hurry to get here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 30})
(:Text {content:  Doctor Crusher, medical emergency, room four.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Can't... make it... stop...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  John tell me... is it worse than before?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Much... worse.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Should I get something for the pain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  No. The readings are fluctuating too wildly... it wouldn't do any good, his entire cell structure... is transforming.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Beverly! I have to... leave!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Where do you want to go?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  I must... get off... this ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  John, that's impossible. In your condition---})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  I must... !})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 33})
(:Text {content:  Security...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  Okay, let's realign the magnetic inducers on the starboard nacelle.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  John!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  Leave the control booth immediately!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 41})
(:Text {content:  John! Listen to me! You must come down!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Step away from the controls.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  Get back! Please... stay away!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  I have no wish to harm you... but you must return to Sickbay immediately.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  No! Do not come any closer! I have no control over what's happening to me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  His neck is broken. No life signs. Sickbay, form a resuscitation team, we have a code seven in shuttle bay two. Transporter room, standby...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 47})
(:Text {content:  No... don't.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  There's no trace of injury.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  You admit you were trying to steal a shuttlecraft.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Yes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  So I ask you again -- why?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I don't know!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  No response from John.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Dammit, I'm entitled to an answer. You nearly killed a member of my crew.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  And healed him.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I am not forgetting that. It's the only reason he's here, and not in the brig.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I warned him... told him it was dangerous.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Why? Why is it dangerous? What is happening to you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I don't know.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})

(:Text {content:  The rate of metamorphosis is accelerating. Almost as if your body were generating an electrical field that's warping the tissue. I can't explain what I don't understand.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Who are you? What are you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I am afraid... for myself... for all of you. I have to get away... isolate myself. Whatever is happening to me, it's dangerous.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  As Lieutenant Worf discovered.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I don't want to hurt anyone. Captain, for the sake of your crew, let me go before it happens again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  John, I can't believe you're capable of harming any --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Captain, the alien vessel is coming within weapons range. Its shields are up.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  On my way. Take him back to Sickbay. I want him under constant surveillance.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I want to thank you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  For what?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  I don't know how -- or why -- but down on the planet, you gave me something... a new confidence.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  I doubt I can take credit for that... Perhaps I only helped you find something you already had.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Alien vessel approaching at half-impulse, heading zero-five-one mark one-one-four.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  Raise shields. Slow to one-third impulse and bring us to one-zero-three mark zero-two-five. Mister Worf, hail the alien vessel.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  They continue to ignore our hails, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  They are scanning us, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 53})
(:Text {content:  They are answering our hail, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  On screen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  You know him?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Yes... I don't know how, but... He's dangerous...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  I am Commander Sunad, of Zalkon. You are trespassing into our space... and you are holding a Zalkonian citizen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  I am Captain Jean-Luc Picard, of the United Federation of Planets. We intend no transgression of --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  You will return him to us immediately.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Sunad -- this individual is our guest. We found him dying in a shipwreck and returned him to health.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Then you have aided a criminal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  He is one of four escaped prisoners. We eliminated the other three.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  We thought this one dead as well. Return him so we may complete our task.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Of what is he accused?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  He is a disruptive influence. He spreads lies... encourages dissent... disturbs the natural order of our society.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  That is not your concern. I will give you two hours to comply.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 55})
(:Text {content:  Tactical analysis.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  The Zalkonian ship has a formidable armament. Their weaponry is comparable to ours.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  They're just as fast -- and probably just as maneuverable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  Counselor. Do they mean to carry out their threat?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  I believe so. Sunad's hatred for John was evident... but there's something else. The Zalkonians fear John.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  Commander Riker, Counselor, Doctor. John, I'd like you to join us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  Mister Data, you have the Bridge. Mister Worf -- stay at Tactical. Counter any moves the Zalkonian makes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  Aye, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  I can neither confirm nor deny what the Zalkonians told you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  They make serious accusations against you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Their accusations may be true. I don't know. I don't believe I am a criminal...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  You understand the difficult position in which I'm placed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})

(:Text {content:  Completely. And I refuse to place your ship in danger. If necessary, I'll surrender to them. But I'm convinced there's more at stake here than my life... there's something... important I must complete... my survival is vital.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  If I could explain it, I would...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  I'll inform you of my decision shortly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Captain, you can't seriously be considering --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  We must consider all options, Doctor, without letting our personal feelings impede our judgment.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  You're going to tell me it's irrelevant that we'd be sending him to his death...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})

(:Text {content:  Exactly. Whether we approve of the Zalkonians' motives is not at issue. For what it's worth, I suspect John may be correct that his existence has broader ramifications than that of a simple criminal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Sunad thinks so. He feels personally threatened by John.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Sunad called John a \"disruptive influence.\" That's hardly a capital offense --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  It is not up to us to judge their laws, Doctor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  I know how I'd feel if the situation were reversed... if they were in our territory, holding a Federation citizen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  The Zalkonians truly don't understand our indecision about returning John. In their eyes, we shouldn't be involved.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  We are involved. I saved his life. For what? So they could chase him down and take that life away?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})
(:Text {content:  Picard -- we will not tolerate more delays.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Commander, let me remind you we are on a mission of exploration... our purpose is to establish peaceful relations with the civilizations we encounter.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  We do not want relations with you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  If that is your wish -- we will respect it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  We simply want you to leave Zalkonian space as soon as you return the criminal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Commander, we will leave. It is not our policy to intervene in the affairs of other cultures.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  But before I return the survivor to you, I would appreciate a more detailed explanation of what he has done to merit a death sentence.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  As I said -- it is not your concern.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})

(:Text {content:  Agreed. However, there are circumstances of which you may be unaware. The survivor has suffered a memory loss -- he is, therefore, ill-equipped to defend himself against your accusations.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  There is no defense. Our judgment is final.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Since his recovery, he has manifested unusual abilities --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  What kind of abilities?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  He apparently has the power to heal injuries with a simple touch...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Lies!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Obviously he has corrupted you as well. I see I am wasting my time --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 61})
(:Text {content:  Shields ineffective...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  I can't... breathe...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 65})
(:Text {content:  It's come back to me, Beverly... I know who I am -- what I am.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  Ready all weapons.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75})
(:Text {content:  That will be futile. You will no longer harm these people, Sunad.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75})
(:Text {content:  Fire upon that ship...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75})
(:Text {content:  I won't hurt you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  Kill him, Captain -- he's evil...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  You could learn from these people, Sunad. They don't fear me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  They don't realize how dangerous you are -- you and the others like you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  That's what you and the other leaders have maintained for generations. But it's a lie.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})

(:Text {content:  Captain -- my species is on the verge of a wondrous evolutionary change... a transmutation beyond our physical being. I am the first of my kind to approach that metamorphosis. They tried to convince us it was a sickness we'd never survive... that the pain and energy pulses would kill us. They claimed we were dangerous... so they destroyed anyone who exhibited signs of the transfiguration.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  We were protecting our society...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  By murdering us? You saw the mutations as a threat to your authority... you were terrified of something you couldn't understand.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  as he TRANSFORMS -- and his body begins to GLOW in a hundred colors.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 76})
(:Text {content:  There is nothing to fear. You can join me. All Zalkonians can. Let me show you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  Don't touch me!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  As you wish. But others will listen... now that you can no longer prevent me from telling them the truth. Those who are willing will follow me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  Sunad is back aboard the Zalkonian vessel, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 77})
(:Text {content:  Captain... my people are about to embark upon a new realm, a new plane of existence... thanks to you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 78})
(:Text {content:  It is our mission to seek out life... in all its forms. We are privileged to have been present at the emergence of a new species.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 78})
(:Text {content:  You gave me life... and more. I don't have the words for my gratitude... nor my sorrow at leaving you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 78})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Stardate 43994.1. The Enterprise has arrived at Jouret Four in response to a distress signal from one of the Federation's outermost colonies.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 1})
(:Text {content:  Anything from the surface?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Nossir. There have been no communications from the colony for over twelve hours.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Sensors picking up any signs of life?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  None.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  The surface environment is safe for transport, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 2})
(:Text {content:  Mister O'Brien, verify these are accurate coordinates for New Providence colony.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})
(:Text {content:  Coordinates verified, sir. You're at the center of town.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 3})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Stardate 43997.6. Admiral Hanson and Lieutenant Commander Shelby of Starfleet Tactical have arrived to review the disappearance of New Providence colony. No sign remains of the nine hundred inhabitants.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 5})
(:Text {content:  The truth is... hell, we're not ready. We've known they were coming for over a year... we've thrown every resource we've got into this but still...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Then, you're convinced it is the Borg... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  That's what I'm here to find out. The initial descriptions of these surface conditions are almost identical to your reports from system J-two-five.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Mister Riker wrote those reports... he agrees with you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})

(:Text {content:  Commander Shelby took over Borg tactical analysis six months ago. I've learned to give her a wide latitude when I want to get things done... That's how I intend to operate here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  My priority has been to develop some kind, any kind of defense strategy...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Obviously nothing we have now can stop them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  We've been designing new weapons... but they're still on the drawing board.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  We expected much more lead time. Your encounter with the Borg was over seven thousand light years away...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  If this is the Borg, it would indicate they have a source of power far superior to our own...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  I'd like to see the colony site as soon as possible, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  It'll be night at the site in thirty minutes. We've scheduled an away team for dawn.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Why don't you show the commander to her quarters...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  It's our poker night, Admiral. There's always an open seat for you...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Next time, Commander. Your captain and I have a lot to cover. But rumor has it that Commander Shelby's played a hand or two...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Keep your eye on her, Jean-Luc. One impressive young lady...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  You seem rather taken with her, J.P.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})

(:Text {content:  Just an old man's fantasies. When Shelby came into tactical, every damned admiral's uncle had a take on this Borg business... she cut through it, put us on track.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Earl Grey?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Four sugars. She'd make you a hell of a first officer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  I already have a hell of a first officer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Don't tell me he's gonna pass up another commission?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  One's available?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  The Melbourne. It's his if he wants it. Hasn't he told you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  Well, I guess I knew this day would have to come... he'll make a fine captain, J.P.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})

(:Text {content:  You may want to tell him that. We're still waiting for his decision. Hell, this is the third time we've pulled out the captain's chair for Riker. He just won't sit down. And I'll tell you something -- there are a lot of young hotshots like Shelby on their way up. Riker could suddenly look like he's standing still next to them. He's hurting his career by staying put. If I were you, I'd kick him in the rear end for his own good.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 6})
(:Text {content:  We know the Borg have no interest in power or political conquest...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})
(:Text {content:  They identify what's useful to them, then consume it. Or try to at least...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})

(:Text {content:  But here's the question -- after they take what they want... what happens to the rest? There has to be some evidence... residue... something that tells us they've been here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 7})

(:Text {content:  I don't know exactly what I'm looking for... but we've tested the sections of the Enterprise's hull that were damaged by the Borg. There were some unusual magnetic-resonance traces...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  A Borg footprint?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})

(:Text {content:  That's my theory. I'll see if it holds up tomorrow. I've reviewed your personnel... I'll be assigning Mister La Forge and Mister Data to accompany me on the away team...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  I've... already assigned them to the away team, Commander. And I'll be with you as well.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Of course. I appreciate any assistance you can offer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Tell me, something, Commander... is serving aboard the Enterprise as extraordinary an experience as I've heard?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Every bit of it.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Good. Because I intend to convince Captain Picard that I'm the right choice for the job.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Job? Which job... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  Yours, of course. I'm sorry... I heard you were leaving.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  If I am... I'm sure you'll be the first to know, Commander. Poker's at seventeen hundred hours, my quarters, deck eight...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8})
(:Text {content:  I will buy another card, Counselor.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  Got another king in the hole, Data?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  I am afraid I cannot answer that Wesley. And as you are a newcomer to the game, may I say it is inappropriate to ask.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  No help there.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  Fold. Again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  I'm in.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  Three jacks looking back for the handsome young ensign.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  Beginner's luck.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  Pair of deuces stands.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  Possible flush, possible straight flush. The bet is yours, Mister Crusher.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  I'm in for ten...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  Time to put on the long pants, Wes. I'll see your ten. And raise you a hundred.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  He's got the straight flush.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  Not necessarily. Commander Riker may be bluffing, Wesley.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  I don't think so. I fold.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  With three jacks? Wesley, you may get straight A's in school, but you've still got a little to learn about poker...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  I've only got two pair, Commander. But I've got to see that blind card. I'll call.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  You got him!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 8A})
(:Text {content:  Mister Data and our guest appear to be tardy...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Sir, Commander Shelby and Data beamed down to the planet surface an hour ago...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  On whose authority?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  On... hers, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 11})
(:Text {content:  Morning. Early bird gets the worm, eh? We've had some interesting results...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  It is an order. She obeys. Geordi and Data exchange a look...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  I believe Commander Shelby erred... there are no known avifaunal or crawling vermicular lifeforms on Jouret Four.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  That's... not what she meant, Data... but, uh, you're right, she erred...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 12})
(:Text {content:  I'm sorry... I woke up early and I saw a weather system was moving in... it could have affected the soil readings...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  So without any regard to the risk of coming down alone...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})

(:Text {content:  Really, Commander... if we ran into the Borg, two extra bodies wouldn't've made a hell of a difference, would they? We had three hours before the storm front hit, less than two hours now. Data was available. I took him. We came. I don't see your problem...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  My problem, Commander, is I expect to be notified before there's a change in my orders...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Noted for future reference. Do you wish to hear my report, sir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  Go ahead.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})
(:Text {content:  The soil contains the same magnetic-resonance traces... That's our footprint. There's no doubt any more. It's the Borg.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 13})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, Stardate 43998.5. With confirmation of the Borg's presence in Federation space, Admiral Hanson has returned to Starbase three two four to discuss strategy with Starfleet Command. Lieutenant Commander Shelby remains on board to continue tactical preparations.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 14})

(:Text {content:  all Federation and allied outposts have been warned... Ops will continue to monitor long range sensors... I've assigned Data, La Forge and Mister Crusher to work with Commander Shelby.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Very good, Number One. You've covered all the bases. As usual. What's your impression of Shelby?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  She knows her stuff, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  She has your full confidence...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Well, I think she needs... supervision. She takes the initiative a little too... easily. Sometimes with risks.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Sounds a little like a young lieutenant commander I once recruited as my first officer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Perhaps.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  You're the best officer I've ever served with, Will.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  But what are you still doing here?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  I hear you've been offered the Melbourne.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  I've decided not to pursue the commission at this time.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  She's a fine ship, Will.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  She's not the Enterprise. With all due respect, sir, you need me. Particularly now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Starfleet needs good captains. Particularly now. I cannot keep you to myself forever.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  I want you to reconsider your decision.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})
(:Text {content:  Are you asking me to leave, Captain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})

(:Text {content:  I'm asking you to look at your career objectively and make the best decision. I know it's hard to walk away. But you're ready to work without a net, my friend. You're ready to make the life and death decisions a captain must make. And, hard as it is to accept, if you choose to leave, the Enterprise will go on just fine without you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15})

(:Text {content:  What am I still doing here, Deanna? I've pushed myself hard to get this far... I've always said I wanted my own command. And yet something's holding me back. Is it wrong to want to stay... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15A})
(:Text {content:  What do you think?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15A})
(:Text {content:  Maybe I'm just afraid of the big chair.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15A})
(:Text {content:  I don't think so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15A})

(:Text {content:  The captain says Shelby reminds him of the way I used to be. And he's right. She comes in here, full of drive and ambition, impatient, taking risks... I look at her and I wonder whatever happened to those things in me? I I liked those things in me. I've lost something.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15A})
(:Text {content:  You mean you're older, more experienced... a little more seasoned...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15A})
(:Text {content:  \"Seasoned\". What a horrible thing to say to a man.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15A})
(:Text {content:  I don't think you've lost a thing... and you've gained a lot more than you realize. You're much more comfortable with yourself than you used to be...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15A})
(:Text {content:  Maybe that's the problem. Could be I'm too comfortable here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15A})

(:Text {content:  I'm not sure I know what that means. You're happy here... happier than I've ever known you to be. It really comes down to a simple question -- what do you want, Will Riker?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15A})
(:Text {content:  What?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15A})

(:Text {content:  Stupid. An old song I heard when I was a kid. Keeps running through my mind... \"Didja ever have the feeling that you wanted to go... still had the feeling that you wanted to stay... You knew it was right... wasn't wrong... still you knew you wouldn't be very long... it's tough to have the feeling that you wanted to go... \"})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15A})
(:Text {content:  you wanted to stay... start to go... change your mind... \"})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15B})
(:Text {content:  You start on Friday -- two shows a night, matinee on Wednesday.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15B})
(:Text {content:  I play the trombone too...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 15B})
(:Text {content:  Borg ship's subspace field... a definite pattern -- at four-point-eight minute intervals during your first confrontation with them.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 16})
(:Text {content:  Might indicate high-output auxiliary generators kicking in.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  One theory is that their systems are decentralized with redundant power sources located throughout the ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})

(:Text {content:  It is a reasonable conclusion. Borg technology has given each member of their society the ability to interface and function collectively. It is likely they would construct their ship with the same philosophy.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Knock out one generator and another takes over without interruption.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  What kind of damage would we have to do to shut them down... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Projections suggest a Borg ship like this one could continue to function effectively even if seventy-eight percent of it was inoperable.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  And our best shot barely scratched the surface.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  From what I've seen, I can't believe any of your new weapons systems can be ready in less than eighteen months, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  We've been projecting twenty-four.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Is there anything here we can try to adapt to our current defense systems... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  We'll have to look through the specs again. I don't know. My mind's turned to clay.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Mine too.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  I think we should look at modifying the plasma phaser design...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Commander, I think we should call it a night.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  All right. Anyone who's really that tired... if you want to leave...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  No, that's okay...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Go ahead, Commander...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  What would happen if we take the frequency klystron from the existing unit...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Riker interrupts, firm, but none of this ever gets loud})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  Sir, if you'll allow me to continue with Mister Data, who does not require rest...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  You need rest, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  If we have a confrontation with the Borg without improving our defense systems...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})
(:Text {content:  If we have a confrontation, I don't want a crew fighting the Borg at the same time they're fighting their own fatigue... Dismissed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 17})

(:Text {content:  At nineteen hundred hours yesterday, the USS Lalo departed Zeta Alpha Two on a freight run to Sentinel Minor Four. At twenty-two hundred hours and twelve minutes, a distress signal was received at Starbase one five seven. The Lalo reported contact with an alien vessel... distress signal ended abruptly. She has not been heard from since.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  How long to get there at warp nine, Mister Data?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  One hour, seventeen minutes, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Make it so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  We're coming with every available starship to assist, Captain. But the closest help is six days away.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  We'll try to occupy them pending your arrival, Admiral.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  I know you will. Hanson out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  All hands will stand to battle stations...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Commander Shelby, status of defense preparations?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Mister La Forge has a plan to modulate shield nutation... hopefully, that'll hold them off for awhile.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  At the same time, we're retuning phasers to higher EM-base emitting frequencies -- we'll try to disrupt their subspace field.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Your assessment of our potential effectiveness?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Shot in the dark, Captain. Best we can do for now.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Dismissed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 21})
(:Text {content:  Sir, reading an unidentified vessel just entering sensor range, bearing two-one-zero mark one-five-one...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Hail them, Mister Worf...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  No response, sir...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Move to intercept.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Sir, the vessel has already changed course to intercept us. Approaching at... warp nine point three... Entering visual range...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  On screen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 23})
(:Text {content:  Magnify.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Mister Worf, dispatch a subspace message to Admiral Hanson -- we have engaged the Borg.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 24})
(:Text {content:  Captain, you are being hailed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  I am?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Yes, Captain. By name.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Data, is it the same ship we faced at J-two-five?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Uncertain, Commander. However, dimensions are precisely the same.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  On screen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  I am Jean-Luc...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})

(:Text {content:  Jean-Luc Picard, captain of the Starship Enterprise, registry NCC-1701D, you will lower shields and prepare to transport yourself aboard our vessel. If you do not cooperate, we will destroy your ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  You have committed acts of aggression against the United Federation of Planets. If you do not immediately withdraw...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  You will surrender yourself or we will destroy your ship. Your defensive capabilities are unable to withstand us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  What the hell could they want with you?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  I thought they weren't interested in human lifeforms... only our technology.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})

(:Text {content:  Their priorities seem to have changed. Open channel. We have developed new defense capabilities since our last meeting and we are prepared to use them if you do not withdraw from Federation space. If you do so immediately, I will agree to arrange a conference of our peoples at a neutral location.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 26})
(:Text {content:  Shields are being probed... I'm modulating nutation...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 27})
(:Text {content:  Sir, the Borg are attempting to lock on to us with their tractor beam...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Load all torpedo bays... ready phasers... target coordinates on the source of the tractor beam...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Status of shields...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Holding...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  The nutation modulation has them confused...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  They have the ability to analyze and adapt, Commander...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29})
(:Text {content:  Shield modulation has failed... they've locked on...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  Shields are being drained... ninety per cent... eighty...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  Trying to recalibrate nutation... damn...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  Shields have failed.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
