(:Text {content:  Fire all weapons...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 29A})
(:Text {content:  Their subspace field is intact... new phaser frequencies had no impact...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 31})
(:Text {content:  Reverse engines...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Full reverse... we're not moving...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Fire at will...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Launching torpedos... phaser spread continuing...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Still no damage to the Borg vessel, sir...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 32})
(:Text {content:  Warning. Outer hull breach.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 34})
(:Text {content:  They're cutting into the hull... Engineering section...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  Geordi... evacuate Engineering...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 35})
(:Text {content:  People running... the thunder continuing... on the move})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Redirecting Engineering control to bridge. Sealing doors to core chamber...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Move it people!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Warning. Inner hull failing. Decompression danger, deck thirty-six, section four. Sealing Main Engineering.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 36})
(:Text {content:  Data, fluctuate phaser resonance frequencies... random settings... keep changing them... don't give them time to adapt...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 37})
(:Text {content:  The tractor beam has been released.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38A})
(:Text {content:  Warp nine. Course one-five-one mark three-three-zero... engage...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 38A})
(:Text {content:  They are in pursuit, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Maintain course.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Damage report, Geordi.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Hull rupture in Main Engineering... damage is heavy... We lost a lot of good people down there.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Eleven dead... eight more unaccounted for, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Repair teams to Engineering... seal hull breach...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  They didn't get to the core... I can control functions from here...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Approaching the Paulson Nebula, sir...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  Drop to impulse... take us in, Ensign...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 40})
(:Text {content:  The field is getting too dense, sir...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Steady... Mister Data, analysis of the nebula cloud...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Eighty-two percent Dilithium hydroxyls... manganese, chromium. It should provide an effective screen against their sensors, sir...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 43})
(:Text {content:  Prepare to take us in, Mister Crusher. Now. Mister La Forge, prepare to reverse engines, full stop.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 44})
(:Text {content:  The Borg ship is continuing scans... attempting to locate us...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Good. As long as they're looking for us... they can't hurt anyone else.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Shut down all active sensors, passive scanners only. Deflectors to minimum emissions.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Barely visible through the dense cloud.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 46})
(:Text {content:  Time index five-one-four... Data started to fluctuate phaser resonance frequencies... the Borg's beam breaks contact... Freeze picture.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 48})
(:Text {content:  The same shot in slow motion... there is a slight wobble in the entire Borg power system.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 49})
(:Text {content:  There's a two percent power drop, just for an instant... but it's system-wide... The phaser frequency spread was in a high narrow band.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 50})
(:Text {content:  Conceivably, the ship's power distribution nodes are vulnerable to those frequencies.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})

(:Text {content:  If we can generate a concentrated burst of energy with that same frequency distribution... I mean a lot more than anything our phasers or photon torpedos could provide...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  How do we do that?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  The main deflector dish.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  It's the only component of the Enterprise designed to channel that much power at controlled frequencies.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Unfortunately, there is one slight detail -- in the process, the blast completely destroys the Enterprise as well.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  But if we could get far enough away... increase the deflector range...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  It could work. In the meantime, we should retune all phasers, including hand units, to the same frequency.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Proceed. I'll inform the Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  There's one other recommendation I'd like to make, Commander. Separate the saucer section... assign a skeleton crew to create a diversion...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  We may need power from the saucer impulse engines...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  But it would give them more than one target to worry about.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  No, it's too great a risk...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I'd like the captain to make that decision, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I bring all alternatives to the captain's attention, Commander. That'll be all.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I'll need to install higher-capacity power transfers to the deflector dish, Commander...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  How long...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Better part of a day.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  She gets a full head of steam up, doesn't she...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Yessir... she's... a formidable presence to say the least. But I'm convinced she can help us here, Commander...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  I am too, Geordi. Don't worry about it. I can handle Shelby.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 51})
(:Text {content:  Come.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 52})
(:Text {content:  Come in, Number One... Commander Shelby was just telling me of your concerns about her plan...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  I'm sorry that she troubled you, sir... I already informed her...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})

(:Text {content:  Yes, I entirely agree with you. It's not the time. But I am afraid the time may eventually come when greater risks are required. I'd like you to consider her plan as a fall-back position and make the necessary preparations.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  Very good, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 54})
(:Text {content:  Deck eight. Battle bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  Halt. You and I have to talk, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  You never ordered me not to discuss this with the captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})

(:Text {content:  You disagree with me, fine. You want to take it to the captain, fine. Through me. You do an end run around me again, I'll snap you back so hard, you'll think you're a first year cadet again.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  May I speak frankly, sir?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  By all means.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  You're in my way.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  Really? How terrible for you.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})

(:Text {content:  All you know how to do is play it safe... I guess that's why someone like you sits in the shadow of a great man for as long as you have, passing up one command after another. Proceed to deck eight.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  When it comes to this ship, to this crew, you're damned right I'll play it safe.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})
(:Text {content:  If you can't make the big decisions, Commander, I suggest you make room for someone who can.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 56})

(:Text {content:  Captain's log, supplemental. The Enterprise remains concealed in the dust cloud. And to my surprise, the Borg have maintained their position, waiting for us to come out of hiding. I have no explanation for their special interest in me or this ship.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57})

(:Text {content:  Much activity. Repairs are continuing... supernumeraries working at the last patches in the breach area... at consoles, Geordi, Wesley, Shelby and Data huddle and compare notes... as Picard ENTERS, taking a slow, respectful inspection. The crew members look up to acknowledge Picard, who just nods,})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57A})
(:Text {content:  Trouble sleeping?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57B})
(:Text {content:  Something of a tradition, Guinan... touring the ship before a battle...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57C})
(:Text {content:  Before a hopeless battle, if I remember the tradition correctly.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57C})
(:Text {content:  Not necessarily. Nelson toured the HMS Victory before Trafalgar...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57C})
(:Text {content:  But Nelson didn't come home from Trafalgar, did he?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57C})
(:Text {content:  No, but the battle was won.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57C})
(:Text {content:  And you, Picard, do you expect this battle to be won?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57C})

(:Text {content:  We may yet prevail. It is a conceit but a healthy one. I wonder if the Emperor Honorious watching the Visigoths coming over the seventh hill could truly realize that the Roman Empire was about to fall. This is really just another page of history, isn't it? Will this be the end of our civilization? It is not the end.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57C})
(:Text {content:  You say that with remarkable assuredness.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57C})

(:Text {content:  With experience. When the Borg destroyed my world, my people scattered throughout the universe. But we survived. And so will humanity. As long as there is a handful left to keep the spirit alive. You will prevail. Even if it takes a millennium.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57C})
(:Text {content:  Captain Picard, report to the bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57D})
(:Text {content:  On my way, Lieutenant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 57D})
(:Text {content:  They're some kind of magnetometric-guided charges.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Status of shields.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Back to forty-eight percent, Captain.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Mister La Forge, I may have to take us out of the nebula... I'll need all the power you can give me.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 58})
(:Text {content:  Engines are ready, Captain. Recommend you adjust shield harmonics to favor the upper EM band when you proceed...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Acknowledged.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 59})
(:Text {content:  Direct hit... deck nine...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  Damage report...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  Structural latching system integrity breached...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  Take us out of here, Number One...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  Fire up the engines... half impulse until we clear the nebula... then punch it to warp nine.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  Ready phasers... load forward torpedo bays...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  Engage.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 60})
(:Text {content:  Borg tractor beam is attempting to lock on...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Fire at will. Continue rotating shield frequ...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Shields are failing...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  Tractor beam has locked on.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  They're holding us...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  It's no use... they've already adapted to the new frequencies...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62})
(:Text {content:  The Borg ship is disengaging... leaving at warp speed...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62D})
(:Text {content:  Maintain pursuit...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62D})
(:Text {content:  Borg vessel has reached warp nine... nine-point-four... nine-point-six...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62D})
(:Text {content:  Stay with them. Riker to O'Brien. Can you get a fix on the captain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62D})
(:Text {content:  Negative, sir. There's some kind of interference. I can't lock in on his signal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62D})
(:Text {content:  Senior officers report to the bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62D})
(:Text {content:  Sir, the coordinates they've set... they're on a direct course... to sector zero-zero-one. The Terran system.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62D})
(:Text {content:  Earth.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 62D})
(:Text {content:  Captain Jean-Luc Picard, you lead the strongest ship of the Federation Starfleet. You speak for your people.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  I have nothing to say to you, and I will resist you with my last ounce of strength.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})

(:Text {content:  Strength is irrelevant. Resistance is futile. We wish to improve ourselves. We will add your biological and technological distinctiveness to our own. Your culture will adapt to service ours.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Impossible. My culture is based on freedom and self-determination.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Freedom is irrelevant. Self-determination is irrelevant. You must comply.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  We would rather die.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  Death is irrelevant.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  What is it you wish of me?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})

(:Text {content:  Your archaic cultures are authority driven. To facilitate our introduction into your societies, it has been decided that a human voice will speak for us in all communications. You have been chosen to be that voice.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 66})
(:Text {content:  They're leading us into the heart of our own defenses...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  So far, they haven't had any reason to worry about our defenses...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  Commander, if the Borg stay at warp nine-point-six, we'll be forced to discontinue pursuit and power down in less than three hours.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  Two hours, forty minutes and three seconds.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  How soon before the deflector is ready?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})

(:Text {content:  We're close. Few hours maybe... I know I'll get it done in two... somehow... but Commander, I need serious power from the warp engines to make this weapon work. We're using all we've got just to keep up with them...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  We've got to get that ship down to impulse.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})

(:Text {content:  I'm leading an away team over there to get the captain back. We'll find a way to bring them out of warp... Ensign Crusher... continue to assist Mister La Forge... Commander Shelby, you will take the bridge and coordinate with Starfleet... Data, Worf, Doctor Crusher, you're with me...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  Excuse me, sir... with my knowledge of the Borg...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  Those are my orders, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})

(:Text {content:  Commander Riker... It is inappropriate for you to lead the away team. Until the return of Captain Picard, you are in command of the Enterprise. We are in a state of war. Your place is on the bridge.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  Commander Shelby, you will lead the away team.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})
(:Text {content:  Make it so.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 68})

(:Text {content:  First officer's log, supplemental. Our pursuit of the Borg continues at high warp on a course that will take us to the very core of the Federation. The devastation they could bring is beyond imagination.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 69})
(:Text {content:  These phasers have been retuned. Each has a different frequency spanning the upper EM band.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  All right... a reminder... we only get to use each of these once, maybe twice before the Borg learn to adapt. Don't fire until you have to...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  What kind of resistance can we expect?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  At our last encounter, the Borg virtually ignored us when we beamed aboard their vessel, Doctor. They clearly did not consider our being there a threat.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  That could very well change, however, if we start interfering with their plans.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  Shelby to bridge. Away team ready.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 70})
(:Text {content:  We've got fifty-eight minutes before we have to power down and disengage.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Understood.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Proceed. Commander, no unnecessary risks. If it becomes clear you can't succeed, I want you back here, alive... I don't want any dead heroes. Clear?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Very clear, sir. Shelby out.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  We've matched warp velocity for transport, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Energize.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 71})
(:Text {content:  Tricorder functions are minimal.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  Any signs of human life?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  Inconclusive.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  Look at this... this is extraordinary.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  These appear to be some kind of power waveguide conduits which allow them to work collectively as they perform ship functions.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  There's no way to take out enough of these to slow them down.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  The decentralized power system makes it virtually impossible.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  What about looking at it... from the mosquito's point of view.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  An interesting metaphor, Doctor. What is your idea?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  If we sting them in a tender spot... at least we might get them to stop a minute to scratch.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  Distribution nodes.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  If we take out a few of these, it just might make them scratch...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  The captain's communicator... it is still activated.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  Crusher to Picard, can you hear me, Captain...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  Can you locate it, Worf?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  This way...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73})
(:Text {content:  I strongly recommend redeploying all available defenses to protect sector zero-zero-one, Admiral...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73A})
(:Text {content:  We're moving to intercept at Wolf three five nine. We'll make our stand there. How much longer can you maintain pursuit?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73A})
(:Text {content:  Twenty-two minutes if they stay at current speed. If we can't bring them out of warp, we'll do as much damage as we can before we have to disengage.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73A})
(:Text {content:  Picard?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73A})
(:Text {content:  Nothing yet, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 73A})
(:Text {content:  In here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 74A})
(:Text {content:  Shelby to Enterprise.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75A})
(:Text {content:  Go ahead.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75A})
(:Text {content:  We've found the captain's uniform. And his communicator.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75A})
(:Text {content:  We're resuming our search.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75B})
(:Text {content:  Stand by, Commander.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75B})
(:Text {content:  We're in business.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75B})
(:Text {content:  It'll burn out the main deflector... but it'll be one hell of a bang.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75B})
(:Text {content:  Radiation danger?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75B})
(:Text {content:  We'll need to evacuate the entire forward half of the secondary hull. And the lower three decks of the saucer.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75B})
(:Text {content:  I'll see to that.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75B})
(:Text {content:  Commander Shelby... we have only seventeen minutes of warp power left. Do what you can to get them out of warp.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75B})
(:Text {content:  Acknowledged. Shelby out. Let's take out some of these distribution nodes and see what happens... Get ready. This may rile up our friends.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 75C})
(:Text {content:  Ready phasers...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  Fire.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 81})
(:Text {content:  Enterprise, encountering resistance, prepare to beam us back on my signal...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 84})
(:Text {content:  Enterprise... beam us...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 89A})
(:Text {content:  Wait! Look --})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 89A})
(:Text {content:  Captain!})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 94})
(:Text {content:  Enterprise, get us out of here.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 98})
(:Text {content:  Sir, they did it... the Borg ship is dropping out of warp...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 99})
(:Text {content:  Go to impulse.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 99})
(:Text {content:  Diverting warp energy to main deflector...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 99})
(:Text {content:  Move us to within forty thousand kilometers, match velocity. Commence arming sequence... Increase deflector modulation to upper frequency band...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 99})
(:Text {content:  The captain?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 99})
(:Text {content:  Sir, Captain Picard has been altered by the Borg. We were unable to retrieve him...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 99})
(:Text {content:  Altered... ?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 99})
(:Text {content:  He is a Borg, sir.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 99})
(:Text {content:  We'll go back... I need more people... we need to retune the phasers again... we'll get him out of there...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 99})

(:Text {content:  Commander, reading subspace field fluctuations within the Borg ship. Looks like they're regenerating... restoring power. They could be capable of warp any minute.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 99})
(:Text {content:  Is the deflector ready?})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 99})
(:Text {content:  Will, he's alive... if we get him back, I might be able to restore...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 99})
(:Text {content:  This is our only chance to destroy them... if they get back into warp, our weapon becomes useless.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 99})
(:Text {content:  We'll go back... we'll sabotage them again if we have to...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 99})
(:Text {content:  We can't maintain pursuit. We don't have the power. Prepare to fire.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 99})
(:Text {content:  At least consult with Starfleet Command. Get Admiral Hanson on subspace...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 99})
(:Text {content:  Belay that order, Lieutenant. There's no time...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 99})
(:Text {content:  Sir, we are being hailed by the Borg...})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 99})
(:Text {content:  On screen.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 99})
(:Text {content:  I am Locutus of Borg. Resistance is futile. Your life as it has been is over. From this time forward, you will service... us.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 103})
(:Text {content:  Mister Worf... fire.})-[:SAID]->(:Scene {id: 103})
